58b3(dkon brtsegs): zag med shes rab mngon par mi ba sgrub pas// des ni mdo sde 'dil mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zang ngo bor rab rtogs pa// des ni zag med shes rab bsgru ba mi nus
58b4(dkon brtsegs): zag med shes rab mngon par bsgrub pas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zang ngo bo ma rtogs pa// mig stong nyid la rtag tu rmongs par 'gyur//
58b5(dkon brtsegs): des ni kun 'dzin ye shes mi bskyed pas// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mi ga zang ngo bo rab rtogs pa// mig stong nyid ni rtag par rtogs par 'gyur// des ni kun
58b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ye shes rab bskyed pas// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bor ba rtogs pa// des ni kun 'dzin ye shes bsgrub pa nas// bla med ma chags ye/
58b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bsgrub pas// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di la ma mos pa// mig 'ang ngo bo nyid la rtag tu rmongs// de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams las nyams/
58b8(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ bla med ye shes thob par shin tu dka'// gang zhig mdo sde 'di la ra ba mos shing // mig zad nyid ni mngon rtogs pa// des ni ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pas// bla med//
59a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mngon byed dka' ba med// gang zhig mi zad ngo bo nyid rtogs shing // bdag med mtshan nyid rab tu shes pas na// des ni rtag tu chos 'di thos pas na// mdzan/
59a2(dkon brtsegs): par yid ches bcom med pa thob// gang zhig mi zang ngo bo nyid sems shing // nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo med par ni// des ni kun 'dzin spobs pa mngon bsgrubs nas/
59a3(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'drin rtag tu ston par 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed// 'od gzer 'byin pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur// des nod bzhin gshegs par ba stan cing /
59a4(dkon brtsegs): mig stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig mchod rten brgyad stong rab byas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa byas pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems
59a5(dkon brtsegs): byed na/ 'di'i yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags// gang gis rol mo brgya stong rab byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel mchod pas na// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin
59a6(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur na// 'di yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams// bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par// de bzhin gshegs dang
59a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par mchod pa bas// mdo sde 'di gzung bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang gis mdzasde 'dzilas tshigs bani pa'i// tshigs pa ni bcang gcig tsam 'dzin ca/
59a8(dkon brtsegs): dun byed ma// de la rgyal bzugs rje chen po'i gtso ltar gus pas rab tu bskyed par rtse// ngan 'das pa'i bskam pa brgya song na// srang pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur pa /
59b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dag ni tshang med pa rnams la// mdo sde 'di'i phyir ni rim gro byas res 'ga' mar me brgya stong tshang med pa// snying por ra'i chang kyang dpag cang tsam// sbar nas mdo sde 'dzi
59b2(dkon brtsegs): rang dbang dag/ thob par bya phyir 'dren pa rnams la mchod// res 'ga' me tog tsam pa ka dang ni// su ma na dang me ngan med pa'i/ 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis/
59b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas// nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe// slong du 'ongs pa dag la sbyin btang ste// res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang gtang/
59b4(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' tham pa khron pa chu mig btang // res 'ga' glang po che dang gzhon pa dang // res 'ga' rin chen rta dang chung ma btang // res 'ga' gser gyi khri dang rin chen 'gyur// ras
59b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' se mo do dang 'phreng ba btang // de bzhin bskal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni// mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
59b6(dkon brtsegs): mdo// bam po gnyis pa// // nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gsungs ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu bsgoms// sems can rnams la sbyin pa
59b7(dkon brtsegs): btang / nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// gtum mo dag gis brgyad bkag kyang // de tshe nga ni snying brtse bas// de la gnod pa yong ma byas la ni// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// slong du 'ong
59b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dag la ni// ji ltar mos bzhin rab btang bas// thams cad rab tu dag par byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// gzhal med khang chen rnams la ni// rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas/
60a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su phul// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin po ches// sangs rgyas rnams la
60a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// drin yod rnams rtag dran pas na// tha na tshig bshad mnyan pa// de la yang ni bkur stir byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// tshul khrims ldan
60a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ra ba bkur bas// tha na 'chag pa'i chen yang // de la rtag tu gus pa bskyed// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// 'khor ba bdag na 'khor ba'i che// drin ni chung bar yod la yang // de dag
60a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu drin du gzos// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// snyed pa ma btsal chos ma bskur// nye bshes sems can rnams la ni// snying brtse dag ni rab tu bskyed// nga sngon mdo sde
60a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir// mang thos legs bshad ldan pas na// chos la mngon par zhen byed cing // bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// mi dge ba'i sems ni skyes
60a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na// myur ba nyid du rab gshegs pas// 'phel bar yang ni yongs ma byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// rgyal po'i bur ni gyur pa na// rin po che dang byug spos dang // smras kyi
60a7(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed pa// dang ba'i sems ni ngas skyes nas// sangs rgyas rnams la smos shing brus// nga sngon meng sde 'di'i byor// khri mon brtson la snying brtse bas// sdug bsngal sna tshogs
60a8(dkon brtsegs): gang myur ba// lus kyi sbyin par dang dri zangs// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i zer// 'dod pa'i yon na lnga spangs nas// rtag tungs drug dag gici// sdom pa dag ni rab tu thangs
60b1(dkon brtsegs): ngasngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgoms pas// tha na chung ma dag la yang // 'ad pa'i ser sna yongs ma bskyed// nga sngon mang sde 'di'i phyir// dpral 'phongs pa/
60b2(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad kun// bde ba dag ni thob bya'i phyir// nor dag gis ni phyag por byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// dge slong dang ni bram ze dang // sku dgra rnam pa sna tshogs kun// thams
60b3(dkon brtsegs): cang dag ni rab tu bsdus// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// thams cad kun la phan gdags phyir// rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas// slong ba dag la yongs su btang // res 'ga' me tog
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dag/ gzhan dag gcod du mi bzhugs par// sems can rnams la yongs btang zhing // yid bzhin du ni tshim par byas// nga sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i che// sems ni rtag
60b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pas na// tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dang // tshul khrims 'chal dang ngo mtshar med// rdzu 'phrul pa thob pas na// so so'i skye bo'i bar dag la// ngo mtshar bsam ni
60b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas// gus pas kun la sbyin pa btang // nga sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe// sems la thon dman med pas ma// sdug bsngal la 'gro ba mi tshol zhing // mdza
60b7(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di la rtse gcig mos// res 'ga' yul khams dag tu ni// phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing // klu rnams kun ni ra ba btul nas// dus bzhin char ni rab tu phab// zla 'od
60b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis shes par gyis// ngas ni rab dpag med nas// mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir// dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spyad// bskal pa brgyad stong steng du ni// brjod kyang mthar thug/
61a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// yang dag dran pa'i sems skyed la// mdo sde 'di ni bshad par bgyis// ngas ni sangs
61a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyan dag gis// ma 'ongs dus ni gsal gzigs pas// spyod pa sna tshogs ji lta ba// thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa yin// dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis// bla med ye shes
61a3(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba'i phyir// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa// gang zag de dang phyogs rnams kyang // thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// ma 'ongs thams dus kyi
61a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe// mdo sde 'di thos nas gang mos pa// bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang // thams cad ma lus thugs su chud // dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas//
61a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa la skur 'debs pa// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang // dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di ni thos 'gyur nas//
61a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsagadung bas du byed pas// de kun ngas ni lung bstan nas// rgyal ba gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur// tha 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul skabs kyis ni// gang ngas
61a7(dkon brtsegs): yod ni dag pa dang / gang dag gis ni ma dag dang // ba nams pa gang yin pa// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// rab ni dben la rtag
61a8(dkon brtsegs): mas cing // ting 'di rnams la ra ba gnas nas// 'khor ba dag lachags pas/ man pag chags rnams kyangs// gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang // da las lugs
61b1(dkon brtsegs): pham yo can rnams// thams cadam lus thugs su chud // sems can dag ni gang shig gis// mi bdan rgyas zhen pa dang // sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas la ni rang /
61b2(dkon brtsegs): zas pa// ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// 'jig rten bde la rab chags pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon
61b3(dkon brtsegs): dag/ lags pa nyid du mi bskyed pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni de'i phyir/ sbyor ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur// su yang rung ba gang zhig gis// byang chub sa bon rtogs gyur na// gang zag
61b4(dkon brtsegs): de yis nges par ni// rnam dag 'od gzer dpag med thob// zla 'od khyod kyis 'di lta bur// 'od gzer 'di las sogs pa'i// rgyu dang rkyen ni re re kun// so so tha dadang nyid du bsko/
61b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis shes rab stobs kyis ni// thams cad de ltar rig par gyis// gang zhig mi dge grogs spangs te// dge ba'i bshes nyen la bsten nas// tshul khrims rnam dag gang
61b6(dkon brtsegs): bsrungs pa// sangs rgyas 'od gzer bsgrub par 'gyur// khyod kyis dbang po rab bsrungs la// ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spong // dge ba'i chos ni rab bsgoms la// sems
61b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni bsrangs par gyis// khyod kyis brtsod pa rab spongs la// stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis// rnyed pa dag la ma gdung bar// mang thos legs bshad ldan
61b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyis/ khyod kyis rnyed pa dag la ni// mig gtsang lta bur gyis// rnyed pa'i dri ma dag gis ni// rnam dag sems ni sngags ma byed// rnam par grol ba bcal bar bya
62a1(dkon brtsegs): bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur// khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar bltos// chos kyi sgron chen rtag spar la// 'jig
62a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzag rten kun ni snang bar gyis// khyod kyi sems ni ri rgyal ltar// mi g.yo nyid du ra ba tu byos// kha ngan dang ni brdegs pa dang // thams cad bzod pa dang du long // khyod ni sems
62a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi phyir// dge shes yang dag rab tu byos// dman pa'i sems ni yongs spongs la// rnam dag las ni rtag tu bslabs// khyod kyi sems ni rten byos la// tha med tsha
62a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu ston// mdo sde dam pa 'di lta bu// brtse ba can la sbyin par gyis// bla med ye shes gang 'tshol ba// 'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed pa// des na sdig pa rnam spangs nas/
62a5(dkon brtsegs): phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dper na blo dang ldan pa dag/ me la spyod par mkhas pa gang // ro rnams sna tshogs sbyin byed kyang // mes ni sreg par yong mi 'gyur// gang
62a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig blo dang mi ldan pa// thabs dag la ni mi mkhas pas// me khyer lag mthil gang bzhag pa// mes ni rab tu sreg par 'gyur// ji ltar mi zhig dug dag gis// sems ni
62a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs nas myos pa gang // me la rab tu bsgos nas ni// de'i rgyu yis sos par 'gyur// zla 'od khyod kyis shes par bgyis// blo ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// yid rten yid na
62a8(dkon brtsegs): stong par rig/ de phyir 'khor bar gnas kyang ni// mig rten mig ni stong rig pas// mig brtan mig ni sang rig pas// mig la mngon par zhen pa med// gal te ltar /
62b1(dkon brtsegs): shes ma mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med// gal te mig nyid stong rig na// yang dag ye shes bsgrub par 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thob pa'i phyir// 'od gzer dag ni 'dran
62b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ gal te mig nyid stong rig na// 'dod chags dag ni brtan nas spong // 'dod chags dge ni med pa'i phyir// 'od gzer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin zhe sa/
62b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang / ngar 'dzin 'cha ba dang khro ba dang // ser sna phrag dog ngo tsha med// mi bzod sems ni mtho ba dang // rgyags dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang // g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med
62b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gya gyu la sogs rab tu yang // thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad// yang dag ye shes thob gyur na// mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs// zhi ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir//
62b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ad gzer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thob 'gyur na// sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas// tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir// 'ong por dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur
62b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ye shes thob 'gyur na// sangs rgyas thabs la gnas par 'gyur// thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir// 'od gzer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes ma bsgruH/
62b7(dkon brtsegs): par sgrib pa dag ni gtan spongs zhing // 'od gzer 'byung ba bsgrub bar ni// ngas sngon ma thos ma mthong ngo // yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas// sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan
62b8(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing // spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba// 'od gzer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i dpyod pa yongs 'tshol zhing // mdo sde 'di la brlab byas nas// de bzhin gshes
63a1(dkon brtsegs): la gang mchod pa// yang dag ye shes thabs thob 'gyur// yang dag ye shes gang bsgrubs pa// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bgyis// 'o dag par byed/
63a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rdzogs par 'gyur// lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhin ni// mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa// dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od ga
63a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa thong ma 'gyur// mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa// dge sbyong chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur// gang bag de yis del bu'i// 'dag par 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// mags
63a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' bang gang rtogs pa// rnga bskye ba'i mtha' yang rtogs// rna ba skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pas// dge sbyong chen pos chos shes bya// gal te mig gi ngo btang // mtha' ni yongs su
63a5(dkon brtsegs): ma shes na// mig ni skyes pa'i mtha' dag kyang // yongs su shes por mi 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od gzer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig ging
63a6(dkon brtsegs): da/ mtha' ni yongs su shes 'gyur na// mig ni skye de'i mtha' dag kyang // yongs su shes pa nyid du 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od gaper 'byed pa zab par
63a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang te mig ga ngo cing // mtha' na legs par ma shes na// mgon skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // lags pa nyid du ma shes pas// gang zag de yis dalta bul// 'as
63a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs pa shes 'gyur na// mag ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // legs pa nying du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de rje
63b1(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu'o// 'ad gzer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni mngon sum ma shes nas// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mngon sum nyid du mi shes pas/
63b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag da yis de la bu'o// 'ang ga par 'gyod pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gang btsang // ma ga ni skye ba'i mthu' dag kyang // mtha' ni mngon sum shes 'gyur na// mngon sum
63b3(dkon brtsegs): cing drar ba zhes pas// gang zag nga yis de lta bu'i// 'od gapar 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig ging bo nyid// mtha' legs par ma zhes ma// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' das
63b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang // yongs su shes par mi 'gyur ba// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od gzer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na//
63b5(dkon brtsegs): mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od gzer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid//
63b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag legs par ma shes na// rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag la// legs pa nyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od gzer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal
63b7(dkon brtsegs): mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par shes 'gyur na// rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa// legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de blta bu'i// 'od gzar
63b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus// yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang // reg bya chos dang sa chu dang // me rlung dag gi dngos po dang // 'jig rten sdug bsnga
64a1(dkon brtsegs): / phung po dang // khams dang 'jig rten skye ba dang // sgra dang maung las bsogs pa yang // thams cad de bzhin rig por bgyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rba2/
64a2(dkon brtsegs): gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing / 'od gzer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par
64a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'did ba des/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dris rnam pa brgyad bcu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rnam pa brgya bcu gang nam/ 'das brisems can yongs su bskyeng zhi
64a4(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa dang // gnad sems dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrung shing ma mi par ma byed pa dang / sems shin tu marnam pa dang // g.yo sgra med pa dang / sar sna mangs
64a5(dkon brtsegs): dang // phrag dog med pa dang // 'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang // bsdu ba'i bsam pa med pa dang // zag pa chen po'i mang sde dam pa dag la mngon par yid chos pa dang /
64a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug dang // rgyags pa la bzhin cing srid pa mang pa dang // bzangad pa'i skabs phun su mtshugs pa dang // smon lam las byor mi ldog pa dang // bsam bzhin tu rnam par
64a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyu pa dang // dgan pa na gnas pa dang // labar rnams la man pa dang // nang pa'i mkhyen padang // grags pa la marten pa dang // bsam gtan rnams sa rab tu gnas pa
64a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag par gyi ting nga 'dzin rab tu bston pa dang // tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag sgyu med par rim gro byeng pa dang // tshangs pa mtshungs par snang bdag la mchog gi bsam pa rgya
64b1(dkon brtsegs): das rnam la gus pa'i phyir mkhan pa dang // bsrab dpon dag la shin tu bkar ba dang // mngasde de'i dan rab tu chags pa dang // yang dag par bston pa sa rab tu mkhas pa d+hA/
64b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig sbas pa rnams la mi bden pa med pa dang // yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang // rtag tu sbyin pa btang ba dang // bdud kyilas
64b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs pa dang // dbang po rnams dam du bsrung ba dang // tshig rab tu brtogs pa dang // don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa dang // sa rnams kyi rang bzhin gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs
64b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzugs zad mi shes pa yongs su 'tshal ba dang // lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med pa dang // 'khor gzhi po dag la rjes su ston par byed pa dang // 'jig rten pa'i bsam
64b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su bcad pa dang // 'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med do zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba snams spangs pa dang // da dung ma bslabs pa dag la gya gyu'i mtshan mi ston pa dang // gang bas
64b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dag la ci nus kyis rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang // klu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang // rgyan dang yo byad kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /
64b7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang // mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // gnyid rab spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la ra
64b8(dkon brtsegs): tu brtson pa dang // sangs rgyas la gus pa dang // byang chub sems bskyed pa dang // 'dzag rten pa'i las yongs su spangs pa dang // bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par
65a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa dang // chos la sbed pa'i phyir/ grogs khyad par can la rten par byed pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang // rab tu
65a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la shin tu mos pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang // sdig pa'i las mi spong ba dang // bstan pa rnams la the tsom med pa dang // dpes
65a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang // gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas ston par byed pa dang // byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la ngal ba med pa dang // mdo sde yang dag par gzung ba rnams
65a4(dkon brtsegs): brjed par mi byed pa dang // rang gi brlab pa mi spong ba dang // pha rol gyi smra ba rnams char gcod pa dang // nges par 'byung ba'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang // skyed pa tshad med pa rnams mdzan
65a5(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub pa dang // chos kyi ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar mthong ning 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang // srid pa gsum po dag lanag
65a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang // mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang // mngon par yid ches pa dag mi gnyen po rnam par gzhag nas ston par byed pa dang // ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye bras
65a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par khong du chud pa dang // sngon gyi mtha' yongs su shes pa dang // gzhan gyi dring la mi bltos pa dang // yongs su spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang /
65a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang // dpe byeng kyi bkod pa blan su ma tshogs par byeng ba gang yin pa 'ang ni rnam pa brgyad cunas bya'o// gzhan yang tha'ang gnon chos brgya cu bo 'di dag na
65b1(dkon brtsegs): chos lnga nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor bshes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang // nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa /
65b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos lnga po de dag ni chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
65b3(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang // gzugs yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos gnyis po de dag ni gcig gi nang du
65b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ro// gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla'
65b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad bcu yod de// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang
65b6(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od gnon yang chos rnam pa brgyad bcu yod de// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
65b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad rtsi gang nan/ 'di skye ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang // tshul khrims rnam par dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang // nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang
65b8(dkon brtsegs): thal ba dang // rgyal rab tu bcom pa da'i/ tshig mtshan pa dang / ras pa sna chag sa rab tu shes pa dang // dag pa'i grags tha yangs su shes pa dang // thig pa can pos yang dgas
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba dang // brtson 'grus kyi gotso bgos pa dang // spyod lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang // nyon mongs pa ltung ba rnams kyi the tsom rab tu gcod pa dang /
66a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba rnams la smod cing chos dkar po rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang // mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la yongs su skyo ba
66a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang // byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang // brtson 'grus rab tu brtsom pa dang // bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang // bden pa rnams mngon du gyur pa dang // yang
66a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang // the tsom yongs su bcod pa dang // sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su bzla bar sems pa dang // srid pa rnams la mngon par zhen
66a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang // sems rgya chen po yongs su bskyed pa dang // sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang // 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ra
66a6(dkon brtsegs): tu spong ba dang // 'dod pa'i phan pa yongs su mi 'tshal ba dang // sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa dang // 'phags parna
66a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la gus pa bskyed pa dang // zag pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten cing rim mo byed pa dang // theg pa dman pa dag gis bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang // can zas kyi
66a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ring du spong ba dang // phyi rol pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas// khyad par du 'phags pa'i sa
66b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dpral bar byed pa dang // thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang // spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang /
66b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang // chos yongs su 'tshal ba la le lo med pa dang // don zab mo yang dag par bston pa dang // gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang /
66b3(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang // chos rgya chen spel bar byed pa dang // yongs su 'dren pa la chog shes pa med pa dang // spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
66b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa dang // spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang // mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // mi dge ba rnams kyi sngags pa mi brjod pa dang // dge
66b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las yang dag par bsgrub pa dang // phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang // lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang // rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang // spyod yul las yang dag par
66b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang // spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang // yongs su dang ba bskyed pa dang // yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang // theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang //
66b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par byed pa dang // bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang // 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang // mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su 'tsho/
66b8(dkon brtsegs): ba la mos pa dang // 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa na gnas pa dang // rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang // ci tsam rnyed pa de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin par
67a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang // dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang // bdag gi
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang // so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang // sems can gyi spyod pa dang / 'thun par byed pa dang // sangs rgyas la shin tu dad pa dang // snad
67a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang // mi 'thun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang // gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang // gsol ba 'a
67a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig 'ongs na ci rigs par bston par byed pa dang // zas la snyoms par gyur pa dang // rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du btong ba dang // sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa/
67a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag ni// bla 'od gzhon nu chos brgyad cu zhes bya ste// 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed do//
67a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa chos de lta bu chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gnyen
67a7(dkon brtsegs): bla mig bang mtha' mkhyen pas// de slang rnams dag ye shes ston ston mdzad lags// rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas ni// rnam dag 'od gaper phun sum tshogs pa lags
67a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mig bdag med mkhyen pas// de spad nam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags// rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na// tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid dun
67b1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa lags// bcom ldan sngon ni sems can phan btags pas// de srad rnam dag gsungs ni rdzogs pa lags// rnam dag gsungs ni yongs su rdzogs pas/
67b2(dkon brtsegs): na 'jig rten tshad med rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pas mi gnyid stong mkhyen pas// de srad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags// kur 'dzin
67b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer dpag med ston// de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen// mig gi khyad par dag kyang
67b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma mchis// mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer dpag med ston// sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas// mig
67b5(dkon brtsegs): yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen// mig yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer dpag med ston// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab sems pa//
67b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs// sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtogs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gaper nges pa ston// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog
67b7(dkon brtsegs): ni yongs rdzogs pas// mig gi 'jigs pa dpag med thugs su chud// mig gi 'jigs pa rab tu mkhyen pas na// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad
67b8(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
68a1(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce lus yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag dang chos// 'jig rten skye dang sgra dang mig las sogs// thams cad la yang de
68a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab tu mkhyen// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring po
68a3(dkon brtsegs): thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byon dang ldan// ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por
68a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring ba
68a5(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon/
68a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bsam gtan pa ral byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan pasam gtan
68a7(dkon brtsegs): rol byon/ bdag kyang ring bar mthogs de bzhin nog/ thugs rje chen po nang gnyis mchog gyur pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar brtsam
68a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab pha rol byos// bdag kyang ring bar mi thags pa ni mnog/ thugs rje chen po nang gcis mchog gyur pa// chos sku'i pha rol byon pa phun sumatshogs// ji ltar bcom
68b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan nas sku'i bar la byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po nang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phran su mtshogs// jim
68b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/
68b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag yid dang ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// yon tan mchog ni dpag meng phun sum chog
68b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum
68b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan gzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag sgra ni dpag
68b6(dkon brtsegs): med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag sgra ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po dag
68b7(dkon brtsegs): med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul che ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// sems can gdul spang
68b8(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum na bzhugs// ji ltar bcom ldan sems can 'dul mdzad pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'khor ba'i
69a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
69a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa// 'dod chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ldan bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen pon
69a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa// zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan ni sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
69a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ gti mug spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
69a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags ne sdang spyod pa dpag mod 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
69a6(dkon brtsegs): ni sdang gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmobs spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin gshog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
69a7(dkon brtsegs): 'did chags gti mug spyong pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod tshangs spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin nag/ thugs rje chen po nang gnyis mchas gyu
69a8(dkon brtsegs): pa cha mnyam spyod pa dpag mang yang dga'adas// ji ltar bcom ldan ma mnyam spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mo thogs de bzhin shog/ 'dzin pa 'dod chags dag las
69b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten 'phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa'i zhe sdang dag la/
69b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'a jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa ga
69b3(dkon brtsegs): mug spyod las yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par nog/
69b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
69b5(dkon brtsegs): par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i
69b6(dkon brtsegs): shes grub par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// lha mi kha lo/
69b7(dkon brtsegs): skur ba'i ston pa shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// klu tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// lha mi
69b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// gnod sbyin mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha'i mi
70a1(dkon brtsegs): lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// dri ba thams cad rab tu 'dral mdzad cing // de bzhin grul bum dpag tu ma mchi
70a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
70a3(dkon brtsegs): pas// chos rnams yang dag don ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// yang dag don la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal zad
70a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mkhyen// skye dgu' thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad pa the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs
70a5(dkon brtsegs): pas rgyu zang mtha' mkhyen pas// skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// rgyu zad de la the tshom mchis shog/ de bzhin gzhas
70a6(dkon brtsegs): pas mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub gyur nas// 'jig rten spyod la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin
70a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas mkhyen pa mkhyen mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten los dang 'bros bu rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pan
70a8(dkon brtsegs): bgying shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten drang bzhin sna chog rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye zhes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams
70b1(dkon brtsegs): ma su gyu
70b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin par btsuldan// de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ khyams cad kyim tu 'gro ba'i spyong pa ma byas// bdag pa dang 'dra'i mags grub thang nas// 8
70b3(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad lan phan pa kyang shogs de bzhin gshegs pa ma chog ldan pas// 'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de bzhin ye shes gru gyur nas// 'jig
70b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes gru 'gyur nas/
70b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog ldan pas// bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyuran/
70b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgying shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/
70b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// cha mnyam spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur
70b8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye
70b9(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen// bdag kyang
71a1(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad rab mkhyen nas// 'jig rten phan 'dogs dpe
71a2(dkon brtsegs): zla yod ma mchis// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin rab gnas pas// khyad par thabs
71a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// sngon
71a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa mchog
71a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas// 'tsho 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen
71a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog ldan pas// rten mongs pang pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i lo gas grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pan bgyid nog/ de bzhin gnas
71a7(dkon brtsegs): pas mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// bla med byang chub yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// bdag kyang de 'dra'i yo shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid no//
71a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pa
71b1(dkon brtsegs): bar shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'khor ba des 'byung chos ni rab tu mkhyem// bdag kyang de 'dra'i mi shes grub gyur nas/ 'jig ca tham
71b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab mkhyen pas// sems can dpag med rnams ni go bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig
71b3(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma lta dang // rmi lam mig rgyu lta bur bar du mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig
71b4(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi// yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/
71b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas// dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
71b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs sku gsung thugs 'dul bas// thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ya
71b7(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas// 'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'// bdag
71b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten chos thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // shes rab bsgrubs pas de las
72a1(dkon brtsegs): ldog mi 'gyur// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur pas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po gtsor 'gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsdum
72a2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor 'gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs
72a3(dkon brtsegs): pas zhig nas lhag mthong bsgrubs// lha' mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor 'gyur
72a4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs
72a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i gtsor 'gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pas// 'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'dra
72a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la po chos ma mchis sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed bang mtha' mkhyen pas// dri srad de la rmongs pa yongs ma mngal// bdag kyang de 'dra'i yo shes gru bgyur nas// skyes
72a7(dkon brtsegs): da la mtshas ma mchis nog/ de bzhi gshegs pa rab rnamanga' mkhyen pas// dasrad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mngal/ bdag kyang 'dra'i lo zhes rgyu bgyur nas// rab
72a8(dkon brtsegs): tsham ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gzhags pas sngon dang 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas// nga srad de la tshangs pa yongs mi mdzang // bdag kyang de 'dra'i ma shes grub gyur nas/
72b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// de srang slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang nga 'dra'i lashes gru bcu
72b2(dkon brtsegs): nas// snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen// de srang slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra
72b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas// skyon thog de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// mig gi rtag tshang dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang nga
72b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye bar mtha' mkhyen pas// mig gis rtag tshad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang
72b5(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas
72b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pas// de ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen
72b7(dkon brtsegs): pas// de skad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig zad dang ma zad ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la non pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de srad
72b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen nas// nga slang
73a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dag zhen mi mnga'// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang // g.yo sgyu phra dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims pa'od dang brtson 'grus dang /
73a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas// 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od g.yo
73a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o// 'od gzir nges kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing chang med dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te// 'jig rten gyis khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas/
73a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan
73a5(dkon brtsegs): las langs nas// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gus pas tha
73a6(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'ang dag gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das la nu bzhus pa// 'brug dang sang ga'i sgra sgrogs shing // ka la bing ka'i sgra byang nas
73a7(dkon brtsegs): macan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dri srung du 'jam pa mdzang// nyim stong pas zang par 'phags// rnam dag slar ba dag dang ldam// yon na mtha rab mnga' ba// dza sring
73a8(dkon brtsegs): btsa ba mangs sbyin nga tshul khrims bcang btsun 'grus/ khamams nags rab ba brtan pas// thamasas dang la mdzugs pa// dza srang bdag par bgyi bamang/
73b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyes pas// ngag tu ba rnams ni rtag tu spangs// sems can nad ni legs gso pa// dzaM srang 'ong gapar bkye ba ma dang // thugs rdo tshon pa dang gnyis
73b2(dkon brtsegs): gtso// mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen// rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas// sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming las sogs
73b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nas// kun 'byung 'gog pa lam ngag dang // ye shes bzod par ba de bzhin// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig bang skye bo'i mtha' dag dang // rab zhi dag ni 'khor ba nga/
73b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen// rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri reg bya nas// sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// gzhan yang
73b5(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel 'byung chos// chang dang rtag pa yongs bral nas// bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas// rkyen mang las byung nyid du gsungs// res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs
73b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis// sdug bsngal bzhi ni ston par mdzad// res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas 'od gzer bsngags pa mdzad// res 'ga' tshig ni tshad med kyis// rab dben
73b7(dkon brtsegs): chos ni ston par mdzad// gang zag srog dang bdag med dang // sems can med pa nyid du ston// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gi/ tshigs su bcad
73b8(dkon brtsegs): pa brgya stong gyis// de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan chos// yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang // brjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas// brjod mang /
74a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs mi mnga'// bcom ldan yang dag chos bsrung zhing // skye dgu rnams ni go mdzad pas// lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag/ gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur
74a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang // mos pa dag ni rnam par dag/ mi ni mang po tshad med kyang // the tshom dra ba chang par gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs// ne sdang gti mug rnam pa
74a3(dkon brtsegs): bshig/ srid dang nga rgyal ma rig dang // g.yo sgyu pra dog spros pa nas// sdug bsngal phung po las sogs par// thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs// 'di las sogs pa'i tshig gang sa
74a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la// sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas// grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston/
74a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las// de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pas// chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang // brjod pa thug pa med pa ston// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi
74a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas// ming tshig dang po bar ma dang // tha ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen// tha dang tshig ni sna tshogs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslabs bas na// don mchog
74a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ni mnam // ston pa dag pa rab tum khyen// de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa// rgya chen tshogs pa lam byung bas// lha 'ba' tshig ladzin pa las// lus sems pa ma
74a8(dkon brtsegs): 'a mam// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yas// thugs bcu'i 'khang pa yongs 'das na so// rngal stsar bcom ldan namasas kha tshom dgani yul du gsal// de bzhin gnasas
74b1(dkon brtsegs): bas mo ga bang dang // mtha' dag ni rab ni bgyis// rtag tu stong ning dben pa dang // 'gro'ang med pa rab tu mkhyen// bcugs dang gnas ni mamanga' bas// yang dgas pa'aras
74b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs// bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'// de skad dang bdag rku ba lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag kyang // bang dang ma bang lang
74b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni// rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen nas// chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad// thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas// ji skad 'dzum pa ston
74b4(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad// bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na// ji srad 'dzum pa bston par mdzad// bcom ldan mig ni
74b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag dang // brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu spyod dben mkhyen lags na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben
74b6(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen cing // nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa rnyes// grags pa mchog ni phran tshogs pa// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan
74b7(dkon brtsegs): yun ring sgom bslabs pas// bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad// mig nyid stong pa nyid dra mkhyen// dri bral rtag tu rnam par dag/ skyems kyi spyod pa tshang med rnams// dgongs pa
74b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis thams cad mkhyen// 'od gaper 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags/
75a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs dag ni rab bskul pas// thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis// mig
75a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni rab tu rtogs// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gis spang // deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// rna ba snga lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen zhing // sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i
75a3(dkon brtsegs): bar thams cad kyi ni de bzhin no// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sna nyid stong par ra ba mkhyen nas// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom
75a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen// lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen
75a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rol bdag med mkhyen// reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs// chos nyid
75a6(dkon brtsegs): stong par rab mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan la bdag med mkhyen// chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// me nyid song bar rab mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum
75a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan par mdang // bcom ldan drung la bdag med mkhyen// nga bam cig nyid du chags// dngos nyid spang par rab mkhyen na// jisrad 'dus paston pa ma pa// bcom na
75a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong par rab mkhyen na// ji srad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan khams la bdag meng ma
75b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs// skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ji srad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen// ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// lam chi
75b2(dkon brtsegs): stong par rab mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen// rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems can stong par rab mkhyen ma
75b3(dkon brtsegs): ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med// bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen// mos pa stong par rab mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdza
75b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs// rtag dang mi rtag pa mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol// grags
75b5(dkon brtsegs): pa khams gsum kun tu gang // brgya byin ma'i dbang po dang // klu rnams las sogs kun gyis mchod// de bzhin gshegs pas mi gzang dang // skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen la
75b6(dkon brtsegs): na// ji skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa// 'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dras// sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang // chos las sprul te gang byang
75b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis// gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags// 'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni// 'od gzer rgyu rkyen 'di 'u lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mi/
75b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni/ stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na// khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni// bye brag med cing man
77a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil par gda'// zhing ni brgya stong dpag med
77a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu bar mdzad// sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad// tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra// lcags mtshan srid ring zhal ni kun tu khyebs// 'gram pa seng ge 'dra
77a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing shangs kyang mgo// thams cad thabs dang rnam dag thugs las skyes// ud pa la'i gsung ni zhal nas 'byung // tsan dan dri dag skra ni kun tu khyab// sngon ni byams pargya cher
77a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil shin tu mnyam// sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur// gom pa seng ge glang po
77a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// 'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan// khyad 'phags 'od gzir dag ni rab tu gsal// dge bang/
77a6(dkon brtsegs): gis skye dgu phan 'dags pas// gang gis mthong ba dad pa rab tu skye// sor gcig 'od gzer brgya stong rab bkye nas// sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad/
77a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon ni dag sbyong mang po rab bsgrub pas// mtshan gyis bkod pa sna tshogs/ 'di bskyes lags// gzugs sgra yangs rdzogs ba cwa yongs ma mchis// zhal mtshan pa
77a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags// rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten zin 'dogs pa// ci srang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa ri dgas a ne yang dang 'a/
77b1(dkon brtsegs): sku dbribs mi gu seng ge ji lta bzhin// 'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mngad pa// ji srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi
77b2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das// mi'i seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags// ci srang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// sku las 'ong
77b3(dkon brtsegs): zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing // kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba// rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang // mdo sde tshad med pa rnam dag ston par mdzad// rtag dang chad pa dag la
77b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa yis// de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags// gang gis mtha' lha rnams ni rab spangs na// bcom ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur// lnga rnga 'brug sgra gsu
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ni kun grags shing // ka lan da ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal// lha'i glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa// ci srang 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni
77b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pas// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad// de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa// de kun zab mo cing ngo mtshar ches lags so//
77b7(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad// spyan mchog dag ni kha dog mthon zing 'dra// gtsug gtor mtshan ni na mkha
77b8(dkon brtsegs): lngas mi mthong // tshems dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dag pa'i 'phrin las chang med dag las skyes// ci srang
76a1(dkon brtsegs): / mkhyen pa// bcom ldan dgangs pas rab mkhyen gyi// rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yin// bcom ldan mig la bdag meng mkhyen// nga ba nyid stong 'cha
76a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ rnam dag mkhyen pa tshang ma mchis// ji srad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gsum pa/
76a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' ra bzang ba// thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi'i gtsor gyur pa// ji skad 'dzum pa bston mdzad bshad du gsol/
76a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis// gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams// mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs// sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par
76a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang du bsgrubs// mnyam par dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso// ji skad 'dzum pa bstan
76a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bshad du gsol// gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab 'chang nas// chos 'di thos nas dga' bar bskyes nas// 'dren pa rab mchog ma'i gtsor gyur pa// ji srad 'dzum pa
76a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan ma dang bshang du gsol// bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal dang bzhin tu dbyings rab stam// sgra snyan chad med rang gi dang gis byung // ji sa
76a8(dkon brtsegs): gapar 'di bkye bcang du gsapa// tshigs cad bya bachang ma mchis pa yis// rdzas 'dun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod cur cing // grwa tso'i ro'i skam mchog ldan pa/
76b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jagapar bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sgras// 'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa// thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/
76b2(dkon brtsegs): ji skad 'od gzer gser gyi kha dog bkye// skye dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen// mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ang med par rtogs// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i 'gog gyur pa/
76b3(dkon brtsegs): ji slad 'od gzar gyi ni kha dog bkye// mig gi byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang // 'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang // smig rgyu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa// rgyu rkyen gang gi
76b4(dkon brtsegs): srad du 'dzum bstan lags// de bzhin rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dra re reg bya chos rnams nas// sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin
76b5(dkon brtsegs): du ni rig par bgyi// rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku// mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs// sku la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa// rgyu rkyen gang spang mdzub/
76b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi tong ba ring // phyag gi mtshan ma mi gda' seng ge 'dra'// lta ba shin tu zab cing rked rgyas pa// rgyu rkyen gang smad 'dzum mngad pa
76b7(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs// ba skya re re kha dog mthon ting ldan// g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngang ldang ba// rgyu rkyen gang srad 'dzum mdzad pan
76b8(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// sku mchog dam pa yongs rtogs rtag gnas pa// dper na n+ya gro nga'i shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan// gsung dbyangs dag gis
78a1(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku// kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing // 'od gzer rnam dag ngo mtshad
78a2(dkon brtsegs): rab bkye ba// ci srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso// sems can bsam pa thugs su chung gyur pa// thogs pams
78a3(dkon brtsegs): spabs pa mchog bsnyes pa// ci srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol rab byon pas// rigs gsum dang ni mngon shes drug/ rnam pas
78a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od gzer dpag med ston mdzad pa// ji srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med rnyed// bcom ldan lnga brgya stong rnyedang la mchod
78a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba// ji srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med rnyed// ting 'dzin mchog rnams
78a6(dkon brtsegs): lan rab bzhugs pas// mig gi skye mtha' bang pa'i mtha' mkhyen na// ji srad 'jam pa bstan pa mang drags pa// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dmyur dus/ 'dran pas pas
78a7(dkon brtsegs): kun ni rab tu mchis// rnam dag mgyon pa thogs med pas ma khyab/ ji srad 'dzum pa bsam ma dang bgang drugasapa// nganas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ab mang ba'i mdun
78a8(dkon brtsegs): phyag gser gyi kha dag lta bu gang ste// zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la banag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu shin tu legs par hom// ngas na dang 'dir byang
78b1(dkon brtsegs): chub chos// 'od gzer rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs btang gyis/ ma 'ongs tham dus ngan che// chos ni rnam par 'jig pa na/ khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni// rab ca/
78b2(dkon brtsegs): bye nas bshad par bgyis// ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi che// shin tu bab cing gya nom pa'i// mang sde dam pa 'di dag la// gang mos gang ni mos pa// thams
78b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// byang chub lam ni rab 'tshol ba// rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing // mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgros/
78b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig dam pa rab 'jig cing // 'dra 'dzi la ni mos gyur dang // nyin mtshan nyid la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// nga'i bstan pa dag las ni// rab tu byung bar
78b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la// mos pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chung bzos 'gyur// 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la//
78b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs mang bar thos nas ni// 'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas// 'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis smon par 'gyur// chos gro
78b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni gos gyur kyang // de la shes rab ci yang med// thub pas legs par gsungs pa'i// yang dag bka' ni gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thob gyur na// yid ches
78b8(dkon brtsegs): len par mi 'gyur te// skyes bu blun po de dag dang // lhan gcig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te thos par gyur nas kyang // rab tu
79a1(dkon brtsegs): / dga' zhing mos pa'i// sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni// ngas ni rab tu smon par byed// mi lus thob par gyur mod kyi// den ngan
79a2(dkon brtsegs): med chung zos yin// gal te shin tu bab pa'i chos// 'di dag thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' zhing mos pa'i// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang bgang dag ni/
79a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon tshad sangs rgyas phrad pas na// gdon mi za ba kho nar ni// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// skyes bu blun po gang dag gcig/ lta ba ngan pas rab sbas nas// shes rab rtsa/
79a4(dkon brtsegs): ni gcod byed pa// byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge bas// gshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni// bsten cing gus pa bskye
79a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya// 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na// nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod dang // sems can ngan song gsum po ni// rtag tu byin par gang byed pa// thams cad gti mug
79a6(dkon brtsegs): nga li rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na// nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing // rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag chos ni spong byed cing // chos ma yin pa spyod par byed/
79a7(dkon brtsegs): dbus na rmongs pa'i// skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya// ji sar kha lo sbyar ba yis// rang gi srog zhing bcag pa banam// mi dag las ni byas pas na// sems can dmyal bar
79a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni// rtag tu bdag la gnong byed pa// ji ltar ster rnothogs nas// rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra// chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis/
79b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni// rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par// de ltar khong du ma chud pas// 'jig rten drang srong la rten nas// dge ba'i grags po yin snyam sems
79b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du// stong pa nyid ni gang bsgom pa// 'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas// chang par lta ba bskyed par byed// lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra// sems kyang
79b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gag 'gyur zhes// phal cher bkyal ba'i tshig dag la// mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing // 'di la mngon par zhen pas na// phan pa'i don ni ci yang med// gal te sna
79b4(dkon brtsegs): ni gdug pa 'dis// gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang // nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams// ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed// blun po gang zhig chos ston pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig
79b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pas// skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed las sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa// 'di lta bur ni lta bar bgyis// deng 'dir nga'i spyan
79b6(dkon brtsegs): sngar ni// zla 'od gzhon nur gang 'dug pa// 'dis ni sngan chad 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das/ chang med gang gA klung bre snyed// mchod pa rim gror ba byas ni
79b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bstan par yongs bsgoms nas// bla med ye shes btsal bas na// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med// mig gi skye mtha' gtan tu ni/
79b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par shes pas na// spos pa dag ni yongs spangs nas// mngon par zhen pa ci yang med// sems can dag ni tshad med la// phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir// bla med
80a1(dkon brtsegs): bla med 'od gzer ston pa'i// mdo sde dag ni ston par byed// skyes pa blun po gang yin pa// chos 'di bslob par mi nus pas// rnal 'byor sgom pa dag la ni/
80a2(dkon brtsegs): skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed// de lta bas na blun po dag/ thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas// de dag la ni sten mi byed// de'i chos kyang mi bsrab bo// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/
80a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa'i sbal mos mi pas ni// btsod sgra med pa'i spyod pa la// nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dag rnams la yang // tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med//
80a4(dkon brtsegs): bas na de dag la// bsnyen bkur mi bya ba sngags mi brjod// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// la la snyoms las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyis// mi dge
80a5(dkon brtsegs): lan spyod pasam// des la tshul khrims dag pa dang // shes rab mang thos ci yang med// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing // 'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed// khyed kyis 'dis
80a6(dkon brtsegs): blun po de// rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos// khang khro bka' blo mi bde ning // byang bzhin dag ni mi sdug la// gal te dge pa'i gnas skyes
80a7(dkon brtsegs): mas na rtag tum rabs 'gyur// bdag du 'jugs la nan pas// yang dag ngan la tshangs par 'gyur// blo gros ngag dang mi ldan pas// tshig gi bye brag 'byed ma
80a8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin snang ba'i chos pas kyang // de sa mas pa sgo ma 'gyur// de bzhin gnags pa bcom ldan 'das// yun ring po 'jig rten pa'i// tshig gis spros pa gang yin /
80b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin// sa sa'i skye bo 'di dag la// shin tu zhen cing chags pas na// ci sring 'tsho ba'i bar du yang // rtogs shing khong nga chung mi 'gyur// tshul khrim
80b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod byed kyang // tshangs par spyod pa grub mi byed// kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang // lus kyis chos min spyod pa byed// rang gis 'dul ba ston byang kyang // rtag tu
80b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul min spyod par byed// sangs rgyas bslab ma dag la ni// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag gis// gos 'di rab tu bgos kyar
80b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / nga rgyal dag ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ci bos pa// thu lam 'bar ba mang ba 'dra// de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas// 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba me /
80b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchog gi bde ba ma tho ba nas// spyod pa 'dren mos byed pa bas// mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos pa ci bskyed pa/
80b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang ni dag mi 'gyur// de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni// 'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang // dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag/ seng ge'i khrur ni zhugs pa bzhin// de lta
80b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba'i// chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang // de kho na nyid stong pa'i don// rtogs shing khong du ma chung bas// 'khor mang dag la bstan sngags kyang // khengs pa'i sems
80b8(dkon brtsegs): ni bskyed par byed// ston pa chen po mi dran pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med// mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang // yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin// shin tu dga'
81a1(dkon brtsegs): bas 'dzin byed pas// sems kyis chung zad gting mi byed// 'di lta bu'i ma rabs ngag/ khyim nas rab tu byung na ni// spyod lam dag kyang bsrung ba dang /
81a2(dkon brtsegs): chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang // cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na// yang dag shes rab ci yang med// kha spu dag ni khrigs gyur kyang // sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing /
81a3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong ma yin pa'i chos// log lta dag tu ltung 'gyur na// rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dge sbyong mngon du bya ba'i// 'bras bung/
81a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang thob mi 'gyur// ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni// rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ba// grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing // rang nyid dben pa'i sngags brjod kyang // skyes bu
81a5(dkon brtsegs): blun po blo med pas// yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur// sems kyi 'dud pa ci yod pa// de dag thams cad mi dag yin// rnyed pa 'dod pa rgyu'i phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas
81a6(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgya// bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lnga'i dngos po dag/ bsgrub pa
81a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ning ngag kyi la mang po gnas byang kyang // byin lags par gyur pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das lam stan pas ma// nam kyang dag slong lam /
81a8(dkon brtsegs): ga~M 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag lta bas rang nyams shing // tshul khrims dang yang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan par// de la zhin tu me
81b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni// rtag tu sred pa bskyed par byed// gal te grong khyer zhags na yang // nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing // lus kyi las ni mi bsrung bas// spyong lam
81b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag la gnas mi byed// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas ni// rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu// ri phrag dag ni gang yod pa// khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par
81b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni bdag gi gnas yin te// mthon dang dman par blta ba dang // 'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes// tha dad ma'i tshig mdzad de// dgra bcom pa'i rtags bstan pas// khyim pa
81b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ci snyed pa// phan tshun du ni 'di skad du// dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa// yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer// res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na// gnas par gyur de'i tshe//
81b5(dkon brtsegs): gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na// 'di lta bur ni ston par byed// bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu// nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce 'am// yang na rtswa 'jam gting nas ni// 'dir ni 'du/
81b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed ces zer// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs gyur nas// khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe// g.yo rgya nan tan 'di skad du// bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed// 'jig rten pa'i 'du 'dzi
81b7(dkon brtsegs): gtam/ rgyal po chom rkun las stsogs pa'i// sna tshogs dag ni brjod par byed// res 'ga' chags pa'i sems ngag gis// bud med rnams kyis mdun dag tu// thabs nirna
81b8(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan brjod par byed// bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis// bsod nams zhing ni chen po byed// bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas// rab tu
82a1(dkon brtsegs): byung nas lam bsgom yin// btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang // mtho ris skyes par gyur ces zer// de dag skad ces thos nas// shin tu gus pas bsam
82a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de// gos pas dang ni gtung ba dang // sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed// btsun pas thugs rjer rab dgongs shing // bdag cag tha dang du yang gshegs// ron mi dag lan/
82a3(dkon brtsegs): chags shing // nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas// bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed 'gyur nas// ru sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas pa dag la yang rnyed pa dag gis snyems
82a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed// dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la// brnyas shing bskur pa 'debs par byed// rnyed dang grags pas sems rmongs pas// yang dang yang du zhen pa bskyed// lus ni yongs su
82a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba'i phyir// rtag tu g.yo rgyu spyod pas na// lus dang ngag gi mi dge las// yang dang yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis// dad pa'i sems kyis mchod
82a6(dkon brtsegs): na yang / le lo snyoms las dbang gas ni// de'i bsod nams 'bri bar byed// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// rtag tu mi dge 'dod bskyed pas// stong pa nyid kyi chos 'jal/
82a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes 'dun bzang sems thob ma 'gyur// gang dag pa'i bstan pa las// nyes dmigs dadagar ba spangs nas// nang ngan pag yod sgrub byedan// chos 'di thos par dka' tshe 'phrum
82a8(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang ma rnying dang // bstod spad sdug bsngal bde las sogs// 'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pa// chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang /
82b1(dkon brtsegs): phung ba rda'i 'du shes dang // bas ni rma bslus 'dra shes dang // chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// glo babang dag ni thob gyur gang // rdegs pa dag na ma bskyed cing // ngatshangag das
82b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir gyon pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// gzugs dang mi skyems shing // zas la chags pa med pa dang // srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/
82b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa 'di ni stong shes nas// 'dod pa dag la blang dor med// rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// dpag chad gcig 'das ri khrod du// gcig bra'adus
82b4(dkon brtsegs): nas mnyam bzhag cing // 'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// mi gzang skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing /
82b5(dkon brtsegs): mig gtsang lam ni rab bsgrub pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad kun kyang
82b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// de bzhin mo ngas dus kyi che// dge slong dag ni tshad med snyed// brtson pa dag ni la lo can// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyur// ngag dang mi dag grogs po dang // sgrub
82b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang na mo'i sgrub pa// yid ches pa dang yid mi chis// thams cad de bzhin gshegs par gyis// dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ mig zang lam ni gang yin pa// bsgrub pa dang
82b8(dkon brtsegs): ni mi bsgrub pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing // zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni// dus gzhan phyir ni gang log pa// thams cad
83a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin shes par bgyis// gang zhig chos 'di thos 'gyur nas// mos pa'i sems ni gang bskyed pa// gal te nyams par gyur na yang // slar ni dang bathob par
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bag med spong bar mi byed de mdo 'di sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// de snyam du ni sems par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/
83a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba// dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang // phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhig chos lam mos pa// mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol// grong khyer rngal
83a4(dkon brtsegs): rab rgyu zhing // gzungs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang // kun 'dzin 'od gzer sngags brjod kyang // de'i sa yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang // 'jig rten lnga
83a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod tshol ba// brjod pa dang ni rtogs byed pas// stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs// dran dang shes rab sems med pas// che tshang bar du don med 'das// blun pos stong pa'i chos
83a6(dkon brtsegs): bang na tshul khrims bsregs byas pas// mnar meng dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// nams kyang mtho ras yod mi skye// gang nig skad cig gcig la ni// mchod rkyen stong ni byas pa
83a7(dkon brtsegs): byas// gang gis mdo sde'ang thos nas// tshigs bani tshogs bcang gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa byas// gang gis
83a8(dkon brtsegs): mang sde 'di bas nas// tshig pa tshogs bcad sems pa 'phags// gang gis ri chen mchod can dag/ gang+gA'i byang snyeng byas pa bas// gang gis tham nang cig tsam// mang ldan
83b1(dkon brtsegs): sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya// mthagagatan nas mtshang ba bas// gang gis can skad cig ces// mang sde 'ang sems zang bar 'phags//
83b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'bum phrag brgya mang po// sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang gis tha ni skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dag 'phags/
83b3(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med// gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur// 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med che// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung
83b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan drang srong khye'ur gyur// me tog thogs nas mchod par byas// shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba// byang chub snying po la 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// nga la byang chub lung yang
83b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur// nga la lung bstan thos gyur nas// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems skyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te drang srong khye'u 'di ni// mngon par
83b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas che// bdag na nga'i grogs gyur na// mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi sde sdod par 'dzin cing // bsrung bar shog ces smon lam btab// sangs rgyas
83b7(dkon brtsegs): mar mi mdzad de yis// 'od gzer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni ji skad gsungs bzhin de'i tshe// bram ze'i khye'u gzhon nu gnyis// legs par nyan cing yongs su gzung // nga sngon 'das
83b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus kyi tshe// me tog ud pa la dag gis// sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas// de tshe khyed kyang der 'dug ste// 'di skad du ni smon lam btab// nga'i bstan pa tha ma la// ma
84a1(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di ni rab bzungs nas// rgya cher ston par shog ces smras// gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi bskyed par// gzung 'dzin klog cing 'don pa
84a2(dkon brtsegs): dag/ de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// thos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas// sems can dag la don gyi tshul// rgya cher spel zhing bstan par bya// ngas kyang
84a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// yang dag chos ni nub pa na// 'od gzer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// sems can dag la rgya cher bstan blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas// 'di la skur pa 'debs par byed
84a4(dkon brtsegs): ras ni 'di skad thos gyur kyang // zhe sdang dag ni bskyed mi byed// ngas ni rtag tu bzod bsgoms nas// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed// bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na//
84a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang dpe brang dag gis brgyan// gzhonur khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku// gya nom yongs su rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags// bzod pa'i stobs
84a6(dkon brtsegs): byung bar ltos// nga'i 'bas ni sa reg nas// zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang // sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba// thams cad bzod pa'i stobs las skyes// nga'i sgra khung gcig las ni/
84a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ad ga zar brgya stong rab kyi nas// thams cad gsal bas gang zad pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // 'jigs pa'i srog chags ga'i phrin 'phrog// byed pa lartas
84a8(dkon brtsegs): gus pa yang // thams cad parang tshig spobs las byung // nga 'ig par na sring rab tudu la gyur nas// nga bzhin gzhags la gus pa yang / thams cad paza ma kyim na mas sa
84b1(dkon brtsegs): khyung // rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/ khor 'dus chen po nang dag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod kyang // thams cad bzong mchog stobs las byung // klu'i rnam na
84b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dag/ rab tu 'dug cing 'jigs rang ba// sangs rgyas mthong nas dga' ba yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas/
84b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong thogs// 'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // zhing ni brgya stong tshad med pas// bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
84b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// nga'i yon tan sngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong dag ni 'dras gyur nas me tog gtor nas mchod
84b5(dkon brtsegs): pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa// bye brgya phrag drug bcu rnams// 'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stob
