84b6(dkon brtsegs): ma byung // gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po ni// ma na ba la sogs pas// mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa// thams cad babong mchog stobs las byung // du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i// brgya stong
84b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas me tog spos
84b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa chen 'dzin pa'i klu'i rgyal// lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas// thal sbyar ngal gus pa yang // thams cad
85a1(dkon brtsegs): bzong mchog stobs las byung // lus med sgra can zin las sogs// bye ba phrag ni brgya stong rnams// dad pa'i sems kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod
85a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog stobs las byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos// sangs rgyas 'od gzer gang reg pa// sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las
85a3(dkon brtsegs): byung sa ma muta dang rlung gi lha// brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni// spos kyi char babang mchod pa// thams cad bzong mchog stobs las byung // lha'i 'khor ni brgya stong dag/ lha'i rma
85a4(dkon brtsegs): tog gtor mchod de// sreng spangs sangs rgyas bsten byed pa// thams cad babong mchog stobs las byung // khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsku
85a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa// bzod mchog stobs las byung bar bltos// phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang // bden pa bzhi'i sgra dag gis// thams cad kun ni ga
85a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa thams cad bzong mchog stobs las byung // nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mi bang mtha' dag dang // rab ni sman thos gyur te// skye ba'i mtha' yang dngan
85a7(dkon brtsegs): / nga'i rdzu 'phrul skabs kyis ni// mkha' las mig na rgyu da rkyen du las skye yang 'gro 'ong zeng // de skang du na thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkhal
85a8(dkon brtsegs): sa cos gyings/ sas rgyas rnams cad da rgyas ngas du thas par 'gyul// nga'i du 'phrul grims kyis ma/ mkhal lalam mi gas byungs/ mas
85b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de las skyes// de sad dran thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig 'ang mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnam kyang de las skyes// ngasang dran tham pa chu
85b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig mtha' rab zhi pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mtha' las mig 'ja
85b3(dkon brtsegs): rab zhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig mi skye zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du
85b4(dkon brtsegs): ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig dben rab ni pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// rna ba sA lce dang yid// gtsu
85b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i bar thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang // 'cha ba dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang // khyengs dang nga rgyal la sogs
85b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no// de nas zla 'od gno nur gyur pa de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas// rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo gyur te// bcom ldan 'das
85b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang // 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na// thugs brtse bar dag
85b8(dkon brtsegs): te bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs chod gsol bar cig gnang // de skad ces gsol pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gnon nur gyur pa de'i bsam pa rnam par dag
86a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can chang med pa rnams la yang phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen na// thugs brtse bar dgongs te// cang mi gsung bar gnang /
86a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tha 'a gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mag zas phyag byas te// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// rab tu dga' bas rang ma
86a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang // lha dang klu dang // gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang // lho phreng las sogs pas// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdo dar gyi lding khang bris te// lding khang de
86a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la// thams cad kun tu khyab pa// gser gyi cong cong dra bar bres pa// nor bu rin po che'i 'breng ba sbyangs pa// seng ge'i ba dan dang // gser gyi 'phreng ba la lu gur+g+ha
86a5(dkon brtsegs): can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'phreng ba'i phung po dag/ gcal tu bkram mo// me tog tsam
86a6(dkon brtsegs): bka dang a ti mug ta las sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'bring ba tshang med grangs me pa yang // rin po che'i lding khang ga nang thams cad dang // 'khor 'dus pa thams cad
86a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu khyab par sbyangs shing rgyun tu bris so// gzhan yang de'i nang du khri bstan rnams bshams nas// rin po che'i spos phyi li ka dang / du ma ca dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum rnam par
86a8(dkon brtsegs): dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs 'asregs so// de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar ro// gzhan yang spos kyi chum lam/
86b1(dkon brtsegs): srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag bab bo// sa bzhi kun tu me tog sna tshogs dra ba rtsam mo// de'i lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / skan ma 'dzim gyi bram ma/
86b2(dkon brtsegs): tshad bla yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir// der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan no//
86b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun tu khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa dang // gdugs tshong la bab par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsam na/
86b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slang du// grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu grong khyer
86b5(dkon brtsegs): du gshegs nas// sgo'i thim pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu// grong khyer chen po de'i chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya
86b6(dkon brtsegs): stong tshad med pa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag ni mi ga mthong bar gyur// sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur// 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/
86b7(dkon brtsegs): byang bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byang bzhin pabang po thob par gyur// nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur// bu med pa rnams la ni bu yod par gyur// gos med pa rnams la ni rma
86b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par rin po che med pa rnams la ni rin po che thob par gyur// nye bshes med pa rnams la ni nye gshes dang ldan par gyur// lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs pa ni lus kyi rgyan thams/
87a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang dang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / na tso dang / rma bya dang / ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs
87a2(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong ba dang // rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// sgra sman cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgrang de dag thos pa yang yid shin tu bde bar gyur to// gnan
87a3(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing chang med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams ma tog yongs su dag pa
87a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / gnan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mchod par byas so// gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa
87a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du ma me tog dmar po dang / tsan dan gi phyi ma thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor te// lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha ma
87a6(dkon brtsegs): po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang / dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khyebs par g.yogs sa// gzhan
87a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi rje 'phrul gyi stobs kyis can dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljom zhing dang / rin po che'i snod dang / gos la sogs pa'i ldan shing chang med dpag tu med pa rin po
87a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis brgyan pa mchog dang // lam phran su mchogs shing rgyas pa// sems can chang zad pa'i bsod nams kyirnam par smin pa'i 'bras pa thun mangs du mngon par grub pa/
87b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi ngan langs patsam byas spos mchog dam pa dris sangs rgyas kyi ning chang mang pa rnams kun du khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul te// sems cad bzla sang cang bang ma
87b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang dus gcig tu me tog thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de bzhin du sems can dang sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
87b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go// gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gyis dag go bsam pa ji lta bzhin du rab yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
87b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe// 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nam mkha' las khyad rab tu 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgras thos par
87b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang // de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la// tshigs su bcad pa brgyad stong du mas kyang // chos rnams yang dag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/
87b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs
87b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhus
87b8(dkon brtsegs): che mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'di ni grong khyer zhugs
88a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe// mkhas las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags rab ni stong dpon gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob pas 'gyur/ ma ldanan #
88a2(dkon brtsegs): tha'adas ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtags pa// yang dag nyid rtags byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhug so dz+ra/
88a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'ad chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag gnyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das myon/ sa
88a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pas// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong
88a5(dkon brtsegs): shugs pa'i che// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs par// yang dag nyid rdzogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ @#
88a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong khyer zhugs pa'i che// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags rab 'gog slong dben gang rtags pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyu
88a7(dkon brtsegs): srag khang sal bab sa// gas rgyasams dang rgyal su nang // sdug bsngal pan 'byung 'gas pa'i mamasems cas// ze drang bram dag dngas// rgyas pa sa rgya mangs
88a8(dkon brtsegs): drug la drus 'grung pa'i ris padang // 'ag na drug pacwam thang po mas rnams dang // 'jig da tu mang sogs kyang dab ma/ rgyas rnarnams mam ma
88b1(dkon brtsegs): na sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// lha'i 'jig rten kyan kyang zas gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas par mos// bcom ldan 'das zla
88b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sna ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan 'dasan stobs ngag la rab mos pas// sbyir pa'i stobs kyis byang chub bzlas bya// bcom tha 'a
88b3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las snga ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos par// tshul khrims rna mo dag stobs kyi byang chub pa rnas// bamam
88b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i che// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnam par gyu la sa
88b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i che// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas// brtson 'grus stobs kyis
88b6(dkon brtsegs): brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab tu mos pas// bas chag sa
88b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i che// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mad byas
88b8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab stobs kyis byang chub skyes par gyur// rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas shes stobs// thabs dang gzugs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs// las dang rngan
89a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung yan lag dang dang thos// gtong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs// rab dul yang dag mtha' dang bden mkhas stobs// 'jigs dang da meng phan
89a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dogasal mos dang // byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod tshe med// stong dang 'bru mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu'i 'phags pa'i mnga' dga' lda ga
89a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan grags pa dpe bra ma mchis pa// grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe// sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad// sngon chang sring gsum las dger ba
89a4(dkon brtsegs): bas// lha'i dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// 'jig rten thams cad kun ni rab tu bkur// nga'i bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs
89a5(dkon brtsegs): gnag pa'i tshe// grong khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// bcom ldan rnam dag 'od gzer mthong bas na// ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med// bcom ldan /
89a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pan cher mdzad pas// lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na// bcom ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags
89a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor los gzhag pa che// rnam dag 'od gzer kran gsal nga mtshar gyur// rnga na cing shes grong khyer sgra sman phyung // bya tshogs ngag kyang ma
89a8(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu dga'// gzhan yang rab tu dang brang mang po'i// lag dang nang gi gdub la khar 'bring ba dang // de bzhin rin chen brgyan ni sna tshogs las// ma dgrol bar ya
89b1(dkon brtsegs): rang cid sgra snyan byung // so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing // bskad 'thun pa kra shis mchog gi bsngags pa brjod// 'on longs dbang po ma mtshang dbang po thang/
89b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs che kun dga' bas// lha mis me tog mngon gtor mchod pa byas// mkha' la
89b3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu sgra snyan byung bas na// lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dbang bar gyur// gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dag/ smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod/
89b4(dkon brtsegs): bud med gang sbram mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa// 'od gzer byin gyis bde ba thob pas gyur// skye ba bud med do khrel bcas la// dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad par/
89b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de// thu ba mchog zhabs la spyi btung phyag byas nas// kha cig bcom la bla med lam rab 'tshol// kha cig byang chub sem
89b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyan thos 'tshal// bcom ldan grong khyer chog tu gshegs pas na// bcom ldan zhal tu la zhing rang nyid dga'// bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa'i spyod btil pas/
89b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rjes 'thun phan pa rab tu mdzad// chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin// rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang // bcom ldan grang bya
89b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i
90a1(dkon brtsegs): / mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad 'byung // gang zhig mig skye mtha' srid pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yim// gang zhig mi bang mtha' srang pa// sangs rgyas yid ches mi
90a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs 'thob// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dngab rgyun mi 'chang // gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// chos la yid ches mi 'jigs thob/
90a3(dkon brtsegs): mi zad mtha' ni lta bas na// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mig zang mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chang gang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig zang mtha' sred pa// tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur// mig zang mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chang // gang zhig mig zang mtha' srad pa// ngan 'a
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur// mig pang mtha' ni lta bsan// 'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i ni sdang spong bar 'gyur// mags
90a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni lta bsam// zhe sdang rgyur ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig bad mtha' srid pa// ngan 'gro ri gti mug spong bar 'gyur// mig bang mtha' ni lta bas na// gti mug rgyun na spong
90a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya // gang nig mig sadas pa' ska pa// byang chub mo gas drag gnas// mig sa mas nas pas// byang chub la nas rgyu tshal // rig mtha 'ang mig ma
90a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa dang ni rab dben dang // yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang // maM skye rab tu ni pa dang // 'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang // thams cad mig bang 'dra bar bstan// gang zhig mig
90b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' sring pa// de ni rtag tu mtshom med pa'i phyir// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye mtha' srang sa// de ni rtag tu batshamam pa
90b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig ni mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom meng ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu
90b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig dpan
90b4(dkon brtsegs): rab sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig ni skye sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs
90b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rdzu 'phral thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig med la sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ ma gang zhig mog medan
90b6(dkon brtsegs): sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yad // gzugs sgra dang ni bar du yang /
90b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mig bskyed dpag med gang bskyed pa// ye shes dpag med bskyed par byed// ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir// chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin
90b8(dkon brtsegs): mig zad dpag med gang shes pa// mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med thob// rna ba sna lce lus yid
91a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs sgra dri rig bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i che// sems can dasan
91a2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong snyed// mkha' las chos bshang snga thos pas// sangs rgyas yon tan tho tshom med// kha gcig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs ma byed/
91a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ang chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas yon tan bsor mi 'gyur// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // bla med la shes tshol byed cing // ma 'jus chos ni sgrub pa dang /
91a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed// byis pa bsam gtan bsgom byed kyang // bsam gtan bdel mos pas na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyeng nas// dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sem
91a5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bsam gtan bsgom byed kyang // mig bang mtha' shes med na// bskal pa brgya stong bsgom byeng kyang // de la rnam grol ci yang med// skye ba len pa thams cad ni// de la
91a6(dkon brtsegs): chags bskyed par byed// gal te sku nying stong rigs// mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur// gang zhig bsam gtan pa ni bsgrubs kyang // mi bi yang mtha' nas med gyur ma kham
91a7(dkon brtsegs): pargya song yin ma// bsam gan yongs sa das ma 'gyul// gang ni gcar brtags thob gyur kyang // khang mtha'ags pa thab ma zul yang bza' gas bya// bas thab la sa
91a8(dkon brtsegs): byang gang nig dugs par byung ba// 'dugs pa mamatshashes bamapa/ 'dugs par thamags byar// ga tu 'dugs pags byung/ gang des 'jis ma 'thal/ tshag na das
91b1(dkon brtsegs): med 'jig rten pa mtha' ma the byer// rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod / gang zhig zag bcas sems lan// sems pang mtha'i bri ba med/ sems bag pa ni mnye phyir// rtag tu sems ni lags spyo
91b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig bag bcas chos la gan// chos pang mtha' nazhes pa mad/ chas bang pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu bag bcas chos la srung/ sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang / mig pa mnamanamangs ldan
91b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ma she phyir// yang dag sbyangs la gnas pa min// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gro bgos kyang // mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// mig zad mtha' ni ma she phyir// yang dag chos gro bgos ma yin// ya bu rig sa
91b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes gyur kyang // mig bzad mtha'i shes med na// mig zad po ni ma shwe phyir// de ni dag pa'i rig ma yin// 'khor mang dag ni dog gyur kyang // mig zad mtha'i the med na// myur du ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te/
91b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dag ni skyob mi nus// sgra'i rig pa mkhas gyur kyang // mig zad mtha'i shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// sgra'i rig pa rtog ma yin// bzod rnams la ni mkha gyur kyang // mi zad mtha'i she med
91b6(dkon brtsegs): na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni bzo la mkhas pa yin// 'dri ba mang la mkhas gyur cing // yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang // mig zad mtha'i shes med na// de ni don 'thun pa bshad ma yin//
91b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i rjes bslob byed kyang // gsang dang gsang min mi bre shing // mig zad mtha'i shes med na// chos na rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// brjod pa sna tshog rgyang pan dang // chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang //
91b8(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha'i shre med na// khri shing stug por ltung ba 'dra// sgra'i rig pa mkhra gyur cing // dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston dang // tshig 'bru'i yi ge sgra skad dang // klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang /
92a1(dkon brtsegs): / mig pang mtha' rnam shes na/ de dag rnams ni shes med yid// bud med dag ni mtshan mdang / mchig mkhan mongs par byed pa dang // lus mas
92a2(dkon brtsegs): dasalams mas dang / brdzu gsamasas thar / yig pa sa 'a na// de chogs ngas/ su thabs rgya mang byon bye ci/
92a3(dkon brtsegs): mabang kyang / mig pang dmapa nam gyis na// bkad pa do don med yin// de bzhir mig ste mtha'adas kyang // mig mapa'ad ni 'dug padas// rab tu na pa'i bar dul pa/
92a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rig par gyis// rnga ba sA rtse lus dang srid // gzugs sa ji rig panas// sa dang mig gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhi sbyang bar byas// sgra'i rig pa klog 'dzim
92a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i don ni cig gyur kyang // mig zang mtha' nim shes na// de ni rnams kyang dman pa yin// srang pa ni ngag ni 'jor byed cing // bsang sngags dag ni rtags gyur kyang // mig zad ma
92a6(dkon brtsegs): masarnams kya ldan pal/ rnam 'ag sa du banas/ rabadun pa ga rjes
92a7(dkon brtsegs): / bas kyi'as dang yi // zugs sang ga na// skang nga bar drung // mas nga ba'i sna ba ga/ nga'i mchis brdzogs patsham pa ma/
92a8(dkon brtsegs): bam po bzhipa/ bcom ldan 'das thang zer gshegs pa'i tshe// thams can dag cheng me me// mkha' las chos bstan skams pas
92b1(dkon brtsegs): rig sa sa 'jigs pa ba// bcom ldan thong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems cad nodagan tsha me basbed/ mkha' las chos nam sa thos pas// mig ga rang bzhin rdzogs pa chu
92b2(dkon brtsegs): stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas// thams cad rnam dag mig tho 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yin// gzugs snga drir reg byanas// skra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang // nga rgyal khyengs dang g.yo sgyu nas// bag med pa'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/
92b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// steng gi nam mkha' dag las ni// sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos// kha gcig 'dod chags 'jigs pa'i// dpe zla med pa'i ming yang thos//
92b5(dkon brtsegs): kha gcig zhes sdang 'jigs byed cing // 'jigs rten pan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha gcig gti mug rab rtogs shing // nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming thos// kha gcig 'jig rten dag
92b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni// rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos// kha cig shes rab dag ston nas// 'jig rten pan 'dogs ming dag thob// kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas// sems can pan
92b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jogs ming dag thos// kha cig bdud ni rab bdul kyang // kho na 'dzin med ming dag thos// kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis// rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos// kha cig
92b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can sdug bsngal ba// rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// kha cig me'i gtso bo yis// 'jig rten sgrol pa'i ming dag thos// ming ni de dag thos 'gyur nas// thams cad
93a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag mig thob gyur// nam mkha' dag ni rgya mtsho chu// ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang // thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thugs mi
93a2(dkon brtsegs): kha'agyur// gang zhig mig zad nges par thob gyur nas// chos sku mngon par grub par dga' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur ni// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob
93a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur na// sangs rgyas brdzu 'phrul thob pa
93a4(dkon brtsegs): dka' mi 'gyur// gang cig mig ste nges bathob gyur na// chos sgra mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos sgra mchog ni rdzu 'gyun// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med
93a5(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
93a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya'i chos dag nas// skra rnams dang ni ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du
93a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sbyar bar bya// dechos chen dgani rab tu ga yos// rgya mtsho rnams kyang ni de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams// thams cad rab tu dga' ba bskyed par byed/ 'du
93a8(dkon brtsegs): nga du sa gyur ba mnas/ thams sa sa rgyas bgang pa sla pa mas// ma mas pas mas me yang dugs ras// 'a rdzun dag ma
93b1(dkon brtsegs): ni' rten byung bsan// lha ma thams can lan phan par medzad// sa pra'i 'khor gzhal med gnas nas// ngang pa'i sems kyis dga' das 'disang du// 'dren pa'ang/
93b2(dkon brtsegs): rten deng byang shini tu legs// 'jig rten kun bden ni rab tu mdzang // mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos na// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dad pa skyes// kyang 'phags smrasas
93b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa'i 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes// khyang 'das
93b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa 'byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// sum bcu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/
93b5(dkon brtsegs): khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba
93b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes// khyad 'phags smra skan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bcom
93b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan blan med mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi// lha mi ga tso mchog la ni brten nas su// sems can thams cad stsol bar bgyid ces zer// dga' ldan lha rnams de skad ces nas
93b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// bcom ldan 'das kyis
94a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba bye bar ni// spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med mngon bsgrubs nas// sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan// 'khor ba bsgral
94a2(dkon brtsegs): nas mya ngan las 'das la bkod// 'phrul dga' lha rnams de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang pa skyes// khyad 'phags snga sman sangs rgyas bsngags brjod
94a3(dkon brtsegs): nas// 'dren pa pas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de nas ni// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags snga sman sangs rgyas bsngags rjod
94a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pa na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad// bla med byang chub dag nis yongs
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs nas// skye gadrangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer// tshangs ris lha rnams des dkris nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ khyad 'phags sgra gan sangs rgyas
94a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngags 'ardzanas// 'dzin 'byung bas 'a'i rten par mang dasher// de bzhin gcig nas du mams pas// tshangs pa'i 'khod rnams dga' nas 'as dang/ 'dzin pa 'ang
94a7(dkon brtsegs): na pams gags su ma / sas sa zu na
94a8(dkon brtsegs): du mams pasas// bla ma 'i na dga'athibs shing lha rnams 'phel// bdud kyi yang ba dag ni mongs spongs shing // 'arnams 'a' nir brgyas par gyur/ mi 'arigs spobs kyis la/
94b1(dkon brtsegs): tshams rab btul nas/ byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du brnyes// de bzhin skad gcig sub tsam ldarnams kyis// bcom ldan byang nas pa na mngasas gyurang nas// 'ang tam zad pa
94b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa shin tu legs// rnam dag mig ni sems can byin shes zer// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams/ mi gtsang bsams pa bshang byas pas/
94b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dang chags ni sdem lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// zhe sdang dag gis gsungs pa rnams// byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas// zhe sdang ni ste ma lus spangs/
94b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan thong khyer gshegs pa'i che// ga'i mug dag gi gdungs pa rnams// shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas// gti mug ne sdang ma lus spangs/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i che/
94b5(dkon brtsegs): ngargya la dag gis gsungs pa'i tshe// dargyal spangs pa chos thos pas// nga rgyal ni stem lus spangs// bcom ldan mong khyer pa'i tshe// phra reg dag gis gdungs pa rnams// phra rog spangs pa'i
94b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thos pas// phra dog gi su ma lus grangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// khong khror dag gi gdungs pa rnams// khang khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas// khong moni stem lus
94b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams// ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas// ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs// gang zhig dul ba'i spyod sgrub
94b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas// mang du thos pa'i 'tshor zhugs nas// kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mkhas las sgra thos pas// me tog dag gis sangs rgyas
95a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod// yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing // snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul sngon// gzhan yang mkha' las spa thos pas// bcom ldan 'das sgra dang skye gnas
95a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gdung chung dang ni gsung sgra rnams// khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod// sems can 'gro ba'i lta bar// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad// mig dang na bsnga lde lus
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang sba las sogs pa dang // bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dag/ ston par mdzad par khyad par 'phags// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pas na// 'jig rten slong ya ba mdzad cing // gardza/
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ni mang po ston pa yang // thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin// snod dang snod la de rjes su// mi 'thun chos ni sngon mdzad pas// sems can che rabs tshang med nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa
95a5(dkon brtsegs): ma byas shing // dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la// sems can dmyal ba bshad par mdzad// gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing // lha la rten nas spos dga' ba// bcom ldan de dag lngab
95a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / spos bzhi ni sgra thos mdzad// gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid// nges par nying du song ba dang // 'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang // ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos// gzhan yang sen
95a7(dkon brtsegs): can brgya song pa// mapa' las ga dang shes rab sbran// de bzhin chos kyis spyan par nga// yang dgastan pa'i sa lags// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul skabs kyis ni// tshul tshams
95a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin shes rabs// nam thol rnam grol mthong ba'i sa// dran pa dag kyang thos par gyur// sems can dgan ci sang pa// ni bzhin du 'phrul rab bstan nas// ji sa rjes 'dun sa
95b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad// sems can la la grang zhig/ sprin dang tshul khrims bzod pas mos// rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji khwa bzhin// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzang
95b2(dkon brtsegs): sra son/ bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul spobs kyis ni// sems can dbang po 'os bzhin// rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas// len 'dzin sngon la 'gong par mdzang // bcom ldan rdza
95b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stobs kyis ni// phung po khams dang sde mched kyi bcings dang grol dang nga dang // sa'i gnas gabs bye ba zag gi/ mtshan cing sun pa thos par 'gyur/ gas yangs da
95b4(dkon brtsegs): mashes kyis// 'od gzer chad med ston pa dang // nyon mongs pag chags spangs pa dang // spangs min lha thos par gyur// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// grwa dang mi'i zom
95b5(dkon brtsegs): mas dang 'bras bumi mardungs pas// skyelenas dang thos par byar// res 'ga' bung med mdun ngag tu// bud med 'argya pa'i lus sprul nas/ mkhas las skye ston na smrams pas
95b6(dkon brtsegs): gang ba 'dod chags bas la mdzad pas// shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang ba skyes par snar// thugs rjes mos pa ci bzhin du// bla mad chos ni ston par mdzad// me'u 'gal
95b7(dkon brtsegs): na 'angasu sa dang // kab yin dang kun dga'adag// 'ang srungs chen bdag na// kun shes ko'u tshun lasags// 'a gams pa ci bzhin du// can thas sngon pathos par gyur/
95b8(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin// gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang // ba raka ni 'khor bcas dang // bral bum dag ni tshang med rnams// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ gzungs sngags
96a1(dkon brtsegs): sman thos par gyur/ A di si/ bi di si/ i ra sa sIr/ oMn si/ man si/ A khyi/ un gyi a khyi tsal mang nang ye/ dang ni sha ni mai/ tra ka na/
96a2(dkon brtsegs): a maM mnaH/ na sapas bu re/ byung d+he ni ri/ a khi char/ bi ya ki ri la te/ a 'char bar mi ti/ ka la bzhi ni/ sa zo bong sha nir d+he bon/ bar ga sa ste/ shes te/ bar gas da/ 1
96a3(dkon brtsegs): data b+hU mi/ a ma b+ha ra/ a ma b+ha ra/ li la b+han/ shaMH tsing ta/ bi ba mi ta/ tsing ta a nan ta/ oM ber sa ba mi ha b+h+ra mi na nam ka ni bi min te/ sha ri bin+da/ a ma la ni ma la/ bu li te/
96a4(dkon brtsegs): na shis/ gas ma ma li/ b+ha ra ni/ Nik+Sha sman ribar/ u d+hir ta ba tsaM/ man ta ri/ kuH ri/ kA tA ri/ ke pra sra ba raM/ kar mi/ gsum ni ye/ kakari/ ka kha ul la su
96a5(dkon brtsegs): 9/ dar ni/ dang ni/ nag ni re/ ba ra len te/ a te ba ral te/ an tar bAn d+he/ an ta ra bA ti shis/ gsi ri/ mkha li/ i ni sam b+ha re tiH/ sa Sh+kar mi ga zu lo tsa/
96a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu// yul 'khor bsrung ni la sogs pas// khyad 'phags su ni grangs med kyis// dben pa'i sngags tshig rab tu sbas// tshang medas ni drag kyang /
96a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs rje 'phrul dbang gis byang sa te/ yan kar ldan ma an tam na cigs/ sa ri/ rdzu 'phrul dag ni cang med pas/ bstan pa dag kyang chang med pas// sa
96a8(dkon brtsegs): sa/ du 'al ba sa mas/ 'am ma sa ngan pa/ sa pa ba sa/ pa sa kyis rgyan pa
96b1(dkon brtsegs): mang bur mdang bas// bltam nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang / rgyal sring spangs nas rab tu byung dang / byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas/ bsres pa'i chos dag bang gangs pa
96b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang // mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis// sna tshogs chos ni sngon mdzad pas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams
96b3(dkon brtsegs): khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po'i sa// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// byams chos bsgom pa bshang bstan pas// byams pa'i
96b4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan pas// bsdu ba'i spyod bzhi 'phel bar mdzad//
96b5(dkon brtsegs): de rtse thugs rje chen po yis// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshang bstan pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/
96b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin rnams kyis longs bskor nas// rnam tsho nyes dmigs pa bstan pas// rnam 'tsho sems ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lA ma yin gyis yongs bskong
96b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ zab pa'i nyes dmigs pa bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgoms pa'i sngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// nam mkha' lding gis yongs su bskor nas// 'gal
96b8(dkon brtsegs): byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// 'dum pa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// dga'i tshig ni dpag med
97a1(dkon brtsegs): ra bzhin pa shegs pa'i grags brjod pacan// de se thams rjechen po las// lto 'bru 'a tshar kyis mangs bzungs// yugags chos sa spa pa nga cing/ batsham ldan
97a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab bsngags brjod bstan/ de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// 'dre srin 'khor kyis yongs bskor nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog/ rgya cher bsngags pa brjod par mdzad// thugs
97a3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya srong sred// mig zang mtha' bstan byas pas na// mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems
97a4(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni brgya spong sred// mig mtha' ni bstan thos pas/ mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig gi mam
97a5(dkon brtsegs): ni bstan thos pas// mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya snang sbed// mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur nas// mthar byiphyin non na
97a6(dkon brtsegs): rnags par gyur// thugs ni chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong sbed/ mig daden bstan pa thos pas ma/ mamar byin na na rtogs par gyur/ thugs rje chen ces na
97a7(dkon brtsegs): sa/ sa na na pa rnam pa 'dul / sems
97a8(dkon brtsegs): tsha me nan pa sayang gyu ma sa pa gyur// gas can pas 'phrul bsarna pas// sems cad can nga shid // tshig par na ba rgyas ma pas #
97b1(dkon brtsegs): dang gas par byar// thugs chen pas 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya spang srid// mig la bdag mang bstan thas pas// bathar byin na na dgas par thar// rdza sa
97b2(dkon brtsegs): chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la gang zag med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems
97b3(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la sems can med thos pas// mthar phyin don na rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul snyan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la slob
97b4(dkon brtsegs): meng thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni bsta brgya stong snyed// mig la gsob med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni
97b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten shes pa sman pa de// zhen pa mig skyed nyid du mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
97b6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad de// 'dus ma byas kyi bsngags rjod mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher
97b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ zag bcas shes pa rab smad de// zag med shes rab bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten bsapa gtan rab spang
97b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas tshul khrims rab slad de// zag med bslab gnas
98a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pas mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher na// sems rgya chung ngu'i brjod de// sems rgya chen po'i yon tan
98a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab// zag med rten pa med pa'i// bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos
98a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bstan nas// sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing // spos la dga' zhing zhen pa dag/ sangs rgyas smad par rab tu bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sem
98a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la rgya cher ni// mig chang skyon ni rab 'byed cing // rab zhi mtshan nyid bstan par byed// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs snga dri reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /
98a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin sti myur bar bya/ thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bsan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// daral babacing gnon pa la// nyes dmigs dpas med yod par bsdus
98a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phral bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chos rigs dag ni bsnyems pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas
98a7(dkon brtsegs): sems carnams cher na// longs slong bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag mad med par bsan// sngags ni chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ma/
98a8(dkon brtsegs): rang bang pas ma gyur pa la/ zhes migs dpag med song bar bstan nas// rdzags chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ sems ca rnams la cher na// gathabs kyis pa me bal
98b1(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pas 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la cher ni// bud med pag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bsan
98b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gos kyis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
98b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'chang gis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// zugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rdul
98b4(dkon brtsegs): bo bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes
98b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul snyan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// shes rab bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
98b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang // bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang // nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor// rol mo klu dang lce rkyang dang // grags pa phun tshogs bsngag
98b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bkur sti dang ni sred pa dang // mdzes dang g.yo rgyud rgyal dang // ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang // khyengs dang pun tshogs nga rgyal dang // bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no// thugs rje
98b8(dkon brtsegs): chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig sems dang yid// dman par gyur pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
99a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang zhig rab zhum zhing // brtsol bar mi byed de dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang zhig nor rnams la// chags par gyur pa de dag la// mchog shes chos ni ston par mdzad// gzhan yang sros kyi drig cad khang // me tog dag gi gzhal med kha
99a3(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul nas// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan// gzhan yang lha'i bu mo rnams// me tog tsam pa khang pa na// gnas la lus byed bsten sprul
99a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ me tog 'phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag/ me tog ma li khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog 'phreng thogs mchod byed
99a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan// gnar mang wa'i bu rnams dag/ pad+ma sngon po ldang pan// gnas pa lus byed bstan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yan tan bsngags pa bstan// gzhan mang tshangs pa rnams kyis
99a6(dkon brtsegs): lha/ gser gyi gzhal med khang pan// gnas pa lus kun bstan phul nas// skra sman sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod// gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag/ sna tshogs brgyan ni lus
99a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun cing / rgya na pan tshun dag pa la// sgra stan dag ni sa byung nas// 'dus byas rnams kyis chos dgu na/ 'gyur zhing mi brnyan yinan yang// byis pa mi bde rtog pa las/
99a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ga bzhin ma shes par// rgyan gyisan 'das kyang // lus dang sems las byung ma yin// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// phyogs kyang yong ba ma yin te// gzugs dang sems
99b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// byis pa rnams kyis mi sems pas// 'di la the tsom skye bar 'gyur// rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las// sgra swar byung ba de yis ni// sa
99b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing kun grags pas na// sems can tshad med grol bar gyur// de ltar bas na mkhyed rnams kyis// 'dren pa'i rang byung ye shes dang // yon tan dpag med sku dag ni// sring ba'i
99b3(dkon brtsegs): spos las 'das pa dang // rab dben skyon ni med pa dang // lha bral sems ni rab sbyangs dang // mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang // sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos// khyed kyis bcom
99b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan grong gshegs che// gom pa dag ni seng ge 'dra// gshegs stangs dang pa glang chen 'ang // sems can reb bsod par mdzad// bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs// yang
99b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// sems can dag ni thams cad kun// lta bas mi ngoms nyid du ltos// khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso bo mchog/ thugs rje chen po ldan pas na// dngos po chu
99b6(dkon brtsegs): dus mchod byas kyang // yod ngamatshad med thob mdzad pas// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni// mya ngan 'das pa thob par du// rnam smim thug pa med pa
99b7(dkon brtsegs): ltos/ khyod kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni// zag med tshul khrims rdzogs pas na// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// gus pas spyi bos pag byed dang // lha'i 'khor ni mang po rnam
99b8(dkon brtsegs): so sor gzhal med khang spangs nas// rtse ba dag la chags med par// 'dren pa la ni sten med ltos// khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor// bcom ldan 'das la dang bskyed nas/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi rlung yab dgathogs te// g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod pa dang // bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis// lha'i me tog yid 'ongs pas// de bzhin gshegs
100a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mang gtor nas// bla med ye shes 'tshal la ltos// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni// bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na// de tsa bcom ldan 'das pang gyur// sosor
100a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' par gyur pa yin// rlabs pa dag ni na med gyis// de bzhi ga shegs pa'i bsngags pa badzad/ 'a ma bdu gyu/ sang bsangs pazhes byab/ zag mer bam
100a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags brjod nas/ mig zad mtha' ni shes par gyur// mig gi skyes pas mtha' skyes pas ni// rab ni mtshan nyid rab tu rdzogs// gzhan ma yang mig zad la sogs pas/
100a5(dkon brtsegs): mig don tshig ni pag mad rtogs// des ni mi mkhas dag gis ni// sems can rnams la yang dag bstan// ming dang don rnams la yang ni// nen dang po tsom med pas ni// 'grol
100a6(dkon brtsegs): med pas rab rtags shing // glang dor med pa nyid du gyur/ rang bzhin dgan sang dben pas// yi ge rnams na spangs pa dang // led dang gzungs dang thog pa dang // 'jam
100a7(dkon brtsegs): sems sa
100a8(dkon brtsegs): padi dag ni// phung po khams dang skye mched 'das// bdun pa med cing bden pa'ang med// gnas dang gnas pa yong ba min// tshig gis sla ba'i lam cha cig// sems kyi spyod pa
100b1(dkon brtsegs): 'angar btug/ zla ba'imatshan mazhen pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan mong khyer gshegs pa mthang / bcom ldan mtshan pa yangs spangs kyang / byis pa yang dag pa yin nog/ bcom ldan thong
100b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe// gang zhig dga' ba ste 'gyur ba// don mtshar ma rtag pas/ myang na gdungs dang bcas gyur/ gang gis mtshan ma'i rtogs spangs pa// grong khyer gshegs pa mangs
100b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gshegs pang bskyed pa'i mtshan mal// rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab thab// gang gis mchar mar sangs rgyas mthong // des ni thong khyer gshegs pa mthong // skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos
100b4(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ rnam par rtog pa bskyed par byed// gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong // dga' ba dag ni skye 'gyur pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas// bdud kyi spyod yul sdang ba yin// gang
100b5(dkon brtsegs): gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong // de ni 'gyur bar mthong ba yin// de ni mya ngan gdungs bcas pas// mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin// chos la thob par gang lta ba// de la chos ston ma
100b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan yang // sangs rgyas mthang bskyes pa la// mya ngan 'das pa'i drug bsngal mang // bskal pa mang par gang bsgoms pa// mtshan ma thams cad rtogs pas na// grong kyar gshenas
100b7(dkon brtsegs): mam nags cis// mngan 'das pa'i 'du shes med// sems kyi mtshan nyid gang rtag pa// sangs rgyas srung la gnas pas ma// thong khyer gshegs par mi rtag cing// mya ngan 'ad
100b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med// gang gis de ltar rab shes pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing // ngo bo nyid kyang dod rtogs stong pas// mthor ni skye 'gag ci yang med// bcom ldan bskal
101a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag med nas// dka' ba rnams ni rab spyad nas// ngo bo nyid ni slong mkhyen na// byis pa rnams kyis mis rtogs sa// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa
101a2(dkon brtsegs): che/ 'khor ni brgya stong mang gis bsod// pi dang mi ma yin la sogs// btang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa pas// gang gis sa gcig sam dun// mig zang papa' di bsems cang/
101a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma rnams ni stong pas// 'di'i bsang nams de bas 'phags// bgrang ba dang ni grangs kyi tshe// rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do// de bzhin mog gi skye mtha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'phrag pa
101a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par bya// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs snga drir rig byas nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de nas
101a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis// sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos// ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang // thams cad bcom ldan 'das la byog/
101a6(dkon brtsegs): ma sa / mas ca nas pas mtsha nas// nas kyimam ldan nas/ tshang byer du gshegs pa ma// 'i dbang tham rgyal/ mam tsha ma
101a7(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin dag ni mang ba rnams// rang gi grong khyer snangs nas ni/ bcom ldan spyan sngar 'jug myur // rab tu dga' nas mtshang bar byas// de nas che bcom ldan 'das/ zang kyi
101a8(dkon brtsegs): ni gshegs pa'i tshe// gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i// bya'i tshogs ni chad med pa// ne co dang ni rma bya dang // ka la ping ka bya'i rnams// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i// yon
101b1(dkon brtsegs): mnanamad pasan// thams cad rnamamatha sa na// sa byangan khapas rnam par na// rnams pa namapa tshugs kyi/ A dus na
101b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi ni skabs dag gis// sems can chang med brgya stong snyed// mdangs pa dag ni mdza
101b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur// 'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur// dbang po mtshang gang yin pa// thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur// sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag/ thams cad bde ba thob par gyur//
101b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de ni tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// 'di skad smra ba thos par gyur// gang gis mtshan ma rnams kyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
101b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs byed pa// de yis bcom ldan 'das la ni// mchod pa bya zhes brjod mi bya// mig zad mtha'i ngo bo nyid// rtogs par yang ni mi 'gyur ro// mtshan mA nI gang spangs pa// yon tan bzhi ni bsdun/
101b6(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ mig zad mtha'i ri bo nyid// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes// 'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i mtha'// rab tu rtogs par gyur ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang / rab tu rdzogs
101b7(dkon brtsegs): bar khong du chud// mig ni zang pa'i mtha' dag la/ mi 'dzin sred pa med pa dang // mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la// rten cing gnas pa med pa dang // mig ni rab tud dben pa la// ma mo ba'i bsam
101b8(dkon brtsegs): ba med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la// rnam par rtog pa med pa dang // mig gi mtha' ni gang yin pa// de la yid kyi
102a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog med dang // migri na rnam par 'jig pa la// bstan par bya ba med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bathong bame du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni ming ra gyur
102a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pa dang // mig ni skye ba med pa la// yongs su sdung pa med pa dang / mig ni rab tu na pal// 'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa// depa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ mang bcing
102a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ar ba yin/ ma ni pa pa shes pa'i phyir/ mtshan nams pa sgrub pa dang / yi ma 'jigs pa'i rtsom// bang ba gnas kya ba/ mi gi shes pa byer/ dang ra
102a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang thob gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas// gzugs ni khong du drung pa dang // mig ni 'jigs par rab shes nas/
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ma las pa gas pas/ e ma gis zugs// laman sgrub bar gang kyang ba// 'a na ba gagags nams// sa ya du gyur ba yi/ e sa rnaM ba napa
102a6(dkon brtsegs): gan na mas pa'i khyod// las kyi zas pa dang pa// des ba gas pa gyung // las kyi bya za pa dad pa// matudags par gyur bar byes// dzis rnaM da bzhi gshegs pa nas/ #
102a7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba sa sa shegs/ yang gang shi das pa'i rtsom ldag pasas byams ngapa// rnam bdugs par tha/ spyas pacwas byam nga// mdums
102a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis na pani gags pa mas/ ya sa ma / sa sa ma / ma dgas par gyi/ drug bsngal mas pa ga
102b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sdug bsngal 'jigs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des mid bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur pa yin// thig gizing pa dang
102b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir 'angs
102b3(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi skye med gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa// des yang rab tu rtogs
102b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhin yang mig gi mi rtog nyid/
102b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir// des ni de bzhin
102b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig la yi ge med// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag kyang // rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba
102b7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig gis mi 'ong nyid// yang
102b8(dkon brtsegs): dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// 'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// 'dod chags rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//
103a1(dkon brtsegs): mthang ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang bsapa gtan bsgom pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rnags
103a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gang zag des ni de bzhin du// mig
103a3(dkon brtsegs): gi sngon mtha' shes pa dang // mig gi mi gnas shes pa dang // mig mi sta~M ba'i shes pa dang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang // mig gi dman pa shes pa dang / mig ni khyad 'phags shes
103a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ye shes dman pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag le shes bla dang // tshul khrims rnam dag shes pa dang // lus kyi sdom pa shes pa dang // rnam dag sla'i shes pa dang // ngag gis sum
103a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang // rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang // gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang // sems can ni chos kyi shes pa dang // sems spyod shes pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag las kyi shes pa
103a6(dkon brtsegs): / sems kyi rnam pags pa dang // sa dmigs pa'i gas pa dang // rnam pa sgralams pa dang // drang pa'i bya gags pa dang // rang pa'in rgyan shes pa dang / rnamam
103a7(dkon brtsegs): ga pa rdzu gnasags papas/ ga mad rnal rnams nas pas ci gas pa nga // sa pa khye shes pa dang // sdug pasngal pa
103a8(dkon brtsegs): dang/ 'as bya rnams tshogs pa dang / yang ma nga sa gas pas/ mams chags par byang po mas// gnan man med rkye du nyis kyi/ rlung des sams pa
103b1(dkon brtsegs): slong med pa'i shes pa dang // mtshan ma dang bcas mtshan ma med// 'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas// rnam par gzhag dang yongs sdud dang // bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa// yang dag
103b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang mi zad skye mtha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang rab dben dang // 'jug pa dang ni med pa dang // mi skye ba dang nyer zhi nyid// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// sems can
103b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni mang po rnams// rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang // mthu dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang // brtson 'grus ye shes thob par byed// gzhan yang gcig dang tha dad shes// sems can dag ni thams
103b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis// mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi// mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang // rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang //
103b5(dkon brtsegs): las dang rnam smin shes pa dang // dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang // sems ni 'gyur ba shes pa dang // shes rab mos pa'i shes pa dang // shin tu rnam grol shes pa dang // spobs pa mchog
103b6(dkon brtsegs): gi shes pa dang // yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can ma rungs dang // chos la mos pa med gyur pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// mos pa'i shes pa skyed pa byed//
103b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang don gyi tshul dag ni// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// le lo med pa'i shes pa dang // dus shes sgrub par byed pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// chos rnams
103b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byed pa dang // yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// thogs med pa'i ye shes dag/ yang dag ji bzhin gshegs pa yin// gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang // tshig gis bstan pa gang
104a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ rjes su shes pa'i shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang 'gros babang 'thur gnas dang // gos dang bras bdung ba dang /
104a2(dkon brtsegs): nashes panas/ yang ga gags pa sas// gzhan yang byab ma dpa sa na gang yin pa/ nan na bsgrub pa gas pa dang / ya sa ba
104a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing // sgo 'dogs skur 'debs yongs spangs nas// bla med ye shes gang tshol pa// gang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu
104a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa stabs dag gis// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sprul ba'i sgra ni rab bstan nas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// yongs su smin pas mdzad pasam// mas
104a5(dkon brtsegs): cang rab tu dag 'gyur nas// dad pa skyes pa'i shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang / mos shing gus pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod chags spang ba'i chos dag la/
104a6(dkon brtsegs): rab mas sgrub pa'i shes pa dang // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun chogs la yang // mchod mar mos pa'i shes pa dang // byang chub chen po dag la yang // rab mes bsdu pa'i sa
104a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams kyis ni stod ga la// ra ma da pa'i gas pa dang / mam pa rnams ni gang mdas/ maso bdagasams pa dang // 'bams
104a8(dkon brtsegs): 'pheg na pa// lags pa gas pa'ags pa sa 'azung sas ngan pas la/ shes par byed pa gas pa nga / dang sa du ma pa' mam
104b1(dkon brtsegs): mang pa gas mams pa sa su pa rgya ma rnams// yang dgazhan 'chags pad/ 'ad pa mas byu ga na
104b2(dkon brtsegs): padang // 'thab dman pa 'di dag tu// lung ba mi 'gyur shes pa dang // mi dge ba shes gnyen gang yin pa// yongs su spang byed shes pa dang // dge badzin shes nyi
104b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bsten par byed pa'i shes pa dang // 'dri zhing lan lon gang ba yin pa// rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang // gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa// legs par rdzogs pa'i
104b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // sa dang sa min gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang // 'dus byas shes pa
104b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa// 'dus ma byas kyis shes pa dang // dngos po dang ni rdzas kyi shes// dngos dang dngos min shes pa dang // yongs su sdud min shes pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa'i
104b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // yang dag bsgrub min shes pa dang // mig dang mig min shes pa dang // mig dang lhan cig shes pa dang // mig gi bye brag shes pa dang // mig gi rang bzhin shes
104b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// rna ba sA lce lus nas ni// skra dang min las stsogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gang yang
104b8(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rgya rkyen nyid// yang dag slong zhing dben pa dang // mthar ni bdag yong ma yin par// sems par byed pa gang yin pa// gang zag des ni de bzhin du// yang dag nges pa'i
105a1(dkon brtsegs): ma naM/ sems kyi kyi 'dzin parang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur// gang zhig migan rten 'brel dang // mig mirtag pa'i bcan /
105a2(dkon brtsegs): nges pa nyid du rtogs gyur nas// sems par byed pa gang yin pa// gang bag ngas ni de bzhin du// mig gi rgyu rkye gang yin dang // mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa// yang dag dza
105a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de'i tshen bcom ldan 'das
105a4(dkon brtsegs): zong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i che// zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis// dngos po ngo mtshar rab bstan pa// deng 'dir bdag gis mdor bsdus nas// yon tan phyogs ni cung
105a5(dkon brtsegs): zang cig/ sems can dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir// yang dag par ni bstan par bya// de tshe lha ma 'dren pa yis// skra'i khung bu gcig nas ni// 'od gzer brgya stong chad med
105a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ras tu bskye bar gyur pas na// 'dag ze gni ngas kyang // nid ni rmang med gsal mngang nas// sems can mang po kun kyi byir// sangs rgyas mang par ba tu ma
105a7(dkon brtsegs): gang nag 'das pa'i dus su ni// sangs rgyas rnams la mtshad pa dang // yud ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dag/ mngon par bslabs pa gang yin pa// de lta bu'i gang zag pa/
105a8(dkon brtsegs): ma nga nan pa'i du yul dngas pa ma thas/ sa 'a mas par gyur// ga gas sargyas pa ma mas/ nams mas ma
105b1(dkon brtsegs): sum yin pa sams// des ma pasan// deman med bstan pa// 'phrul pa na 5/ mas ga sprul sa// ma
105b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang babyug// sna dang man 'dzin pa mos// bsam gyis mi khrub mthung sa gis// \u0f89\u0fa4 bu las segs pa'i// rdzu 'phrul snatshogs ra bstan pang/ tham na
105b3(dkon brtsegs): ni brgya stong dag/ chad mad grangs med pa rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni// bsten cing rim gro mchod pa byas// lnga dang mini 'dren pa yis// bsam gyis
105b4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab mthu dag gis// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong dang // tshad med grangs med rab bshad pas// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// bstan pa des ni thos pas na//
105b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dad pas rab blangs te// sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mthu dag gis/
105b6(dkon brtsegs): nam ma'a'alan 'di skad du// mig zad mtha' ni shes pa nas// mig ni nye bar ni ba dang // mig nyid rgyu'i bar du yang // 'gro ba med cing 'o med dang // mthar na sa
105b7(dkon brtsegs): dben shes par gyis// de skad du ni thos par gyur// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa 'i bu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar
105b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// da 'tshan bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du g+sa shegs pa'i tshe// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// swa spyan dam pa mchog byung nas// de bzhin gshegs sa
106a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sna tshogs// bsngags pa brjod par gyur pas ni// 'khor ni 'das pa chen po rnams// thams cad dang mas sems kyang sems// de ltar 'dzag
106a2(dkon brtsegs): can bzlags pa'o// ma tsha mang sa yang yin pa/ mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpurang dag/ par mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'dil bu'i mtsham/ thob par gyu ba da
106a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyu thams cag/ 'du dus pa nus gas par// blta 'jig rten pazhugs pa'i/ mdzes gagang yin pa/ mdza ni 'ad chags gnas pa dang
106a4(dkon brtsegs): mang tshas kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// 'dzid pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar
106a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bcugs pa'i yin// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni zhe sdang gzhom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan/ thos par gyur
106a6(dkon brtsegs): bde ga ni// ne nga dag na gang yin pa/ thams cad sang par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rted bzhugs pa/ me'i seng ge gang yin pa/ mtshan ni gti mug gzhom pa
106a7(dkon brtsegs): nimang chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'dis bu'i mtshan// rnas par gyur pa de dgan// gti mug dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// dgrar 'jig rten
106a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa'i mi'i seng ge gang yin pa/ mtshan ni rgyal gcom pa// ni mang chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang nig de la bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa da na// tu la sa
106b1(dkon brtsegs): gang seMn pa/ thams cad thang par 'gyur shes par// de ltar 'angs rten bcugs pa'i// me'i seng ge gang len pa/ mtshan ni 'ang thogarnam pa dang / zhamang dngas kyi rgyas nas /
106b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta bu'i nas mdzan// ches par gyur pa de dag ni// khong khro dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da lngar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'o// me'i
106b3(dkon brtsegs): gagang yin pa// mtshan ni phrag rog gnam pa// ni mdang chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// zas par gyur pa de dag ni// phrag dog dag ni gang yan pa/
106b4(dkon brtsegs): cad srong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni mi bder gzhom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang zhig 'di la
106b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// mi 'den dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i/ me'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan
106b6(dkon brtsegs): ni lta ba rnams gzhom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gi 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// lta ba dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar gyur zhes pas
106b7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni spros pa gzhom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de ga
106b8(dkon brtsegs): ni/ smos pa dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni yang dag pa'i chos// rnam dag chos
107a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rnam par chos ni gang yin pa// rab rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar
107a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i/ mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni las rnams rtogs pa'o// chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// zas par gyur pa de dag ni/
107a3(dkon brtsegs): las rnams thams cad gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// de ldar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mngand rngu 'phrul phun tshams pa'i/
107a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// zas par gyur pa de dag ni// rdzu 'phrul yon tan gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar
107a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni pha rol phyin pa rnams// phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// gang gis 'di lta bu'i
107a6(dkon brtsegs): mam/ sa par gyur pa de sa/ b.rol ston drug gang yin pa// sangs sna rdzogs par 'gyur gas zer// daltar 'dig rten bzhugs pa'i/ chu'i sang shes
107a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mtshan ni 'du byed dgang yin pa// rab rtags kyis kyi rgyal nas bya// gang gis 'di la bu'i mtshan// 'jig par byed pa de dag no// 'du byed dag sems cad
107a8(dkon brtsegs): rabadu sa par gyu gas dkya gtan 'azugs tham mangs ga gang yin pa/ mtshan rnam pa dag pa medan/ 'dig zeng su na
107b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i skye len dang // yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i/

107b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dam pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni sku gnyis dag pa'i// 'od gzer kun 'dzin

107b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i rus rig rnams// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa/
107b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan na rgya cher grags pa'i// 'od gzer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// mthos par gyur pa de dag ni// rgya cher grags pa grags pa rnams/
107b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni sbyin pa btod pa dang // tshul khrims can dang bzod
108a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgom dang // brtson 'grus brtsams dang bsam gtan pa// shes rab kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par
108a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag na// sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang // gzungs kyi sgo ni gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar
108a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni stong cing rdzogs pa'i// chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'dil bu'i mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de /

108a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// skye 'gag med don gang yin pa// yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig
108a6(dkon brtsegs): rted bzhugs pa'i// me'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa'i kun 'dzin chos kyi rdzogs bya// gang gis 'dil bu'i mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/
108a7(dkon brtsegs): ra ya yin pa/ yang ldan par gyung shes ba/ rnabasna kyings sa ni/ skadang ming las sogs pa'i bapa mil ldadapa / men 'dza
108a8(dkon brtsegs): dag dang/ mang me 'jug dang gos rnams kyang / thams cad de bzhin myur shing bya// dgo mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo
108b1(dkon brtsegs): bam po lnga pa sapa'o/ rdo'i dzin bcom ldan 'das/ tshang khyer dun gshegs pa / khas sa kyis mi khyab pa sa
108b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni stobs rnams kyis/ nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sgra sman dam pa rab byung ste// gzungs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ yang dag par ni bstan pas na// 'khor ni 'dus pa chen
108b3(dkon brtsegs): po rnams// 'di lta bu'i tshig thos te// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// mig gis zang mtha' gang yin dang // skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams dang // rab dben dang ni 'jug pa rnams//
108b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar rnams kyis// chos rnams gang yin de dag ni// mthar phyin gnas ni gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu rtogs par byed// sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis mthar ni gang dag sdung
108b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul khrims stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag 'grub pa dang // bzod pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag bkod pa dang // brtson 'grus stobs ni
108b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag slong ba dang // shes rab stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag ston pa dang // yi ge rnams dang brjod pa dang // sgra skad rnams ni spangs pa nas/
108b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang // mthar ni rnam ngag nyid du rtogs// zag dang bcas dang zag med dang // don rnams dang ni phan pa dang // thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang // mthar
108b8(dkon brtsegs): ni rnams dag nyid du rtogs// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// rten cing gnas par mi byed dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni// rab tu dben par gnas par byed// 'gro ba med
109a1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'ong ba med// dge ba ma yin ming ge min// lung du mi ston pa yang mam// bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o// de la bu yi mal macan ma rnams
109a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su das pas na// dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang // gnas par mngan mi byed do// cad thos dang ni skye bo dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos la ya/ khas
109a3(dkon brtsegs): bar ma na ma byed do// mig ni mang pa'i mthal dag dang // skyematha' dang ni mtha' rnams nas// rke bang ni ba'i bar rnams kyi// spyod pa dgan gang yin pa// mas cad tshangasas
109a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ skye ba dang rnam snye dang// sdug bsngal dang na 'de ba dang // btsud pa dang ni smad pa dang // thams cad sangs su spang rnaMs ze/ ma byin snang bgang yin dang/

109a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gas sar 'gyur ba yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen pa la// rab tuganas par gyur pa yid// migapa ma pa'i skabs dgal// de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang / chog kyi
109a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ de bzhin ni gnas pa dang // mig gi mtha'i stobs dgal// de bzhin du gnas pa nas// nye bar ni pa'i skabs kyi par// de la rab tu gnas pa dang // rna bsna lce lus nas
109a8(dkon brtsegs): blang yang la mags pa'i ba narnam pa nyi tha la// mas cad bzhin kya nas zer// gzungs ni gang yin 'di gagis// de bzhin gshegs pa na mam gyi skabs
109b1(dkon brtsegs): kya bar phags pa gang yin pa// sangs su rdzogs par byang tshung zer// gzungs na gang yin 'di dag gis// gam byin mang skabs de bzhin du/ yangs mdzums par byas mad
109b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnas kun la ni 'dug pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// spyod yul kun la gnas gyur pas// 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun// lam
109b3(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi tshogs dag la// brtad par 'dzin pa'i sems spangs nas// tshangs par spyod la gnas par byed// gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med dang // grul bum dag ni chang med rnams/
109b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kun kyang ni// rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed// dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang // srin po'i 'khor ni gang yin pa// tshang med grangs med de dag kyang // rab tu 'dul ba

109b8(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod yul bar gyis kyang // dmigs par bya ba ma yin te// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming las sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam par nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar
110a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa' yang mig gi pa ma 'das mi rnams kyin tham dang sogags padang la ga bams/ nab ma dag
110a2(dkon brtsegs): mang pa dang sam pa cangs mangs
110a3(dkon brtsegs): mam ca dgas par 'gyur shes ze// gzhan yang 'dig chos cing kyi// mi ni dgas par gyur sas// gzhan yang 'jig rgyas rnams las// sgrub pa'i mgan gang sa
110a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes mig dang shes rab mig/ tshangs pa'i mig dang lha'i mig/ mtshangs par skyes nas thos mig dang // lha'i skyes nas thob mig dang / tshangs pa'i rnam smin mig dag dang /

110b1(dkon brtsegs): rnas ga sas rnam sabyung / ma rnams sa smra
110b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan meg das dang // ma tan las byung migadas dang // skalas byung mig sa dang / rgyu rgyan las blang mig das pa/ rdzug las skyes mog ga dang / gnas tha
110b3(dkon brtsegs): dang dang // ye shes rnam par dag mig dag dang // yong min pa'i mig dag dang // dmigs med mig ni gang yin pa// thams cad rtogs par byed ces zer/ rna ba sA lce lus nas ni// !
110b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mig las sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// gzhan yang dag tu
