130a7(dkon brtsegs): la ma sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa chos du dang ldan
130a8(dkon brtsegs): na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya zhing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyong // sangs rgyas kyi
130b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sdig bcom la thub rtsa
130b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gyi phyir grong bar gi phyogs cog tu zhugs so// phyogs gcig tu zhugs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/
130b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag chags brgya stong mang po dag lpags par gyur to// bar sdang las kyang lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas thes dang bcas par thal ma
130b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal
130b5(dkon brtsegs): baM/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcom ldan gcig dang lngar na myur bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
130b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to// chos
130b7(dkon brtsegs): cig po gang zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing // lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa
130b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs byang chub du sems dpa' bskyed pa'o// de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud pa gang zhe na// rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes
131a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas/ mi dge ba'i las gang mi spyod pa'o// ji ma spyod ce na/ 'dod chags ma spyod/ zhe sdang ma spyod/ gti mag
131a2(dkon brtsegs): ma spyong/ khyim pa'i nags la sring la mi spyod de// rab byung nas kyang brnyed pa dang / kAr sti nga tshogs su bcad pa mi 'dang tsa gang rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa de'i gnas pam
131a3(dkon brtsegs): na/ ri la rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa gang nas/ 'di lnga sde chos thams cad yang dag par nga ltar ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o// chos thams cid khri du rab du rtags pa ga nas
131a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bcos thams cad ces bya ba ni// phung po dang khams dang skye ched dang // 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so// phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rdzogs na/
131a5(dkon brtsegs): bra po lnga rnams sna ma lta bu dang // dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par rab tu rtags pa ste/ dag sa
131a6(dkon brtsegs): bar sna sa par rjes sa ma mthung ba de ltang rab tu chags par// gang gi tshe mangs par rdzas su mam tshogs/ rlom sems su ma byed/ mdzag ngam par ma
131a7(dkon brtsegs): chog pa thams cad ce byar ba ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// gang bang b.rab tu rtogs pa 'i chos thams ca rab tu nags pa s+t+wa~M/ rigs kyi bu 'ang mang tu phyu
131a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsgrub pa zhes pa'o// de ltar thugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni sems can rnams yongs su ma gyung de/ mtshan byor nan/ btsam
131b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa// de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 'dras
131b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po chos cig po 'di dang ltar na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yang
131b3(dkon brtsegs): su spyod// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa yang yongs su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yonas su tan bkod pa yod
131b4(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na// byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// des dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing
131b5(dkon brtsegs): la bdud srid tsam du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so// 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
131b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// lha dang mir byas pa'i skyes dgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni// chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas
131b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe mdzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das
131b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhal gi sgo nas kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / mar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gi
132a1(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyad par byas nas slar log ste// bcom ldan 'das
132a2(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas// bla gos phrag pa cig zhug par /
132a3(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang la sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol
132a4(dkon brtsegs): to/ chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// 'dren pa khyod ni rgyal po'i stobs la mnga'// khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags// ji'i slad 'dzum pa
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan gsungs// thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen// da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa// jis de byad kyis
132a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dum pa mdad pa'ang mad gsungs// rab 'thong ba ma'i sems dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen// chags grol srid pa'i 'jugs pa 'o/
132a7(dkon brtsegs): / ma 'dul kha la myur b.lung bstan gsapa// ma rnams bye ba khrag tshig na rnams te// snyan ma mtsha la la la snang phyag 'tshal canapa// skye ba'i cham rgya
132a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dis khang rdzo kyis/ thub pa chen ge tshungs med pa su sa dugs la// byad rlo migs par la phyos// kyang la 'phrul pa yang mi ma la/ byung pa'i byas pa
132b1(dkon brtsegs): mabyad pa/ mag slad du 'jus pa bstan/ b+ha ba khrag tshag lagasapa// 'di dag chas rnams 'jal ba'i mang du 'di lhams sa// de bzhin dag grang chags kyang
132b2(dkon brtsegs): po dag / dam pa'i rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis// khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams rab tu bzang zhing bad pa brdung bar bgyi// skye bo mang po'i chom 'tshal
132b3(dkon brtsegs): ba kun/ thub pa de 'dir the tshom myur gcad gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
132b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa bcom 'di// shing ta la bdud srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug par mthong ngam// kun dga'
132b5(dkon brtsegs): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo byang
132b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bkal ba grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
132b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
132b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kun dga' bo dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'khrug
133a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub
133a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug
133a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang mi lhag mi thub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs de nas gshegs te// mthar kyis rgyal po ma
133a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang // bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la zhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa
133a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun zhugs par rig nas// bdag nyid lag bdar te bza' ba dang byas pa
133a6(dkon brtsegs): dang myang ba bzang po mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang // dge slong kyi dge 'dun las bslabs te tshim par byas so// bsgrubs te tshim par byas nas de bzhin
133a7(dkon brtsegs): gags pa gags gsal pa dang / ltung babad bzhag tsang phyag btabs par rigs nas// bcom ldan 'das la ras bcas bu 'thung rin pong med pa sku
133a8(dkon brtsegs): nas kyi maldan sa dang sa na / na padas
133b1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes ji ltar 'gas pa lags/
133b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go// phyogs cig 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang / thab pa ngang sdang dang 'a
133b3(dkon brtsegs): bgang nas bya ba lags/ mi shes pa ji las skye ba lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dpral 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
133b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po che pa ngang 'dzin pa dang // nga yir 'dzin pa yid pa las gnod sems dang // zab pa dang zhe sdang dang 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin pa dang /
133b5(dkon brtsegs): yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas// yon tan dang nyes mi shes te// de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o// gang ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi
133b6(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su shes pa de la ni shes pa 'am mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gang yang 'gro ba dang gang
133b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa/ de ltar bslab par bya'o// rgyal po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang mi 'gro gang 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med
133b8(dkon brtsegs): do/ gang la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med 'gag pa med do// gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o// shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa yang de bzhin no// de
133b9(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba 'am// nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba 'am// nges par mi 'byung
134a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gang yang mi shes de'i tshe// ye shes can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol te/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi legs par gsungs pa mdo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das gal
134a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag par skabs 'di kho nar gum pa'i dus bgyis par 'gyur na ni bdag nyid ngarngams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skye dgral chos
134a4(dkon brtsegs): gtam yang dag par bstan// yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzer spyong// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas// gdan las zhongs te gshegs
134a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa las 'du bar 'gyur bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das zas sbyin byis len pa spangs de// lhung bzed dang chos gos
134a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir rdo'i'adus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa la
134a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas nas ri'i rgyal po nad phung po gal bder gshegs te byon nas 'dzis ste// chos myang dag par rab tu snyan pa'i byor bcom ldan 'das gdas thams pa laja
134a8(dkon brtsegs): / cho nga ldan pa ga re'i bu sa/ nyan pas chen po gnan das kyang de bzhin du mang dag 'jog las langs nas tsho'i rgya lo ma rgyan kyi phung pa gal ba dang // ma ldan
134b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der dong sde phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs rtog du 'khod do// 'jam dpal gnad
134b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te// lha'i bu bzhi khri gnyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing
134b3(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste// phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs rlig tu 'khod do// byang
134b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stod tsam gyis yongs su bskor mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
134b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs cig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis
134b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrags pa'i ya sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste// byin
134b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'khod do// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang dpud kyi tshogs yan lag zhis yongs su bskor cing
134b8(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la man
135a1(dkon brtsegs): pas byab 'tshal te// phyogs cig tu 'amadan// rgyal ba'i khab kyi tshang khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig tu slong du mtsha' rgyal po
135a2(dkon brtsegs): nad kyi phung po mal bdang // bcom ldan 'das gal ba dang ring ste// lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te// lcags cig tu'i 'ad // sa
135a3(dkon brtsegs): sa sa kyi rdzus ci dang ldan pa gar dra bdun las yangs khragag thag pa gangs tub sar das sus ma gams pa'i spa sa la bcugs te// bamam ldan las
135a4(dkon brtsegs): bder logs su bral mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsala'o// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po khab gi zong khyer chen mo 'grong bar du byang chub sems
135a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rdzog pa tsam gyis gang 'di bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yan na bkod pa las rnams te/ ma stams
135a6(dkon brtsegs): pade'i lan bcam ldan 'das kyis ma tsam zhig bka' stsal nas// bcom ldan 'das yang byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi
135a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa yongs su sgrub pa de las rnams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma
135a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzag pa nga/ thams cad mkhyen pa yong du drung bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdud kyi ma rnams pham par bgyid pa dang / gzhan su segs can rnams bcod par 'gyur ba sa
135b1(dkon brtsegs): na mongs pa gzil gyis nod par 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyongs par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
135b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang //
135b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste// byang chub sems dpa'agyur bzhin du// chos kyi 'gyur 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar
135b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyis par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
135b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du nye bar 'dus shing mchis pa gang rnams bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang
135b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba dang rgya chen ze thob par 'gyur te// de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas// ji ltar thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis sgrub par 'gyur ba dag
135b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par bya na// 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
135b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas// phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re re yang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po kye la 'od gzer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi
136a1(dkon brtsegs): byug lagacig patu slong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te// sangs rgyas kyi na rag tud nyis dang tha pa'i 'a kyang masang nang zadas 'a
136a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis gzil gyis na nas phyir mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mdzem// klu dang gnod sbyin dang nor bu dang zlog dang me dang / skar ma'i
136a3(dkon brtsegs): zugs dang / sems gzhan gang gi 'ang kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang // gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' mas mu se med pa'i 'khor lug dang / 'khor
136a4(dkon brtsegs): yug chen po dang // gtang bzangs dang / ba'ang bzungs chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nas po dag dang de ma yin pa gzhan rims
136a5(dkon brtsegs): po dag dang rtsog pa dang shing dang nags tshal de dag thabs cad 'od gzer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dra bya ba mngon par 'du
136a6(dkon brtsegs): ma du sa/ sa bdas ldan 'das kyis ngam tha' 'das par rgyan paganas gsungs pa pa'ig meng dpa da / 'dung bgasal pa
136a7(dkon brtsegs): sa su ga na g-i rnams mtha' las tha ma du ga skyes bya ba par // ma 'dzi par byags ste pang brgyas kyi nang 'dinas sungs rgyas rgyas
136a8(dkon brtsegs): gang ba'i gling rgya brtsurgya bzhi'i byem snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rter gyi khams kyi khams kun nas 'ang ces bya ba 'ang ni bzhi migags pa dam btsam pa yang dag pa
136b1(dkon brtsegs): rtags pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' byegs rgyal za zhes bya bar ltar yang zhugs te// 'chan shes la chos kyang snyan na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing don namams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams
136b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ming yang mi thug ste// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig gis yongs su gang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
136b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshogs re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
136b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das
136b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal rdzogs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis bskor cing chos ston pa'i sbyar chu shing ta la 'dun srid tsam du bar snang la 'phags
136b6(dkon brtsegs): te lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje tshig gis gzungs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
136b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems de/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'i nga'i lus mi snang mod kyis bshad pa yang thags las
136b8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'byin te gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo // snga ri ldar bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de lnga
137a1(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa ma // nga'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshatshas 'phags sa
137a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong // gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
137a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das gi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs rmyig tu 'dug gi// phyogs kyis
137a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen pa
137a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dig rkyen du 'dug 'byung song gsang gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang ganga' ba de'i rgyu gang legs rkyen gdu lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'di ste phun ma
137a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mamadzod/ ma ces gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa ma bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmyal rgyags rgyal
137a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi ni
137a8(dkon brtsegs): bang gA'i klung brgyad bcus rgya ni'i byem snad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mamadzad ces bya ba yod de de nas de bzhin gshegs pa das bcom pa yang dag par rdzams
137b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang zhugs te 'tsho zhing zhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa nges gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrib brgya stong
137b2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sdu ba dang / 'di lta ste chos sgrags par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od gzer 'di dag btang ste/
137b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rtsegs rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
137b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
137b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de l+la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun de la yang lta ba dang
137b6(dkon brtsegs): chos de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' se
137b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri gsum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du drar nas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs po che
137b8(dkon brtsegs): lag pa skum pa nas brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba nas skum pa tsam gis skad cig thang cog yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi
138a1(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'dir nas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
138a2(dkon brtsegs): ches bya ba la snyoms par bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyang nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs mthag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid stong gsum gyis
138a3(dkon brtsegs): chen pa'i 'as rten gyi khams 'ang mertag gi tshogs chen pos pus ma nub cam gang bar gyur to// sil slan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ba// 'jig can gyi 'ams 'di gdugs dang rgyalam
138a4(dkon brtsegs): gas par ldan pa ma/ na kya rnam 'ang ldanas bya
138a5(dkon brtsegs): ma sa byu ba mas dpa' sems pal na du lku du na byu ma sa pa'i thams
138a6(dkon brtsegs): mang+yas ma thams sa pa pags pa ngas kyi pa ni sa na
138a7(dkon brtsegs): sa smra sa
138a8(dkon brtsegs): sa sa
138b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bskyongs pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang zhugs te 'tshe zhing zhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag du med pas yongs su bskur cing chos pa
138b2(dkon brtsegs): bston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med do// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba
138b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na// yang rigs kyi bu de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du na sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/
138b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa g.yas pa brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gi byugs nas lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // chos ring ba
138b5(dkon brtsegs): che'i sgra dang / dge 'dun rin po sgra 'byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab chen po'i sgra 'byung ngo //
138b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // de dag dang gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i
138b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong ngo // gsungs gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/
138b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
194a1(dkon brtsegs): par byung // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ zhe sdang zhing kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po bcus gcig la gcig mnar sems su byed
194a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mthong ste// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ bdag nyid la gnod pa byas shes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / gnod pa byed de zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye
194a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gnod par byed par 'gyur ro// zhes sems kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag
194a4(dkon brtsegs): gi mnga' bo la gnod pa byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag
194a5(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mdza' bas don byas nas sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag dang mi mdza'
194a6(dkon brtsegs): ltab do byed par 'gyur ro// zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / gnod pa'i bar du snang brjid dang 'dra'o// khyim bdag kun nas mnar sems kyi dngas po bcu pon de dag
194a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ kun nas mnar sems can thams cad sel ba/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o// nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas
194a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// kye ma'o sems can ne sdang ste/ gcig la gcig ni pi ni chun du/ kun nas
194b1(dkon brtsegs): ma sems dngos po bcus// kun la kun nas mnar sems gyur/ bdag dang bdag gi gi dul// gnod pa byas dang byed pa dang // gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro nas// de la na nas na
194b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kye// gang rnams bdag dang ma 'ja' ba// de dag gi ni don byas dang // byed de byed par 'gyur ro zhes// de yi kun nas mnar sems rtse// gnod pas sdang dang 'du yin te//
194b3(dkon brtsegs): gis mnar sems 'phel 'gyur ba// de mthong kun nas mnar sems rnams// mi 'dod pas na rab tu byung // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni lta bar byas pa/ lba ba ngan pa
194b4(dkon brtsegs): thibs po bcus lta bar byas pa sna tshogs dang // lta ba ngan pa'i thibs po dag gis gnon par mthong ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang / sem
194b5(dkon brtsegs): na du lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // srog tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // gang zag tu lnga bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // chad par lta bar gyur pa lnga ba ngan pa
194b6(dkon brtsegs): thibs po dang // rtag par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // bya ba med par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang / rgyu med par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // mi mthun
194b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyur lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // log par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang // 'di gnas bcu'o// khyim bdag lta bar gyur pa ngan pa thibs po de dag yin te/
194b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o// zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// don de nyid rtsa
139a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
139a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa seng ge'i dral gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rted du 'byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang ganga' ba 'dzim
139a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas lags rkyen byung lags// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi 'byung blugs sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzimam sa ma rgyas kyi mang bya ba khras thab sang pa'i
139a4(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rgya drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba me do// den bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
139a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba da ltar yang zhugs te 'tsho zhing shes la mchos kyang gud to// de bzhir gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas
139a6(dkon brtsegs): byang rlobasams dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'din pa/ ngas pa'i chos bklag pa'i phying ba sku'i zung buthams cad nas 'ang 'di rab tu bab shing bgang gas pa pa'i sa sa
139a7(dkon brtsegs): sa ba sa
139a8(dkon brtsegs): dngagadun pa rnams sangs rgyas gyo nong gi yon can bkod pa mangs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ngadas bcom ldan 'das sang ba'i tshul gyis bsgyings pa la byang chub
139b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
139b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa
139b3(dkon brtsegs): de la yang lta ba dang / chos ston pa de yang nyan du mchis// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste ci rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags
139b4(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang gti mug gi khyabs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrag pas 'jig rten gi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
139b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol do// bcom ldan 'das
139b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ji zhig gzigs na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
139b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su 'dzin bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
139b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
140a1(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan par bya'o zhes yud ring po nas smon lam btab par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni de ltar thugs rje chen po dang
140a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sing ge'i rtsal gis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces pas
140a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / b+hag bgyi ba dang / bsan bkur brgya
140a4(dkon brtsegs): slad du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
140a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shAkya thub de dga' ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu 'byung bar dka'o// de mthong ba yang rnyed par ba
140a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyangad pa'i dus la bab par shes dang sa la rigs kyi bu khyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bstim par gyis shig smras par
140a7(dkon brtsegs): shes gang sangs rgyas pa nyid da smras pa'i byung chub sems dpa' da na skye ba dag 'jag/ 'anasams gan das kyad ma
140a8(dkon brtsegs): khri ba dag go// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal
140b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sbas par 'gyur gyis// bcom ldan
140b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag la ni rjes su chags pa yang mchis// khong khro ba yang ma mchis na/ bdag ci'i slad du smras par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams cad kyis
140b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa gshe zhing smras ste/ sdigs shing btsags nas bang ba dang mtshan gis btab kyang bzod pas smos te// sems can gang la yang gnod par bgyi ba'i
140b4(dkon brtsegs): sems mi bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sing ge'i rtsal bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rigs
140b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro bar de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi
140b6(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed der song shig/ bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad ces gsungs ma thag du de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri
140b7(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong gis dbyangs cig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spros
140b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che byang chub sems dgu khri nyis
141a1(dkon brtsegs): sdong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du mdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi nang 'gyur nas/ sangs rgyas
141a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'di nas sa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rngu 'phrul gyi chom 'phrul ci lnga bus bcom ldan 'das
141a3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa do nga du 'a / sems can chang zad pal de ltar ba dbar byab sam ma// nganas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa lag na rin po ches de'i tshe ma
141a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum kyi stosnang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pas bka' nas lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la baba' byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la bdud ba
141a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / bye ru dang / su dag ji 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las
141a6(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos ngan tu gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa raM las chom zas par gyur pa dang / den sems can dpag dri med pa de dag gis
141a7(dkon brtsegs): chos mngon par rtags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang nang rnam pa snga tshugs kyis bad ba cing sdug bsngal bgyur pa rna ga rnams ca kyang mchog tu ba ba dang ldan pa
141a8(dkon brtsegs): del bu'i du 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngan par byas so// rangs byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po las na rin po ches rnga 'bral rnams pa de lnga bu 'di snyan nas kyi
141b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
141b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum bskor byas gnas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// yang de'i
141b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang ga'i klu'i dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gi bye ma snyed 'das pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
141b4(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i snying pos zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya da ltar yang zhugs te/ 'tsho zhing zhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
141b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bair+ya DUr+ya bzang po 'ba' shig las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par zhag pa med de/
141b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig kyis yongs su gang ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang rung / 'od yang rub
141b7(dkon brtsegs): 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ljang yang rung / chags yang rung ste/ de dag gis bai DUr+ya 'o sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po de mthong ngo //
141b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na shin tu phyis phyi ba'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ bai DUr+ya'i sa chen de
142a1(dkon brtsegs): las bzhin gshegs pa sadang// sadzangs rgyas kun 'jan/ rna bzhin gshegs pa yang da / lung gyunapa// dngam
142a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bzod pa thob bo// 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das de sngon gyi smon lam gyis// bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi ba spu'i dbus su yang nor bu rin po che chen po
142a3(dkon brtsegs): po mngon par grub ste// nor bu ring po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zubs pa dang / me tog la skye
142a4(dkon brtsegs): ba las nyin mtshan bzang par mtho brtogs par/ nyim dang ma pa mdzan pa yang zang / nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang mdang // yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa
142a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten pa smon lam khyad par blo thos shes bya ba nig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
142a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po smon lam tho zos kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong // gsung gsal ba'i sku de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i
142a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rigal ba'ad sa sbyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gabs la mag zas phyag 'jas / phyogs tu 'jug so// phyogs ts+tshag tu 'dug nas byang chubs
142a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo zos kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhid gagags pa nar bu brtsigs pa rgyal po re la 'di ska ces gsal te/
142b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du 'byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang ganga' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal
142b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye khrag khrig brgya stong gang ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
142b3(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs de 'tsho zhing gzhes
142b4(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyang bston do// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
142b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste chos bsgrags pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
142b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
142b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang // phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus
142b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub
143a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdur du
143a2(dkon brtsegs): bdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur gnas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems
143a3(dkon brtsegs): dnga' smon lam khyad par blo zas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gis cha 'phrul ci lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam btsam pa yang ba
143a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong sum gyi spang
143a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'o skye nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams
143a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshas pa bdang ldan par byu pa dang / thams cas myal ba'imams can rnams kyisasas dmyal badzab yang btsun par byung ba dang / thams can
143a7(dkon brtsegs): ma na sa rdzus sa
143a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ba rnam pa dang thal ni ba pa mchog dang ldan par gyur ba 'dom sa/ dab na gzung bsam sa nam gangs par thugs pa za pa bzhinas/ ga byas dam
143b1(dkon brtsegs): na de dag bde ba rnams par 'di lta bu skyes nas/ skad cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba 'am/ nga rgyal lam/
143b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa 'am// tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog mag sa/ ser sna 'am/ g.yo 'am/ thab 'am gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skyes pa'i sems
143b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pa mar 'du shes pa dang gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
143b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du bya ba mngon par byas te// de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo thos kyis rdzu'
143b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi rnam par 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
143b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pas rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
143b7(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta bzhin du 'byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs cig tu 'khod do// dkon mchog brtags
143b8(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po gnyis pa'o// / yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug bcu'i rtsags
144a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi nong den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
144a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing zhes pas chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med
144a3(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba sha stag go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so//
144a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos dung smrig gyon zhing dkyil mo bkrung bcas par rdzus te 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag
144a5(dkon brtsegs): las sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnam thangs yang dag par rab tu san// r-i la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/
144a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems dang bskyed po de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i snga stong la
144a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug la// gzugs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas sems mi ga yid pa gtsang ba/ rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma mang ba lnga yang dag par bsgrubs
144a8(dkon brtsegs): ra ma kyis nga gas da pas/ du pa sa pa 'ad pa'i gyib rgya cams pa/ saca kyis mas
144b1(dkon brtsegs): chos mas cad rab tu rtogs pa de dag la yongs su rtags pa med pa/ rtogs pa yang dag par 'chad bapa/ de yang mi mthodu ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag chu zhes rna
144b2(dkon brtsegs): yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan kyis brgyan pa skar ma rtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de'i smon
144b3(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu ste/ sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mthong ba de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
144b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung
144b5(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sa la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
144b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas
144b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung
144b8(dkon brtsegs): bde la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen gang lags
145a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas la'i dbang po rgyal po la 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces
145a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug khri gsum stong gi bye ma srid 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
145a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod de// chen de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha kya thub pa zhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing zhes la chos kyang ston to//
145a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa
145a5(dkon brtsegs): rag sas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang 'di lta sa/ chos bsngags pa'i bying sa m+bu'i lung bumams cang nas 'od ze 'di par btu kyi na gzung gsal ba'i//
145a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ri'i slad du 'jig rten gyi marnyed ces bgyi// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di de ltar 'jig rtenagyi
145a7(dkon brtsegs): khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mdzad// zhe sdang la mo mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal mi mdzad de// nga'i phyir 'jig rten gyi 'am
145a8(dkon brtsegs): ma ces byab// sagasas pa bcom ldan das sems can dag las la la rnas pa dang minan pa brjod pa dang bsdigs pa dang brnags pa
145b1(dkon brtsegs): tsang dang du len par bgyi ba mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis sam/
145b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las
145b3(dkon brtsegs): phal cher ni gnod sems dang // thab pa zhe dang zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang gti mug gis kun du dkris so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces
145b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i ming 'di mthog tu ma bab bo// gal te sems can dag gzod par 'gyur na ni/ de yang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du
145b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo byang chub
145b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya sdang mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i bzod pa dang dul pa
145b7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spyos// bsdigs mtshon gyis btab kyang ji skam mi mjed de/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug
145b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mi 'grogs so// rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa nga pe dag gi ming gis 'jig rten de mi mjed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
146a1(dkon brtsegs): pade yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa mu cor sla ba gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
146a2(dkon brtsegs): su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mi gus pa/ phrag dag la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag kyis
146a3(dkon brtsegs): de tsam du spyos shing smad de/ gnod par byas shes shing bkur kyang bcom ldan 'das de snying rje bas brjod cing dang du len nyes dang mnyam pa'i sems rjes su
146a4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / khong khro med pas de sti bstang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ stob sang ma byas kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ mi spyos shing brgyad kyang
146a5(dkon brtsegs): mi banopo rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur mi 'phrogs// mi chags mi smro bu/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
146a6(dkon brtsegs): mazhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal lo 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyi brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal bas
146a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dkyis gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rte rnams nang du ma sdus pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par snang na// bcom ldan
146a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal ma/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'i skad byer tshig/ rngatsho'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang gar mtshams na 'jig rkyen gyis khams brgyan du
146b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes
146b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'chog zhing zhes so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no// 'di ltar te dper na 'gog pa la
146b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par bzhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde ba de ltar bu dang ldan no// yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyad pa
146b4(dkon brtsegs): der lo bye ba rgya stong du/ tshangs par spyod pa byas na gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi byed du tha na se gol gtog pa sring tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems
146b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams mang du bskyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du yong su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
146b6(dkon brtsegs): pa sa la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' chen po mtshan po gyis rgyan pa bskur ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
146b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
146b8(dkon brtsegs): de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o//
147a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes nas shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis
147a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa skar ma brdegs pa'i rgyal po byad sems can dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing lhan cig sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhe nas mi
147a3(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa bskar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du
147a4(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji ltar bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thang du 'gro sram nas/ de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
147a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba mngan par byas pas// sum srang gsum gyi srang chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'ang rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis gyibs par byur ba dang / rinam
147a6(dkon brtsegs): cha'i gdugs de las kyang ma tig rnam pa sna tshas kyi char rab tu 'bab sil snyan brgya srung mang 'tshal/ mu tig gi brgyan 'phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'byung
147a7(dkon brtsegs): bdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan brgya snang yang mngon par 'ja ba dang / bcom ldan 'das sa kya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dag slong dang /
147a8(dkon brtsegs): grangam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / kla dang / gnad sbyid dang/ dri ba dang / lham yin dang / nam mkha' ldang ngas ma 'am dang / ma byichen
147b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji sred pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chem pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa re la bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
147b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya bar mngon par 'du byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa sar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul gyi
147b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bral rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
147b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba der 'ong ste/ lpags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan

147b6(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams kyis
147b7(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po de yang mthong // gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
147b8(dkon brtsegs): lhags nas de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos
149a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khong mdzes te// nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal// lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa/
149a2(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen po mo dge slong po mo dang // thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan 'das pan bzhed chos ni bshang drugasal// khyod ni 'das
149a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // da ltar yang ni shin du nges par mkhyen// lus can mos pa ri bzhin khyod gzigs la// the tshom chen po stsal ba'i chos bshangasas
149a4(dkon brtsegs): thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na// zhing rnams dag pa rdul med thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smon lam bsgrubs par thob 'gyur ba// de ni 'dren pas bdag la
149a5(dkon brtsegs): mAr bkad gsol/ ji ltar ser sna'i drims mi gos shing // ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang // bsdig pa dang ni de bzhin bskur ba dang // skyes pa /
149a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang thub pas de ldar bcad// sdub bsngal dums rab tu gamir ba'o// 'jig rten dgagi sdug bsngal ba rjog skad de// bslab pa bya ba med zas rgyam mas rnams

149b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ji ltar bsrung sde bcas bcom nas// byang chub brdul bral bu med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

149b3(dkon brtsegs): dal bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa// sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba rna
149b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don
149b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang ci zhig gi gzigs na bdag gdan gting tu bcug ste/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la ma stsa la/ de bzhin gshegs
149b6(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan gting du bcug pa las na gdan 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
149b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de'i tshe/ 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mngon par du bya ba mngon par byas pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag chang ba ni 'bum pa/
149b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che du mas sbas pa lnga'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma btang ba/ shing bal 'jam shing reg na bde ba bshams nas khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
148a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chan za
148a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / lA ma yin nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgyargya
148a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten stong pa dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od gzer gyi snang ba chen

148a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i tshe de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pas ji snyed pa
148a6(dkon brtsegs): de gnas byang chub sems dpa' tshang mang pa zangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig can gyi khams ma mdzad 'dir rang rang mi sangs rgyas
148a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhing gi san tam bkod pa de dag re 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chang med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gis sangs rgyas ba
148a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / chu zhing min par bcom ldan 'das ga rgya grub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa gang yin pa de'adra bar byang chub sems dpa' deng /
148b1(dkon brtsegs): gisas so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phur sum tshogs pa ji 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa
148b2(dkon brtsegs): ji 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang kun spyod ji 'dra ba de 'dra ba 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs
148b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
148b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ba rgya chen po de mthong nas/ bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pas lda ngas
148b5(dkon brtsegs): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// phyog
148b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu dag na grags pa mtha' yas blo// 'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste// thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis// tshad gzung mi nus de
148b7(dkon brtsegs): byir khyen bsam yas// phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa// chos tshal slad du de 'aring 'dir lhags shing // bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus
148b8(dkon brtsegs): bcas nas// smras pa'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs// phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo
150a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das zi lA ma las bzhengs te/ seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so//
150a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
150a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//
150a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyis bsam pas yang dag par bzhugs pa dang / sems cad la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
150a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la brten pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu
150a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang tshus gcig dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slor lam ma rnams shing phun su mtshogs pa yongs su snang bar 'gyur ro// chos macig pa
150a7(dkon brtsegs): / kA ri'i bu 'dil byang chub sems dpa' da batshan gshegs pa mi thugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i slod pa la bsngon cing 'ad pa dang / 'dun pa bskyed pa sa/
150a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhi ni gagagaso pa mi 'khrugs par sngon byang chub sems dpa' gyur zan/ tshis 'di skad ces gal ci bdag smra bathams cad du rab tu ma byang ma
150b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces sbas ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes
150b2(dkon brtsegs): su bsrab par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bslab pa ni/ skye ba thams cad du rab tu byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma zung ma
150b3(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste khyim gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sred pa mchog yin
150b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu rab tu byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i rang ste byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la
150b5(dkon brtsegs): chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang thob pa dang / de chu ma dang bu pho dang bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur
150b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la rten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
150b7(dkon brtsegs): bran su mchags pa zab pa dang / de lta lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la me ma yin pa rnams kyis bsungs par 'gyur ste/ sha ri'i bu rab tu byung ba la mngon par ngam
150b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
151a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / rgyun tu rab tu byung ba dang / mngon par byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu chos
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bzhan
151a3(dkon brtsegs): yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur to// gnyis gang zhe na/
151a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' can thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gangs la mi dga'/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang mA bsten/ nyan rdzas kyis bas
151a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi bsla'o/ nyan thos kyi thog pa dang ldan pa'i chos chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyis theg pa la yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing rang sangs rgyas kyi thags
151a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ than ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug sa/
151a7(dkon brtsegs): ra'i bu de la gcan dag sangs rgyas kyi kyig pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to// sabacug pa zhin 'dil
151a8(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas kyi ning sangs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'tha' shig ga ge 'dun dund pa dang / ri la sangs rgyas bcom ldams
151b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su spogs shing / chos ston pa dang / 'di lta ste brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems dang sem
151b2(dkon brtsegs): las byang brgya chen po bskyed pa dang / mir gyur pa na yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lA dang mi rnams dga' bar
151b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi 'byed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang srong gsum gyi stong
151b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum
151b5(dkon brtsegs): du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la gzhag na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do//
151b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs
151b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// kA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur
151b8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la rab tu dgod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// sA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan
152a1(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to//
152a2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/
152a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum ga zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang ming med par chos kyi sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la
152a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcutso ba ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di mi 'jigs par gang du 'a/
152a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'gyur la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs pa la mas na za dang / ma 'gas par gzug lag khang du lag pa dang / mi 'dags par dan 'a
152a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du 'dug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lur 'bogs pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas
152a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du la rjes sargyas sman pa dang / ma 'jigs pa gas dang pas dmas can na pa'i mams sun dang ma bya la smad pa dang / ngas smram pa gzung bar gyung ba/
152a8(dkon brtsegs): gara'i ba rgyab sems kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chus sams dpa' ma 'jisas pa bcu ban dag 'o// mar brimang pa'i med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rgyam
152b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/ ye shes kyis khyi mi 'dod pa yin te/ de grags
152b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la ser sna med pa yin te/ gos dang zas dang mal cha dang na pa'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis
152b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lnga dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma lags par rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skye ba yin/
152b4(dkon brtsegs): de sangs rgyas kyis sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon lan gyi chos bcun
152b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu dgon pa las gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na gang
152b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la bsten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par gyur pa dang / mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
152b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang mi bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod par chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshogs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / nges tshigs
152b8(dkon brtsegs): dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chung mi za ba dang / de ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
153a1(dkon brtsegs): ni yon tan gyi phan yo bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin na// shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
153a2(dkon brtsegs): shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bus yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi
153a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi ning ji lta bu 'dod par lta bu yongs su 'dzin na/ bani gang zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden pa sgru ba yin/ dzaM lda nang smras
153a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yom dargyal char gcad pa'i phyir nugs shing phrag rog dang sar sa yongs su spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor pa la yang yid dga' ba min
153a5(dkon brtsegs): no/ ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par sba ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi ga na ni 'di lnga s+t+wa~M/ de'i kha nas ya sung pa la'i dri byung ba dang / lus dang ga
153a6(dkon brtsegs): rang kyi las mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lngar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul pa med par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyasakyi gsung phun su mtshug
153a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nga bu nga mangs su 'dzin paste/ gam-i bru ban po ma byang chub sems dpa' bdan bsgrubs pan man yi no// bar thun ridag tsang rgyal bcom pa'i
153a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i phan yin ma/ bcig shin gang 'di na 'thang chub rnams par blang ba gy-i/ 'angs su mo dang lal ba dang bang bu ma nga'i skyes panas pa
153b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam min dgag spang bar smra ba rnam par spong ba dang / ma spang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan phyir tshul ba dang / mamanga' ba rnams kyis mi chugs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang pa ma
153b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'jig tan gyis phyag zla bar 'gyur ba ste/ shAradza~M bu bzhi po de dag ni rgyal brnam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon yin no// shA ra'i bu dran pa 'dings ni
153b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog dang sar sna dang ldan yangs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phan yon yin te/ gong ba ni gang zhen 'di lnga ste/ de gtsang ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / chun
153b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag du 'gyur ba dang / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su khyim gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang / len pa la su yang phrag
153b5(dkon brtsegs): dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag
153b6(dkon brtsegs): ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung
153b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdag 'di dag gis ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag la bde bar sbyar bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar
153b8(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyong rgyal po dang / rkun po dang me dang tshu la sogs pa dang / bgo skal la skyong ba'i mi
154a1(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /
154a2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ji dgos/ de longs spyod dang kun sna
154a3(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po la sems 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag nan pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon na// shA ri'i bu chos bani me
154a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam mi nyams cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chom ldan
154a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su
154a6(dkon brtsegs): b+ha / klung sbyin/ kAri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi nang gi yon tan bkod pa rnams pa thun su mchags pa yongs su rdzogs par byu
154a7(dkon brtsegs): khye rgyas can du tshul zhi de yang la tshus ldan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ma lngar yon na 'di dag yongs su bsgrubs pa dkun 'dzi'ang des chos masam
154a8(dkon brtsegs): sa / kyi tshigs
154b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung bas/ datshul tshams sangs su dag par gang da da gang du smon pa de dang der skye ba ste/ de der skyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang su dag pa la sems
154b2(dkon brtsegs): \u0f7f/ byas kyis phur sum tshogs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ longs spyod dang kun spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar
154b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pas tha dad du song nas bcom ldan 'ang
154b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'aji ltar snang na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pas des kyang
154b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lhags pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su grub pa'i 'gyur gnas de dag ston cing yang dag
154b6(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu 'chad de/ des de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan pa'i zhing bya ba dang ldan pa
154b7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de mI shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing / bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo do// de la ye shes ni gang bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes shes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la
154b8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// byang ba'i zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o//
155a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sem dpa' chu dang 'byung ba la mkha pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang 'byung ba ni gang zhe na/ chu zhes bya ba'i gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin la
155a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtag pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sem can nam gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de nas tshul bzhin la brtson pas yin te/ de la tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thas cad yid
155a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ami byed pa ste/ 'byung ba yang de nyid yin// shA ri'i bu'i bya gzhar yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ba nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ning gang ba 'i rab tushes so// de la sangs rgyas kyi
155a4(dkon brtsegs): ming dag pa meng ga ba ti gang nan/ sangs rgyas kying po 'i ces bya ba na meng tsam mo// zhing gi ra ba nyid ces bya ba de yang mang tsam mo// gang ming rnam pa de ben par shes shing ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa
155a5(dkon brtsegs): shes partse// ri'i bu chos lnga pa de dgang ldan byang chub sangs dpa' slad lam las mi la yomasangs rgyas kyis ya na shong ba sa bram su 'dzin cing ma su byung ba// gang bug ma gyu
155a6(dkon brtsegs): kun byang chub ma pa 'a byung du ldan medapa'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chu mngan par rdzogs par 'chad rgya ning 'jig rte mas cad la mngan pa 'phags shing 'gas pas sangs rgyas kyi nang ma
155a7(dkon brtsegs): se gang nas ge 'i bu 'di la byang chub sangs dpa'an myed pa bston pa sa rgya gyu // rabs pa 'bas pa med du nga ba ma dpa 'a papa gyur ba rde dag mngasug cid ma byam pa
155a8(dkon brtsegs): mabyung ba grangs mal ba ma ba sa ma rnam rin ma sa yang gras rdzogs kyang chu ma ma mang dra ba 'is rgya can pa sa
155b1(dkon brtsegs): bdas bya ba chen po yong su rdzogs par bya'o// kung tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni blan med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dub sgrub par mi nus so srab du drug go/ de nas de ltar brtags nas 'dog pa
155b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ma gzhan gyi nor gyi rnab par dang / chung ma dang bu po dang bu mo lha mos kyang ci dgos/
155b3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
155b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyo bcing bdog rnams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir de byang chub thob pas nas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa
155b5(dkon brtsegs): yang rung / rab tu byung yang rung ba ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'anga'o// gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par ba
155b6(dkon brtsegs): bde yang sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes
155b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod te/ de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do// de bde'i bar chos dron gsum du 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor
155b8(dkon brtsegs): rtog par 'gyur// yang dag par so sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o// phab mo la bzod pa skyes pas ni lta ba dadrang por 'gyur ro// lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan 'ad byed par 'gyur ro/
156a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i nang ngan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrab par 'gyur// skrag pas pas 'byung ba
156a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te// ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khung khyer la nye ba
156a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing martogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i bcugazhan med de snyam mo// de ltar mas sor rtogs pa na sring rje chen ma zaza pa// de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa mdzub kyi bar dumag dang gosapa
156a4(dkon brtsegs): me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mo 'din ro// shAri bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i gyon cing // bzod pa'i skabs dang ldan pa yin gying rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan
156a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin na// des spobs brgyad pa rdegs pa sngags kyang bzod pa bsgrub ste/ pha rol la mo 'khrugs gnod par mi sems so// de 'di ltar sems bskyed do// phal te bdas la sems
156a6(dkon brtsegs): can dag gis rir tsam gyi thags parnags pang bskal ba bya ba'i bar du chur mi 'chang par gshe' yang yang bdag gis gnang bar sems drang thab 'a dang ga sdang gi sems bskyed par mi byas
156a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i phyir chen/ sems can dag nim bslabs pa/ 'dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la srab par 'dod pa'o sam nas/ rdotsa la zung sems can rnams kyis spyod ngas pa
156a8(dkon brtsegs): dang kun pa 'das pa de 'a nga chen brnyed dpang gagis mas can 'ad da/ brgya par zug// yang dgasams can 'dig gan rgyam po pathamams pa shims
156b1(dkon brtsegs): cir 'di dag bzung ba yin te/ bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya'o// bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang 'ab ba dang ne sdang gi sems bskyed par ni mi bya'o snyam mo// dar ltar
156b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i go cha bsgos pas phun sum tshogs pa bcu thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di rigs su phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /

156b4(dkon brtsegs): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas kyang dang pa thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha 'gos pa byang chub
