156b6(dkon brtsegs): brtsoms shing yi dam la brten pa yin no// de 'di ltar brtson 'grus brtsoms ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor
156b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// zhes tshul 'di dang brtson 'grus brtsom pa 'di dang spyod pa 'di dang sems zhi ba 'di dang / yi dam 'di dang dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje'i sem 'dis sems can
156b8(dkon brtsegs): tham cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar byas te/ de ltar bdagis sems can yongasu mi gtod do// snyam nas brtson 'grus brtsom mo// yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung
157a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/ sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs padas pa
157a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa sbyin te/ tshul 'di dang stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha' bsal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa pas byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa
157a3(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed na/ de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// sha ri'i bu brtson 'grus bgrus rnams pas byang chub
157a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yon tan gyi chos bcu thob ste// bcu gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ des byis pas spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba las nyes par 'dushes
157a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yin/ don dam bcas pa las ma yin/ nang nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang mabyon pa dang daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa
157a6(dkon brtsegs): yin// 'dod chags dang the sdang dang gti mug rlung ba yin/ disar bsar pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyis don rab tu shes pa yin/ nad tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa yin/ shari'i bu btsun 'grus

157a8(dkon brtsegs): de ba na gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa rtag tum nyam par gnag pa bsrel ba mi mangs ba dang ldan pa'o// mam nas de yang 'disam du sems te/ bdag de bzhin ga shes pa bzung pa'i rjes
157b1(dkon brtsegs): su 'gro bar byan// sems sayengs pa dang / brjengs pas ni gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sanas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus mo snyam nas de nabs pa thams ca dang / yongs su 'di pa'angs
157b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / thob pa dang bkur sti thams dang / grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang gla mi dang / khyim la sred pa de dag thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams
157b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dod kyi phyir sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi gtong snyam nas dgon pa rab tu dga' ba yin te/ gser ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyogs gcig tu sems can
157b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du skur te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshang med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byam pas khyad par byed do// byams pal gnas nas
157b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro// yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa
157b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bstang du byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas/ rab tu dben pa 'dod cing dgon logs su phyogs te/ gom pa
157b7(dkon brtsegs): bdun por na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// ches myur du zlo bya bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bcu po 'di dag ni dben pa na gnas shing bas gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bcu gang na
157b8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'di la ste dzin pa dang ldan pa yin/ thobs dang ldan pa yin/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/ mos pa dang ldan pa min/ mung du sabs pa rab tu thob pa yin// gzugs bsgrub pa yin/ rtse bdang 'das
159a1(dkon brtsegs): sa na sa ma / ma yan pa dgas rgya nga sa la

162a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi che'i na ni'i tsam du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shari'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa re zhing tshe'i chad banas pa bcu bcur 'gyur // des sa
162a7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa' sems pa thams sa can tha zang ga tshus kyi ma me bcug rgyun sa pam da du ma par 'gyu te/ 'as pa desan las las ma
162a8(dkon brtsegs): gtsigs pa la nas bram ze rnams pas sangams btsun te/ tsam ldan 'das gas pa nga sogs sums ma gyu ba rnanas/ mam ldan 'das la 'din cam samal/
162b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'jam gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ bstod cing bsngags nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpa' gnon nu pa 'di yun ji srid cig na than med pa yang dag
162b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng
162b3(dkon brtsegs): gtsul gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sbal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' seng ge rul gyis
162b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpa' khyod ci srid cig blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
162b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyi sbas pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo la khyod ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs bsam 'on te ma zhugs shes te dris shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
162b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gal te kho bo la byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ni de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang rgyan/ kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur smras pa/
162b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/ sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no//
162b8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos sems can zhig dmigs na ni/ de ci'i phyir kho bo yang dag gi don tu byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu
163a1(dkon brtsegs): 'judag na rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do// ldog pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam
163a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma tshugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/ chos gang zag pa
163a3(dkon brtsegs): med cing khongs su gtogs pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas su nugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa/ de dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra
163a4(dkon brtsegs): med// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis 'di gang du thong sangs rgyas kyi chos khyod du ma zhugs samadzes rnas pa/ de khyod nyid 'dzis khyod kyis ji sar bzod pa de bzhin du 'ang ba na cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di mam
163a5(dkon brtsegs): sems/ gzugs kyang chub man tapa/ 'on te gzugs kyi 'ang ban pa/ gzugs kyi badzin cidangs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs ci dben pa nyid das
163a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub du son/ rigs kyi bu jisam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'anang rgya'am/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin gyi
163a7(dkon brtsegs): da/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ bzugs song ba nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos
163a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'acang tu smras pa/ 'ja ma dpa'adi ma yin/ gzugs kyang chub tu slo pa med nga // gzugs kyi nga rlung zhi dang / gzugs kyi shin cing nga / pazus
163b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid dang // gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi chos nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
163b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rgya ste/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
163b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/ rnam par pa'i shes nyid kyis bar du yang byang chub tu smon tam/ rigs kyi bu 'ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a#
163b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya'am rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
163b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// rnam par shes pa'i chos
163b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi bar du yang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol tu bdag gam bdag gi zhes bya bar gdag par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam
163b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ni yin no// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta yin na/ byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lnga gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod la byang chub
163b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnan ga gi dbang gyur pa/ tshang mar gyur pas/ kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do// kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bshad na/ bstan pa de thos
164a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mas dang pornamam nag par 'gyur ro// 'angs dpal kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skrag pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa me sa
164a2(dkon brtsegs): grag pa med par bya ba'i phyir ba'in gshegs pa sa ston te// gang skrag pa deni mo bar 'gyur/ gang sprobar gyur ba de ni 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dang cags dang bral ba de ni rnam par grol lo//
164a3(dkon brtsegs): gdas par thol ba de ni cing nga med par 'gyur ro// gang btsas pamed pa rigs par mi 'gyur ro// gang chags pa med par doni 'gro ba med do// gang 'gro ba med pa deni mos bamed de/ gang 'ong ba med pa ni
164a4(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa med do// gang smon pa med pa de ni smon lam 'debs pamed do// gang smon lam 'debs pa med pa de ni ldog pa med do// gang ldog pa med pa de ni phyir ldog ste/ ngi las jir phyir sdug cen/ bdag tu 'di
164a5(dkon brtsegs): palas phyir ldog par go// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srol du 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / dag pa yin pa dang / 'a mar 'dzin pa las byi nugag/ rnam pa mas
164a6(dkon brtsegs): byar drug so/ ma phyir rdzog pa med pa 'i tshe/ 'gyur byed papa bye mi ldog sa// gangams kyi ni ste// gang mas phyi mi ldo cem/ rang nyi mas byi mi ldan ga// mnan med pa dang / srin med pa dang /
164a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldan no// de gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang nen/ bral ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// yongs su gtogs pa med pa ni
164a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi tsho rnams so// dmigs med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamasas// min pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamasas// dong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas rnams sa// chub med pa dang / rnam pas
164b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / me ma du zad pa dang / rung ba dang / mgyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / 'ong bamang pa dang / 'gro ba me pa dang / rnam pa nga bdang nas ca mos dang/
164b2(dkon brtsegs): rdul med pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blangs pa med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa ni
164b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de la ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la galas 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
164b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ zhes bya bar brjod pa'i gnas mi dmigs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni myur du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
164b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni ji yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'dzam dbal ji las bsam shing de sa du bston/ smras pa/
164b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog par de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam nas de dag mngon par
164b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzos par 'am rgyu bdang blan pa'i sems bskyed pa je srid dbres par gyur ba meng du mngon par rdzogs pa 'tsha rgya'o// gang dag de sa bu'i sems mi sbed pa der na ni byang chu btu migs pa ma cing sems
164b8(dkon brtsegs): rlob sems su mi byed de/ byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do// gang gi me rnamapar mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// ci'i phyir ci yang mngon
165a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang chub med cen/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par tshang chub med do// rigs kyi bu 'di mamadu sems/ rnam mkha'i khams cang chu na
165a2(dkon brtsegs): rnga ma dpal de de lnga'in
165a3(dkon brtsegs): ba rdzogs par ma rgyalas/ rnas pa/ la ma dpa lang rim yino// 'jam dpas gyis smras pa/ rigs blang com ldan 'das kyis tsam thams sad rnamasapa'adang mnyam par bdun med/ smras pa/ lo mau 'i
165a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na nam mapa 'jil par byang chub kyang de bzhin/ byang chub sa par nam mkha' dang byang du ba de gnyis su med de gnyis su byang med do// gang gis des bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa 'o
165a5(dkon brtsegs): / cung zad shes pa med la/ des ma shes pa yang gang yang med do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong khri nyid stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi bri bani stong chos
165a6(dkon brtsegs): ga su la ni ma sa nan/ ma sa su 'i dru gang mi ma zu b.las ca ma pa yang rdzogs pa'i phre rgyamapa thang / su zungams pa
165a7(dkon brtsegs): dang gis ma chos pa babang pa rnas pa // rnas ca chus pa ma dpa' sems pa 'an po sang ga 'jam gyis mngan par brtags pa'iH/ 'a ma la nam na bya sa 'din
165a8(dkon brtsegs): ma sa bcang kyis mams kyi na na me ma na pa gas pa'i tha sa tumams bskyed/ 'a ma pal gyis smras pa gas kyi ma // ma rnamams

165b1(dkon brtsegs): ba po thu/ ris kyi sa bdag gis rnamams kyang chub cu bskyed par bya bden bu yang dag par nges su mi mamadzaH/ desar bdag gis sems de yang dag par ngas sum mthong sa rgya
165b2(dkon brtsegs): yang sems bskyed do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i don gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i
165b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben
165b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan par ro gcig tu brjod cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa
165b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / nga'i ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid
165b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams la tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mthong / gcig tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni mnyam
165b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o// mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod ma nas dag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rgyal gyis
165b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'di ni ji srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhes bgyis
166a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon te// 'khor 'di ga ni can pa 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu'ang ma dpal ga nur chung ba ni pa pa mo'i bzod pa yang napas
166a2(dkon brtsegs): de yang cecas du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du zab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems ming sogs pas sangs 'di srid cig nas byang chu tu sems brje
166a3(dkon brtsegs): de zhes bya ba min non/ rigs kyi du'ang mdapal gnon nu thur mas 'an po ciganas than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bdan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'as
166a4(dkon brtsegs): dus bgal pa mangs med pa brgya stong gang ba'i drung gi byem myed phrag bdun 'das de'i pha rom kyi yang chem pa man/ de'i tshad 'dus na de bzhi gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'drug da sa
166a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rdzu nas ma pa khyenapa zu sa ma ma ma sa sa
166a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi ning gang gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi khyim sred 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ den bam

166b1(dkon brtsegs): mam ngan lasar pa gzham dang gzham ngag dang
166b2(dkon brtsegs): dang nacan 'das pa dang / 'khor du bcas pa las gzhan med cing slo ba med pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sla'i dbyangs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa drang na ba sems dpa'i dge 'dus

166b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur to// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de ga nges pa'i sems kyis 'dus byas na/ nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// snyam nas
166b6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dis pa du sems te/ dge pa'i rtsa ba 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo'am/ tshangs par bsngo'am/ 'khor los sbyar bar bsngo'am/ nyan thos su bsngo 'am/ rang sangs rgyas su lnga
166b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ gang du bsdomam pa dang / rigs kyi burgyal ba de'i sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu meng gi par yang las lha mang pos su bsgrags pa/ rgyal po chen po des ngasa' ba'i sems masbed cig/ ci'i phyi
166b8(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ khyod kyis bsod nams kyi phung po yangs pa byas kyis rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig ces pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' de dga'
166b9(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang chen po skyes par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldon go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems yongs su
167a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ sa khrims rnams sa bya bajig sum nag cul yong su sa ci ma du dub

167a3(dkon brtsegs): btu napa rtsogs cig tu mdzad// rigs kyi rnams rgyam brnams 'a nas bya bangs bcom ldal me ba ni gshegs pa 'dug cu'i gras kyikyil brog su mashes su ma mgyur ba 'drasas

167b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu sems bskyed do// 'gro ba thams cad 'gron gnyer te// dbul zhing 'phongs la dgrol bar bya/ de ring phan chad gal te yang // bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na// phyogs bcu
167b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag na bang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bas pa par 'gyur// byang chub nam nig blar du// thab pa'i sems dang gnod sems dang // phrab dog dang ni ser snga yang / dang par chad mi bya'o//
168a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongs su btang // tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la// sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya/ bdag ni byang chub rings 'tshul du
168a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chang rgyar mos shing slob med// phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang // sems can gcig phyir srung par bya// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas ning ni srung bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu pa thams
168a3(dkon brtsegs): cadadu// bdag gi ming mi thos par bya// bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med// bdag gis lhag bas ma rnam par dag/ bdag dbang 'din 'dren pa rnams// sum pa
168a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi las rnams kyang / rnam kun tu bdag gis snang / yid kyi las byang srung bar bya// mi dge las ni spyod mi bya// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhen// bden pa des ni
168a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di yang // rnam par drug tu g.yos gyur cig/ bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa// mnor yang dag smras shes na// bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las// bsil snyan dag gi sgra grags shog/ bdag
168a6(dkon brtsegs): la gal te g.yor med cing / de bzhin thab pa med cen// mnang ra ba'i me tog bzang // bden pa des ni char du 'pheb// yang dag don tu nges pa'i// tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang / phyogs mtha' yas thams
168a7(dkon brtsegs): nga rtse// bye ba ba'i rnams rab tu g.yos// de'i mdol mkha' dbyings nas// sil bsran bye ba'i sgra yang byung // me tog man nga ra bdag/ mi 'greng bdun sring 'bab par gyur// rgyal po de'i rjes bas pa te/
168a8(dkon brtsegs): so rnams byeb ste mig// 'dzinapas bdag cag 'gyur ma ces// ming du 'ong ba'i bla yang brlabs/ de sang sreg rgyags bya ba zag// nye'u po rnams thams cad kyang // rgyal ma mchog ga rjes bathob ci sa
168b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gdunags pa bgyur/ rims kyi bud 'a tshad drasan// 'jom mo ma sbyar ba'i rjem brnamama'a' zhes bya byung bde nan nis min nam du mas na/ lud bas den mi mug 'aci phyogs las
168b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhonur gyur pa de nyid de'i dus na/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis// byang chub tu sems bskyed phyin chad gyur te/ de nas nye bar bzung nas/
168b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs so// 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongs su rdzogs so// 'dri sangs rgyasas yongs su rdzogs so// 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yod
168b4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' yang des bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur te// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
168b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan snga rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rtogs
168b6(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar yongs su mya nga lngas 'das so// de dag thams cad
168b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'dis/ sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par rab tu btsud de/

169a1(dkon brtsegs): kham pa'i
169a2(dkon brtsegs): / sangs rgyas kyi ning gang gA'i klung khri ba ni stong gyi bye ma snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pasa'i sa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
169a3(dkon brtsegs): tsha med pa dang / sku co'i tshad ni dpag tu med par zhugs pa ste/ deng ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tshe'o zhes so// sdong byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

173b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu 'di supa du sems/ de bzhin gshegs par ci'i phyir kun du gzigs pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rtse ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med po kun gyis sangs rgyas pam
173b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur
173b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste// // de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du gzigs
173b7(dkon brtsegs): bde'i mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni mi gyur pa la zhugs pa dang / mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
173b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabs de'i phyir de ba'in gshegs pa 'ide kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la'angam dpal gar gyur pas 'di gang ces gsol te//
173b9(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya nyen rigs kyi bu de bzhi mas ses pa kun
174a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur pa smon lam mdzad pa lta bu yang ma lags ste/ bcom ldan
174a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shing skyes par gyur na de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gis lag pa g.yas par
174a3(dkon brtsegs): ro tho ba brgya thag tu ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i sdod snod mngon tu byung bar gyur la/ snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'dri snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
174a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul/ sems can dbul zhing 'phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang / mgon par gyur pa dag dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar
174a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'chi ma'i thal ba dga' yang mi rnyed pa de ltar bu dag yongs su tshim par ma byas par bdag nyid kyis bzas pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thong bar 'gyur cing de'i mdo la
174a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ning nam mkha' las mchi ba dang / drung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyi sa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
174a7(dkon brtsegs): ter gyi khams grangs med tshad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas/ kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang phul/ sems can pongs shing ltogs pa dang /
174a8(dkon brtsegs): mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang / yid dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongs su tshim par bgyis sam/ de dag la chos ston te/ skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
174b1(dkon brtsegs): mang ma chi bar nga ci gces bgyi bar dran lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das gnan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub tho par/ thong ga gis sa rgyas kyis 'ang ra
174b2(dkon brtsegs): zab pa'i phyi/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te/ bsams btsam gyis
174b3(dkon brtsegs): jil dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gi tshul dang / mthun pa rung ba dag byung bar 'gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis gos 'di ltar bdag
174b4(dkon brtsegs): cag gis gos 'di lta bu'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma pral bar bdag cag nyid kyis yongs su sbyang pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra bo skam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas
174b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis pa drug tu mchis shing gos de dag sangs rgyas bcom rnams la mngon par bka' ste sngar sangs rgyas kyi ning der mchi
174b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ji dga' ba'i gos rin po che las spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhini du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
174b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa gang ci snyed gcig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun da dang bcas pa dag la dul nas srad kyis
174b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mi khom pa brgyad mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mi dge ba'i sgra mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug

175a3(dkon brtsegs): par bzags pa'i sngas 'di sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang tu bcom ldan 'das gde bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pade 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi la
175a4(dkon brtsegs): de ming zhes bgyi bar 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin bzhin du yongs su rdzogs shing dag la rdul med pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur /
175a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtem khams de phyogs gang logs shig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de'i lho phyogs
175a6(dkon brtsegs): logs su dra le/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing yongs su chud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gnodur gyur pas gnams
175a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dimang ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sngon lam 'di ltar btab ste// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nger ni rin po che bye ba khrag zig phrag 'bum phra gdums pas
175a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ang nor bu rin po ci dums sbal pa/ nor b.rin po che gung tu bstan bstan pa 'jal/ rin po tshong ngag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan pa yong las rgyang ma mthong zhing mi srid pas/

178b7(dkon brtsegs): bya so/ shar phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go// gnyis pa ni ye shes bla na ma zhes bya ba ste/ lho phyogs kron

179b1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por dong zhing sems car rnams la chos ston par mthong ngo // de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed
179b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sangs rgyas kyi ning 'dir/ sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa dang / sems dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang sems dpa'
179b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri ba ni stong stan las langs te thul mo sbyar nas kun kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jam dpal gno dur gyur ba'i nga
179b4(dkon brtsegs): dzaM 'dra ba'i spyod pa de la bsgrub par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de ldi bu bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mdzum pa mdzad do//
179b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang /
179b6(dkon brtsegs): le la dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu mang po thon par gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lanas su
179b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'dri skad ces garol gyi
179b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
180a1(dkon brtsegs): tu#ma na du 'gyur makyis ba po san ma nga
180a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' bcud khri bzhi song / 'jam dpal gnodur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa'i rnam pa de sa bu'i sangs rgyas
180a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ming gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ba'i stong po de dag las skyes blangam pa bcu drug gis ni lhag pa'i bsam pa
180a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par bsam pa thag pas tshig+sa brjod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par spangs
180a5(dkon brtsegs): b+h+yasad+d+hi/ de dag kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis sangs rgyas kyi ning 'jig rten gyi khams badz+ra ba can nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
180a6(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po'i rnams kyi lhag pa'i busam pa gces smras byed pa la
180a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyogs/ tshig tu brjod par 'dru yang glang gis lhag pa'i bsam pa nas thag pa nas tshig tu brjod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to// gang gis
180a8(dkon brtsegs): 'i sems dang dang ba tsam gis tshig tu brjod pa de dge sdang / mngal ba des bskal brtse'o khrig khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu la khor dgyir bsgril te/ rim tu phyin pa la yongs
180a9(dkon brtsegs): bla rdzogs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba'i po 'od kyi rtogs dang / ye shes rnam dang / mima'i dazang ze dang / blon mam tho zas dag kyang phyogs bzhinas khang pa bcags
180a10(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yo mas
180b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bai DUr+ya'i mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/ lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum brgya song du ma sna yongs su bsor cing mdun gyis bdan te/
180b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam par drug tu g.yog par byed de/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'be bas/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum mi sgra 'byin cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul sna tshos
180b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'ong bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub se ji mas
180b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'jig rten tu dogs sa cher g.yos par gyur pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi mchis par gda' bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa byams pa byang chub
180b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bzhi po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas skul nas de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong gyur to/ de skad cing bka' stsal nas ring por ma lon pa de'i mod la byang
180b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag de ljags ste/ lpags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa lta ba der dong ste/ phyin
180b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// byang chub sem
180b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag 'khod ma thag tu thams cad nga ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa
181a1(dkon brtsegs): 'arol kyi ma yong su rdzoms par gyur cing
181a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go gyon pa/ 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis rigs
181a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dag khyed kyi skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la rim 'gro skyed la chos thams ca dris shig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu skyes dam pa'i 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu dang / skyes bu dam pa 'di dag
181a4(dkon brtsegs): rlon lam mimam pa 'dis bus/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo byad chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag gis bdag cag mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag rnams cad tha med pa yang dag par rdzogs
181a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cig/ bud med gcig/ bud med gcig gis bdag cag gi ming thos na yang myur du
181a6(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/ rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir btub pa mdzad pa
181a7(dkon brtsegs): da sangs kyi nang nge yang mi snang bar 'gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gnanur gyur bas 'dzi nad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni skyemal dun+d+he/
181a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'dis se per na sgyum ma khan ni smram sprul pa yang bgyid// klung sa m+b+ha pa yang ts+tsho p+na sbru ma mchis par yang brjid de/ btsemathun 'das de ban du ngas thams
181a9(dkon brtsegs): kyang rtse ba yang rtse/ 'gag pa yang 'azhin te/ gangal myi ba dang 'anag pa ma mchis pa de na mnyam pa nyid // bcom ldan 'das pa nyam pa nyid sa bslab pa'i byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa
181b1(dkon brtsegs): chen par dasteng dubyan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyan// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blams 'angs dpal gnadu gyur pa la 'di sad ces smras so
181b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma pa shig cing gang la yod pa 'am/ med par chags pa dmig
181b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dmigs su med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' shes thams sbas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub de ci'i tsam du yod pas kyang mi tho ba med pas kyang mi thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
181b4(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur mi gyur pas de'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshul cig pa'i chos
181b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'tshul gcig pa'i chos ba snyan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang /
181b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang ma yin sha'i mig car yang ma yin zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos gang yang 'phel ba dang 'dzin par bya mi mthong ba
181b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i sngas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gra' zhing / chos nyid dang
181b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'do dag ni so so skye bo'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi byed cing / gang 'di dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig pa 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi
181b9(dkon brtsegs): ring ga mas rgya tsham chog 'khrims rgya kyim
182a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong dag sa smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/ de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / 'di
182a2(dkon brtsegs): ni zab po zhes bya ba mi rta gnas par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa ni zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad
182a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi blang pa yang yin pa de ni shin tu zab pa bzeng zer ste/ gang chos thams cad kyi mi zad par chos son pa de'i chos nyis las 'gagal bar mi byed pa de ni/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin
182a4(dkon brtsegs): dri ni chos kyi rdul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems pa smras pa/ gang posem thasam du med pa la yang 'jug la bsam du med pa nges
182a5(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral bas rnas pa/ gang 'dod nags pang
182a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags shin tu bral ba yang med 'dod chags dang thal ba yang med/ rjes su rags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med/ rmongs pa yang
182a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig du byed pa yang med/ gnyis su byed pa yang med/ byed pa la yang med/ mi byed pa yang med/ len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med de/ de sar bsan pa gang yin pa don chos kyi rdus
182a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgyam chos sbas pa/ gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos ma zhugs pa de chos ma zhugs pa de chos la mi rtog rje skur gnas
182b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du chos ston cing ba dag dang gzhan du rnon sems su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin de ni chos kyi gcig du bstan pa'o// bzla ba'i bla ma gnod nur gyur gyur pa smras
182b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gang sems can la mnyam pa'i sems kyi bzla ba lta bur gyur kyang / sems can de dag la yang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//
182b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ glang mya ngan las thams cad rgyan rdzamachad pa de ni mya ngan med pa cing num par 'gyur ba med do// sems
182b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o// de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'dir ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang dag ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa/ mnyam pa nyid la
182b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyis tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med kyis smras pa/ gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi
182b6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dmigs pa de ltar ma bstan gang yin pa de ni chos kyis tshul gcig tu bstar pa'o//
182b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas sbas pa/ gang chos ston na yang gang 'di stong pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/
182b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa/ gang chos
183a1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i tshe/ 'khor gsum dang 'gas par mi byed de/ 'khor gsum gang zhen/ bdag gi mi dmigs pa dang / chos nyan pa mi dmigs dang / chos pa yang mngon
183a2(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa med do// 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar ston pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro grub pas smras pa/
183a3(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad 'dra ba med par yang shes shing nges pa shes pa de bzhir du yang ston la/ 'di ltar mo chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir/ yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bsrid pa gang yin pade
183a4(dkon brtsegs): ri chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsta pa'o// byang chub sems dang zab po byung bas sbas pa gang yin dedo chos thams cad kyi mthab nyid kya zhes pa chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang ston pa dang /
183a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la ston pa dang / gang bstan pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de dang bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rdul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de bzhin du sgyur te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po gzi' brjing chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi sobs pa ston par gyur te// tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sem dang 'bye ba phrag bdun bcu mi skye ba'i
183a7(dkon brtsegs): sra bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags bye bakhrag khrig 'bram thag bcu bsru ba ni than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems snang par gyur to// dge slong bdud mdzim
183a8(dkon brtsegs): se pa meng pas pag pa rnams las sems dam par tham la// srang me'i gying dgulas 'ag jig gu bcucu drun ni chomam ces kyi mi tshus dang grol tsha drim ma pa pa dag pa
183b1(dkon brtsegs): byung na// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sngam 'di skad ces gsom to// bcom ldar 'das de bzhin gshegs
183b2(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gnonur gyur pa ni ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang
183b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gnonur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig de nas byang chub
183b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i sba sa 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ci srid cig na tha na med
183b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi ni nam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa da
183b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
183b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o// gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par brgyo ba de'i tshe/ gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes
183b8(dkon brtsegs): bu dang brag cha dang mig yor dang / chu zla dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang
184a1(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur la bzla ba'i 'od kyis ma na mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu
184a2(dkon brtsegs): gar yin gyis su byang chub tu sngon la de la dris shi gsus pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu ma srin ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir nem/ 'jam dpal nyid
184a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang nub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang zhig byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni ming tsam mo// ming gang yin pa
184a4(dkon brtsegs): de ning dben shing byed pa ste stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gang yin pa don byang chub po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis man
184a5(dkon brtsegs): par bsngags pa'i sngal 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa
184a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos 'dus pa zong ngam thos sam/ gsol pa bcomaldan 'das bdag gis ma spyong ngo skyes so// bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu'adz+ra dzi sam+ba du sems/ gsol pa
184a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' d+ha/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta steng dper na/ yul ma
184a8(dkon brtsegs): ta'i til gyi ngong las til gyi 'brugacig blangs ma rigs kyi bu til 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de lta bur mi nga ba'ir gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
184b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o// phyin til gyi lhag ma las pa lAn ni 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'a
184b2(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la ste dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar grags te/ rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab tu byas
184b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ba ci bsnyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas/ kyang brgya'i char yang smos
184b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro// steng gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / spur yang spros par mi 'gyur ro//
184b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshon ni tshang med grangs med
184b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na stong gsum gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu glags te/ thal ba
184b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa la de la skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul gcig mkhyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gci snyed pa de snyed kyi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra
184b8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi rdul gcig gnag ste/ skyes bu shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zang zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa ni ga skyes te/
185a1(dkon brtsegs): des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed gcig nas tshul bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin tu phyogs bcur skyes bu delta bu re/
185a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul de dang 'dra bar/ de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul brang zang du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
185a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed do// 'bum du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pon
185a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod de/ 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed
185a5(dkon brtsegs): yan cig yod do// bye ba 'bum 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed yod do// gtam dum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'di cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di ste
185a6(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do// zhes bya bar mtshang bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
185a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gos stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang dag tu byin te rdum phra rab kyi rdul deng
185a8(dkon brtsegs): bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te/ rdul phra rabam bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btab te/ rdul phra rab tu thags na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyed du sems
185b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bum zag snyed rkyen mod rdo
185b2(dkon brtsegs): rdum zlar ba dedag rtsis shing shes pa'am/ drim la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di med cig ma dang // stong phrag ni 'ang sbed cig mang ba/ bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig yong /
185b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba phrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di srid cig yod
185b4(dkon brtsegs): po gtams dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// mi khrugs pa phrag ni 'di med cig yod do// zhes bya bar shes pa'am/ bzang ba dang / gnal ba dang / tshad brdum
185b5(dkon brtsegs): bar rus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dpe' de la ni sems can rnams mos par 'gyur gyi/ don 'tshal ba'am/ gnal ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ tshang ba
185b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas rdul phrar pa de dag pa bzang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed
185b7(dkon brtsegs): yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stod
185b8(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig khrod
185b9(dkon brtsegs): de// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// mi khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gang du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams
186a1(dkon brtsegs): cad du thugs su rung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
186a2(dkon brtsegs): ga te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i snod du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu' rten blo'i rom tu/ sems can dmyal bachen por bsregs kyang / bcom ldan 'das
186a3(dkon brtsegs): den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos des bzod par bgyi// dem bu'i ma shes chen po ni yongs su 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
186a4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ byams pa de de bzhin no// ji sa smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos pa cung dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus rlung ba ma gtogs par su nig su TI ga de la bu'i rtsem
186a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'dod pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas hU~M ye shes 'di bstan pa'i che/ srog chags kyi byang chub tu sems sred par 'gyur // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub ma
186a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i skal 'dis ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de sar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis
186a7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji med cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sbyin rdus zang ba kyi rdul por ba dang / gang dag las
186a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das te/ ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu grags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i skal par dadung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi phyir sbyang ba spyod par 'gyur
186b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam mi ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas de byang chub
186b2(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bya
186b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' seng ge rtsal gyis mngon par bgrogs pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pas
186b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ltar bskal pa 'di snyed gcig tu yang skyo ba skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po ngo mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis
186b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyed snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams 'di lam snyam du zhig dang nyi mo dang zla ba byed dang / tus dang lo dang bskal pa dang /

186b8(dkon brtsegs): khams la ni rnam par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' sna rur
187a1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud nas ci nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du nag gcig 'das par gyur to// nyi ma

187a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa gang yin pa de ni skyo ba dang yongs su yid chang pa'i sems mi skyed do// rigs kyi bu gang la nam
187a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' khams shes bya ba de lan tshig pa med skyo ba med/ yi chud pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ na ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba medo//

192a6(dkon brtsegs): gi spyi bo lnga yi gdugs bzhin du/ kun nas byin gyis gzhol bar gyur pa lags// dbu'i sgor 'jam zhing rab mnyen la/ an+ta rnyil dang sdang zil kha dog 'dra// g.yas su
192a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyi la shin du 'jam pa ste/ ma bya'i mgrin pa ji bzhin nyid du gda'// smra bar chog gi 'bral ba shin tu bcam/ khyod kyi spyi rmugs 'jal thugs lnga dra ste// 'od gsal
192a8(dkon brtsegs): ma'i rgyal ba khrir/ rdul ba bsrin pa rnams rtswa shin du 'dzis// rgyad pabangs khyod kyi spyad de dkar 'gyur ba// 'gro rnams la mdzes shing 'bang na dgar// bas
192b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ngas 'ongs par mgyur to// mgon po na ma dag spyan la bdag phyag 'tshal/ skyes bu dam pa'i gangs ni byed kyis mnyam// ji ltar gser gyi lhar rab tu gda'// khyod kyi smos dbyis
192b2(dkon brtsegs): babya ru bzhin// dag cing rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra// dul la dgyes pa'i tshems ni mdzes pa ste/ snang bar byed pa'i rab tu dkar ba'i choms// pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzho na sgur 'dra// sa
192b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing dmal thag bzangs shin tu dag/ tshems dang tshems kyi bar ni shin du 'byor// rgyal ba'i mche ba mdzes shing rdul mi mnga'// ngang pa'i khyun ngang pa'i rgyal po ni// rnam dag dkar zhing
192b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dkar ba bzhin// bde bar gshegs pa'i ljags kyis zhal khebs te/ ut+pal dmar po rnam dag bzangs kyi mdog/ nyi ma 'char tshe nor bu dag mdog bzhin// srab la dang
192b5(dkon brtsegs): skyon med shin tu yangs// go'u ta ma'i sman ni shin tu legs// seng ge'i 'gram pa seng ge 'jigs med bzhin// tshangs bcas 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbyangs can// 'dug
192b6(dkon brtsegs): gis gang yang mthos mthong ngo // bde gshegs mthu yis mgur na mthong ba ni// mgur gyi mid pa gtsang la 'od gsal te// drang po dbus su 'gro ba yon po gsal// ro'i mtsho/
192b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dang lha'i lha// dpung mgo rab tu bzlum zhing thal gong rgyas// bdun po mtho ba 'jig rten kun tu grags// mgon po mi dbang snying po dpal gyis kyang // ri yi rtse la nyi ma 'char
192b8(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin// mtho ba gnyis ni zhabs kyi mthil nas skyes// phyag las gnyis skyes thal gong gnyis skyes te// mtho ba gcig ni lhag pa nyid na gcig/ dge zhing dag ste 'od gsal
193a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma'i phyag ring ba// ji ltar glang po'i rgyal po'i sna bzhin te// phyag gnyis pon mdud pa ma bgyis par// pus mo gces
193a2(dkon brtsegs): su byug gis rab tu reg/ sru yi ro stod seng ge bzhin du 'phags// sku ni sred med bu ltar rab tu brtan// n+ya gro bzhin du chu deng gab pa'i sku// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa stobs por/
193a3(dkon brtsegs): sku yi spu rnams g.yas 'khyil gyen du phyogs// re rer skyes shing shin tu 'jam pa ste// ji ltar pad+ma chu dang 'dam mi gos// de bzhin rdul dang du bas mi gos so// rta mchog dul ba yi na
193a4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ro// 'doms kyi sba basbubs su nub ces gda'// bla ni rab zlum smig ma'i snying po bzhin// khyod kyi rje dang byin gyis rims bzhin mchis// zhabs gos dung ltar mtho zhing rding
193a5(dkon brtsegs): ba che// khyod kyi phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas 'brel// sor mo ring zhing sor mo nyi shu mnyam// sen mo bzangs 'dra so sen me tog can// khyod kyi zhabs mthil 'khor lo rab kyis mtshan/
193a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsi bas stong dang ldan rab tu 'od gsal ba// long bus long bu 'thab par mi 'gyur zhing // gom pa dag ni sa la yong mi 'dor// sa la kun du sor bzhi mi reg par// 'jig rten
193a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gtso bor rab gshegs te// khyod ni gang du gom bzor bar yang // rin chen pad+ma skye bango 'tshar to// dgod par mgyur dal zhing brtan par gshegs// stag dpa
193a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang 'gros kyi gzhan gnon cing // bag cha med par stabs ni bsgyings te gshegs// dpa' bo khyod kyi 'gros 'dra su yang med// mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar snang las/
193b1(dkon brtsegs): mamanas da 'debs shing // glu dbyangs smras ni khyod la mchod par bgyid// cho 'phrul 'di 'dra 'di dag rmad du byung // khyod kyi gzugs ni rnam thos bubs lhag/ gang brjid
193b2(dkon brtsegs): sa byas lags// mas banas me rnas pa'i 'jig rten// khyod 'dra'ang me na lag pagal mtsham// bdag gis byed kyi 'phrul chag 'ayong ngas// yod
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gapa pang dag gdags gyu // de bded pas na med par 'byung sa pa/ bdag ni de ma mamam 'chal bar 'gyur/ de nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis// khyim bdag zong dpod par rtso
193b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'adin ces bka' stsal to// kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gtse ba bcus gces par mthong ste// bcu gang zhe na 'di la ste/ skyebs gseb dang / na bas gtse ba dang /
193b5(dkon brtsegs): nabs gtse ba dang / 'chibs gtse ba dang / mya ngan gyis gtso ba dang / smre sngags 'don pas gtse ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba dang / yid mi bde bas gtse ba dang / 'khrun
193b6(dkon brtsegs): bas ga ba dang / 'khor bas gtse ba dang bcu ste/ khyim bdag 'jig rten na gnas pa gtse ba 'di bcus gtse ba 'di mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o//
193b7(dkon brtsegs): nas dadapas kyis nas kyim med par rab tu byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshitshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'khor ba'i sgom du chud pa yi/ byas bas
193b8(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba kun/ nAd dang nabs rab tu gakhor// mya ngar byed cing sme sngags 'don// 'chi ba'i bar du song mthong nas// srid pa'i sgom las mthar bste/ bslab pa'i phyi na ma mngon
193b9(dkon brtsegs): skye bas nye bar gtses pa dang /
195a1(dkon brtsegs): cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byis pa so so'i skye bo kun// bdag tu lha dang sems can lta// srog tu lta ba rnams kyi yang // lta ba
195a2(dkon brtsegs): thibs pos pos rab tu g.yogs// rtag dang chad par lta ba dang // bya med lha la gnas pa dag/ yang dag lta bar dgod do zhes// de phyi nga ni rab tu byung // kye ma'o// khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa
195a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni// zug rngu chen po rnam pa bcus bskal ba grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du zug rngu zug par mthong ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sred pa'i zug rngu dang / ma rig pa'i zug rngu dang
195a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i zug rngu dang / 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dang / zhe sdang gi zug rngu dang / gti mug gi zug rngu dang / lci ba'i zug rngu dang / 'byung ba'i zug rngu dang / 'jigs pa'i rug rngu dang bcu'o// khyim
195a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag drug rngu bcu po ni 'di dag yin no// zug rngu thams cad bsal ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o// zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de
195a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i \u0f7f/ tshigs su bcang nga 'di dag gsungs so// sred pa'i drug rngus drug pa rnams// thog ma'i mtha' ni migs so// marig pa yis ljongs byas nas// mun pa
195a7(dkon brtsegs): nas ni rkun pa'i mo// med pa'i dug rngus thug pa dang // 'dod chags drug rngus nus pa dang // ni sdang zug rngus rgyal bas na// phung po dag ni len par byed// gti mug sa ni mug rnas dkris
195a8(dkon brtsegs): dargyal dag gi drug rngus sems// 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa na// lta ba'i bus rngus mi 'thod 'gyur// byis pa so sa'i skye bo kun// phan tshun tshig gi tshan chayis// 'di ni brdzun gyi 'di 'din
195b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ga tsun du ni brjod par byed // drug rngus drug pa'i sems can gyi// skyabs dang dpung gnyen myur pa yi// drug rngu 'byin pa bzhin gshegs/ 'jig can 'dir ni 'byung bar 'thung /
195b2(dkon brtsegs): gdan yang kye ma'i khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni// sred du'i rna ba las byung ba'i chos bcu po dag gis rtsa ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par mthong ste// bcu gang den/ 'dil ste/ rje
195b3(dkon brtsegs): bal brten nas kun tu tshol ba dang / kun tu tshol ba la brten nas/ rnyed pa la brten nas nga yir 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la brten nas rnam par gdon ming ba dang / rnam par gdon mi
195b4(dkon brtsegs): babal brten nas/ 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dang / 'dun pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas/ lhag par chags pa dang / lhag par chags pa la brten nas/ sar sna dang / ser sA la brten nas/
195b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas/ yongs su srung ba dang / yongs su srung ba la brten nas/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ yongs su srung ba'i gzhi las/ dbyug pa thogs
195b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // mtshan ma thogs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'chang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rjod pa rnams 'byung ngo // de'i phyir phra ma las sogs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam pa mang ro
195b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khyil bdag sred pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i chos bcu pa de dag gis 'jig rten gnas dper mthong nas/ rtsa ba med pa gnas pa med pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par
195b8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o zhes/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la de skad ces bya'o// sred pas med pa'i sems can rnam/
196a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa'i 'dod chags rab tu 'bel/
196a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nis 'dir ni kun tu tshol// rnyed pa rnyed nas nga yir 'dzin// de las rnam par nges par 'gyur// bya ba 'di dag bya'o zhes// 'dun pa'i 'dod chags 'brel bas na//
196a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag par chags phyir mer sna 'gyur// ser sna'i nyes pas 'jig rten na// kun tu 'dzin pas par 'gyur// yongs su 'dzin pas kun srung ba// rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar 'gyur// byis bkun
196a4(dkon brtsegs): tu spang ba'i phyir// dbyig pa dang ni mtshon 'debs shing // sdig pa thams cad byed pas ni// de la sdug bsngal 'phel bar 'gyur// srid pa'i gan las sdug bsngal kun// shin tu 'byung bar
196a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas na/ rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa'i// byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'dod// gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag/ 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni// log pa'i chos bcus log pa nyid du nges par
196a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i rtog pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log
196a7(dkon brtsegs): nga dzin pa dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / log pa'i shes pa dang / bcu ste/ khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa ni/ log pa'i chos bcu po de dag gis
196a8(dkon brtsegs): log par nges par mthong nas// log pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya bar bya'o//
196a9(dkon brtsegs): shes dad pas kyis nas kyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ don 'di cid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i mtshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang dag
196b1(dkon brtsegs): bganas khags dang / lag par dag pa'i spyod yul dang // log pa'i tshig tu sgru ba dang // mog pa'i las ram 'thud pa dang // log pa'i ma dang log pa'i rdol// mag pa'i dran dam
196b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jog/ log pa'i rnam grol rdzogs pa dang // log pa'i shes la gzhol ba yi// log par nges pa'i phung po ni// byis pa de la gnas pa dag/ yang dag nyid la dgod do zhes// de phyir ngar
196b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung // gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni lam ngan par zhugs shing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyis phal cher ngan song du gnol ba dang / ngan song du 'bab
196b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ngan song du babs par mthong ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod chags log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / bram zer ba dang
196b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub mo dang / tshig bral ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / bcu ste/ khyim bdag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyis 'jig rter gnas pa
196b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di las ngan par zhugs shing / phal cher ngan song du gzhol ba ngan song du bab par mthong nas// ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
196b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar bya'o// zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs
196b8(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// srog gcod pa'i sems can dang // gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa dang // 'dod la log par g.yem pa dag/ sems can dmyal bar myur du 'gro// dben byed
197a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni chib rtsub dang / brdzun du sla zhing mi sdoms dang / byis pa mang du smra ba rnams// so so'i skye bo smra bas bcings// gzhan gyi spyod la brnab sems dang // gnod sem
197a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni mang ba dang // mi mang lta log zhugs par 'gyur// lus kyis sdig pa rnam gsum dang // ngag gi sdig pa rnam pa ni dang // yid kyi sdig pa rnam gsum ni// sdig byed pa dag rab tu byed/
197a3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas na/ de byor ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// ci nas ngan 'gror mi btang bar// bsgrub pa'i phyir ni rab tu byung // gzhan yang kye ma'o// khyim bdag 'jig rten ga
197a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa bcu dag gis/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang ldan par mthong ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ser sna'i dri ma
197a5(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / gnod sems kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / le lo'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
197a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba'i drims kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / srid 'u med pa'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / the tshom gyi drims kun nA
197a7(dkon brtsegs): na mongs pa dang / ma mos pa'i drims kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / mgus pa'i drims kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / bdu ste/ khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pakun nas nyon mongs pa cum
197a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya'o// zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
197a9(dkon brtsegs): kunams nyor mongs meng 'dong
197b1(dkon brtsegs): na tsha cad na 'di yod te/ de la 'di skad ces byar// 'jig rten 'di dag pal cher na// kun nas nyon mongs 'duyis gzir// 'dus byas kun nas can mongs dgang //
197b2(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar byed mi 'gyur/ byis paso sa'i skye ba kur// ser sna'i drims nyon mongs te// bslab pa yang dag 'brang nas kyang // bsdom pa med cing nyams par spyod/ dris pa bzod la rgyab kyis phyogs
197b3(dkon brtsegs): dan 'grus chung ba la lo can// sems kyang gnas pa ma yin// shes rab 'chal pa zlan zhing rmongs// pa dang ma dang bu po mo// bla ma la ni sri'u spangs// 'jig rten snang mngad sangs rgyas dag/
197b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas blang na nem nur byed// bab ma rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// dam pa'i chos ni spong bar byed// mun pa'i phung pos rab tu khebs// 'phags pa'i tshogs la gus mi byed// kun nas 'on
197b5(dkon brtsegs): mongs 'di gzigs na// 'dus byas gang la yang mi dga' ste// nyon mongs med pa 'dus ma byas// mya ngan 'das pa thob par bya// gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di
197b6(dkon brtsegs): lha ste/ brag dog dang ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan par shes// kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas bu 'di lta ste// gti mug gi 'jobs su nub par mthong // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig
197b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i klung gis ded par mthong // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dug rngus shin tu zug par mthong / kye ra'o khyim bdag
197b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa'i du bas shin tu gnas gdugs par mthong // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lnga ste/ 'dod chags kyi
197b9(dkon brtsegs): pa rig pa'i ling thog gis khebs par mthong / kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten khams pa'ang maling lta
198a1(dkon brtsegs): mes kun tu 'bar bar mthong // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi dug gis kun tu khebs par mthong // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten
198a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa'i tsher mas skor bar mthong // kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pas brtson 'grus nyams par mthong ste/ khyim
198a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'jig rten gnas pa yongs su khri ba bcu po dag gis yongs su dkris par mthong nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir
198a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rga bas skyes bu rnams kyi gnon pa 'joms/ gzugs kyang rnam par 'jig cing gzugs ngan byed/ dran dang blong na dga' ba med par
198a5(dkon brtsegs): byed// 'gro ba rnams ni 'chi ba'i sgo mor khrid/ nang ni stobs dang drag shul rab tu 'joms// mthu dang pha rol thams cad 'phrog/ dbang po'i grong rnams mtha' dag 'joms par byed// mgon
198a6(dkon brtsegs): med shin tu rtul po gzhan par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i srin po lta bur mi zad skye// rtag tu skye rgu rnams kyi phye bzhin 'brang // stobs kyis rab tu mnan nas 'gro ba yi// 'phags pa'i tshe ni ma lus zad par
198a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thung / rga ba dang ni 'chings skyo 'gyur te// 'jig rten dag ni nad kyis gtses rig nas// mi rgas mi 'chi ni ning bde ba'i// chos rnams tshel phyir nga ni rab tu byung // me gsum gyis ni 'jig rten ra
198a8(dkon brtsegs): tshig pa// 'gro ba dag rgya gzhan med 'thongs// ngan sungs dang bung gan 'gyur byas te// 'dud kyi cha bab dernams napa bya// byed gu dgani las rnams nga ra nga // ris
198b1(dkon brtsegs): ljongs padrangs par gyur bar thong // ngani 'ag rten dag lamig sbyin zhing // lam rnams bsar phyir nga ni rab tu byung // sgrib pa dag gis nibs shing kun bablangs nas// Shatsam dudunam la sa
198b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag/ tharba ma rab tu bas la bar 'gyur ba dang // ches rnams bstan phyir nga ni rab tu byung // sems can 'di dag pan nun mi 'thun te// glags dang nabs tshal gnong nga'i nas bcad/
198b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'grol ban 'dod phyir ning rab tu byung // ba dang ma dang sdug pa'i mchog rnams la// nga rgyal dbang gis mi gus sems can dag/ nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskul ba'i phyir// khyim bdag phyir
198b4(dkon brtsegs): nga ni rab tu byung // chags pa yis ni bsgribs pa'i sems can rna/ brdzus phyir ltung bar byed pa mthong ba dang // nor bdun rgya chen rab tu rnyed gyur te// des ni sems can dbul ba med par bya//
198b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag phan tshun gsod byed cing // lus ni gdon mi za bar dor dgos kyang // byis pa don med bdag lus gso mthong nas// srid pa gsum las nga ni rnam par log/ ji ltar khyod ni
198b6(dkon brtsegs): don mi shes pa bzhin// de 'dra bas ni 'jig rten gsum po gang // 'jig rten dag la don rnams bstan pa'i phyir// phan par 'dod pas nga ni rab tu byung // sems can dmyal bar ltung ba'i sems
198b7(dkon brtsegs): can dag/ mi bzad rnam par sna tshogs mtha' yas kyi// sdug bsngal drag po byed par mthong bas na// de dag thar bar bya phyir nga rab byung // gcig la gcig ni gnod byed sems can rnams/
198b8(dkon brtsegs): byol song 'gro bar rnam par spyod mthong nas// skyes bu'i mgon ni bya ba'i phyir// snying rje'i bsam pas nga ni rab tu byung // gshin rje yis ni gtses pa'i sems can rnams// bkres skor mi
199a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang sdug bsngal gcir mthong ste// byang chub dam pa thob nas de dag la// bdud rtsi ro mchog kha zas sbyin par bya// mi'i kun tu tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang // lha rnams
199a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phos sdug bsngal rig nas ni// 'jig rten gsum kun sdug bsngal gyis// nyen par mthong nas nga ni rab tu byung // khrel ba dang ni ngo tsha med pa dag/ 'dod pas rab tu rgyal ba'i sems
199a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams// ma dang sring mo bla ma'i chung ma la// nyal ba khyi dang bag rnams ji bzhin no// 'dod pa'i dga' ba yis ni 'di dag ming // sems can bud med dbang po 'di mthong nas// tshong dpon
199a4(dkon brtsegs): bud med dag ni mi 'dod pas// khyim yang spangs nas nga ni rab tu byung // byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i dga' la gnas// thams cad sdig rjod pa'i dbang du song // bdud rnams thams cad la ni dang
199a5(dkon brtsegs): byas te// byang chub rim par 'tshang rgyang rab byung // khyim na gnas pa dag ni nyes pa stong // 'di 'dra ba'i gnod pa 'di mthong nas// sa rnams thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni// skye bzang
199a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya phyir nga rang byung // de nas khyim bdag lnga brgya tsham po// de dag kyi ma'o 'di ni sangs rgyas yin no// nes ngo mtshar thob par gyur te// de dag sangs rgyas sangs rgyas so snyam du rig nas/
199a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra skad cig mgrin cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// med dpon 'dus byas lnga brgyamam po dag/ rgabs 'jigs skrag rgyal ba'i drung du mchis// 'di la
199a8(dkon brtsegs): chos mchog dam brgya cha ba// rga shi mthar phyid rab tu bzad du gsol// srid pa'i 'gro ba yongs su bsam pa dag/ bcom ldan srid bral 'jigs las rnam par grol/ 'byung ba 'jig par
199b1(dkon brtsegs): i rnamarar grol/ rdul thal
199b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bskyabs mdzod de// srid pa'i khyim nugs 'gro ba thar par mdzod// dpa' bo 'dod chags bral zhing dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag sems// 'dul ba mkhas pa kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog/ bdud rtsi
199b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i khyim gyi rgyur bye shig/ skyes bu dam pa gzugs rab mchog 'dzin pa// khyod 'dras dang lha yul gang na yang med// mi mnyam mnyam pa dam pa 'jig rten gtso// bde bar gzhig
199b4(dkon brtsegs): rab mchog chos gsungs shig/ dri gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon mi mnga'// mun pa rab rib mi mnga' rnam dag spyan// mun dang bral zhing gti mug bral ba stsal// rdul mi mnga' ba mtshungs
199b5(dkon brtsegs): ze ngos rnams gsungs// 'gro ba mgon med sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams// srid pa'i mchor lhung skyabs med thams cad la// thugs rdzob bskyed de byams pa'i thugs// rgyal ba myur drongs
199b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol dgod par mdzod// nga rgyal gti mug rgyags pas rgal dka' zhing // nad dang rtsod mang rba klong srid pa'i chur// 'gro ba lhung nas khyer ba skyabs med la/ thugs brtse bskyed nas srid
199b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyud las grol// gser gyi ri ltar rnam par dag pa'i sku// gzi brjid nyi ma bye ba brgya pas lhag/ 'jam zhing snyan pa tshangs dbyangs mchog mnga' ba// chos mchog brjod pa mdzes pa rab
199b8(dkon brtsegs): tu gsungs// chos 'di kun ni rang bzhin rnam par dag/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ye nas brtse ba dag/ ma byas byed dang tshor ba po dang bral// gzhan las ma gsan rnam dag thams cad gzig
199b9(dkon brtsegs): spyad par baspyad grags pa mtha' yas pa// rab byung stobs bcu mnga' zhing 'jigs med pa// mtha' yas ye shes nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs// rab sbyin dge mchog gis chos
200a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du gyur te/ e ma'o khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin gyis/ ci nas sa phyogs
200a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid du khyim pa'i mtshan ma spangs te rab tu byung ba thob nas/ thams cad zag pa zad pa'i mthar byed pa/ de lta de lta bur ngas chos bstan to snyam du dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe steng
200a3(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang la/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag/ bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dga' ba dang / dad pa dang ri mo dang gus panye bar zhig go// de
200a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lnga brgya po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed rnams/ gtse ba bcu las thar 'dod dam/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste skye bas gtse ba dang / rga bas
200a5(dkon brtsegs): gtse ba dang / na bas gtse ba dang / 'chings gtse ba dang / smre sngags 'don pas gtse ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba dang // yid mi bde bas gtse ba dang / 'jug pas gtse ba dang / 'khor
200a6(dkon brtsegs): bas gcong ste/ khyim bdag khyed rnams gtse ba bcu po 'di las thar bar 'dod dam/ gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/ @
200a7(dkon brtsegs): gang der/ 'di lta ste/ bdag cid la gdod pa byas shes// sems la kun nas par sems skye ba dang / gnod pa byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / gdod pa byed par
200a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sems la kun nas mnang sems skye ba dang / bdag gi mnga' bo la gnod pa byas zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byed de 'as
200b1(dkon brtsegs): sems mgun nas pa dang sems skye ba dang / bdag gi mnga' bol gnod pa byed par 'gyur ra// zhes sems la kun nas pa dang sems skye ba dang / bdag dang mi mang 'ab dod byas shes mesas
200b2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas sems phye ba dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i dod byed do zhes sems la kun nas mdar sems skye ba dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// zhes sems la kun nas man
200b3(dkon brtsegs): sems skye ba dang / gnad ba'i rab tu snang ba nyid dang bcu ste/ khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/ gzhan yang khyim bdag byed na
200b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba sna tshog su gyur blta ba ngan pathibs po bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang / sems can du lta bar gyur ba lnga bangan
200b5(dkon brtsegs): thibs po dang / srog tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang / gang zag tu lta bar gyur pa lta btan pa thibs po dang / chad par lta bar gyur pa lta ba thibs po dang / rtag par lta bar gyur pa
200b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ngan pa thibs pa dang / bya ba med par bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang / rgyu med par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pathibs po dang / mi mthun pa'i rgyur lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan 'thing
200b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang log par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po ste/ khyim bdag khyed rnams lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/ gzhan yang khyim bdan
200b8(dkon brtsegs): drug rngu bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sred pa'i zug rngu dang / ma rig pa'i zug rngu dang / 'dod pa'i zug rngu dang / 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dang / ne sdang gi zug rngu dang /
201a1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi zug rngu dang / nga rgyal gi zug rngu dang / lta ba'i zug rngu dang / 'byung ba'i zug rngu dang / 'jig pa'i zug rngu dang / bcu ste/ khyim bdag khyed rnams zug rngu bcu
201a2(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/ gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams sred pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i chos bcu po 'di dag las thang bar 'dod dam/ guzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams sred pa'i rtsa ba
201a3(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i chos bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dmyi// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sred pa la rten nas kun nas tshol ba dang / kun tu tshol ba la brten nas rnyed pa dang / rnyed pa la brten nas nga yir
201a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / de yir 'dzin pa la brten nas rnam par nges pa dang / rnam par nges pa la brten nas 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dang / 'dun pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas lhag par chags pa dang lhag
201a5(dkon brtsegs): par chags pa la brten nas ser sna dang / ser sna la brten nas yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sring ba dang / yongs su srung ba la brten nas sdug bsngal ba dang
201a6(dkon brtsegs): ban ste/ yongs su srung ba'i gzhi las dbyug pa thogs pa dang / mtshon mthogs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'chang 'dru dang / 'byed pa dang / rjod pa rnams 'byung ngo // de rdza ma
