226a8(dkon brtsegs): smin pa 'di ni sems g.yeng ba/ 'di ni sems g.yang ba'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni shes rab/ 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes
226a9(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par
226b1(dkon brtsegs): snang ba sa par dzin pa/ 'din ngag gi legs par byed pa rnam par smin pa/ 'dzin ngag gnyis par spyod pa/ 'di ni dag gces par spyod pa'i rna par smin pa/ 'din meng ba
226b2(dkon brtsegs): nga byed pa/ 'di ni med kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par srin du byan yud byanyes par byung ba'i rnam par smin pa/ 'drin dge ba/ 'drin mi dge ba/ 'dir byang/ 'don mi rtag
226b3(dkon brtsegs): ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur/ 'di byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis
226b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ snod du gyur bar yang shes nas/ ba' ro gtam yang gi
226b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dzin du 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtan
226b6(dkon brtsegs): dang // ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / srog med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel bar
226b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba rab re'i gtam rab tu ston to// 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyis rnam par
226b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i
227a1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags
227a2(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' nig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste
227a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di yod na 'di 'byung / 'di med na 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas/ 'di 'gags ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas/ 'du byed 'gag pa nas de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po
227a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di'ang bzhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'di la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/ de ci'i gyur ne na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'gyu
227a5(dkon brtsegs): bste/ bdag po med pa// rgyor bya med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la chos gang yang 'grub pa med// bzlog pa med pa/ rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rlungs
227a6(dkon brtsegs): pas khams gsum 'dogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / sdug bsngal gyi lam du 'dogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
227a7(dkon brtsegs): tu brtags na/ chos grang yang chos gang gi byed pa 'o ma yin no// gang la byed pa 'o ni don dam par bya ba yang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med/ 'jig pa med de nas
227a8(dkon brtsegs): da// du'i bamam mas nas/ ma sems me dang / tsam thams cad chags pa zang par 'jug pa/ de gzusas la mnashes/ thar pa dang 'dun pa dang
227b1(dkon brtsegs): byed d+hanas ba gas ngal chags/ rig dang gzugs/ mig sa rnam par shes pal mi chags// nu ba dang / sna dang / lA dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi dam
227b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la mi chags te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// zhes dad do// shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas la ngal ba las yongs
227b3(dkon brtsegs): su ma rnams/ chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams dge 'dun la sten bkur byed pa las yongs su mi nyams so// de dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur
227b4(dkon brtsegs): ro// chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur// dge 'dun la snyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/ de dang de dag du skyes
227b5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang / brtson 'grus brtsor zhing / dge ba'i chos yongs su rol ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ khyim gyi gnas mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu bo dang bu mo 'dod par mi
227b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyi ro bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dag mi 'dod par 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyi nga ro lta pa mi 'dod par
227b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de skyes nas 'dod pa la rjes par na tshod gzhon nur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu byung ngo // de dad pas rab tu
227b8(dkon brtsegs): byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtog pas/ dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge
228a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyan cing / bsgrub pa snying por byed par 'gyur te/ tshig lhur byed pa'i blo dang ldan par mi 'gyur// mang du thos pa yongs
228a2(dkon brtsegs): su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur// ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la yang dag par rab tu ston te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la
228a3(dkon brtsegs): mi re ning rang gi tshig yongasu spong bar gzhan la chos ston te/ ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ gzhan la chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur//
228a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ro// de mang du thos pas lus dang / srog la mi lta bar 'gyur// 'dod pa nyung ngus chog shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa dang / nges
228a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / dgon pa la dga' ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog pa dang / don la rton gyis yi ge la mi rton
228a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ lha dang mi dang lda ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir zhugs par yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen
228a7(dkon brtsegs): blad med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi le shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mishes/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad bar du 'angags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshul ma// bas yang bsku
228a8(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur te/ de 'angag yod pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ dbang gi yang dag par sdom pa ganganan/ gangags gzugs mthong nas paca mar rmi lan/ mngon nags su mtshan
228b1(dkon brtsegs): rdugs la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du spabs sgra dang / sngas dri dang / lces ro dang / lus kyis reg tu dang / mid
228b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos shes nas/ mtshad mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtogs su chos rnams la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa nas byam/
228b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bag yod pa zhes bya ba ni gang bdag gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems srungs pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba
228b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dong ba la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa
228b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi 'byung ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod
228b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa mi 'byung ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ba den
228b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag du zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu/ bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni/ gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes/ gang med pa de yang
228b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so// de la ci yod ci med ce na/ yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol yod do// log pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba
229a1(dkon brtsegs): med do// las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa de ni med do// gzhan yang mig yod de/ gang gi mig de ni med do// rna ba dang /
229a2(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do// gang gi yid de ni med do// gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// gzugs
229a3(dkon brtsegs): brtag pa dang / rten pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / ther zug pa dang / de bzhin du gnas so// zhes bya ba de ni med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
229a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can ni yod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / rten pa dang /
229a5(dkon brtsegs): zer zug pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag pa de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyis/ ma rig pa med 'du byed
229a6(dkon brtsegs): ba nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi bar du yod kyi/ skye ba med na rga shi med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod pa chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas dngul por 'gyur ba med do//
229a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni med do// thobs shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi
229a8(dkon brtsegs): gis rab chen por 'gyur ba med do// bsgom pas thal bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// bsgoms pas thal par 'gyur bamed do// tshul bdi ma yin pa 'di la byed pas kun du byung ban
229b1(dkon brtsegs): mad rdum padan ma yin pa yid la byed pa med do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chung yang // le lo can la ni byang chub mod brtsal ba med pa la
229b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung bar lung ston pa yod do// nga rgyal can la ni mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong pa nyid yod do// 'di dag dang sems can dang / srog dang /
229b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dang / gang zag go zhes bya ba de ni med do// de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan na ni gang yod par 'jig rten na mangs
229b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod do zhes 'dogs so// gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dogs so// de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs
229b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang dag par shes par mi byed/ med ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang dag par shes par med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i don
229b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang khong du chud de/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa/ 'du byed
229b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi pa'o// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams
229b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni/ bde bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar 'du shes
230a1(dkon brtsegs): pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni/ bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyis bdag tu 'du
230a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pasdang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// mya ngan las 'das bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa
230a3(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// de 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes thos nas shin tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas/
230a4(dkon brtsegs): smon lam dang bral bar skyed do// chos thams cad la bdag med pa'o zhes thos nas/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgrol sgom mo// mya ngan las 'das pa ni nga'o zhes thos
230a5(dkon brtsegs): nas mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed do// dus ma yin par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/
230a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos las yongs su mi nyams te/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed na// byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa zhes bya ba'i/ le'u ste gsum
230a7(dkon brtsegs): / gzhan yang shA ri'i du de ltar dad pal gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi
230a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i cos brgyal mngon par dad pas yid ces/ rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi brgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs brnyed nas/ ngomanar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed do// bcu ga zhe na/ 'di sa sde de pa ni
230b1(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sugs ma gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad pas yid ces/ rab tu rtog/ thotshom mi ba/ rgya cher dga' 'gu ste/ ngom chang dang drang du 'du shes skyed //
230b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par dad pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed pa'i bar du'o// 'dis ste/
230b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsal gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'ang
230b4(dkon brtsegs): lha ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
230b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
230b6(dkon brtsegs): brnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
230b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad cing yid ches/ rab tu rtog cing the tshom mi za/ rgya cher
230b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir brtson 'grus cher rtsom zhing mi
231a1(dkon brtsegs): num mi gong / mi skyo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu 'o ma thob kyi bar du lus kyi pags pa dang / rgyus
231a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang pri dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag zhig pa la lus kyi sha dang / khrag skams kyang sla'i/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya'o snyam du de ltar sems bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de ltar
231a3(dkon brtsegs): dang pa mas pa nga chung das dang / mas pa da sa dzod 'angs/ na
231a4(dkon brtsegs): cher dga' mgu sde rang ba rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas su ni
231a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam mi khyab/ chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ mtshan ma med cing snang med la// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dang bar byed// 'gro ba tha dad ji snyed kyi// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
231a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du ni chos sgrogs te// sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang / ji tsam sems can thams cad kyi// dus gsum dag gi dbang po kun// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te/ bas
231a7(dkon brtsegs): mi khya la rab tu dad// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'od 'tho yas// 'od gcer dra ba bsam mi zab// ning rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa// thams cad kyi ni phyogs su byab// rngub pa'i rtsa
231a8(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'jig nan 'das// 'das chen chos la mi gnas te// rdzu 'phrul rkang ba bsam yas la// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dang // sangs rgyas drug tu mnyam par gnas
231b1(dkon brtsegs): mab thar ba byas pami khyab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod dul ni// sems can kun gyis shes mi nus// rjes kyi dbyings ni dbyer med la// gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba/
231b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po'i ye shes stobs/ nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa// sems can gcig gi don phyir yang // bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par// 'dul ba'i don phyir bzhugs
231b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas na// de dag snying rje de 'dra'o// sems can thams cad gzhan dang gnan// dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang // dris lan gcig gis tshim byed de/ mi 'jigs pa ni bas ma mo khyam
231b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa// chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma 'dres pa// thams cad du ni ye shes gzigs// dad pa la ni rab gnas pas/
231b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun gyis chos nyid rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag la// de dag thams cad dad par byed// shA ri'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku
231b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad// yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas// ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di lta ste/
231b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o// 'di lta ste mi gtsang ba dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / stabs
231b8(dkon brtsegs): dang rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / bral ba/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa las rnam par grol ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun
232a1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'jig rten las 'das
232a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs brtsegs pas sems
232a3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
232a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa/ dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pas yon tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs
232a5(dkon brtsegs): banan lnga du dang / tshul zla bralta bu'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sra ni rnam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam gyis mi khya pa'o// 'di ltas
232a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dag pa thams cad las log pas zag pa med pa'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' la
232a7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i mu'o// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dpe med pa bla med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ste/ dag pa dri med pa/ kun nas non
232a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de ni sngon gyi mthas rab tu bye ba yin/ phyi ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yid/ nga ltar byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin// skye ba dang / rus dang / rig
232b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa cu rtsa mams skye baches kyis rab tu rtse'am yid/ skyebs ram tu rtse lam yin/ gnas sa ra tu phye la ma yin/ 'jigs pas rab tu rgyal ma yin
232b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu byed ma yin/ gzugs kyis rab du bye ba ma yin/ mtshan gyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ dpe byang babang po rab du bye ba ma yin/ sems kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu
232b3(dkon brtsegs): bam yin/ rab par shes pa'i rab du bye ba ma med/ lAbs rab tu phye ba ma yin/ thos pas rab tu bye ba ma yin// drin pas rab du bye ba ma yin/ rnam par rig pas rab tu byed ma man
232b4(dkon brtsegs): phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin// 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/
232b5(dkon brtsegs): dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rtags kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dbyibs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'od bas rab tu phye ba ma yin// 'gro bas rab tu bye ba ma yin/ tshul khrims
232b6(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin// shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin// rnam par grol bas rab tu bye ba ma yin// rnam par grol ba'i ye
232b7(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin// mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin// mtshan nyid mi mthun pas rab tu phye ba ma yin// chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin//
232b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs su sgro brtags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin// so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin// rdzu 'phrul gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/
232b9(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho 'phrul gyi rab tu che ba ma yin// snying rje chen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par spro brtags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang /
233a1(dkon brtsegs): zla dang rmi lam rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa las byung ba'i sku'o// mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o// mi 'khrugs pa'i sku'o//
233a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku'o// mi gnas pa'i sku'o// mi sems pa'i sku'o// gnas pa dang rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o// gzugs med pa gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i
233a3(dkon brtsegs): sku'o// tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa'i sku'o// byung ba ma yin/ kun du byung ba ma yin/ ma byung ba
233a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin pa'i sku'o// rmad du byung ba rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o// mig las byung ba ma yin// gzugs su gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar
233a5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol mo yin/ snas rnam par shes par byas pa ma yin/ drir gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ ldes bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi
233a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ldan pa ma yin/ reg byar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ sems la 'jug pa ma yin/ yid la 'jug pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma yin/ ldog pa
233a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang mi g.yo bathob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ rnam ma'a'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ nam ma'a' dang mnam pa'i sraste/ ri'i du
233a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de 'dzin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ras rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi ba/ rgya tshe dga' megu sa
233b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas brnyed nas/ b.ranar dang drad du 'dra bas byed du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ ba bar gshegs pas demang gsungs nas/ ston pas yang 'di skad gsus so//
233b2(dkon brtsegs): babye ba khrag khrig dpag med par/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam spyad cing / lam rnams gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par// mtshungs med bde bar gshegs pa'i sku tshol lo// byonas
233b3(dkon brtsegs): ngacu 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang // snying rje rgya chen skyed nas sbyin pa byin// 'dod pa log par g.yem brtag spongs shig/ nam mkha' lha mchog gi sku 'tshal lo// gser ltar dag cing mdzes
233b4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i gos rnams ni/ dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab spyod cing // rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'jig rten mchog la dul// g.yag gi cha bzhin du tshul khrims srung / ya
233b5(dkon brtsegs): laganyin lag bcad kyang dgral 'azod// brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing // sangs rgyas sku la smon pa yongs mi skyo// shes rab thabs dga' rgya ched bsam gtan pa// bsam gtan
233b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par ldar// chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku// de 'drar bdag gyur ces ni de la smon// srid par 'gro ba dag du dge byed cing // mi mchog gis
233b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub mtshungs med thob// dad pa dri med gtsang zhing rdul grol ba// nam mkha' 'dra bar yangs pa'i sku thob bo// rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang sems can bral// mtshan ma med cing
233b8(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang bral bathob// mig gi yul kun las rab 'das pa// de 'dra'i sku ni thub pas yang dag thob// bzod pa nas stong ma byung ma byas pa// gzugs dang skra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa
234a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs sku mi g.yo gang thob pa// des ni phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa mthong // ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa'i sna tshogs lus// rta dang glang po bud med skyes
234a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzugs// byis pa slub brdzud bzhin phyin ci log/ de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la blta bar byos// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang // ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang
234a3(dkon brtsegs): dag/ chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings kyi klas shing nam mkha' 'dra// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ mngon
234a4(dkon brtsegs): par dad / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa la the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
234a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon pa dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di
234a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
234a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ams thams cad du zab par byed mod kyis/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ 'khor la ni 'di bshad/ dge slong ma'i 'khor la ni 'di/ dge bsnyen gyi 'tsha
234a8(dkon brtsegs): lani 'i tham de'i 'khor la ni 'di/ rgyal rigs kyi 'bar 'dzad/ khyim bdag gi'i khor la ni 'di/ mangs pa'i 'khor la ni 'di/ 'di lta ste do sde dang / dbyangs kyis bskrad pa'i sde dang /
234b1(dkon brtsegs): lung du bab pa'i sde dang / rigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtog par brjod pa'i sde dang / des 'byung ba'i sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde
234b2(dkon brtsegs): drad du byung ba ngas po sde dang / gtan lada'ab par bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad par bya'o snyam du yi dgongs mod kyis/ 'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'i ngal du 'dus par gyur ba/
234b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag gi/ dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang / sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bu thob par bya ba dgos par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos kyi ma tham
234b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyi chos bstan pa de/ gcig la gcig nges pa'i tshig gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang
234b5(dkon brtsegs): gces rnam par rig par kun tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa/ bden pa
234b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang bas 'jug go// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'jam par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yid dga' ba dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / bstan pa
234b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mnyen par 'os pa dang / shes par bya bar 'os pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi rlang ba dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba skyed pa dang /
234b8(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bar byed pa dang / gsal zhing zad pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / seng ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi/ nga ro'i sgra dang / sprin gyi sgra dbyangs
234b9(dkon brtsegs): sems sim par byed
235a1(dkon brtsegs): s+tha dbyang
235a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra sgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i glu dbyangs dang / kA la bing+ka'i nga ro'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro sgra skad dbyangs dang / dpal dang
235a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / sgrags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad du grags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
235a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs byung ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs
235a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi pa/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du
235a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su/ 'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te/ tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed/ 'di'i chos ni
235a7(dkon brtsegs): dran su mtshogs// de'i dbyangs na byams dang ldan// snying rje las ni yang dag 'drung // btang sdoms dang ni dga' ldan pa// thung pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung // srog chags kun gyi 'dod
235a8(dkon brtsegs): chags me// de sdang drug nin byed cing / gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/ bun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o// 'jam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na/ mir byur ba'i nang ni mtha'
235a9(dkon brtsegs): lam pa// kun na de'i sman mas snga rtogs pa// dbyangs 'di thos nas rjes su rdzogs par 'gyur// sad+ma dang ni de bzhin par snang lnga/ de dag ci 'dra'i skad la 'jug pa ltar// dpyir thung dang
235b1(dkon brtsegs): daca mnir 'thugs te// rnam par ngas thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur// rkang gnyis pa ngag dang nang bzhi rnams dang ni// nang mangs dag dang nang du med pa rnams// thams cad mni dam
235b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs 'jug/ bskul nas rab tu 'chos shing tshar gcod byed// stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa// tha ma dang ni de bzhin 'bring dang rab// de dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de zlogs
235b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can thar bar byed// rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste// gzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin// mnyam par gzhag pas 'phags pa'i 'din bcang // sems
235b4(dkon brtsegs): can thos des cod mongs ni bar byed// sangs rgyas dang ni de bzhin ga dge 'dun smra// sbyin thos tshul khrims de bzhin bzod dag/ mtha' yas snga ri sems can thos byed de// de banin
235b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra'o// dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa// de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yod med do// de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dang cing // de bzhin gnas
235b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbyangs la the tshom med// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dngad //
235b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches// rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za/ thos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu chos thams cad la de bzhin
235b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/ yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// de bzhin
235b9(dkon brtsegs): bas ngo tshar bangon
236a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsam ste/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
236a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams rtsa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yan cad ji snyed yod pa skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu srungs te/ gang+gA'i
236a3(dkon brtsegs): gi byem spangs nas mes sregs te tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so// thal bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po gang na yod pa de dag tu blugs te/
236a4(dkon brtsegs): lo stong du dkrugs kyang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po de dang
236a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag nas/ thal ba de dag blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag du/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing / 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi
236a6(dkon brtsegs): che ge re zhig gi shing / che ge mo zhig gi rtsa ba dang / chege mo zhig gi sdong po dang / che ge mo dag gi yal ga dang / che ge mo zhig gi lo la dang / che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o// 'di ni
236a7(dkon brtsegs): ge mo chog gi 'dabs 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o// nes rab tu 'byed do// ci'i phyir na na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rdzogs ste/ de rab tu gcos
236a8(dkon brtsegs): stede bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams cheg mo dag gi thal ba'o// zhes rab tu mkhyen pa nas rgyas par bya ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam
236b1(dkon brtsegs): ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o// de ltar mthu zer// 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa ste/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bam
236b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa yid la byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ dge ba'i rtswa ba 'di'i mtha' mthob par sdug
236b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mthar 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de shin tu rtogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sa
236b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa gcig kyang chud mi za'o// shA ri'i bu khyod la dper bya ste/ 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu
236b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu la la tshe lho brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa blangs te/ ngag la ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces kye go'u ta ma bdag gi chu'i
236b6(dkon brtsegs): thigs pa 'di khyod la gdams kyis nam bdag la dgos pas gyur pa de slar byin cig ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te/ rgya mtsho chen por bor nas/ de chu'i rgyun gyis
236b7(dkon brtsegs): bangs te/ 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de nas skyes bu che lo rgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang / ngag la ba der 'ongs te byin nas 'di skad ces go'u ta ma bdag
236b8(dkon brtsegs): gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyis/ bdag la byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes de dang ldan pas de bzhin gnas
237a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skra'i rtse mo bye ba rgyar btsal bas/ chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres pa blangs te/ skyes
237a2(dkon brtsegs): bu de la slar byin no// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te/ de gang gi don tu blta zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu skyes bu'i chu'i thigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
237a3(dkon brtsegs): lag tu gnag pa de yun ring po nag lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang / yid ches rab
237a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs nas de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di
237a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas/ de
237a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems gcig bskyed pa yang chud mi ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
237a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yeshes gang rnam par gas par mchis par 'jug pa marachis sa pa/ dge 'dul ba/ gari'i dri de la yin no// bcom ldan 'das rtse shes ni ga las
237a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni yang lags/ ga'i'i bu 'di bzhini rnam par shes pa'i gnas ternam pa rags pa de la gnas so// 'di la rnam par shes pa gzugs na par song dang gnas pa dang /
237b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la darigs/ gdugs la gnas/ dga' ba la sten pas skye 'ing 'phel te/ rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa/ tshor ba la nye bar song nang gnas/ tshor ba la dmigs
237b2(dkon brtsegs): ngaganas/ dga' ba la bsten pas skye zhing 'phel te/ rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 'du shes la gnas/ dga'
237b3(dkon brtsegs): la bsten pas skye zhing 'phel te/ rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du byed la dmigs/ 'du byed la gnas/ dga' ba la bsten pas skye ning
237b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang len pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes
237b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang
237b6(dkon brtsegs): khams bani la mi gnas par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun du dbye ba shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i
237b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par shes pa dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang / lus kyis
237b8(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par rig pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang nang nye bar ni zhing / phyi rol du mi rgyu ste/ yen
238a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog/ yid kyi rnam par mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni dmigs las skye'o// rnam par
238a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ni yid la byed pa las yongs su rtog pa las skye ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dzin pa med pas snyems pa dang / dmigs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa
238a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyad pa'i chos la/ rnam par shes pa gnas shing / gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
238a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas la ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o//
238a5(dkon brtsegs): gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'di na ye shes te/ byang chub sems dang 'a de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
238a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dang yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi brgya cher dga' mgu ste/ yid rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
238a7(dkon brtsegs): khyis dang da kyi cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ny+dza ra gang+gA zung gi byem dpag med pa/ de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'ams rgya rnams ni/
238a8(dkon brtsegs): dag byes dul las mer thegs pal bar byas/ yon pam stong dag tu gyur tshor dkrugs pa rnams/ de 'dra ba'i spongs bcul shes tha mnga' ba/ thal ba blangs nas 'gro 'dag la lung ston pa
238b1(dkon brtsegs): ning rnams rang 'byams dag gshing rigs 'di dacig thal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ ji ltar phyogs drug gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul/ thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams
238b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de dag thams cad bgrang yang chags med the tshom med// de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes nam mkha' bzhin/ ji steng phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud// yang dga'adzi
238b3(dkon brtsegs): chags spyod dang ne sdang gti mug ldan// spyod pa kun gyi tshul ge bsam pa rnams dang ni// gang gi blo nyams gang gis thar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen/ 'jig rten kun mchog stobs bcu rnams kyi me
238b4(dkon brtsegs): shes ni// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings su rab zhugs kyang // 'dren pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung // bde gshegs sras po dad pa rgyal la dad par byed// dkon mchog
238b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po bzhi pa// / shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
238b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon dad pas/ yid ches/ rab tu rtogs/ the tshom mi ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di la 'dri
238b7(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings su rtogs te// de rab tu rtog pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de mngon par gshegs nas lha me/ ldan
238b8(dkon brtsegs): ne// lhang der mdzad do// de 'di lta ste dper na sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar nas lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
239a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas/ lham me lhan ne lha der mdzad do//
239a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu me khyer gyi 'od de ngas ni/ gang 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// 'bru mar gyis
239a3(dkon brtsegs): mar me'i 'od de bas ni rtsig pa chen po'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags// shin tu mchog pa nas shin tu rgya che ba'i bar du'o// gang rtsig pa chen po'i 'od de bas ni/ me'i phung po 'od gang yin pa dang
239a4(dkon brtsegs): smad deng skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du/ rgyas par bya ste/ zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang / gnal rmed dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang /
239a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med
239a6(dkon brtsegs): khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'dod pa rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi bar rnams kyi bar dang / gzhal med
239a7(dkon brtsegs): 2 dang / lus kyi rgyad rnams kyi'ang 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu babang / shin tu mchog tu kha dog dang ldanaM/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu mche'o// gang tshangs pa rnams dang /
239a8(dkon brtsegs): ngam ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od rgyas par byabya/ tshad chen dang / 'ad rlung dang /
239b1(dkon brtsegs): med na dang / 'od gas la nas dag rgyas kyi bar dang / 'bras bu cha dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang / mau dang /
239b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gya no pa snang dang / shin tu mthong gi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi 'od dang / gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ba dang / gnal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'ad 'ang
239b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'phags/ shin du bdang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gnal mad
239b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od pas ni/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/ shin tu babang / shin du mchog
239b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu
239b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / shes pa dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu ji tsam sto
239b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'od tu btags pa gdags par gtogs pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i
239b8(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang mI 'gro'o// de 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal pa bzhag na snag tsa'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur te/ lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhanar
240a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ lha der mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'od du gdags pas btags pa/ ji snyed
240a2(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na lAm mer mi 'gyur// ldan ner mi 'gyur/ lha der mi 'gyur ro// 'od gsal bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'a
240a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni de dag gi na mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi tse ba 'od las kyi rnam par smin pa las/ mngon par grub pa'i
240a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin tu khyab par gyur te/ shA ri'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba yang mi byung / nyin mor yang mi shes/ mtshan mong
240a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi shes/ zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig par yang mi shes/ dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyis/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pas/ sems can la thugs rtse ba'i phyir/ 'od
240a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dom pang cam du byen gyis rjong ste/ garor da de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams grangs med pa'od kyis rgya
240a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad do// dkyi phy-i zhen/ gari'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nIs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i na su b+haste/ shari'i bu don de nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe brdzun to//
240a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bul 'azhig gis/ grong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi rams kyi rnama'i srid 'tham sa cin rngu marab tu byas nas rdul de dag tha 'ar blugs te/ shar phyogs su mngonas
240b1(dkon brtsegs): nul tha pod byed kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'das nas rdul thar ba gnyis por zhing / shar phyogs su ming nas/ ra brdul thar ba de thams cad ni dang pa 'thur gyis/ ba 'dun
240b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs lams ni bad pa med do// de bzhin du lnga dang / nub dang / byang nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o// shA ri'i bu de'i snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams de dag gi mitha 'do du
240b3(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba dris sam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das deni ma nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na ji tsar 'od du gtags pas btags pa de dag
240b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun du rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de de ltar/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
240b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni/ rtsig pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ljon pa
240b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'khor yug gi ri 'am/ 'khor yug chen po'am/ ri spos kyi ngad ldan nam/ ri btang ba zung ngam/ ri btang gzung chen po 'am/ gangs ri 'am/ ri gnya' shing 'dzin dam
240b8(dkon brtsegs): de ma yin pa gnan ri nag po 'am/ ri'i rgya'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus so// de dag thams cad las thal nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
241a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di khyab par byas kyang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos par mi 'gyur te/ de la sems can la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
241a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo // gang de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od 'dom do tsam du mthong ngo // gang de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni/ 'od rgyang grags tsam du mthong nas/ gang
241a3(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang shin tu rgya chen pos ni/ 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi bar du mthong ste/ de ltar na shA ri'i bu stong phrag brgya pa'i tshangs sa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag
241a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i bar du 'od kyis khyab par mthong ste/ rgyas par bya'o// sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par
241a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // de ltar shA ri'i bu nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa/ sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ de tsam du 'od kyi
241a6(dkon brtsegs): bya par mdzad de// de byang chub sems dpas thos nas the tshom med/ som mi ma mngon par dang / yid ces/ rab tu rtog/ rgya cher dga' mgus/ rangs brnyed nas/
241a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od dag dang / rgya byin tshangs 'od dag yod dang / 'og min par gyi
241a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis// drin drug ca yang mthod do// 'og min gyi ni 'od rnams dang // gang rnams stong gsum kyang gyur bas// sangs rgyas sku me 'od gcer gyi// brgyangs
241b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// rnamam pa'adag na mamatsham par/ detsam 'ang kyis pab byed pa// thams rgya can sems can / de 'dra ba ni 'du ba dang // sadus rgyas 'dama'asas /
241b2(dkon brtsegs): mamathang dang ni mtshungs ma'am pa// ji ltar dul ba 'gyur rnams kyis// de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo // ji ltar skyes bu mus long gis// kye ma'i 'ad ni de 'dra ba// ma ma
241b3(dkon brtsegs): bas ni 'ad de la// 'od ni yod pa min zhes sla// de bzhin sems can dman pa gang // rgyal ba'i 'od ni mi mthong ste// mi mthong bas ni rgyal ba yi// 'od ni yod pa min zhes par/
241b4(dkon brtsegs): lA lus rgyang grags dpag tshad dang // la las stong gsum thams cad du// 'od kyis khyab par gyur pa mthong // sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang // bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa// byang
241b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpe'i shes rab che// sa chen la ni gang gnas pa/ de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing // bsam yas sangs rgyas ban
241b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams su// sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas te// sangs rgyas 'od gzer bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab la dang byas nas// bsod nams
241b7(dkon brtsegs): dung po bsam mi khyab// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ces/ rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi nga/
241b8(dkon brtsegs): cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyad
242a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par dad// yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag par smra bas smra ba/ tshul
242a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongs su dag pa yi sems can 'jig rten du byung ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa// ngag gis las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /
242a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ 'jig rten du byung zhing skyes nas/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pas// bram ze sdig pa spangs pa dge sbyong zhi ba/ bsam gtan pa'i mchog/ ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i pha rol
242a4(dkon brtsegs): tu son pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang dge bar skabs sla'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs par bcas
242a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bcas pa dang / bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
242a6(dkon brtsegs): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi zung po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa de lta bungs ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir ne na/
242a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge yidzin cha
242a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i ma can par 'ad dang/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di kyar dge slong dag lang bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge yin gyi la sa du phyin pa la bcwam
242b1(dkon brtsegs): ya shA na/ ma ldan 'das rnam thos pa bzhin du dzin par 'gyur te/ batshab ldan 'das das ni 'di la gsas// de ba gshegs pa sa na 'as nan/
242b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal ba/ shA ri'i bu de'i snyam du sems/ sems can gyi khams dang / sa'i khams dang mang gsol ba'i ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa drod
242b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi 'jal ba ltar na bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gis/ sa'i khams ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ nari rje
242b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams rab tu mang gis/ sa'i khams ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed sgong las skyes pa'am/ mang
242b5(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ brdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes
242b6(dkon brtsegs): med 'du shes min gyi sems can ji tsam sems can du btags pas btags pa de dag thams cad/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ skad cig thang cig gis/ snga phyi med par mi'i
242b7(dkon brtsegs): lus thob par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu mir gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig gis snga phyi med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
242b8(dkon brtsegs): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cing / yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag/ ji snyed pa de snyed
243a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyer re la yang zhal stong stong du gyur/
243a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang dbu stong stong du gyur/ zhal re re la yang ljags stong stong du gyur la/ de bzhin
243a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de dag thams cad stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / chags pa med pa'i sgrib pa med
243a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyis spongs pa dang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i dri bzhiru gshegs pa gcig gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te/ bsal ba bye ba khrag khrig bcu
243a5(dkon brtsegs): sdong du bsngags pa brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khribs kyi phung po drod ni de 'draste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mi 'thod// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
243a6(dkon brtsegs): gi shes rab dang spobs pa/ bla na med pa yang mi bzod do// de bzhin gshegs pa deg thams cad de bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste
243a7(dkon brtsegs): badzin gshegs pa'i tshul rnams kyi drung po dang bzhin gshegs pa de dag gshes rab dang slobs pa blan med pa dang // de gnyis de bad med grangs med bsam gyis mi chub/ dmam
243a8(dkon brtsegs): dngasapa nus so// dzi ga kyi nga chen pa'i jig kyi mas kyi sengs can ldagasas/ drwa bar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 'aras pad+ma nga zir
243a9(dkon brtsegs): zhings/ na du mas du sa dang / byas dudun gyi sa
243b1(dkon brtsegs): klung gi byem snyed kyis sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig gis mo'i lus thob par gyur ba nas/ thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang ngu dum na
243b2(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar du/ gong ma bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
243b3(dkon brtsegs): gis shes rab dang / spobs pa bla na med pa dang di gnyis/ tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
243b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dpe tsam du byas pa nyan par 'dod dpa
243b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba 'di ltar dge slong rnams/ bcom ldan 'das las thos nas/ de bzhin du 'dzin par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so// 'de bar gshegs pa de'i tshong
243b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de'i dus de'i tshe 'byung ste/ nyi ma bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
243b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di/ 'bar kun tu 'bar kun tu 'chad cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de'i sa phyogs gang na de
243b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe nas phyogs de lag mthil
244a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar mnyam par gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar kun tu mched
244a2(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa der/ phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal pa'i sa phyogs de/ gseg ma dang / gyom
244a3(dkon brtsegs): med cing / mtho bar gyur pa'i gzugs su gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar kun
244a4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ tshig pa der/ sa phyogs gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs
244a5(dkon brtsegs): sam mnal ba'i sa phyogs de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir/ yangs shing mnyam par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos gsum pa
244a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa
244a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gan de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der rtse sngo bakhyil ba/ 'jam pa/ g.yas phyogs su kyil ba/ karbal
244a8(dkon brtsegs): yang rigan 'de ba/ dri rab tuni pa babye bar 'gyur te/ gari'i bus phyogs deng mtshar dang / rmad gyi chos pani pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan mngo na ra du/
244b1(dkon brtsegs): ga sa / ba sa ga na/ sa bya / gas
244b2(dkon brtsegs): sam 'anal ba'i sa phyogs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu grang ba yang ba/ 'jam pa dang / rnyog pa med par btu dang ba/ 'byung 'dod pa/ mang du blangs kyang na du mi 'gyur drang rje
244b3(dkon brtsegs): yan lag 'di brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur// shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar/ rmad kyi chos lnga po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rnyed kyi khams 'bar du
244b4(dkon brtsegs): turab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ tshig ba der/ sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ marnam
244b5(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sa phyogs der/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rna par smin pas/ rab du bsil ba'i rlung ldang ba de 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu sos kha'i 'a ma'i thab tshabs gdungs pa'i
244b6(dkon brtsegs): dus na/ skyes bu la la nig gang+gA'i klung du zhugs nas/ lus bsil bar byas te/ rims dang smyos pa thams cad zhi bar byas nas/ gang+gA'i klung nas byung zhing slar byung nas/ 'chag cing 'gro
244b7(dkon brtsegs): ba las ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ nags stug po ya la ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma grib ma stug po dang ldan pa chen po zhig mthong nas/ de nags stug po gang na yod pa der song
244b8(dkon brtsegs): ste byin pa dang / nags stug po de'i dbus na/ khri'i steng du bying bu gting ba/ be'u ras kyis g.yogs pa/ ka tsa lin+da gding ba bting ba/ de'i steng dar gyis g.yogs pa/ mthog
245a1(dkon brtsegs): mthog tu sngas dmar po bshams pa nig mthong nas de de la 'dug go// de de la 'dug ste/ 'gro zhing phyogs pa ni kun nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur ba/ de
245a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du shA ri'i bus phyogs der bsol ba'i rlung ba ldang bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos drug po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig
245a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ tshig pa der/ sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/
245a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog ud la dang / bad+ma dkar po skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi
245a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bdun po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas
245a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig pa de des phyogs gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der/ zang las skyes pa'i me tog 'di lto ste/
245a7(dkon brtsegs): ki drug+ha ka dang / tsam+ba ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / ba rig ka dang / mya ngan cang dang / skye snar dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / tar ni dang / ko ni la sogs bzang las skyes
245a8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i matog sa tshogs 'dog dang ldan pa ji dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gari'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos brgyad po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
245b1(dkon brtsegs): do' bya// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar/ kun tur rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcigatu gyur nas cig paded/ gtsugs gang na badzid na/
245b2(dkon brtsegs): pang chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der sra zhing mi shigs pas sa gan rdo rje ltar 'gyur to// sha ri'i bus phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang / rmang kyi
245b3(dkon brtsegs): chos dgu po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lham me rab tu lham me/ kun tu rab tu lha me/ 'bar kun tu rab tu mched
245b4(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/
245b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram par bcas pa'i skye dang / lA
245b6(dkon brtsegs): dang pi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di dang ldan par gyur te/ sha ri'i bus phyogs
245b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de rtogs pas/ de bzhin gsheg
245b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la gcig tu bde bar so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom
246a1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs nas/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su bri ba med par ngas bshad do// shA ri'i bu de
246a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal par gnas sam/ bskal pa rgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya'am/ bsko la pa bye ba brgya'am/ bskal
246a3(dkon brtsegs): pabye ba stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya'am/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang bzhugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
246a4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ste/ de ltar
246a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu che// de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa gcig la gnas
246a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i rnam par shes pas/ bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dug ste/ bsam gtan gyis tshe'i mtha' 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi bar du rnam par shes pa de las rnam par shes pa gzhan
246a7(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du na ri'i bu gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi
246a8(dkon brtsegs): nub ma phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i myangan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su myongan 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs bting ba badzini las nyams pa med/ sems 'gyur ba med/ mam
246b1(dkon brtsegs): da/ sems rnam par rgyu med/ sems rab du rgyab med/ sems rgyas pa med/ sems kyi 'dren pa med/ sems g.yeng ba med/ sems tho dang / seng ma sa
246b2(dkon brtsegs): rims kun tu srung ba med/ sems sbeng ba med/ sems tshim pa med/ sems mi 'thun pa med/ sems 'dud pa med/ sems g.yo ba med/ sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa zed
246b3(dkon brtsegs): sems zhum pa med/ sems nog pa med/ sems rnam par rtog pa med/ sems yongs su rtog pa med/ sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med/ sems rig la gnas
246b4(dkon brtsegs): bzed rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa med/ sems sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas pa med/ sems chos la 'jug pa med
246b5(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa med/ sems 'das pa la mi lta/ sems ma 'ongs pa yang mi lta/ sems da ltar byung ba la yang mi lta ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gsheg
246b6(dkon brtsegs): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ sems las chos gang yang stsal ba med mod kyi/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la
246b7(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral mod kyis/ gan
246b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi 'dor te/ de lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bya thams cad kyang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pas nges
247a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs nas/ ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo // bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yal bar/ sngon gyi srid par 'gro bar byang chub spyod spyad do/ rul
247a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin bag yod dang / bzod pa dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas sgoms// rgyal ba'i rtog dang 'bras bu dge ba 'di 'dra bas// rdul khrims shin tu yongs dag
247a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun gyi mchog/ ji ltar nam mkha' dri med rnam dag spos med ltar// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims dri med nam mkha' bzhin// gang gi nub mo rgyal bas dang po byang chub rtogs// gang gi
247a4(dkon brtsegs): nub mo mtha' mar mya ngan 'das gshegs tshe// stobs bcu rnams la sems rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med// de bzhin gshebasam gtan ting 'dzin nyams pa med nam yang // stobs bcu rnams kyis tshul
247a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims phung po nyams pa med// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang rnam thar nyams pa'i char 'gyur med// bskal ba brgya thag stong du sems ni gcig gis gnas// 'dren pa la ni rtog dang rnam par rtog
247a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med// 'dren pa rnams kyi rnam rtog yul nam mkha' 'dra// dus gsum dag la sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med 'jug/ stobs bcu rnams la sems yid rnam par rgyu dang // rdzogs
247a7(dkon brtsegs): dang gtong ba med par sangs rgyas sras rnams dang / de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / nga
247a8(dkon brtsegs): badzin pasam gyis mi khyang ba la mngon par dang / yid ces/ rab tu rtogs/ somanyi da/ the tshom ri ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs brnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes byed do//
247b1(dkon brtsegs): dug na kyang mam dang de nan pa chags pa rnamam kyan bzhin gachags pa'i dzum rgya thangs ma rgyas thapal lag pa du/ sa/ gas/
247b2(dkon brtsegs): zed thetshom po'i/ rgya rer dga' mgu ste/ rangs brnyed nas/ ngo ma char dang / rmad du 'dugs byed cen/ shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgrang com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa' ma
247b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis 'di skad du/ gnas brnyad mo'u gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni pa'i nyad thos rngu 'phrul che ba'i nang na/ mchog go zhes gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' tha ngos kyis rdzu 'phrul de la
247b4(dkon brtsegs): ning yongs su sbyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul yang 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do// gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul mtshungs shing mnyam par ba mdza
247b5(dkon brtsegs): po// byang chub ses dpa' rdzu 'phrul la gzhal zhing / yongasu dpyad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing yongs su spyod do// gzhal te yongs su spyod nas/ de bzhin
247b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyis mi khya ros
247b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir// rgya cher brtson 'grus brtsom mo// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul brtsams te/ dpe tsam du bya ba de
247b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la khyod nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod 'di lags so// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
248a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'am ya mas ma
248a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te/ dper bshad na dge slong rnams de las thos nas/ de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
248a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir shA ri'i bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la bzungs shig dang ngas bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
248a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gnas brtan mo'u gal gyi bu chen po// rdzu 'phrul che ba yin nam/ gsol ba/ dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na/ 'di ltar gnas
248a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo'u gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni mchog go zhes bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te/ mngon du bzung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i gal te stong gsum gyi stong
248a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po mo'u gal bus 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing stug po 'am/ 'dam bu stug po 'am/ 'od ma stug po'am/ ril gyi zhing ngam/ 'phra
248a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ning gang bar gyur pa/ de ltar gcig tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi tshogs de lta bus/ mthu dang brtson 'grus thams cad dang / rdzu 'bral dang / 'tsho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang / de
248a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'tsho 'phrul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi char yang / rgya song gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba song gi char yang / bye ba
248a9(dkon brtsegs): stong gi car yang / grangs su yang / char yang bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rlur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir ne na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
248b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa sangasargyas ni su phrul dang / 'tsho'aphrul mi dam pa'i pha rol du son par// gci'i bugal te/ de bzhin gshegs pasas 'di la spangs 'brugacig bdagad/ de bzhin gsen
248b2(dkon brtsegs): ngas srungs kar gyi 'bru banag pa de yang de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad kyang / de bzhin
248b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gdag pa'i yungs kar gyi 'bru smra'i rtse mo cog tsam yang rtsod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
248b4(dkon brtsegs): ces ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// sha ri'i du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta 'og la/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
248b5(dkon brtsegs): khas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sbed na/ sems can ji sred yod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu gud kyi 'jig rten
248b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji tsam sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa 'am/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi sems can de dag thams
248b7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su brtag par bzung ste/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na mo'u gal gyi bu chen po lta bur gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis
248b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / mthu dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / 'tsho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang / yungs 'bru yang 'degs par mi nus so// tha ma skra'i rtse mo'i
249a1(dkon brtsegs): mtsham yang spyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ shAri
249a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri
249a3(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod kyis nam 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i dus kyis tsher gyur pa de na/ kun tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung de langs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
249a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rgyal po rab dang / ri khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dang / gling chen po bzhi dang / gling brgyad khri dang / ri chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po yang / dpag tshad srid du mngon
249a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phen cing / rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te mngon sum du bzung ngo // bka' stsal pa
249a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'jig pa'i rlung 'byung ba de na kun tu 'jom pa chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung chen po ldang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas 'khor yug dang brtsa
249a7(dkon brtsegs): ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas/ dpag tshad brgya mngon par 'ben cing / rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad nyis rgya dang / dpag tshad gsum brgya dang / dpag tshad ba'i brgya dang / dpag
249a8(dkon brtsegs): cad lnga brgya dang / dpag cad stong dang / dpag tshad kyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bani stong dang / lnga stong dang du/ mngon par 'dzin cing / rab tu 'thor/ dpag chang
249b1(dkon brtsegs): dag rang ba dang / dpag cad pargya mang zag mang bar brjon par 'dzin cing/ rab tu 'khor te/ de dag gi rdum yang mi spang na/ ri dang rngon pas la gyi smos// 'ja rngam thos rnan
249b2(dkon brtsegs): banal ze pa rnams kyang dgrags bcom/ rab tu 'thor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ gzhal mod 'ang rnams pal spos/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnam
249b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gnan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge rgyas kyis lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi bar du de bzhin tu rgyas par bya'o// ji lar
249b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thab thal gyi dkrugs bcom rab tu 'thor ba de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khang dang / ra ba rnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu gal te dr-i lta bu'i drung ldang kyang / des de bzhin
249b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yo bar mi nus na/ chos gos sam/ chos gos kyi grwa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
249b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
249b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po dang ldan no// shA ri'i bu gal te 'di lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang
249b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi rlung mngon par ldang yang / shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de/ de bzhin gshegs
250a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sor mo'i rtse mos bzlog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / 'tsho 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba yang med do// de ci'i phyir ner/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
250a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad / yid ches/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed
250a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ngo mtshar dang rngad du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// khams gsum sems
250a4(dkon brtsegs): can ji sbed pa/ gnas bairtan mo'u gal gyis bu bzhin du/ rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin pa yi// nyan thos mkhas pa kun gyur pas// rdzu 'phrul thams cad rab bstan kyang // de bzhin gshegs
250a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas sa 'di la/ yungs kar gyi ni 'thung nag pa// g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sbed// rnam 'thor rlung dang kun 'jom pa/
250a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung rnams phyogs bcur langs par gyur// de lta bu yi rlung chen des// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos gos kyi// mtha' ma skra yi rtse car yang // g.yo bar bya bar mi rus so// thub pa chen
250a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i sku bcig gis// klung de rab tu bzlog par mdzad// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'di 'drag// batha' yas panin par 'a 'did// de ltar ga ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin mamams
250a8(dkon brtsegs): parnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi byung ba mdzod par dang // yid ces panas/ ngomaca dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes byed do// yang nA ri'i bu'i ltar byang chub sems
250b1(dkon brtsegs): ban dgagags pa rnams cad ca gshegs pa'i ma bas bam ma gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ces pa nas/ ngarar dang drang kya bdu na/ sam 'i da/
250b2(dkon brtsegs): ma ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs parnyed nas/ ngo mchar chad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs bcu po 'di dag du
250b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten
250b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir chos dang mthun pas ma skor ba'i// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las rnams par smid
250b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / brtson
250b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang // thams cad 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / slor bar 'jug
250b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye
250b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon sum du byed pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag ste/ stobs de dag
251a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis che ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten
251a2(dkon brtsegs): du chos dang mthun par ma skor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di
251a3(dkon brtsegs): la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis gnas su gnas pa yin pa'ang / gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de la gan
251a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang lus kyis nye bar spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par grub pa ni gnas ma yin te/ skabs med
251a5(dkon brtsegs): do// gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid
251a6(dkon brtsegs): du'i 'ong ba mngon par grub pado na gnas te skabs yod do// gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs paspyad pa dang / yid kyis legs pa spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa
251a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te/ skabs med do// gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang
