277b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcom ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob 'azung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa 'ad pa zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi mdun na
277b5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yongs su shes pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ mngon du bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zad pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nam
277b6(dkon brtsegs): du yang mi zad pa ma yin no// de ni shin tu zad pa nyid yin gyis/ gnyen pos zad pa zhes mi bya ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa gang yang med do// gang zag pa zad pa gang yang
277b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'dus ma byas pa'o// de la skye ba med pa 'jig pa med pa gnas med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste chos nyid kyi dbyings ni gnas pa
277b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid de// de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so// gang la 'jug pa yang med mi 'jug pa yang med la de ltar zhugs te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis/ zag pa dang zag pa spong
278a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs
278a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying rje chen po la gnas nas zag pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de 'khor thams cad
278a3(dkon brtsegs): shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi
278a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa de kho na nyid de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'jugs
278a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
278a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa ni rjod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byags ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa
278a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis
278a8(dkon brtsegs): ba bsdang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// de ltar gA ra'i dung bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs dang mi 'jigs pa'asam kyis mi khyab pa na
278a9(dkon brtsegs): nas mngon par dad / yid ches/ rab tu rtogs pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gnyis
278a10(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pas/ gang de bzhim gshegs pa la mi 'jig sa pa mtha' 'dod pa de mama'i' mtha' 'dong ngo // zhes byas pa'i bar du'o// byang chub sems dpas de banya gces pa'i mi yin
278b1(dkon brtsegs): bste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shAri'i du de bzhin gshegs 'thun med
278b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams la bar du gcod do zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la/ yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/
278b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la lngar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni bar du gcod pa'i tshis ma yin no zhes rgol bar byed pa med pa'i bar du'o// de la bar du gcod pa'i chos gang na na/
278b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bag med pa'i sems so// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gnyis ste/ ngo tsha mi shes
278b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang khrel med pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gsum ste/ lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o//
278b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi ste/ ngani gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba bzhi la/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang gnyis
278b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa len pa dang /
278b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / chang 'thung ba'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
279a1(dkon brtsegs): la mgus pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gding ba la ma gus pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun
279a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /
279a3(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i dran pa dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos ban ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i
279a4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi mtha' dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log pa'i dran pa dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na
279a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ bdag la gnod pa byas so zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed do zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun
279a6(dkon brtsegs): nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so byed do// byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i
279a7(dkon brtsegs): rtson byas so byed do// byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skyed pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang ne na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge bcu'i
279a8(dkon brtsegs): las kyilam rnams yin te/ 'di sa sde srog gcod pa dang / mkhyen par len pa dang / 'dod pa sa log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du sla ba dang / bram dang / ngas du
279b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ga 'bral ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba'i skyed pa
279b2(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag gis myang ba la rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa dang / 'byung ba la kun nas ldang ba dang / sred pa dang / lta ba la mngon par nin de'i bang zing dang
279b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas// phung po dang bcas pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod par mkhyen te/ bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang
279b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to// chos bcu po de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de dag zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / sdang ba'i phyir de bzhin gsheg
279b5(dkon brtsegs): gags pa 'dags pa des na phyi byed pa/ mkho bams ca par byed ba/ rnams kyirdzas par byeng du
279b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim bskyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin
279b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
279b8(dkon brtsegs): brtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni/ rjod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/
280a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ gnal du med
280a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i
280a3(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa nas/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpas
280a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas/ mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du
280a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na zhes bya
280a6(dkon brtsegs): nama'i sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems
280a7(dkon brtsegs): na rnams gang la bsten pas sems par 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di
280a8(dkon brtsegs): ni rim par 'byung ba'i lam ma yin no zhes/ de bzhin gzigs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang mthun pas nom par byed mi nus so// nges par 'byung ba'i lam
280b1(dkon brtsegs): sha/ 'di sa sa/ bzad pa cig pa'i lam ste/ gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos gnyis de/ 'dis ste/ deganas du
280b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong mthong ngo // nges par 'byung ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di lu ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa'o// nges par 'byung badzi rlo
280b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtse bzhi gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / tshor bar gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / sems su gtogs de'i dran pa dang / chos su gtogs pa'i dra
280b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'di ni nges par 'byung ba bzhi'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dang
280b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs
280b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /
280b7(dkon brtsegs): lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug go// nges par 'byung ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rlom
280b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs
281a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 'di bdun
281a2(dkon brtsegs): yang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i
281a3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting
281a4(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin te/ 'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no// mchog du dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mchog tu dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
281a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ ye shes mthong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rnam par grol ba ste/ chos
281a6(dkon brtsegs): dgu yang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos badz+ra ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo// 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / ma byin par
281a7(dkon brtsegs): len bsangs pa dang / 'dod pa la mig bar gan pa grangs pa dang / brdzun du smra bsrungs pa dang / tham spangs pa dang / ngas rnab tha spangs pa dang / tshig 'phrul pa ltas
281a8(dkon brtsegs): dang // dan pa sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par oM bste/ 'di yang gong ma bzhin te/ lam de ni nges par 'byung bar 'gyur pa'o// 'di la
281b1(dkon brtsegs): ra du byung nam gyi phyogs kyi chos dge 'ang snyed pa/ rdul khrims kyi rung po dang ldan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rung ba dang ldan pa'am/ shes rab kyi blang ba dang ldan du'am/
281b2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i phung po dang ldan pa'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i lam nas byarjod/
281b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ yang dag par bsgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ yang dag par bsgrub pa de la ni/ chos gang yang sogs pa 'am/ za ba 'am/ blang ba 'am/
281b4(dkon brtsegs): dor ba 'am/ bzung ba'am/ spang ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par sgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la blo ma 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa/ yang dag pa rje
281b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de bzhin gnags
281b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim
281b7(dkon brtsegs): rim pa bskyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / sring rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin
281b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa
282a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni cod pa med pa/ thab med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing / chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam
282a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhal du med/ dpag tu med
282a3(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / snying rje chen pos yin pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de so sor rtog pas sems can
282a4(dkon brtsegs): der 'jug pa rnams de byed pa sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
282a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis che ste/
282a6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong ngam/ zam ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//
282a7(dkon brtsegs): de du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jims pa panamatha' lam su med do// 'dig sde/ dper na ga ri'i bunam ma kha' mtha' las su med pa de bzhin du ni zi nag sa
282a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang mtha' yas mu med de/ sems can thams cad kyis zad par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha
282b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de ni rnam ma la'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi rgyab pa thos nas/ mdzod
282b2(dkon brtsegs): bar dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtogs/ som nyid med/ the tshomA mi ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo mtshar dang rmang
282b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par/ rang byung bas ni rjes su rdzogs/
282b4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/ de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam pa gzigs// so sor skye bo'i chos gang yin/ de dag sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam/ slob dang mi
282b5(dkon brtsegs): slob chos rnams dang // nga rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang // gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang // gang dag 'jig rten 'das chos dang / dge dang mi dge mi g.yol rnams
282b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ smon pa dag ni rnam par spangs/ mi skyes mngon par 'du mi byed/ 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du bsam
282b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas/ thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa/ gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/ de bzhin du yang rab tu ston// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par tshul/
282b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bstan thar pa rab tu bstan/ mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa/ gnyis pa yang dag rab tu bstan/ rgyal bas gang chos rjes su sangs rgyas pa/ ma bsten par mi rnam
283a1(dkon brtsegs): grol mi thob/ bag med pa dang khrel ba med gyur dang / gang la ngotsha ci yang med pa dang / lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis kyang / gang dag sdom pa nam yang yong min dpa /
283a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang / srog gcod pa la gzhan la 'che ba dang / gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang / nga rgyal mi gus de ni bdun pa'o// gang dag log par
283a3(dkon brtsegs): sna ba brgyad pa ste/ thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyun gcod/ yang dag mnar sems dgu dang nyis mang dang / mi dge bcu yi las kyi lam rnams dang / gang dag tshul man ni
283a4(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa/ de dag la ni nam yang mthar pa med/ byin ci log la zhugs par rig gyur nas/ bag med yang dag ma byin sba la chags/ rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pas
283a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya/ gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la/ mi gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur/ rgyal ba nyid kyis ma thos thams cad rig/ shes na mi
283a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i chos 'chang nga // ji tsam dge ba'i chos rnams ni mang yod na pa/ byang chub phyogs dge rgyal bas bsngags pa la/ bsnyen pa rnam par thar pa mi thob pa/ gnas med pa na
283a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs brgyarnams kyis bkud/ tshul bzhin gyis ni na mangs mang ba ni yang dag chos dge mnyam paldan zhing / nas dang tshas ma yin la ma migs/ ni bkyang mam
283a8(dkon brtsegs): la pa rnam grol reg/ gsog gsapa nam mkha'i 'ang ning yam tha/ sgyu ma'i gzugs 'janamam mkha' sa khri dang / dge chas rnam pa gang gis rab shes rab/ deni ming pa
283b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshams mthur bar 'gyur/ thub paskabs brtsarnams kyi chos 'din/ 'gro ba gang mam srid par 'gro ba la/ snying rje rtse ba blad nus par byed de/ mi 'jigs banub ram pa'a' 'ag
283b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ mngon par dga'i yid ches/ rab tu rdog/ sem 'i med/ the tshom mi
283b3(dkon brtsegs): ba nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khya ba'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i buji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gan/
283b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rdzogs/ sem nyi mi byed/ the tshom mi za ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyis bar du 'du shes
283b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni sems cad rjes su gtong zhing nag tu 'jug pa/ sems can yongs su srin par 'gyur
283b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ mi log par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de yang ji ltar ngag gi las kyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba sra ba ma yin pa de ltar chad med do/
283b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab/ de ltar mtshungs pa med/ de ltar dpag tu med/ de ltar brjod du med/ de ltar mi zad cing khong du chud par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
283b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub thob pa/ de ltar sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po yang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob can
283b9(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ byang chub ci 'ang nyid rje
285a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi khong du chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'a
285a2(dkon brtsegs): / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la mtshan ma med pa gang /
285a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med
285a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// yid kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o// de lta
285a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ khams gsum pa ni
285a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul de ni so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o//
285a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/
285a8(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum mnyam pa/ 'bar gsum yongs su dag pa'o// del 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa'i sems mi 'jug pa dang
285b1(dkon brtsegs): ma'angs pa larnam par shes parjes su ma rgyas pa dang / dkar byung ba la yid la byed pam 'jug paH/ rnamams dang yid dpa/ rnam brlags pas
285b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa sa mchog/ ma'ongs pa la rnams sems su mi byed/ daltar byung ba la sbas par mi byed pa/ 'dzim dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'kha gsum yongs su
285b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin na/ sems can rnams kyi khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o// nas sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// ka ri'i zungs
285b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni lus med pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa nas med
285b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no// 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang ma skyes pa'i mi 'jig pa mi gnas pa de ni 'khor gsum dang
285b6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas dang de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rang bzhin de ni
285b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'o// gang dngos po med pa de la gnyis med do// lus med pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de/ sems can rnams kyi khong du chud pas/ de khong
285b8(dkon brtsegs): du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni dbyer med pa'i gnas su mngon par sangs rgyas/
284a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa/ gnas pa med pa'i byang chub thob bo// de la rtsa ba gang zhe gnas zhe na/ 'jigs tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pas
284a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ de dag mkhyen te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas/ rtsa ba med pa gnas med pa'i
284a3(dkon brtsegs): byang mngon par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ sems can 'di dag ni rtsa ba med pa gnas med par mi shes pas/ de dag shes par bya'o// nas sems can rnams la de bzhin gas
284a4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i snying rje chen po 'dug go// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'o// ji ltar nye bar zhi zhe na/ nang zhi ba'o// phyi rol nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
284a5(dkon brtsegs): mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir ni ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang /
284a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o// de mig stong par yongs su yongs su shes nas gzugs la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar
284a7(dkon brtsegs): ni bzhes bya'o// yid kyi bar du yang stong par yongs su shes nas/ chos la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar ni ba zhes bya na/ sems can 'di dag ni ni ba dang / bar me
284a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di mi mas te/ dedag shes par byan ces/ sems can rnams pa badzin gzigs pa'i ming rje chen po 'dun na gas yang thara'i bungs ni dang na gyi ma
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ba byang rgyu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyams// dasar 'ong gas la zhen/ rang bzhin gang yin pa dom/ can nas tshan mongs pa nga ba ste/ rnam rdum
284b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// nam mkha'i rjes su 'brang ba'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal pa
284b3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/ sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis 'ang
284b4(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba 'di mi shes pas de dag rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'ang du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'dus so// san
284b5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la blang ba med pa gang / dor ba med pa gang zhe na/ blang ba med
284b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas/ zang ba med pa dang /
284b7(dkon brtsegs): dor ba med pa'i ngo bo mnyam pa nyid du gzigs te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ tshu rol med pa dang / pha rol med par gzigs pa/ de ltar chos thams cad tshu rol dang pha
284b8(dkon brtsegs): rol dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di
286a1(dkon brtsegs): de la dbyer med pa gang gnas gang she na/ de la de bzhin nyid ni gnas so// gnas med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas
286a2(dkon brtsegs): so// tha dad pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// yang dag pa'i tha' ni gnas so// g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// stong pa nyid ni gnas so// dmigs su med pa ni
286a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so// rnam par mi rtog pa ni dbyer med pa'o// smon pa ni med pa ni gnas so// 'jug pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// sem
286a4(dkon brtsegs): can med pa ni gnas so// sems can med pa'i rang bzhin ni dbyer med pa'o// nam mkha' ni gnas so// mi dmigs pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mi skye ba ni gnas so//
286a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gags pa ni dbyer med pa'o// 'dus ma byas ni gnas so// rgyu med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// byang chub ni gnas so// nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o// mya ngan
286a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa ni gnas sa/ mngon par mi 'grub pa ni dbyer med pa'o// de ltar sha ri'i bu dbyer med pa'i gnas 'di/ sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chung ngas
286a7(dkon brtsegs): du'ang nga chu par bya nas sems camarnams la na bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// ga 'i drabyung chu ba ni lus kyi mngan par rdzags parnas
286a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems kyis kyis kyang ma yin no// ci'i phyir nem/ lus ni bems pa'o// gam pa med pa byed pa med du sdig pa dang shing dang rdo dang mig yong su zum// sems
286b1(dkon brtsegs): ni snu ma dang skyeg tu dang rbaHA rbas/ gang bas rdzas dang mams ngas tha yang nachu pa pang byang chub ces bya'o// byang chub 'i ma sang samadu bzung bas/
286b2(dkon brtsegs): lu saM semasems sam/ chos sam/ chas ma yin pa'am/ yang dag pa'am yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/ bden pa'am/ brdzun pa gang gyis kyang bdang par bya
286b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub la gang gis kyang tshig gi tha skad du 'gyur ba'i gnas cung na
286b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang med do// ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing / tshig med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang gnas med pa brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o// de ltar sa ri'i bu la
286b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'chol ba ni chos thams cad ni tshig med pa ste/ chos la tshig med tshig la chos med do// de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du
286b6(dkon brtsegs): mchud pas de khong du chud par bya'o// zhes rgyan rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni bzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa
286b7(dkon brtsegs): de la gzung ba med pa gang / kun gni med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig yongs su shes pa ni bzung ba med pa'o// gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ban
286b8(dkon brtsegs): kun gzhi med pa'o// yid kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ni bzung ba med pa'o// chos mi dmigs pa ni kun gzhi med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
287a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba med pa kun gzhi med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mig mi 'dzin pa
287a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam pas shes pa mi gnas so// yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing / chos kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// de rnam par
287a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas shes so// ji ltar shes zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas gzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta sku
287a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni sems kyi gnas so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ 'di bzhi ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas/
287a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas de yang gnas med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen te/ gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chung bas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes
287a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// stong pa nyid gang gis byang
287a7(dkon brtsegs): chub stong pa/ stong pa nyid nges chos thams cad stong ste/ de dag spang ba ji lta ba bzhin du de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sang
287a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas med kyis/ spang ba nyid kyis spang banyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni ma yin pas spang ba cing ngam byang chub ces bya bar 'didzi ni tshul gcig pa ma
287b1(dkon brtsegs): mas// das pam mas cam tha ca nga byang chub sa sa dbye ba'i gnyis gang pa mdang// chas da na gnyims meng ci gnyis cung ba mangs
287b2(dkon brtsegs): bam nam med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ rab tu rtsu ba med pa/ khyad pa med pa'o// gang snang ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par chag pa dang / 'dren pa dang thas par// dan ngam par
287b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi dmigs te/ song pa nyid gang yin pa de spang pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes kyang bral nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin no// dengazhi
287b4(dkon brtsegs): dusrang snang pa nas kyang bya la snang ba ched brjod par bya ba ma yinan// 'di ma sna ming tsam du tha nang 'dags pa 'ang/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa rtse/ ming nga yang lus
287b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas sa// ji ltar ming yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du chos ming gis tha skad du 'dog pa'i chos de yang yul na mig nas phyogs na mi
287b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad mkhyen te/ thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung ba de ltar mkhyen pas/ de ltar rnam par grol te/ bcing ba yang med/ grol ba
287b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ang med na/ dbyis pa so so'i skye ba rnams khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni rnam
287b8(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mnyam ste/ nam mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa yang ma yin no// byang chub mnyam pa'ang ma yin no// mi mnyam pa yang ma yin te/ ji ltar chos
288a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag par yongs su grub pa med de/ mnyam pa'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no// de ltar sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
288a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa yang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ji ltar chos rdul tsam yang mnyam par byas pa'ang ma yin/
288a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam par byas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// chos de snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so// yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/
288a4(dkon brtsegs): chos mi 'byung ba rnams 'byung ba dang / byung nas 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni/ bdag po med par 'byung ba bdag po med par 'jig pa ste/ rkyen gyis byung ba dang
288a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par 'gyur zhing / 'di ltar 'jig pa'am/ bzlog pa gang yang med de/ lam gcod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to// lam gcod pa 'di sems can
288a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis khong du chud par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu byang chub de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas ma/
288a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi byung ngo // byang chub jis pa bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
288a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang bzhin pa/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub nge sa pa bzhin na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / zung gis 'ams kyang
288b1(dkon brtsegs): chus g.yogs pa dang / bdag tu mngan par chags pas spang ba dang / khams dang su mamed len te// de la nga bzhin gshegs blangag che bar len pa'i rtsa ba gangs su
288b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag par mkhyen to// bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la yongs su dag pa gang gis tshul badzin
288b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtag pa gang yang med de/ de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas ma spong ngo // ma rig pa kun sa
288b4(dkon brtsegs): mi spong bas/ srid pa'i yan lagacu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni skye ba med pa'o// gang skye ba med pa de ni nges par gyur pa'o// gang nges par gyur pa de ni nges pa
288b5(dkon brtsegs): rdarna ta// gang nges pa'i don de ni don dam pa'o// gang don dam pa de gang zag med pa'i don to// gang gang zag med pa'i don de/ brjod du med pa'i don to//
288b6(dkon brtsegs): gang brjod du med pa'i don de/ rten cing 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i don to// gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don de chos kyi don to// gang chos kyi ngan de
288b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i don des/ de'i phyir sras rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo // sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa
288b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid du btsal na ci'ang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo // de la ci'ang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa ma
290a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag pa mthong ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ma
290a2(dkon brtsegs): par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// zag pa med pa dang / len pa med pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye ba rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can
290a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni dag pa dri ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la dag pa gang / dri ma med pa gang / na mangs
290a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o// mngon par 'gyu
290a5(dkon brtsegs): min pa ni dri ma med pa'o// nye bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// rang bzhin ni dag pa'o// yongs su dag pa'o// ni dri ma med pa'o// 'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa
290a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// sbas pa med pa ni dag pa'o// ma sbas pa ni ji ma med pa'o// spos banye bar ni ba ni can mongs pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid ni dag par// chos kyi dbyings ni tshim
290a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mnga'adi can mangs pa medapa'// ga'abyed pa ni dag pa'o// nam mkha' ni rjem med pa'o// nam mkha' nanyan mongs pa med pa'o/
290a8(dkon brtsegs): 'angs su shes pa ni dag pa'// phyi ras tu ma chu ba ni drim med pa'o// phyin me migs pa rjo na mongs pa med par// phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag par//
290b1(dkon brtsegs): rang ban rje me na/ rgyam ched kyang pa ninanamangs pa med par// 'das pa la zang ba zhes pa dag par// ma 'das pa mas bshes pa ni rlom med par/ dag byung ba sam
290b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang dbyings la gnas pa'i sa san ldan mangs pa med pa ni/ de ltar dag pa dang / de skar dri ma med pa dang / rkan mongs pa med pa gnas gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni 'dzim / ni
290b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas sa// gang ge ba de ni rab tu zhi ba/ de ni nye bar ni bkra/ rtsub pa zhes bya'o// nges pas na ji ltar nam mkha' jis par byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chubajig par mas
290b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhinan/ chos ji lta bar sems can yang de bzhin na// sems can ji lta bar zhing yang de bzhin na// ming ji la bar mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no// de bas na chos thams ca
290b5(dkon brtsegs): ni byangang las 'das pa dang / mnyam zhes bya ste/ mthar thug pas rnam pas gnyen po medado// gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// zag ma nas dri ma med pa'o
290b6(dkon brtsegs): thag ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'di ltar gzugs can dang gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can
290b7(dkon brtsegs): khams la rnam par gzigs shing sems can rnams la/ dag pa dang dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pas/ rnam par rol pa'i zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// de ltar shA ri'i bu
290b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sring rje chen po// dag pa dang dri ma med par lhun gyis grub pas rtag tu 'jug ste/ phyis btang bar bya ba med cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'a
291a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lus par thogs pa med do// de ltar sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni mtha' yas mu med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
291a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pas snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/ mngon par dang / yid
291a3(dkon brtsegs): ches/ rab tu rtogs/ soma'i med/ the tshom mi za ba nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyis rab tu 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan
291a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis/ don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba med cing gnas med par/ sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ ngiH
291a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa de bzhin du/ srog chags rnams ni kun la ston/ nang gi mig ni stong pas stong / phyi rol gzugs kyang stong pa'o// zhi dang nye bar zhi ba yi/ sangs rgyas kyis ni bya
291a6(dkon brtsegs): chub reg/ zhi dang nye bar ni bAH/ sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub rebye// ni dang nye bar zhi ba de/ sems can khong du mchud pas/ tshig don rtogs nas sems can la/ de dga' na
291a7(dkon brtsegs): sring rje 'dug/ byang chub rang bzhin 'ad gsal zhing / rnamangs nam mkha' 'dra ba de/ sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas/ de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/ chos rnams kun la
291a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pa yang ma yin/ thang med dan pa med pa yis/ sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ sems can 'di dag migs pas/ de dag la ni ming rje
291b1(dkon brtsegs): mamam byung dmigs pazu/ 'bams pa rnams kyi byung bral dadi/ khyis pa byung yul ma yin pa/ sangs rgyas byin bya chu ba ga/ gang da ma mas
291b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ sa ma'i skye bos mi shes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la// snying rje chen po rab tu 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas/
291b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med cing 'jig pa med// de la gnas pa yang min te// mtshan nyid gsum las rnam par grol// 'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ byis pas khang du
291b4(dkon brtsegs): mchud pas/ de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/ tshul 'di gang gis sangs rgyas pa// byang chub lus kyi mi rtag sa// sems kyis kyang ni 'changamargya// lusan
291b5(dkon brtsegs): bems po'i rang bzhin te// sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// lus dang sems kyi rang bzhin te// byis pas khong du ma chud pas// tshul 'di khong du chud gyur nas/
291b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ rang byung ba ni byang chub dam pa rgya chen mchog reg ste// shing mchog drung du bzhugs nas sems can khams la rnam par gzigs/ 'khar ba
291b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs khyam gyur pa// de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lnga
291b8(dkon brtsegs): dra bas gzings// sdug bsngal bde dang mi nag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing // bdag dang sems can dang ni srog dang lta bar chags pa rnams// gzigs nas je
292a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni sangs rgyas snying rje mi zang 'jug/ sems can khams ni gti mug ling tog khebs shing sgrib pa kun/ nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin du snang med lam mer mi 'gyur ba/
292a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gzigs nas ye shes snang ba ji med 'ong bya zhes/ de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug ngan tshogs 'gro bar zhugs shing lam skor rab tu 'khyams pa rnams/ sems can sems can
292a3(dkon brtsegs): dang drang 'gro yi dgas rgyud ltung ba/ de dag gzigs nas sngon gyi rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i lam bsnyen ces/ de dag la'ang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zang 'jug/ de bzhin nyid lngar de bzhin nyid du chos rnam
292a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te/ 'gro ba dag cing bzang ba'i chos rnams mi shes gzigs nas su/ de dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zang 'jug des
292a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ sam gyi med/ the tshom mi ra/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs
292a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmang du 'du shes skyed do// dkon mchog rtsegs pa
292a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo// 'amang 'a yang na'i bu ji lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
292a8(dkon brtsegs): 'isas rgyas kyirnams sa pamam ma dang / mad ces/ rab tu gnas 'am nga ma du jigs pabyung can/ gara'i brab ma
292b1(dkon brtsegs): ldanas ma sa mas// su na na la
292b2(dkon brtsegs): sprug tham ga gi gnas su gnas kyim cho/ dge snang dang / zam 'am/ ldu'am/ bdud dam/ sras byung 'a na du ngos dang na
292b3(dkon brtsegs): ra ba/ tshangs pa'i 'bar mo rab tu banar ra// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa bang brkyang gang zhen/ 'di sa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir lus kyi la
292b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang las byas pa 'am/ mkhas pa rjes dang mthun pas rgal bar byed pa'i lus kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med de// ji ci'i phyir
292b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lus kyi las 'khrul pa med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyong lam mdzes pas kun tu gzigs pa dang rnam
292b6(dkon brtsegs): par gzigs pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gas sngam sbyar dang / chos gso dang / lhung bzed snyams nas pa dang / mngo
292b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyag gags pa dang / ser gshegs pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhud ba dang / bzhengs pad / bzhugs pa dang / mnul pa dang
292b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil sal mi rig sa/ 'khor la rtsibs stong pa las byung zhing dri yid du 'ong
293a1(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma mngon par byangs/ de la bzhin gshegs pa'i zhapas 'jug go/ de la gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su tha'i sems
293a2(dkon brtsegs): can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na/ de dag zhag bdun du rab tu bde ba dang / ldan par 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang bde
293a3(dkon brtsegs): maHras kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul chos gas sor bzhi nam gyis mi reg mod kyis/ rnam par 'byor
293a4(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so// sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de
293a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sra 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang sha ri'i bu gang gi phyir/ ngag 'khrul gang las byis pa'am/ mkhas pa
293a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri
293a7(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su smra ba yang dag par sgru ba/ bden par sgrub/ tshigs su sgru ba/ ji skad smra ba
293a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byed pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig sa/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig // maM bzlas pa'i tshigs
293b1(dkon brtsegs): dang pa ma tu brgyan pamamasgru gas 'arjod pa'i sems na rnams ba kyi sa pa rgyu
293b2(dkon brtsegs): bya sangs rgyas ba'adas rnams kyis ngagag sems 'phrul du med cas bya// na sa
293b3(dkon brtsegs): gang las byas pa'am/ mkhas pa ches dang mthun pas rgol bar byed pa'i sems la khrul pa bzhi gshegs pa la meng /
293b4(dkon brtsegs): 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la sha ri'i bud bzhin gshegs panomanyam par bzhag pa'i dngas pa mi 'du zhing / sangs
293b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba thams cad byed kyang / sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad la de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug s+ho/
293b6(dkon brtsegs): phyirade bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med pa de gar sems can
293b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir ches stan te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// gzhan yang na
293b8(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu co gang las bdud dam bdud ris kyi lha'i bu 'am/ gnan mu stegs can gyis glags snyed par 'gyur ba'i
294a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la med do// yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co'am/ rjes su ca co'i byin pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rjes su chags pa 'am/ khong khro ba dang bram
294a2(dkon brtsegs): rtse/ desems panathams cad kyis bkur ni byas kyang thos pa ma thams/ semamacan mamam cad kyis/ bshAng sam byas kyang 'khrug pa med do// gang dalas brtsod pa'am rjes su 'dzi
294a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam mthar phyin pa ci'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang ma rtsod pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la caci med do// de badzin
294a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas ste/ nga'i ba med 'dzin pa med/ len pa med/ mdud pa thams cad bral ba ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tsaco med do// ji ltar de la tsaco med pa de ltar
294a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos son te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsrel ba gang las chos gang la yang rmongs par 'gyur
294a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyel ba de ba'i gshegs pa la med de/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'dug pa la khrags pa med cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang/
294a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba la rnam par lnga pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs pa med na// so ser ci rigs par chos stod pa'i phyir/ kun tums pa med do// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang ngalta la
294a8(dkon brtsegs): tshig sa med pa'i seshes zeng ba'i phyir ro// dad dang chos dang nges pa'i tshis dang / rmongs thams mngangs par rig pa sa kun tu rnams pa med dang// jithar ba dag kung durnams pa med
294b1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang daltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'diri sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
294b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ btsun
294b3(dkon brtsegs): sam/ mnal tam/ bshos gsol lam/ gsungs ngam/ cang ma gsung bar gyur kyang rung ste/ nag tu mnyam par gzhag cing / ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam pa'i mthar phyin pa slob pa med
294b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlabs gtogs par sems can gyi ris na/ sems can gang mnyam par bzhag kyang rung / mnyam pa
294b5(dkon brtsegs): ma bzhag kyang rung ste/ su'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar nus pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar ting nge 'dzir la lba bas/ sem
294b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la chos ston to// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang la las sems mi mnyam par gan
294b7(dkon brtsegs): par gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du zhing mi bzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ning thadad pa'i
294b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med do// rang bzhin gyi tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can thadad pa'i 'du shes med do// chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir
295a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad
295a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la yang rjes su chags pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa la yang
295a3(dkon brtsegs): lan du phan 'dogs pa med/ gnod par gyur pa la yang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul bar 'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la yang smod pa ma
295a4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa na chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces pa'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad
295a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyis tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa lnga pa'o// gan/
295a6(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa las sar ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gzhags pa'i 'atang skams ni lam bsgoms pa yin te/ lamam bstam
295a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ma mam// da na gags pa'i ga myams ni/ gnam thams pa dang / rnam mas bamams pa dang / nas rab 'thams pa \u0f7f/ sa rabs 'amams pam yin/
295a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtang rnams na/ mazham dang ldan pa yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yinan// de bzhin gzhags pa btang rnams ni 'jig rten dang las 'das pa yin gyi/ 'dzin
295b1(dkon brtsegs): den pa'i ma banyung ba ma mnan// dbadzin gshegs pa'i gtang mams ni 'phags zangs par 'byung ba yin la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i ngas par 'byung bab sa na/ ma
295b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bta mams ni tshangs pa'i 'a'ajamam ma bam/ sems cams ming rje dang thal 'di ma yinan// de ban gshegs pa'i gtang rnams rang gis grub pa ste/ maser po rjes su mngab ma
295b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dom pa yang na ri'i bu ba'i gnags pa'i btang rnams 'am mtho ba yang ma yin/ dma' ba yang ma yin te/ mthong ma ma med par garngas pa/ meg yo bar thar pa/ gzis dang tham pa
295b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa/ ng+yas la lta ba/ dus las ma yol ba/ mi g.yo ba/ rloms sems med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma chags pa/ brtan du med pa/ yang dag pa/ dakhon/
295b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs
295b6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos son to// sha ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dzes pa drug pa'o// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// de la 'dun pa 'ang
295b7(dkon brtsegs): nan 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'dzin pa nyams pa med do// snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// chos ston pa la
295b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa nyams pa med do// sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams
296a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med do// dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyis ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di
296a2(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa'o// sems can thams cad blan med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
296a3(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa'o// gnan yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can g.yal bar mi 'dor
296a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i rtson 'grus so// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi snod chos nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang / skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bur
296a5(dkon brtsegs): nges na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyis bskal par yang mi bzhengs so// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la ltabs zan gang na sangs rgyas
296a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gis phyir yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gna'i klung gi byem snyed 'danga' zhing bcud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba'am/ ngagangal pa 'am/
296a7(dkon brtsegs): sems ngas pa med// de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi sngags pa gsung ba'o// brtson 'grus
296a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab babyor pa gang gis sems can 'phags pa'i rnam par tsal bzab par 'gyur ba'i brtan 'grus rnamams ca rnams la bsngags par mdzadan/ ri'i bu 'dzin
296b1(dkon brtsegs): nan gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam ma 'dres pa bcang rdzum// gan yang sa ri'i bu pazhin gshegs pa ni thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyis thams cad
296b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang rtsing de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhem yar de bzhin gshegs pa tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par mam
296b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyis sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis pazhi na shin tu dran pa bsrel ba med
296b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis btang bar bya ba med do// phung po gsum du rnam par bzhag pa dang / sems can
296b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la/ sems kyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa yongs su nyams pa med do// de
296b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dran pa ni rngan par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba mod kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston pa bri bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
296b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i dran pa la nyams pa med do// de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran zhing mi brjed pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams la chos ston te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
296b8(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni chos thams cad mnyam
297a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no// chos thams cad jim ba bzhin pa'o// daci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lam mi nyams zhen/ de na
297a2(dkon brtsegs): ying gang dang ma jam pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo// ting nge 'dzin gang dang / mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam sa/ mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa'i
297a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' de dang mtha' mnyam mo// ne sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' de dang mnyam ma
297a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ gti mug med pa'i mtha' 'ang de dang mnyam mo// 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam ma/
297a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid de la soms par zhugs pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'a
297a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa mad ces bya'o// ba'i phyi shes/ mnyam pa nyid ma sems yongs sumanyams sa// nga bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / skye pa
297a7(dkon brtsegs): sras dang / yidi dang / ldan pa ma man mad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang bram tshang ba yang ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin sna'i khams la mi gnas/ chu dang me dang / rlung gi khams ma
297a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mamiganas/ 'jig rten par la la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa medadade// de'i phyirang bzhin gshegs
297b1(dkon brtsegs): bathong nge 'dzin mams pa med de/ sems can thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyas zer to// bai ri'i bu 'di ni re bzhid gshegs pa'i sangs dus kyi ma
297b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// gan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/
297b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o// sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la chas go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o// sa so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa
297b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o// tshi gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi 'chad par ston pa shes pa'o// ris bu'i 'dra zhes dris pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du the tsam
297b5(dkon brtsegs): gcad pa'i shes pa'o// thams cad du rdzogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o// theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o// sems can sems kyi spyod pa brgya khri bzhi blang mongs
297b6(dkon brtsegs): su shes pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi srang ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa shes pa'o// 'di mi shes rab mi ba pa bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rna
297b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med zang mi shes pa'o// gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos
297b8(dkon brtsegs): ston to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa bcu cig pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med
298a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhen/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/ sgra'i rjes su 'gro'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/
298a2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen khong du chud pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba ni/ chags pa dang gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / thal bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ sngon
298a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar yang ma bcings/ phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/ da ltar byung ba yang mi gnas so// mig dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang
298a4(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol te/ mi 'dzin mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o// sems rang bzhin 'od
298a5(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas/ de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sa
298a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhes bya'o// jis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'i sar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la rgyam sngon te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa cu
298a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang na ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes ldan du 'gro zhing ye shes kyis rjes su 'brang ngo // lus kyis las ded
298a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs pas kyang / sems can 'dul/ gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ banas pas
298b1(dkon brtsegs): bas kyang sems can 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'jum/ gtsun tar sar mi sna
298b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rdzas pa tsam dang / 'od btang ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / zong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas
298b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing
298b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
298b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos na
298b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// phye bar lung ston pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig sba ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa/ rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho ba mi dma' ba/
298b7(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo ba 'dar po ma yin/ gya gya med pa/ mi rung ba/ mi rtsub pa/ gzing gzing ba ma yin pa mnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ ma 'chal ba/ lag log med pa/ mi che ba/ mi
298b8(dkon brtsegs): myur ba/ rab tu myur ba ma yin pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig/ rab tu mnyen pa/ shin tu snyan pa/ dbyangs bsnyen pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ bsgrags pa des
299a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa/ phan pa dang bcas pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ tha ba med pa/ dri ma med pa/ marmongs pa/ thogs pa med pa
299a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sbyor ba'o// 'od gsal ba/ drang ba/ ljongs po ma yin pa/ dig rig po ma yin pa/ bde bskyed pa/ lus tshim par byed pa/ sems tshim par byed pa/ 'dod chags zhi bar bya
299a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhe sdang ni bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'joms pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgol ba btul ba/ go bar byed pa/ rnga'i sgra mkhas pa dga' bar byed pa/ ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs
299a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang ba'i sna tshangs pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho'i brlabs kyis/ sprin gyi sna'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gis/ rma bya'i sra da// du byug gis/ gang sha ta'u swa/ ngang pa'i sna sang/ raM dgas
299a5(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyal po'i sgra/ khong tu dang / pi wang dang / la bar rnga dang / drung dang / sil sran rab tu bsgrags pa'i ste/ kun zhes par 'gyur ba/ rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/ zur phyin pa/
299a6(dkon brtsegs): du'ong ba/ mngon par 'os pa/ zab pa/ lkugs shing dag pa ma yin pa/ bde ba/ dag pa'i rtsab bskyed pa tshig dang yi ge mnyams pa/ shin tu nges par sa ba/ tshig 'bru dang
299a7(dkon brtsegs): ngang batshig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi nadang ldan pa/ zab pa ldan pa/ cod dang ldan pa/ rnam sas tsha'aja' ba/ dbang ba mngag dang mchag ma yin pa zhes pas stan pa/ sbyin pas na
299a8(dkon brtsegs): pa tshul khrims kyis sbyangs pa/ bzad pas bsgrubs pa/ btsun 'grus kyis 'bar bar byas pa/ bsam gtan gyis ying dra'ang bar byas pa/ shes rab kyis nges par rnags pa
299b1(dkon brtsegs): mnan// dag grang sa 'a na rnam par bye ba dang / cha'i chad rnam par bye ba dang / yang rab tu mkhyen te/ chos gnas pa rnam par bye bad+hab jam ched ka/ dazugs kyi mang chub
299b2(dkon brtsegs): rab su mkhyen to// zas kyi mchog gi langs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba yang rab tumachen te/ rab tu mche
299b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po tha dad pa dang / spyod pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems gang gA'i 'og tha sems gang byung ba dngag rnams
299b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum gyi ye shes dang rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyun kyang mi dmigs
299b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
299b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus nal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags mthogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin
299b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gang 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to// bskal pas 'tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang
299b8(dkon brtsegs): chus sdud par 'gyur ba ji srid pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sa'i khams
301a1(dkon brtsegs): me pa dang / rnam tha ba zhid pa dang / rkyang shing gal pa med pa dang / rgan dang dgas pa sa byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mang ma du ma
301a2(dkon brtsegs): byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sas rgyas kyis dang 'a ma na la mas ma ldan das med byung ba 'thar ba dang / rang sangs ma zhi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang
301a3(dkon brtsegs): nga 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'ang med 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byas kyi mi ma myong dang / dbugs tshun 'dang/ 'jag pa dang / 'as pa sa
301a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i ltung sa ngas ma sa gyis padang/ rang sa ma ma sa thamams ca ma sa
301a5(dkon brtsegs): sa ma pa sa #sa ma
301a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang lus byung 'askye
301b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ra'angs chem/ 'dil pa tu na ban ga shegs pa/ dbyar gyi byags bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyisang thams cad bzang ba la rnam pasas bca /
301b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// nga ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin du ltar gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// bltar gyi mar ma'i gzugs
301b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to// dbyar gi rtsa dang / shing gi la ba dang / sman dang / nags thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen te// daltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul tha rab kyi rdul
301b4(dkon brtsegs): char bgrangs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i khams sna'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bzang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen te/
301b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skye ba dang / 'gag pa thams cad kyang bzang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyis khams
301b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyang skra'i rje mos chags kyis bzang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// bltar gyi sems
301b7(dkon brtsegs): can gyis khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang
301b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i skye rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang
302a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i skye 'i'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyenan
302a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu
302a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// da ltar gyi ma'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// dkar gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen/
302a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// dkar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to//
302a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med de/ gnyis
302a6(dkon brtsegs): su med pa la bzhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sha ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi
302a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa bca brkyang pa dag dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gagags pa thugs bcu'i 'jig chen gyi khams rab 'jam ma lus pa thams cad bul bar gyi nang du gzi brjid dang chags pa dang /
302a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / ngasa' dang rang nga byung ba'i chos cad kyis la bar rnams pal gyis man nas/ skam mabyung rngan// datha ba 'i bu de bzhin gzhags pa'i sangs rgyam rgya rnas ma 'jasas
302a9(dkon brtsegs): bacha rgya mama' las su med pa// 'dis sa/ shar labum mkha' mtha' mas su med pa bzhin du/ dra bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' las sun dang
302b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gagasas pa'i sa sa rgyam mams ma 'am parnams semapa' ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sanas dang 'dzum/ dban gshesas pa'i sa sa ma ma rnam pa sa
302b2(dkon brtsegs): rnamam dad par dang / yid ces/ rab tu rtog/ sams mi byed/ the tshom meg/ rgya cher dga' masus rangs pa nad cing / nam ma kha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ dam pa rmang
302b3(dkon brtsegs): nas myed do// denas pamamaldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas ngan 'di bka' stsal nas/ sbyin pa yang 'di ska gsung ngo // 'dren pa la ni 'khrul ba yang ma dang / lus dang ngag rnams pa
302b4(dkon brtsegs): ni sems mi ga so// de bzhin srog chags rnams la chos ston te// de ni rnams kyi ma 'dzes chos/ khyengs par mi 'gyur te// khong zo rjes su chags las mngon par 'das// nyam mongs mengs
302b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing can mongs grol// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyis ma 'dres ches// 'dren pa la ni dran pa bsrel ba med// rnam mthar spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen// so so yang dag dri/
302b6(dkon brtsegs): pa sel ba med de// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsol// 'chag dang mnal ba na yang mnyam par gzhag
302b7(dkon brtsegs): gnagayeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems can la// tha dad 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med/
302b8(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de dag la ni ma rtogs btang snyoms med// shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab bsgoms pas//
303a1(dkon brtsegs): de la nog dang rnam par rtog med de/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med/ ston pa rtag tu snying rjer ba sbyor zhing // sems
303a2(dkon brtsegs): can rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ nam yang brtson 'grus las mi rnams pa med// 'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas// lus dang /
303a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ni yid kyi 'dul// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// byang chub snying pos sangs rgyas byang chub par// de ni dran pa rnam par chud mi za// gang chos rtogs pa de na
303a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs bya min// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rtogs pa med cing rnam par rtog med par// rang byang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas te// chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam
303a5(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dzes chos// 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyis ni rabaskon cing // sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen te// de dag la ni bsam bzhin chos kyang chad
303a6(dkon brtsegs): ngani rnams se ma 'dres chos// can thos rnams kyi rnams grol sra byor 'gro// rang rgyal gyi ni rgyu rkyen 'du shes te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam me khyab// chags
303a7(dkon brtsegs): las rnam 'das med namama' bzhin// sems kyi rgyad 'di rang bzhin rnamam// dmas ni sngon nas bcings par gyur pa med// 'a rnam thal dkyur rgyam na//
303a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal brnams kyi ma 'dzes nas// gzhags dang bzugs dang zang zer 'jug pa dang // spyod sa ma ngas ni mtha mas kyang 'jug/ sangs rgyas rnams kying ba byung bzang ba dang /
303b1(dkon brtsegs): bar dadang 'od tha sa par 'dul bar byags// semam can ming pon pa ni ga 'od gtang me/ khrol chags bye bamang po de gyur te// 'od kyis rig pa dag ni 'jam par 'gyur// 'a
303b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rang ba ni gsung gcig brjod pas na// sems can mang ba bzhin du gsung thos so// zag cal bu'i gsung yang thos// ngo rgyas ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos
303b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi ni ngan pa'i las byas te// kha'i bar gshegs la sems la cung zad med// sems can bsams la ye shes rjes su bzhugs// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chom
303b4(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te// spobs pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu ba med// nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos
303b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus su de yi ye shes zhugs// 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam byed shes pa yi// chos rnams kun la bsgrib pa med par 'jug/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos
303b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du// 'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang // de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus
303b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta ning // de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen// de'i sems ni g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos
303b8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar lam gang 'jug par gyur ba dag/ thams cad rgyal ba'i chags med rab tu mkhyen// 'dren pa'i spyod yul nam mkha' lta bu ste// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dzes chos
304a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa/ bco brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' 'dra bar ni/ dad mkhas byang chub
304a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' da par byed/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam
304a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na/ seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/
304a4(dkon brtsegs): lba'am/ bdud dam/ sras kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// shA ri'i bu'i ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di bsam gyis mi
304a5(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtag/ sam nyi med/ the tshom miza/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes
304a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dko mchog brtsegs pa chen pa'i mad ngam po brgyad pa/
304a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan langa' ri'i bu sar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snang du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i snga snod kyi sa
304a8(dkon brtsegs): nam grangs kyi slo rig/ sangs rgyas kyitshas rnams kyi snang ba nas/ de chung drag gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lam yang dag par rab tun nas// das pasam
304b1(dkon brtsegs): zurnam grangs 'dis kyang / de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sdod du rig nas/ ranga'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub kyi
304b2(dkon brtsegs): lam yang dag par rab tu ston pa de ltar rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu ldan byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ zo che 'i'i dus
304b3(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes
304b4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du bung ste/ gang 'dir ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du ba
304b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gi mngon par shes pas/ mngon sum du
304b6(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bsrubs nas gnas so// de chos ldan te/ tshangs par myong pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa
304b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas du
304b8(dkon brtsegs): po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag 'dun cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems can thams
305a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pas stag go// sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhib byung ngo //
305a2(dkon brtsegs): yang sha ri'i bu che rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa/ mod pa bde ba/ lo legs pa dga' ba/ 'gro ba mang ba dang
305a3(dkon brtsegs): mis gang zhig yod de/ yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i zong khyer gnon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sman gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas
305a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang ning rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/
305a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ga ri'i bu de'i dus na gnon nu brtson 'grus spyong btsun mo'i 'khor dang / lhan cig tu bskyed mos tshal gyi sang byung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa la
305a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung ba chen pos// e ma'o gzhan nu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde gnod kyi rnams grangs kyi snong nga// e mra'o gan nu brtson 'grus spyad
305a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin/ sangs kyichos kyi rnamathangs kyi snang nganas des riganas/ snyid mamatsham gyis sa gas ba dang / n+na 'tshan 'grus byung dgel ba de sang me byin nas/ steng tshanam
305a8(dkon brtsegs): la bzhugs te/ gzhon du brtson 'grus myong la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe no/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byam/
305b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / pharos byin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsgru 'a dngam pa rnams kyi kyis su 'jug pa ma/ don byang chub kyi la ma zhes bya'o// ngal sems cathams cams byams pa gang nam
305b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la gnan nu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do// sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhen/ nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa
305b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo// gnon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
305b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris nas gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can grang yang med do// 'di lta ste gnon nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du gzhon nu byung
305b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i byams pa sgom pa yang dpag tu med do// gzhon nu de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas// sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha
305b6(dkon brtsegs): yas so// gzhon nu yang sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gis/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams ni de ltar ma yin mod kyis/ 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can
305b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams tshad med pa ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
305b8(dkon brtsegs): lho dang nub dang byang dang de bzhin du/ phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya
306a1(dkon brtsegs): tshor gyur pas rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs brtag pa bzung ste/ de la sems can gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ rgyang btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos
306a2(dkon brtsegs): chus zigs pa gcig blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis pa blangs/ gzhan yang sems can ga
306a3(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar btsal ba'i sgra'i rtse mes chu'i thigs pa gsum pa blangs nas/ gzhon nu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po
306a4(dkon brtsegs): zad par gyur kyang / sems can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar/ dpag tu med cing / de ltar mtha' yas pa/ de thams cad la byang chub
306a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do// gnon nu de'i skam du sems gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i'i tshang bzung bar rus sam/ gsal ba bcom
306a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so// gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni ngas
306a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin te/ gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag bsgrub pa yin/ gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems meng pa/ za ba dang gnong sems kyi rtsa ba dang bral ba/
306a8(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'joms pa/ rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ dad pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad lazhes par lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med par/ lus dang ngag
306b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bams par bskyed pa/ gnad kyi gnod par bya ba thams cad tu ma ltung ba 'jigs pa thams cad dang thal ba/ 'phags pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ gshe dang / khas pa la dang pa sred pa
