306b2(dkon brtsegs): chus thams cad las bral ba/ dbyig pa dang mtshon ma mthogs pa/ sems can rab tur bar bya ba la dga' ba/ khang po bams cad dang thal ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang khabs pa dang /
306b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dred pa dang bzhag spangs thabs thams cad thal pa/ rang gi rnyed pa dang / bkur mi dang / tshigs su gcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pas phyag byas pa/ rang gis
306b4(dkon brtsegs): brjid kyis brtan pa/ mkhas pas bslang ba/ byis pa thams cad rjes su bzung ba/ tshangs pas lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dzes pa/ mthar pa'i lam gyi
306b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa/ zag pa thams cad kyis yang dag par gzung ba/ zang ring med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i 'amad nams bya ba'i dngas pa thams
306b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams shing mtshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang mya ngan
306b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i lam thams cad tu 'gro ba/ ngan sang thams cad dang mi kham pa brgyad las bzlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad
306b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbang po dang rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul khring
308a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde
308a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jushes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin gyi logasang ba
308a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir chos bstan to// zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang gnon nu byang chub sems dpa'i phyin ci log gi 'dod pa
308a4(dkon brtsegs): la srid pa'i sems can de dag ma la g.yem pa dang sring mo la yang g.yem pa mthong na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni/
308a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba ste// mu cor smra bas yongs su gang zhing ngo mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo // 'di lta ste/ ma'i rum ma'i mngal gyi mal na/ 'dug 'du
308a6(dkon brtsegs): sde/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung ba la/ de nyid dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa sbyin par byed pa lha ga la srid mangs gcig na san cig tu 'dug 'jug pa'i sring mad
308a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra shing la khrig pa byed pa lta ga la srid te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni brlag go// rnam par brlag go// rab tu brlag go// 'dod chags kyis g.yen sgrol
308a8(dkon brtsegs): sdang yis ga men gyi'o// ga'i tsug gi g.ye gyur// mi zhes pa'i g.yem bya'o// chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// me 'thun pa ma
308b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spyod do// sems na dngas pa'i spyong phul ba'o// dud 'acwor myong yul ba'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod yul ba'o// log pa'i lam la spyod yul ba'o snyam mo// gnon nu 'di
308b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga sre dper na/ wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhigan mtshan mo khyis gces nas g.yang sa chen po nas ltung ba de bzhin du/ gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang grwa dang 'dra'o//
308b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu 'di sa ste dper na/ dmus long khyis gtses na/ g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kye ma'o/ gnor sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o// gnan nu
308b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lnga ste dper na/ phag ni mi gtsang ba za zhing / mi gtsang ba la spyod g.yul ba ste/ gzhon nu kye ma'o de bzhin du/ sems can 'di dag kyang phrag dang 'dra ste/ de nyid ma yin te/ de
308b5(dkon brtsegs): sring mo yin na de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid snyam ste/ sems can nyon mongs g.yer spyod pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba/ bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang / bdud
308b6(dkon brtsegs): zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i dam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to// zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po
308b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa lngas sgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa mig gis
308b8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mthong na/ mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / rna bas sgra/ snas dri/ lces ro// lus kyis reg pa reg nas/ mtshan mar 'dzin cing
309a1(dkon brtsegs): / mngon rtags su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ kye ma 'o sems can 'di dag ni khong khro ba mang zhing phan tshur mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza' bor yang mi shes/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyi
309a2(dkon brtsegs): ni gcig la gcig gsad do// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni gnyid dmyags pa mang bste/ rgan cing zong pa/ mi shes pa'i ling dag gis khyebs cing mi dge ba'o// khyer
309a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas bskor ba te/ blo bur gi nyin mongs pa'i sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// khyima'i sems can 'di dag mi makyar bas kun nam panan
309a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnye zetsam gyis yongs su dkris pa/ chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/ de dkris bsgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to// nas sems can rnams la byang
309a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems pa'i snying rje chen po 'dug go// gnon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis gnon pa/ che ba'i nga rgyal gyis gnon pa/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal
309a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnon pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnon pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnon pa/ cung zad skam pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnon pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnan pa/ dmar
309a7(dkon brtsegs): babs bdag za bar sems pa/ mtshungs pa bas kyang bdas ches lhag pa rtsa ba/ ded ma gzugs la bdas ces mkhas len pa nas/ rnam par shes pani bal bangs
309a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas len pa/ khong du mdud par yong dun mam thu shes pa/ bum par sla bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/ phyag bya bar 'os pa la byas mi 'tshal ba/ na
309b1(dkon brtsegs): bdang gcad pal mi 'drang ba/ thams ma tha ma byed pa/ mkhas pa la dpe pa yang / mang pa dang / bsnyen par bya ba gang / baben par mi bya ba gang / byab pa thu
309b2(dkon brtsegs): lan ma mtha ba dang bcas pa gangapa/ kharnamapa mang bgang / lam pang / ting nge 'dzin pang / rnam par thal ba gang / zhes mdzo ba zung / bdas rnam tsham gon
309b3(dkon brtsegs): dra rlom sems byed pa mthong na/ 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// mnon
309b4(dkon brtsegs): nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcings pa sred pas 'khol pa/ chung ma dang bu pho dang bums zin pa gnod pas zin pa/ don med pas zin pa/ 'khor ba'i gtan pas
309b5(dkon brtsegs): zin pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gzhin rje'i 'jig rten gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i bcings pas zin pa rang nyams med pa/ rang ngadabang med pa'i sems
309b6(dkon brtsegs): can mthong na/ de dag rang nyams dang rang dbang dang gang du 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to zhes/ sems can rnams la byang chub
309b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i shes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs thos 'khor ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos
309b8(dkon brtsegs): gnon pas/ mi dge ba'i las la chags pa 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa len pa dang / 'dod par log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngasu
310a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdub
310a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dge ba'i las bzlog pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste/ spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan no// sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa
310a3(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa mun rag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/ bdag dang sems
310a4(dkon brtsegs): nan dang / srog dang skyeb po dang / shing las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin dang / nga yir 'dzin pa
310a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis mig rnam par sbyong zhing lta bar gyur pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes/ sems
310a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i ming rje chen po 'drug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khar ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na/ de dag pu
310a7(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga'i gang ma las rab tu thar bar bya ba dang / 'khar ba'i 'bras dgan pa las rab tu bzung dang / khams gsum thams cad las 'dan pa'i phyir chos bstan thams
310a8(dkon brtsegs): sems rnams la 'ob tumar bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming rjechen pa'i drug so// bzhin du byang chub sems dpas/ sems can 'khrugs par gyur
310b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa mun 'dang / khas pa las bu mi drang badrang bskur chos pa 'jig rten pa 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/ 'jig rten pa rol nas 'jig rten 'di kun tuchug cing / 'bang balnga
310b2(dkon brtsegs): bal phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar/ 'gro ba la phyir ltas pa mthong na/ de dag gi mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes/ sems can rnams la byang chub
310b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sems can gyi khams mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go/
310b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang g.yo ba med par 'jug go// lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug
310b5(dkon brtsegs): go/ lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang drang po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go/ sems gya gyu med pa'i sems la shin tu gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i
310b6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po de yang gya gya med par 'jug go/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la 'dud pa dang phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu bla'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba
310b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'jug go/ 'di lnga ste bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir nga'i snying rje chen po de yang pha rol rjes su srung bar 'jug go/ 'di la sge g.yo zhing
310b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug go// 'di lta ste pha rol bde ba sbyin pa
311a1(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje che
311a2(dkon brtsegs): bo de yang sems can thams cad kyi 'chakhar khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'dun
311a3(dkon brtsegs): 'o// gzhon nu 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po 'byung zhes bya'o//
311a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims byed pa dang / bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po sra
311a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir ming rje chen po zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa byed pa dang / yang dag par blang ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o// dbang po dang / skabs dang / byang chub kyis
311a6(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i las dang / mthar gyis snyoms par 'dug pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / tshig de thams cad kyis rgyas par bya'o// snying
311a7(dkon brtsegs): chen pa na da byung ba'i migs rtsub par byed pas pa'i bur ming nga chen banas byal// rang sa rtsub dang sems par byung ba brub dang / mi 'byung ba'i bya ba dang /
311a8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la bya ba ci yong snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ 'di ni byang
311b1(dkon brtsegs): drub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas sems can 'di'ang ba'i gnas/
311b2(dkon brtsegs): zab pa mthong na de dag la snying brtse ba dang / seng rje'i sems skyed de// de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams drang ba dang / rjes su dra
311b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi bum pa dang / mi 'gong ba dang / yongs su mi rtse ba dang / mi dga' ba thams cad spong ba dang /
311b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu bsil ba dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu dga' ba dang / de bzhin du
311b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyun kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos
311b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos mgu ba dang / sems can rnams la khong tho ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya
311b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la mos pa dang / nyi che ba'i theg pa sel bar sems bskyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang / tshul
311b8(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal pa dag sdud cing byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ ngan 'gro dang 'jigs pa
312a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las rab tu dga' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngar du zer ba dang / ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod pa'i rab tu dga' ba
312a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lag pa dang rkang pa dang / mig dang mgo gcod kyang bzod par nus ste/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / rkar rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang /
312a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer med cing gsong par smra ba la dga' ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs spongs med pa la rab tu dag
312a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rab tu ston pa bzhin du 'brangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du 'phangs
312a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / bla mal pa ma bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / slob dngan
312a6(dkon brtsegs): la mig bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gangs pa mgo bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la lag pa dang rkang pa bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / chos smra
312a7(dkon brtsegs): 'arin po cha thams cad bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / yul ni can par byang ba la sa pa bzhin du dngas par sems par/ gartson du'ang mngapa' banas byar//
312a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga bdal rab tu gnas nas/ rtag tuchas 'tshal ba ladapa' bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i slad pa srung ba la mama'am
312a9(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs tshol la sngam bzhin du 'phangs par
312b1(dkon brtsegs): des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms gang zhen/ btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhen 'dis ste/ son mongs pa la 'dang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang
312b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o// de la tshan mongs pa'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang bsnyen bkur byas kyang mthor mi
312b3(dkon brtsegs): sems pa dang / bkur sti byas kyang dam par mi sems pa dang / rnyed pas skems pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pas yi mi chad pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'al
312b4(dkon brtsegs): bal blo ma 'am pa dang / grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang / spang ba la yi mi gsang ba dang / bstod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang
312b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stobs dang / rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang // khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mdza' ba la sem
312b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / gnyis su byed pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la mi lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pal
312b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / sman par smra ba dang mi snyan pas sba ba la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs su mdza' ba
312b8(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems rab 'bring tha ma la 'od gzir mnyam pa dang / bsngags pa dang ma bsngags
313a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang / bden pa dang mi bden pa la bdag gi bden pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar gang bdag la/ gnod par byed pa de la
313a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no// de la bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang nyin lag gi sha gcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no//
313a3(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang nying lag gis gcad kyang 'dod pa med cing 'tshal ba med de btang snyoms yin no// lus kyang mi 'gyur/ ngag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyis pa bzod pas de'i phyir btang
313a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa zhes bya'o// mig kyi rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis kyang rma mi byin pa nas yid kyi rnam pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pa de
313a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// ma mi byin cing sdang ba med pas bla'ang snyoms shes bya'o// rdza byang ba la rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// bdag dang pha rol gnyis la
313a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems ni
313a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sems nges par dag pa'o// btang snyoms mi bdag las mar dag pa'o// bsang snyoms ni gnan la gnang pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang rnams
313a8(dkon brtsegs): ma par bdag pa'i da ngas pa ma/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub mams dpa' thams dpa' chen thas bdang rnams pa mnga' bar mi mad du// daci sbyin rgya/
313a9(dkon brtsegs): pa btang snyoms ni 'artsod pa med pa lhur byed
313b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dag tu 'bang bar bya'o// rtag par rgyan mi 'chad par dge ba yongs su brtson par byas/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// des dus dus su 'ang
313b2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms rnam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snong ma yin pa'i sems can la btang sems pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang skams pa dang / mi rnyed pa la dang smad pa dang / ma
313b3(dkon brtsegs): grams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang / nyon mongs can thos pa'i thel pa nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i dus ma tshul
313b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bsgrubs pa btang snyems pa dang / tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus nye bar
313b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrubs pa btang sems pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa btang snyams pa dang / bsam gtan gyi du so na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa
313b6(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / shes rab kyi dus na pha ral tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa nye bar sgrub pa'i btang sems pa ste/ 'di ni dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// de ltar gang
313b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'din btang snyoms nas bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i thams cad la btang sems su byed de// gnon nu 'di ni byang chub
313b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / ming rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
314a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mdor bstan pa
314a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas/ rgyas par brtan pa dang bcas te/ rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod des zos nas pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par
314a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi le'u selnga pa'o// de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/
314a4(dkon brtsegs): bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod do// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin
314a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
314a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so// 'di la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chu
314a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / 'phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di la sde zas kyis 'phongs pa la zas/ skom gyis 'phongs pa la skom gnan
314a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zas dang sras dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang gnas dang / ma byad dang / na ba'i sman dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / zan po dang / zan mo dang /
314b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang bre'ur dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byang ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / na dang glang po che dang / shing na dang / skyed mos tshal dang /
314b2(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba rnams
314b3(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / rtse ba dang / dga' ba thams cad dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang rus pa dang
314b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba med do// sbyin pa de rnam pa bcu'i yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa
314b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ mi mthun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
314b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jigs shing sdug sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su btang ba la 'gron tu gnyer ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su
314b7(dkon brtsegs): gdong du blta zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems tha dad par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med
314b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsdang ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing 'tshel zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems
315a1(dkon brtsegs): gzham yang ka ri'i du bya chum dpa la skyes pa de gzhan rnam pa 'dus yongs su ngas par sbyin mor byen
315a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la sbyin gnas pa yin zhing bskas shing sbyin pa med/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin pa byed
315a3(dkon brtsegs): do// bcu gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med de/ byang chub
315a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyob pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstar nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rjes su mi dga' ba
315a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bkur te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems
315a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams la 'tshal pa la brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med/ shA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam
315a7(dkon brtsegs): bde bcus/ yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de dag gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su ngas par smin par byed de/
315a8(dkon brtsegs): bcug zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la spang nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
315a9(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs shing sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang / phrag dag dang / gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mar mi byed par sbyin pa med/ rang gi la gnas ma yin par sbyin pa med/
315b1(dkon brtsegs): mi ma bsag pa las daza zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rnam pa bcas
315b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ bya
315b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la mi brtan pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshong 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongs su 'chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan gyi dring
315b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jog sde sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung za tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems
315b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa med
315b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smang ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
315b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par byed do// gzhan yang ga ri
315b8(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji tsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang /
316a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ sha ri bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang
316a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bza' ba byin pas che dang spobs pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang sred pa
316a3(dkon brtsegs): cad gsal ba/ phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// bzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// bgo ba sbyin pas khres
316a4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa dang / ngo cha shes shes pa dang / gser ltar mdog yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// sras dang 'bring ba 'byin pas tshul khrims dang
316a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dri dang byug pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob por 'gyur ro// ji rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang / byug pa byin pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim
316a6(dkon brtsegs): po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// de byin pas ro za ba'i nang ma mchog gir zla ba'i sras bu chen po'i mtshan snyam cu tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// gnas byin pa
316a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang rten dang / gling dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu zab bo// nang pa la sman byin pas min ma 'chishi ba med
316a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bde ba yangs su rdzogs pa phran sumatshogs pa rab tu thapa'o// ma byang sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyims kyim byad yangs su rnags pa
316b1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs par btum bas/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas/ deser sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/
316b2(dkon brtsegs): gnan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phan yon gzhan bcu rab tu thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mar me byin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga yongs su
316b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa phun supa tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// sil stan byin pa lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang /
316b4(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang rin po che thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// rlon po
316b5(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob po// rta dang glang po che dang / shing
316b6(dkon brtsegs): byin pas rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dang / che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// skyed mos tshal dang dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par
316b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab du thob po// nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba byin pas/ chos rin
316b8(dkon brtsegs): bo che thams cad kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// zan po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi byin pas rang rnams dang / rang dbang
317a1(dkon brtsegs): dang // rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// bu bo dang / bu mo byin pas mdza' ba dang / sdug pa dang / 'dod pa bla na me dang yang dag par
317a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab du 'thob bo// gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams
317a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rab du thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin pa
317a4(dkon brtsegs): phan yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
317a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// dga' ba'i rtsed mo thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang / rtse ba yongs su dag pa phun sum
317a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// gang pa byin pas chos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// lag byin pas sems can thams cad la
317a7(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi lag parab tu sbyin pa yongs su rdzobs baphun sum tshogs pa rab tu thod bo// na ba dang / sa byon pas dbang po ma chang bamed cing mongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs par btuthom po/
317a8(dkon brtsegs): man 'as shing ga byi ngas pa mtho ba med cing 'dzes pa'i yan lagasangs rgyas kyi su mongs su rdzogs pa phun su mchogs parab tu 'tho ba// mig byin pas sems can thamam thas
317b1(dkon brtsegs): tsas kyi mig sgrib pa yongs su dag paphun sum tshogs par rab tu thob bo// sha dang zug byin pas sems cad thams cad kyi lus dang srog snying po med len pas che bar 'phob la mangs paphun su btsogs
317b2(dkon brtsegs): bar btu 'thab bo// dang byin pas rdo rje ltar mishigs pa'i lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thor bo// yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dzin
317b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi mchog blan med cing lhag la med pa'i thams cad mthon pa'i me shes yong du chung pa yongs su rdzogs bdun sum tshogs par btu thob ste/ shA ri'i bu brang chub sems dpa' byung chu 'dod pas
317b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang ba ni
317b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod// bdud rtsi 'dod/ snying po 'dod/ byang chub 'dod/ yang shA ri'i bu mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni/ bla na med
317b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lado gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do// 'di lta ste shA ri'i bu khyim
317b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag chun pa ning skam la gnas nas ba lang dang / gnam sdod ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo ba go rdzogs par byas te/ sa bon btab nas rnam grangs des gshol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang dngul
317b8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'grub bo// dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'bru dang mtshungs pa'i nor med do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig
318a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do// 'di lta ste
318a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bubs rtsa skam po dang gsher ba zos pa dang / chu grang mo dang dron mo thungs pa de las 'om grub ste/ no dang mar sar dang mar gyi snying po yang grub bo// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sem
318a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa byin na/ de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongs su
318a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grung bo// brgya byin dang tshangs pa yang 'grub bo// gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
318a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su 'grub bo// las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo// las stong gis grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang
318a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'grub bo// las brgyas 'grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan cig yongs su 'grub bo// las nis brgyas grub pa'i gtsug tor spyi bo
318a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bo// rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung chen po yang 'grub bo// rnam par dbye ba dang yon tan brgya drag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems
318a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ther ba lags pa dang bzhag med pa sgoms shing dkara' ba yang yongs su 'grub ste/ de la tshi ga ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras burnam
318b1(dkon brtsegs): sbed pas dngon par 'grub bo// yang shA ri'i bu gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye sbed du sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi ring po rin rgyud mi 'chad
318b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gcig 'grub ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa spu'i bu ga re re nas ting nge 'dzin brgya gang+gA'i rgyud ltar mngon par
318b3(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa mdzad do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi byin bya ba thams cad la dbang thob bo// shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhir gshegs pa/ sngon byang
318b4(dkon brtsegs): chu ba sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang / byang chub 'dod pa dang / mya ngan las
318b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa 'dod pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin par byed do// shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag
318b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam
318b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa/ gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mos zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/
318b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
319a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag bcur gyur to// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni dgra bcom pa nor mongs pa med
319a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/ dgra bcom pa sha stag gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de'i tshe thag pa zhes bya ba
319a3(dkon brtsegs): thags thag pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi
319a4(dkon brtsegs): las byed do// de nyin par las byas nas nub khar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe/ rtag tu dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas ras kyi kha car gcig
319a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bul zhing 'di skad ces gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i gnas kyi/ bcom ldan 'das langs kyi la car rdul pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba des/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdub thams cad dang
319a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces/ des rim gyis ras kyi bcar stong lnga brgya bur te/ des bskal 'bye ba zim byar ngan 'phru
319a7(dkon brtsegs): log par srung bar mthong ngo // dge ba'i na bgrod kyis 'khor lo myung ba'i rgyal po zla ba zag sung myong ngo // de dge ba'i chub de byed kyis/ ngan byin gyi bdag 'a bye ba thag cu byung ngo // dge
319a8(dkon brtsegs): 'a pa ma pa med nga ba dang dza'ilam da kyisasangs rgyas kyi thag pang shes par byas te/ des thams pad la mag dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / 'byung ba dang / rgyas
319b1(dkon brtsegs): dang // bye ba dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / zhal bas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis ste bskang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo
319b2(dkon brtsegs): byas nas mchod do// de byis bskal ba grangs med pa zhig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshes/
319b3(dkon brtsegs): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so// de'i dgra
319b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu'i ngag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa
319b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// des chos bstan te/ sems can grangs med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya
319b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das so// de ltar bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'das nas/ lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so// de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu
319b7(dkon brtsegs): ngad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba bzhin no// shA ri'i bu ras kyi kha tsar phul ba dang / sems bskyed pas kyang / mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos/
319b8(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu sems ni rgya che'i sbyin pa ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bu gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni sbyin bdag gtsab mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur/ nges sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs/
320a1(dkon brtsegs): sum sbyangs so// shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas te/ thams cad yongs su thob par gyur pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin
320a2(dkon brtsegs): banyung yang mang por byed do// ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do// shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do// bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag du med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
320a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/ longs spyod mtho ris 'dod ma yin gyi/ bla na med pa'i
320a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir// depyir snyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur// grags dang ni brjod pa dag dang sgra dang / g.yog dang bde ba nam yang mi 'dod cing / 'chi 'bo'i skye 'i kun kyang mi 'dod de/
320a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zas dang skom dang chos gos gang byin pa/ srid pa'i 'gro ba'i don phyir ma yin te// sbyin pas 'chi ba med pa'i sgo stsal phyir// des ni sra rtse tsam yang sbyin pa sbyin/
320a6(dkon brtsegs): byang ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur// g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong // de dag le lonam yang yod min te// de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spong // rgyal ba'i srid dang 'khor dang
320a7(dkon brtsegs): ga nga // de dag ses ni ban dzu 'gyur / rkyen sa dpa che rnyed pa gyur// rkyen dang nga la byang chu rji dbyung // bdang padang ga slang /
320a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la de bzhin te// gang gis byang chub spyod mchog spyad pa rnams// sbyin mo dag tu thag dgo med par 'gyur// de dag mthong nas mtho ste// ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin dusmra/
320b1(dkon brtsegs): ming 'dod mi
320b2(dkon brtsegs): mimang 'dag dang rtag 'ang 'ding // sreg pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin// de la dngos po gang yod pa// spong ba la ni sri ba med// chos ni 'dod par 'gyur te// 'byung ba rtag tu sme byed cing /
320b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed// 'dod la rkam pa ma gtogs par// su zhig rgyal srid 'dod par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyal srid mi 'dod cing // mtho ris bde ba 'dod pa yin// sangs rgyas
320b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongs tshol zhing // grags pa chen po'i sbyin pa sbyin// bdag dang nor rdzas gnan dag kyang // mang po myur du gtong ba ni// de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog/ nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur
320b5(dkon brtsegs): ro/ mkhas pa gzugs ni mi 'dod de// longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin// mtho ris dag kyang de mi 'dod// myang nganas 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma yin// lam shes lam la mkhas pa dang // gang dag
320b6(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyur pa la brten pa dag tu mi byed de// srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i
320b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dgu pa/
320b8(dkon brtsegs): de la gang la yang brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pas 'gyur ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang de na/ shA ri'i
320b9(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di gsum ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par spyod pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs
321a1(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa'o// 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhen/ 'di la na ri'i bubyang chub sems dpa' ni srog gcod baspangs pa yin/ mkhyen pa len pa
321a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ zlas
321a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag rngub po dang / tshig 'khrul ba spangs pa spang yin te/ 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni ri las sems med/ gnod
321a4(dkon brtsegs): sems med cing yang dag par lnga ba yin te/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de 'di snyam du sems te/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang // ngag gis legs par spyod pa
321a5(dkon brtsegs): gang// yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang yin snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ lus kyi las gang srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par gas
321a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma byas pa de ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa zhes bya'o// snyam mo// de la ngag gis legs par spyad pa gang zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngag gi las gang brdzun du smra ba dang /
321a7(dkon brtsegs): mdang/ ngagazu po dang / tshig 'tshal ba ma smras pa de ni dag gis legs par spyad pag shes bya'o// ma mo// de'i yid kyis migs par spyad pa gang shen/ de mam du mams /
321a8(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi las gang brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba ma byas pa de ni yid kyi las legs par spyad pa zhes bya'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar rdul bzhin mo ser rtog ste/ las
321b1(dkon brtsegs): dbus kyis mabyas pa dang / las gang dag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de dag/ bdags par rus sam/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis rtog pan/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ las gang lam
321b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang dag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de/ sngon po'am/ ser po'am/ dmar po'am/ dkar po'am/ lebargan nam/ shel gyi 'jig du gdags par mi nus te/
321b3(dkon brtsegs): thig gis shes par bya ba ma yin/ rnabs shes par bya ba ma yin/ snas shes par bya ba ma yin/ lces shes par shes par bya ba ma yin/ lus kyis shes par bya ba pa yin/ yid kyis shes
321b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni skyes pa ma yin/ bskyed pa ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ zin pa ma yin te/ de ni las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no// de 'di
321b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ tshul khrims de ni gang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa de la gdags pa gang yang med do// gang gdags pa med pa de la bdag mngon par
321b6(dkon brtsegs): chags par mi bya'o// de 'di ltar legs par spyad pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // gang gi tshul khrims de dang tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba de la yang dag par rjes su
321b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ngo // de de ltar mthong bas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba gang gis tshul khrims sam/ 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi mthong
321b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar ma mthong bas sdom pa dang cho ga dang / spyod pa dang / spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/ shes bzhin du spyod pas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de bdag tu dmigs shing
322a1(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod pha rol tu dmigs shing mi spyod de/ de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no// bdag tu dmigs na tshul khrims su dmigs
322a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur gyi/ gang bdag tu mi dmigs pa de ni tshul khrims su mi dmigs so// gang tshul khrims su mi dmigs pa de ni/ bslab pa nyams par mi byed de/ gang bslab pa nyams par mi byed pa de
322a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims nyams par mi byed/ de tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin te to// des gzhan lus chos thams cad shes so// gzhan yang gang yin pa de la bdag med do// gang bdag med pa de la ci
322a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig yongs su gzung bar bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// lus kyis dag cing dag gis dag pa dang / yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod pa
322a5(dkon brtsegs): dag/ dag pa'i rdul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan// shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di// gang dag srung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma'os//
322a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas// de ni mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan zhes bya// gang dag ma byas ma bskyed ma len pa// de la kha dog med cing dbyibs kyang med// gang la 'a dog med cing
322a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs med pa// de la gdags pa nam yang ni dmigs so// drug tu rdul khrims ma byas 'dus ma byas/ de ni mig gis blta bar mi ngas te// na bsna dang lde yis zhes ma yin/ lus
322a8(dkon brtsegs): dang yid kyis shes par bya ma yin// gang de dbang pos shes par mi nus pa// de yi snying rje 'jug par nus ma yin// de ltar tshul khrims yongs dag mthong bde// nam yang tshul khrims
322b1(dkon brtsegs): rnags par 'gyur te// rdu la khrims ldan nes yid kyis mi sems shing // bdag tu 'dzin pas rgyal khribs mi srung ste/ tshul khris srung yang tshul khrims 'jugs da// don rjem
322b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan byang chub spyad pastod// rdzogs pa la ni lta ba gang sel ba// de ni lta bar nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// gang la lha med de la gnas med de// tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims de mi skems/
322b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes kyi tshul la 'jug pa gang yin de/ de'i chog bsam du med par 'gyur// rab tu byung zhing rab tu bsrungs pa ni// tshul khrims ldan te gzhan la rtsod mi byed// bdag med 'du shes rdul khrims
322b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs te/ bdag med de la tshul khrims dmigs pa'ang med// bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang snyems pa// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i mtha' zhes ngas bshad do// bdag med smra ba tshul
322b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims gnas ma yin// bdag med sba ba tshul khrims sems ma yin// bdag med smra ba tshul khrims gang rtogs ma yin// tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims skyon med pa// bdag ni tshul
322b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan zhes mi gleng ngo // gang la bdag med tshul khrims 'du shes pa'i// shes rab zab mo byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jigs med gang dag tshul khrims 'chal par de mi 'gyur/ thams cad
322b7(dkon brtsegs): chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa// de yi tshul khrims de ni 'phags pas bsngags// byis pa gang dag bdag tu lta gnas te// bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhing khri mas srung zhing // bsrungs nas
322b8(dkon brtsegs): nas tshul khrims 'bras bu myong ba de/ ngan 'gro gsum po kun las mi bar to// gang dag bdag tu lta ba kun spangs pa// de ni nga dang nga des bya mi 'byung // tshul khrims ldan pa de la lnga med de//
323a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni phyir yang log lhung mi 'jigs so// 'di 'dra ba yi tshul khrims gang shes pa// de la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims blta mi nus// srid pa gsum na nges bdag
323a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong na// khrims dang rul 'tshal mthong 'gyur smos ci dgos// shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam par chos bcu 'dus par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ dad
323a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang // brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya chen po la dad pa dang / 'phags pa la ldang ba
323a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang / slong dpon la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos 'chol ba la 'jug par byed pa dang / byang chub yongs su 'chol zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar byed pa ste/
323a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa chos bcu po de dag 'dus par 'gyur ro// de chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par
323a6(dkon brtsegs): bsrung // dge ba'i chos gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ legs par spyod pa gsum po 'di dag nyid de/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o// legs par spyod pa gsum thod dag
323a7(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'od dag ni/ de'i byang chub gang dang / 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su 'tshal lo//
323a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lado tshas nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di ga ces bya'o// sangs rgyas dag gis bklags pa'i// dge pa'i las rnams lum gyi byed// gang las thos pa da 'gyur ba'i// slong ba
323b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yang rim gro byed// sems can thams cad don gyi phyir// byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med// chos la brtsams te gang zag la// ri mo dag ni rab tu byed// ngag ni shin tu sdo
323b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te// de ni mi snyan tshig ma smra// 'di ni 'dun dang ldan pa'i mtshan// nam du'ang ngag rngub mi smra'o// yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur// nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod de// byams sems
323b3(dkon brtsegs): gus dang bcas pa'i// bsam pa nyid kyis rtag tu lta// rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur nas// chos 'di la ni gus dang bcas// chos la gus par byas pas na/ myur du byang chub rnam 'chang
323b4(dkon brtsegs): bya// chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos yongs su tshol ba// slob dpon la ni rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/
323b5(dkon brtsegs): zan nu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu skyed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye ma'o las 'di ni na bsre/ khams ni sbrul gdug pa
323b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rtag par phan tshun mi 'phrod pa'o// sdug bsngal mang ba'o// nyes pa mang ba'o// smyon pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang
323b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis gang ste/ nad dang 'dra zug rngu dang 'dra// chu bo dang 'dra/ gnod pa dang 'dra/ g.yo ba 'jig pa/ snying po med pa/ nyams chung ba/ shig shig po// yun
323b8(dkon brtsegs): thung ba/ skad cig pa/ dur khrod du 'jig pa ste/ snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo // snyam du sems bskyed pa bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
324a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'chol bas/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phul gang tsam yang bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gsheg
324a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo // khams ni sbrul gdug ma rungs par/ bzhi po gcig la gcig rten te/ re re yang ni 'khrugs pa las/ nang po che ni 'byung
324a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// mig nad dang ni rna nad dang // sna nad dang de bzhin du/ so nad ni chu nad rnams/ gzhan yang lus las 'byung bar 'gyur// smyo dang 'bras dang pol mig dang // me dpal
324a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yan pa rnams dang ni// nad gzhan rnam pa mang po dag/ lus las su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lus 'di nad dang mtshungs pa ste// lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o// lus ni gnod pa 'drab
324a5(dkon brtsegs): ste// yun thung skad cig 'dug pa'o// dur khror du ni 'gro ning 'jig/ mi brtan g.yo ba g.yo ba ste/ rab tu 'jig cing na ba dang // lus 'di rnag gis gang bste// shig shig po dang
324a6(dkon brtsegs): thun drung ba/ nag gis gang ba'i lus 'di mos// sangs rgyas kyin sku'i phyir// dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya// thams cad du ni rab bag pa// rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis/
324a7(dkon brtsegs): chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni skra 'grub bo// gang na gzhan gyis thos med pa// de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya// chang dag kyang gang sgrib dang // bsil ba dag kyang
324a8(dkon brtsegs): rang srung ba// lus 'di yang ni nang dang / 'chi ba dag gis banor par 'gyur// gang dag grang dang cha bzod pa// lus kyis bu ni thams cad du// skyes bu'i bya byed pa 'i/
324b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi lus ni 'thong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten grags pa'i bla ma la// rim gro dag ni rang bya ste// snying po med pa'i lus 'di la// snying po mdug ni rdungs par gyur// 'dzim du
324b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dang po 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su 'chol bas// slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de//
324b3(dkon brtsegs): than nu rdza gang tsam yang dbul mo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ drug tu dril ba dang / dkru ba dang / min pa dang /
324b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'bral ba'i chos can no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyis bum pa chung chad pa ste/ che chad byis pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig go
324b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di yang snying po med pa so ma btang ba'i snod bzhin te/ mthar 'jig pa'o shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gi yal ga'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras buji
324b6(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de thams cad kyang mthar ltung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med de 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i chos can no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper
324b7(dkon brtsegs): nar+tha'i rtse mo'i zil pa'i thigs pa ji snyed pa de cud kyang / nyi mas phog na ring por gnas so// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni stong po med pa ste/ zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin du ring
324b8(dkon brtsegs): bor mi gnas so// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu'i rgyun las lbu ba rdol pa yod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po med de/ rang
325a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis nyams chung ba'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ lbu brdol ba ltar rang bzhin gyis nya ba rdung ba'o// shA ri'i 'di lta ste
325a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ char 'bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye ning gzhan 'gag go// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ chu'i chu dung ltar rang bzhin gyis nyams chung ba'o// de ltar snying
325a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs yongs su 'chol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do//
325a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar rnga ma'i mkhan po yis// sa las snod rnams byas pa dag/ de dag
325a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mthar 'jig ste/ sems can srog kyang de dang 'dra// ji ltar shing gi yal ga yi// lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams// thams cad ltung ba'i chos can de// mi yi srog kyang de bzhin
325a6(dkon brtsegs): no// rdza mchog dag gi zil pa'i thigs// nyi mas yongs su bab pa na/ yud tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te// mi yi srog kyang de bzhin to// ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi// dbu nga rdol
325a7(dkon brtsegs): r+dz+dza ba// de sbyar dus nI \u0f7farmA ste// rnying po med pa lbu ba 'dra/ ris bya bdab pa sa// rdu'i chu bung skyes pa yang // nad cig gis ni 'jig gyur// de bzhin sa
325a8(dkon brtsegs): da ba da// snying rjem yi'i sring po rigs// snying po slong pom yin 'dzin// de dag la gnag spyad yul te/ gling ga nga du drad ma yin// snying po med pa rnying med// nga /
325b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyeng po shes pa ni// de dag yang dag rtags pa'i yul// snying po khong du chud pa yi// snying por bres byas gyur to// rnga gAng tsam gyi nu 'dul ba// snying po zad pa'i lus lam
325b2(dkon brtsegs): snying po dag ni len par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su 'chol bas/ slob dpon
325b3(dkon brtsegs): rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bor gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring pong dge pa'i
325b4(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dang bral zhing // mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/ le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun po log par lta ba ste/ mchod sbyin ma
325b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ sbyin sreg kyang med/ legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa brtsegs pa yang med par lta ba dang / 'dod papas zil gyis gnon te
325b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ 'di lta ste/ yi dgas kyi yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gsob ma
325b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ de na bdag yi dgas su 'gyur te/ lo mang po stong phrag mang po// lo brgya phrag
325b8(dkon brtsegs): mang por me ma mur za zhes chu'i sgra yang mi thos na/ lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni de ltar nyes par byas pas/ bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyis// sbyin gnas
326a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba byas shing / lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/
326a2(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon la rim gro bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang
326a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar grogs po sten pa dang // de dag yang dang yang bsnyen pas// de yang de dang 'dra bar
326a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangs// le lo che zhing brtson 'grus nyi mas// g.yo dang phrag dog ser sna can// byin pa
326a5(dkon brtsegs): yod par gang lta ba// thams cad du ni rnam spangs pas// bdag ni yi dgas skye gnas su// 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob bo// yun ring dus su 'khor ba yi// mun nag rung
326a6(dkon brtsegs): po 'jigs pa na// bkres pa dang sgom pas gzir// sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong // sbyin gnas rnams ni ma mthong zhing // bdag gis 'di 'drad la mthob// lon mang
326a7(dkon brtsegs): bstang rnams su// chu'i sa yang yong mthos// da ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na// shin tu dkon par brnyed de// bdag gis slo ba pon mnyes byas byas// dul ba 'byor
326a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bdag gis thob// sdig pa'i tshogs po rnam spangs pas// bdag gis dge pa'i bzhes gnyen rnyed// byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir// lus dang srog la mi lta'o/
326b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi'i byang drung phyir// slong dpon du ma mchon gnas la// rnam par dad pa'i sems kyis su/ bzhi snang gus par rab tubya// zhwa ba'i bu rims bskyed par mtsha
326b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su 'chol bas/ slong 'don la rim tho dang bsnyen bkur byed do// rngan du 'ong gang
326b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dngu lo// gzhan yang 'di'i du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar skyed de/ bdag yun ring ngor dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs rjes zin pas/ le lo can
326b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus 'ams pa/ snyom las can/ dran pas sems can la khu nur dang thal mos brdegs shing gces nas/ bsdus shing chongs bdon de de'i gni las sdig pa yang med /
326b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i gzhi las sdig byung ba yang med do// zhes de ltar lta ba dang / de ltar bzod pa dang / de ltar mos shing ni sdang gi zil gyis gnon pas/ mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par
326b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ 'di lta ste/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa 'jigs su rung ba'i chos thong ste
326b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu ngar ma byas pas/ de na bdag rnga mong dang / bA lang dang / ngong bur gyur te/ rtsa za zhing dbyug pas brdegs/ 'jigs pang bsdogs nas/ mi 'jo
326b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ral dka' ngo // bdag gis da ltar mnyes par byas te/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis dang / lus dang srog la mi lta dang / slong dpon la rim zo dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/
327a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes shA ri'i du sems bskyed pa/ bani ngo de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon la rim zo dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ thar du bum pa gang can rang
327a2(dkon brtsegs): dngung po// 'di'i cho nyid ni yin te de la 'od srad ces bya'o// yun ring por ni 'phags pa'i lam ma rig par gnas pas na/ rnga rong dag dang dong bur gyur// sdug bsngal bang rdo rdzas
327a3(dkon brtsegs): su rkyong// mir gyur pa'ang bdag gis rnyed// gang gis byang chub reg 'gyur ba'i// bzang po yi ni las bya ste/ de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas chos la rang gnas shing /
327a4(dkon brtsegs): gus pa dang ldan par bya// byang chub phyir ni spyong dpon la// rim gro dang ni bsti stang bya// 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal ba bsam med nas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'byam ngan
327a5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te// sbyin gnas dag ni nye bar 'tsho ba rin// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas// rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po rang bsten te/
327a6(dkon brtsegs): de ba de ni bsten pa'i rjes 'jug cing // rgyun mi 'chad par ngan song sa la gnas// btsod dang ni bcing zhing dardeg pa rnams// byed du bcug cing gzhan la spros byas nas/ de yi 'ja
327a7(dkon brtsegs): dus ngan so skye gnas 'gro sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rjes su myong // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mi bsten pas/ rje bong pa lang de bzhin ru ro// ngan pa'im
327a8(dkon brtsegs): d+he ched parung gyur na// dbyug bdag gis brdegs cing lal kyang bkal// mir 'byung ba ni rin du dka' ba dang // 'thun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed
327b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ldan ring dal ba zed 'gyur te// dka' ba'i las kyis bu gar chud pa bzhin// lus dang ngag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas// zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus /
327b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bu shes gnyen dag la gamo med pas// bdag gis lus ni nye bar 'tshe bar bya// bdag gi slob dpon tham gang dag dang / gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa/ byang chub sa
327b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mchog gi lam ston la// ston pa bzhin du dga' bas bsnyen bkur bya// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi byug pa dang // dri dang phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang me tog dag gi chun po yos//
327b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod par bya// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa// sems can don la brtson zhing don dam gzigs// gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'od mdzad pa/
327b5(dkon brtsegs): kha dog mtha' yas pa la mchod pa bya// sangs rgyas mi yi kha lo sgyur rnams la// 'jig rten spyod dang mchod pa cher byas pas// gang gis byang chub snying po bdag 'gro ba'i// byang chub lam
327b6(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs yongs su 'chol bas slob dpon
327b7(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ zan chu bum pa gang tsam yang dbul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i
327b8(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/ le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyom las can/ blun pas 'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can thams cad dang
328a1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags thams cad kyi sha gcig tu spungs shing sha cig tu bcer te/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i las byed kyang / de'i gni las sdig pa med/ de'i gni las
328a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i rnam pa med do// rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji sred pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas kyang / de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi rnam pa med do// rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi
328a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsad cing btu bas kyang de'i gni las sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do// snyam pas/ de ltar byas kyangang bsod rams dang
328a4(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i yongs su shes par ma nus te/ sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa dang / gti mug gi zil gyis gnon pas/ bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ ming dge
328a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal bar/ dman pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus tho ba ste/ de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ den pa
328a6(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can dmyal bar gyur pas/ lcags kyi rdul ma brtsegs pa bzhing gcig tu sdug bsngal zhing / rtsub ba mi bzod pa/ 'chag pa 'chi ba'i mthar khri byed ni ma mang
328a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po'i bar du bde ba'i sgra yang mthos// lus kyis lha ga la nig reg sde/ bdag gis ni dkar mnyes par byas pas/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyir banas rnams kyi nye bar cho
328a8(dkon brtsegs): bya sus dang mapa yin pa/ grabang po 'ani mapa dang / bzhin bapar bya ba nas/ 'i bum sa bsrung ba snga'i bskye sa/ byang chub mas pa kya
328b1(dkon brtsegs): mangs dpa'i sdigaslong kyi rnam thangs yongs su 'tshal ba'i/ slobang pon la rim 'gro dang bsnyen pa par byed de/ mchu bum pa gang tsam yang bral 'o// 'angs pa man 'das kyis
328b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag gsungs so// sdig pa'i grogs po bsnyer pa dang // sdig pa'i sems kyi bsdus pas na// sdig par skal bsnyen gyur te// bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas
328b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ rgyam tshwa yin tshu ros na// sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa// zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang // bsod nams dag gi'i byung gnas med// rgya mtsho yin pa ros nas// sems
328b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ji srid pa// thams cad gsod cing bcom gyur kyang // sdig pa'i 'byung gnas med do nas// sdig pa'i lta ba 'di lta bus// yang dang yang du smin pas ma// gcig tu mi zang sa
328b5(dkon brtsegs): rungs pa'i// sems can dmyal bar myur du dengs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi// yongs su 'dren pa mang mthong nas// bdag gi lus ni stong rnams kying // ngan 'gro dag
328b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gsum du dengs// 'dir 'jig rten dge ba ste// de yi dgra ni thos gyur nas// bdag gis mi'i dngos thob kyis// bzang po yini las bya'o// mir gyur pa ni dka' ba ste// mi
328b7(dkon brtsegs): srog thob pa yang dka' ba yin// dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin// bdag gis mir skye dka' ba yi// tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur/
328b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / rgyal ba kun mkhyen bstan pa rnyed// lus kyi las dang ngag gi las// yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can// mi 'dod mi bzang 'bras bur gyur/
329a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin cang spyad par mi bya'o// bsam pa rnam par dag pa yi// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// 'jig rten rab tu bka' spyod pa// bzang po dag gi las bya'o//
329a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir// bdag gi tha mar gang grags pa'i// bka' las 'da' bar mi bya ste// bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya// lam ni drang po zhes bya ba/ g.yo med pas
329a3(dkon brtsegs): sa ni rab bsten te// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// sgyu mar 'gyur bar mi bya'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa// de lta bur ni sems
329a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
329a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
329a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag yun ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/ 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dang phyag bya ba dang ldang ba dang // thal mo sbyar/
329a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa med do zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal gyis gnon pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par
329a8(dkon brtsegs): smin pas 'di la ste/ me'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'cha ba ma yin pa// smad pa'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas de bdag mir gyur
329b1(dkon brtsegs): / maud padang / ma dadum pa dang / ngan du gyur ba dang / gzhan kyad pa du song pa dang / 'ad du na sa rna sa dang /
329b2(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang // tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang / lnga ba log par zhugs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum la rab tu
329b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams dang / 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'gro ba bzhi la/ 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang / bsgrib pa lngas sgribs pa rnams dang / zla ba drug la gus par mi gnas pa
329b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / dam pa'i chos la ma yin pa 'dun la bzhugs pa rnams dang / log pa brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang / gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par gyur pa rnams dang /
329b5(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba bcu'i lumya ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang / mtho ris kyi lam la ma phyogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i
329b6(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dang bral ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams dang / bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang / dge ba'i chos yongasu spangs pa rnams dang / bdud
329b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams kyi dbyug pas bsdigs 'jigs pas bsngags nas/ mi 'dod
329b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byed cing / rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur te/ bdag gis ni de ltar de dag mnyes par byas pas/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar
331a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho bar bya'o// lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa drug pa de bskyed nas/ byang
331a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de// tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu nig tu gzhug pa'i phyir/ de'i
331a3(dkon brtsegs): che tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sdig pa'i grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba// bskal pa mang por rgya mtshor bsten pas na// mi'i nang du skyes kyang bran du 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rgyun
331a4(dkon brtsegs): du yun ring dus su 'khor// mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang // de ni bdag gis dga' bar thob 'gyur te// gnas pa'i yul ni 'thun pa bzang po dang // sangs rgyas 'byung dang dal
331a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor de bzhin no// thogs po gang dag mchog tu rab bzang ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam ston cing // byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed pa// de dag bskal babye ba mang po
331a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed/ lus da ma chung mi dag mi brtan te// dbu ba rdol dang chu yi chu bur 'dra// sbrub lta bu gar la balnga dang mtshungs// rmi lam mthong dang 'drid pa sla ba bzhin// srog ni yun thung che'ang dang
331a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// ri ltar smin dang klog ni mi gnas ltar// skad cig dun de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur// sring po med las snying po len par byed// gang gis 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal ba yang /
331a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho rtsa mug pas ma las bsdus gyur pa// dartsal ri mam 'ad mnom pa yi// dus dang tshod dang man nin gnas tsas// lum ma sdug pa thams cad ba sangs nas/ mag la
331b1(dkon brtsegs): bamed pa'i yid kyis ni// nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas// yon tan ldan la gus bcas rim mo bya// ngartul chags dang dregs pa skang gyur nas// 'dang mngang chu
331b2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams dang ni// 'jig rten bla mchog tu gang grags la// gus dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya// byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub mchog zhugs pa// gang dag bdag dang
331b3(dkon brtsegs): chub 'dun spyod la// dga' dang gus pa brtan pa bskyed bya ste// rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya// skye dgu nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal spangs// mi mkhas nga rgyal gcad cing gdul ba'i
331b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bcom byas nas// rgyags dang nga rgyal ri ni brdol bar bya// byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs bya ste/ byang chub snying po mchog la gnas gyur nas// bdud kyi
331b5(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams btul te// chu bo bzhi las srog chags bsgral bar bya// phyogs bcu dag ni mi gang na ba rnams// rang gi mi gtsang bar lhung smad pa la// byams pa dang ni snying rje'i
331b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis su// mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dus la bab/ sangs rgyas yon tan bslab pa bsgrub nus zhes// bzod pa bsgom par bya
331b7(dkon brtsegs): ba phun sum tshogs// 'dun pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// bsam gtan pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs// sems gdul ba yi dus ni nye bar gnas// thabs dang shes
331b8(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhas la gnas 'gyur te/ bla ma thams cad la ni bskor bar bya// de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel// shes rab ye shes mkhas pa bsam mi khyab// rang dbang dam
332a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mngon 'phags ste// byur bur yongs su gang ba'i snod byin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas
332a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas/ slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang dbul lo// gzhan yang
332a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas/ le lo can brtson 'grus nyams
332a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las snyoms las can blun pa lkugs par gyur te/ las nag pa dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa'ang med/ las dkar po dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa'ang med// las dkar nag
332a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dkar nag gi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i las dang / mi nag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa yang med do zhes/ de ltar lta ba de ltar bzod de ltar mos pas/
332a6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang / bram ze la/ btsun pa dag dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba rigs pa gang / byu nga
332a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rigs pa gang / ci byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur// ci byas na don dang phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang // ngargyal gyi
332a8(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/
332b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang ba mchang ba'i mi gyur nas/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ bdag mi gyur pa na/ yang spong ba/ mug pa/ thu pa/ chub/ dag pa/ rmongs pa/ 'on
332b2(dkon brtsegs): byur te legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par mi nus so// bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po tshang ba dge ba'i lus rdo
332b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis// sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya// lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya// legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kun shes pa'i mthu yod par bya/ theslong
332b4(dkon brtsegs): dpon la btsun pa dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang // slob dpon la btsun pa dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang // khan
332b5(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba med pa gang / bsten pa gang / mi bsten pa gang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / ci byas nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur/ ci byas na byang chub
332b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhes 'dri zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir// slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ 'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus
332b7(dkon brtsegs): las snying po blang ngo snyam nas/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang dbul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa
332b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di skad gsung ngo // phan pa 'dod phyir bskal ba mang por/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/ dge dang mi dge kha na ma mtho dang / kha na ma tho med
332b9(dkon brtsegs): mam tho mang bya 'das mi la 'a bzhis so ses yang rgyal du cho gnye rje'i dab du song/ sdig sems thogs po 'byem par za pas ma brgal ba rna mang gis mi da 'tsho 'tshang/ mi'i 'jis te mdzeng 'i mchang gyu she na pa mi stong bas zang po 'khyams pa'i byab/ nges dang 'i nges pa mtho dang
333a1(dkon brtsegs): byas 'bras mi shes// ston pa gzhan yang shing mig chud 'dra ngas// mi'i lus ni shin tu dka' bar thob// dbang po dag ni chang zhing skye mched dge/ mi dal
333a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs nas dal ba rnyed// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa mnyes byas nas// rgyal ba bstan bcos 'dod chags bral ba thos// dge dang mi dge byas pa'i 'bras bu dag/ 'jig
333a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gcol bdag 'dri dus la bab// 'gro bar ser sna'i mir gyur ji ltar bur// de ltar sbyin bdag ser sna med par 'gyur// ji ltar g.yong na rkam pa tshul khrims 'chal// tshul
333a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims nor kun srung ba ji lta ba// mi ni khro dang 'khrug par ji ltar 'gyur// khro med bzod pa'i stobs su ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar le lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur// brtson 'phags
333a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dga' ba ji lta bu// ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab blun lkug 'gyur// ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden gtam dga'// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa gcig sems pas// spyod pa
333a6(dkon brtsegs): babang po thams cad tshol bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'grob ma lus pa la byams pa bgyid// ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren// ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi ngoms yid/ lhung
333a7(dkon brtsegs): chub myong bsngo snong yongs su 'tshal// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab 'byams ning rnams na// 'jig rten thal bzhugs par 'i ltar 'gro// phyag 'tshal bsod rnams byed pa
333a8(dkon brtsegs): sa bu/ kun du babang po'i spyod pa'i 'dra 'di// slob dpon blam dag la bdag 'dri ba// de'i dus ni de ring nyer gnas te// bla ma gnas su gnas las can dga' ste// slob dpor
333b1(dkon brtsegs): ying mgu byung ba 'i lta bu// sangs rgyas sras kyis sems 'di bskyed gyur nas// stobs dang bsod nams yangs pa'i blo gros can// nges par mchog gi ye shes stongs ldan pas// dga'
333b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid kyis snod gang chu yang dbul// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bdun pa 'di skyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir// slob dpon la rim phra
333b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ than chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen da
333b4(dkon brtsegs): bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs 'os zin pas le lo can// brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ lkugs pas/ gang tshig dang yi ge dang / don dang tshig tu ldan pa dang / chos #
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dang tshig tu ldan pa dang // 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang ni ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang /
