442b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni shes rab byed pa'o// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa den
442b8(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'i rnam pa'o// thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o// nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams su gzugs thams
443a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kun ston pa'o// de'i mngon pa shes pa den sngon gyi mtha'i sgra nga mnyam pa nyid kyis skathams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i mngon par shes pade ni rang bzhin
443a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du mthong bas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / bye ma'i mtha' yongs su btsong bas/ bskul/
443a3(dkon brtsegs): bathams cad rjes su dran pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa kun ston cing / gzhan la mngon tu phyogs pa mngon par 'du ma byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//
443a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i mngon par shes pa de ni dus las mi 'da' bas/ dus la spong ba'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni 'phags pa'o// 'jig rten la
443a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa/ chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'o//
443a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i mngon par shes pa de ni bapa mo 'dzin to// bdud dang phyir rgol pa bcom pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po 'dzi pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad man
443a7(dkon brtsegs): gapa rdzogs par byang chub pal gzhol ba'o// de'i mngon pa shes paden chos kyi mkhang sa slong bdang 'thun pan// de'i mngon par shes pan na sems can thams cad 'dus par bya
443a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa 'din chos thams cad la dbang bskur bathob pa'o// shara'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa mnyams pa ni/ shes pas byas pa
443b1(dkon brtsegs): nam yinan// mngon par shes pa mnyams pade/ sems yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byung ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang rnam
443b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shin tu dul ba dang / shin tu zhi ba dang / shin tu spyad pa byas pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas kyang nga
443b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du skye ste/ bcings bzhin du skye ba ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'byung ba ma yin pa/ daci'i phyir zhem/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa
443b4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs pa las grol ba'o// de ni nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad las grol ba'o// de'i phyin ci log gi rtse mo'i gnas las grol ba'o// de bas na de grol bzhin du 'a
443b5(dkon brtsegs): 'pho// grol bzhin du 'byung ngo // de skye yang theg pa chen pos 'phongs par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
443b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos de dag kyang phyogs bcu kun nas btsal kyang mi rnyed mi dmigs la/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug go// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos tham/
443b7(dkon brtsegs): cad na chos kyang ma yin la chos ma yin pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsal kyang ma rnyed pa de la 'grang ba gang yang med/ chos thams cad ni
443b8(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'o// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos dang ma yin pa la mngon par chags par mi byed do// mngon par chags pa med pa ni
444a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi don to// gang don la rlom sems su byed pa de ni de'i gnod pa chen po'o// gang don la rlom sems su ma byed ba de'i mdun ni/ don na mngonan
444a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mi gnas so// don mthong ba las gang du yang blo thogs par mi 'gyur te/ de blo thogs pa med do// gang blo thogs pa med pa de yang yongs su 'dzin to// gang yongs su mi
444a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa de mchags so// gang ma chags pade gnas med do// gang gnas med pa de nyams pa med do// gang nyams pa med pa de'i rtsol ba 'bras bu yod pa'o// gang cos pa
444a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu yod pa de la gti mug med do// gang gti mug med bde la nga'i ba med do// gang nga'i ba med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang rtsod ba med ba de la dge sbyong gi chos rtsong pa med
444a5(dkon brtsegs): nga'o// gang dge sbyong gi tshis rtsod pa med pa de lag pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// gang lag pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa de 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ bzus
444a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no// gang thams cad du brtogs pa ma yin pa de la kha dog med/ mtshan med dbyibs
444a7(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang kha dog med/ mtshan ma med/ dbyibs med pa de'i rjes su rdzogs pa ni 'dra'o// de'i rjes su rtogs pa ni 'dra bar rtogs pa yang de 'dra'o// tso'i phyir rjes sna
444a8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang rtogs zhes bya zhe na/ gang gi phyir gang rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba'i chos sa tsam yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa zhes byaro//
444b1(dkon brtsegs): deltar rgyas sa rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa la sgoms par bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo mnar rang du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems
444b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ngomatshar rmang du byung ba'i chos gang zhe na/ gang byams pa dang bdag med pa nyid dang / snying rje dang / sems can med pa nyid dang dga' ba dang / zlog med pa cing dang / btang rlom
444b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i sems nyid dang / rdul khrims dang / zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / mi dzad pa'i sems cing dang /
444b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang / dben pa'i sems nyid dang / bsam gtan dang / nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / spos pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa med cing
444b5(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / spros pa med pa'i sems
444b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / dad pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang rang byung gi sems nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems nyid dang / shes
444b7(dkon brtsegs): rab dang / dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang / stobs nyid dang / kha na ma mtho ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / byang chub rab tu dbye ba dang /
444b8(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa dang / bsgoms pa'i sems nyid dang / zhi gnas dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang / mthong ba bri ba med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
445a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgom pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / thog ma nas dag pa nyid dang / dam pa'i chom
445a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan rnyed/
445a3(dkon brtsegs): padang / mtshan ma med pa nyid dang byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan dang / khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid dang / bdud nar gcod pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i
445a4(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid dang / byang chub dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bzlog pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yong
445a5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun du ston pa'i sems nyid dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'i sems nyid do// sha ri'i bu de ltar na rjes su rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa'i don la
445a6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos ni bdag dang gzhan dag te/ de'i phyir ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ngas pa dag de 'dra'o// zhes bya'o//
445a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i de sa bsam gtan zhes bya bcini ma/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nga la ni yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir de la mchags
445a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// kyang chub sems dpa rnams kyi bsam gtan bdag depa la ma chags pa'i phyi'i kyang ba med 'o// byang chung sems dpa' rnams kyi sas ga mamangs pas
445b1(dkon brtsegs): spong ba phyir mang rjechen pos dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan na 'dod ba'i khams la ma migs pa'i phyir ting de 'din 'asus sdog pal/ rna
445b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa sbyor ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
445b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan ni sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir de kho na la 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad
445b4(dkon brtsegs): byir/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis gnod
445b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni shin tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir bskyong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam/
445b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan ni bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'jom pa'i phyir gnyen po'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das
445b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi mchog go// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir sems can la bsam pasngon du 'gro ngas
445b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul zad mi shes pas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
446a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir mngon par 'phags pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni las thams cad yong
446a2(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa dbang byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ye shes che ba nyid kyi phyir khyab pa ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
446a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan no// shA ri'i bu de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi sngon du 'gro ba zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nges par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ro//
446a4(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems gnas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems ni gnas kyi don du 'gro ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o//
446a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// mthar gyis gnas
446a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'gog pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// dge ba'i chos kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba'i sngon du
446a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o// ding len gyi zung po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon du 'am ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// spangs rgyas kyi ting nge la
446a8(dkon brtsegs): du 'pho ba'o// des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag dang / zhi bar byeng ba'i chos gzhan rnams kyi yang sngon du 'gro bste/ shA ri'i bu 'dzi ni byang chub sems
446b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi chol tu sbyin pa ste/ des brtson pa'i byangan pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zung chub sems papa'i spyang babyu na/
446b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir// de'i tshe tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan dang ni rnamathar ba 'i phyir// badz+ra
446b3(dkon brtsegs): yi gos pa med pa ltar// yid ni chags med dag pa 'jig rten na// bskal mang rgya mtsho rtag tu sbyang ba spyod// gang du ting 'dzin pha rol song ba yi// rnam par sdang mdzad ni//
446b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting 'dzin dang // zla 'od ces bya ting 'dzin rnams bkod na// yid ni srog gis rab tu brgyan pa dang // mngon par 'phags dang de bzhin sems dpa' dang // drim med dang sa
446b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan ting 'dzin dang // yon tan 'od dang grub 'od mya ngan med// chos rnams thams cad la ni dbang sgyur dang // chos sgron dang ni de bzhin chos pa dang // ting 'dzin chos kyi dbang
446b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag ri rab dpa'// dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dbang byed dang // dam chos kun 'dzin shin tu rnam dag dang // gzhan gyi sems la rnam dpyod ting 'dzin dang // dam chos dkon mchog
446b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od gzer ting 'dzin dang // rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan nyon mongs sel// bdud kyi stobs rnams 'jom pa'i ting 'dzin dang // stobs bcu dang ni stobs las mngon 'phags
446b8(dkon brtsegs): dang // kun bcad chags med ces bya tid 'dzin dang // lag na sgron ma bdud sbyin bsgrags pa dang // sa 'dzin legs par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin dang // rI rab smon dang rgyal
447a1(dkon brtsegs): ba mi pa ma dang // ye shes sgron dang de bzhin mig gtsang dang // rgyal ba thams cad dran pa'i ting 'dzin dang // chos dran dang ni yon tan me shes 'jug/ ston par
447a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug dang de bzhin mtshan med dang // smon med ting 'dzin de bzhin zhi ba'i sa// 'du shes sna tshogs thal zhes bya ba dang // rab dul klu dbang sdug ces bya ba dang // 'khyil ba dang /
447a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par ldog pa dang // 'dum pa med dang stobs dang mig dag dang // ting 'dzin rdorje 'drang rdo rjes// mngon 'phags mi 'dzums spyan po sta bu dang // kun nas thog 'khyil rna/
447a4(dkon brtsegs): par dag sgra dang // nges rtog nyon mongs bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang // nam mkha' 'dra dang nam mkha'i bar skabs dang // yon tan thams cad gus par len pa dang // blo gros dran rnos/
447a5(dkon brtsegs): b+h+yo 'del spobs mi zad// nges tshig bstan pa mtha' yas mi zang dang // legs byas byas pacung mi za ba dang // lha bdang na 'gro ba tshim par byed// byams pa mngon 'phags
447a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung rje sangs pa'i \u0f7f// dga' dung mchog tu dga' la 'jug pa dang // btang snyoms dang ni gnyis las chags grol dang // chos can don gyi 'od zer ting 'dzin dang // la tha
447a7(dkon brtsegs): med mi gas sngon dang ma skyes mno// rnam grol zhing po'om pa tsam byeng dang // hrI rgyal ma na 'das pa dang / chos kyis rgyal dang migs nga ni // shes rab ba
447a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa zhi pa'i sangs rgyas mtsho// 'od gzer mtha' yas rnam grol sbyin pa dang // me shes ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs kyi rgyan// bkod pa chen po zhing bkod sdang ba dang / sems
447b1(dkon brtsegs): can bsam pa yongs su rangs dga' ba dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam la rtag 'thun dang // pha rol phyin pa brgyan dang dkon mchog gtsug/ ting 'dzir byang chub yan lag sa
447b2(dkon brtsegs): tog sbyin// nam grol snying po bdud rtsi sbyin pa dang // rlung dang rlung bzhin 'gro ba mi dmigs dang // rgya mtsho shugs 'dzin rin che mdzod ldan dang // zag dang raM 'thab srul po zhes
447b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdzu 'phrul yangs dang shin tu don 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas yul ston ting 'dzin de dag dang // de dang gzhan yang rgya chen mtha' yas pa'i// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bye ba khong du chud/
447b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bsam gtan pha rol phyin spong ba// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dpag med de// mnyam par gzhag nas bsam gtan stong yul 'greng // mnyam par gzhag nas rdo/
447b5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chag pa dang // mnyam par gzhag nas 'dug cing nyal bar byed// de'i spyod lam mnyam par ma gzhag med// mnyam par gzhag pas sgra ni 'byin byed de// chos 'di thams
447b6(dkon brtsegs): cad zhi dang rab zhi pa// rtog pa med cing rnam par brtog pa med// bdag med srog med dbang phyug dag kyang med// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa sring rje can// bsam gtan pa
447b7(dkon brtsegs): rol byin pa skyong byed pa// yon tan rgya mtsho de yi yon tan ni// 'di dang gzhan yang pha rol mtha' yas pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
447b8(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la brtson na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
448a1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu mnyam par byed/ 'dzin
448a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun par byed/ gzhan dag la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed de/ sha ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpas byang
448a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan/ blangs/ bzung / bklags/ gzhan la yang bshad cing / rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ shes rab kyi rnams
448a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab de yang rnam pa gang / 'jug pa gang zhe na/ de la shes rab kyi thos pa ni rnam pa'o// tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o// thos pa'i rnam pa
448a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang / nga rgyal med pa'i rna/
448a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa'i rnam pa dang / ri mor byed pa'i rnam pa dang / mthun pa'i rnam pa dang / bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang / rna ba blags te ga
448a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur gyi byed pa'i rnam pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang / maM g.yengs pa'i rnam pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pas rnam pa dang/ sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nang thams cad
448a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi par byed pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang / dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang / rtogs pa zhes pa'i rnam pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / grol 'jug pa'i rnam dang /
448b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma tsham thos pas ma ngoms pa'i rnam pa dang / btong ba sel ba'i rnam pa dang / byin nas ma spong ba'i rnam pa dang / mang du thos bsnyen pa'i rnam pa dang / gus par dga' ba myong
448b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i rnam pa dang / lus sim pa'i rnam pa dang / sems rangs pa'i rnam pa dang / mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / don mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / chos mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang
448b3(dkon brtsegs): nan tan mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med par mkhan pa'i rnam pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdong mnyan pa'i
448b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / thabs mkhas pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa mnyan
448b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / yang dag par spong ba mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / zhen cing 'bres
448b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung ba mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid mnyan
448b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i sa pa
448b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par du byed pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rang dbang du gyur pa'i rnam pa dang / chos mnyan pa 'du shes pa rnam pa dang / kun tu 'dre ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'du
448b9(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag par mnyan pa'i rnam
449a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pa la mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / 'bugs pa bsten pa'i rnam
449a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su spang ba'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa la mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dbang po mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsgom pa mnyan pa'i rnam
449a3(dkon brtsegs): padang / byang chub kyi yan lag mnyan pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadang pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byas
449a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams mnyan pa'i rnam pa ste/
449a5(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu de ltar gang na thos pa de na shes pa'o// gang na shes bde na nan tan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la mos pade na
449a6(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ro// khros nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang drung chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs la bsam pa yod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro//
449a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la sbyor ba yod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu
449a8(dkon brtsegs): so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dge ba'i gshes gnyen la sten par byed pa ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan ta byed do// gang brgya
449b1(dkon brtsegs): mo// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos par dga' ba skye ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu zhes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang chos thos nas lus na
449b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang chos thos nas rangs par byed pa ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu zhes so//
449b3(dkon brtsegs): nas nan tan byed do// gang theg pa chen po thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsdu ba'i dngos po thos nA/
449b4(dkon brtsegs): gang bsdu bar spyod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dran pa nye ba gzhag pa'i gtam thos nas/ dran pa lus la zhugs pa dang / dran
449b5(dkon brtsegs): bcor ba la zhugs pa dang / dran pa sems la zhugs pa dang / dran pa chos la zhugs pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// zhes nas nan tan byed do// gang yang
449b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par spong ba'i gangata ma thos nas/ mi dge ba skyes shing byung ba dag la khrel zhing ngo tsha bar 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do//
449b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba la mi gtong bar blo 'jug pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam
449b8(dkon brtsegs): thos nas lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / 'dun pa yang skye ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsam gtan gyi gta
451a1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas nges par rtog pa la sems gtong ba den thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// nas nas nan tas byed do// gang chad med pa'i gtam thos nas
451a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / 'phongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje che ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / mi dge ba la btang snyoms pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes
451a3(dkon brtsegs): so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dbang po'i gangatam thos nas dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes/
451a4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi dbang po la sems 'jug par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam thos nas/
451a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ sems la 'jug par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang lam gyi gtam thos nas/
451a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba la sems 'jug pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas na tan byed do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'dzi/
451a7(dkon brtsegs): padang / byams pa dang / swaM rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang thoms chen po dang / so so yang dgu par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang ma dang ga par
451a8(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thos nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'jug go// de thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes/
451b1(dkon brtsegs): nas nan tan byed // sha ri'i bu 'di ni thos pa'i rnam pa 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig ces bya ste/ sha ri'i de sbyar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byungs/
451b2(dkon brtsegs): shara'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snong kyi chos kyi ma grangs shin tum rnas ngas gardang/ bdun
451b3(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par byas/ gzhan la yang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan nas/ nan tan snying por byed pa yin no// chos rnams la nan tan byed pa gang zhe na/ gang ji ltar 'an
451b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de ni chos la nan byed do// gzhan yang chos la nan tan byed pa ni gang chos thams cad mi len pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams len yang log
451b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la nan tan du bzhag pa the tshom du 'gyur na/ chos len par spyod pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na chos thams cad mi len pa ni nan tan no// gzhan yang
451b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la mi sgrib pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gang chos rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gang chos rnams mi len pa dang / mi rlom pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog
451b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// gzhan yang chos rnams la bstan pa med pa dang / bsal ba med pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang du cung zad kyang ma bshad/
451b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du mi snang ba de lta bu ni chos thams cad mi snang ba/ mi blang ba/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o//
452a1(dkon brtsegs): byu sa / #
452a2(dkon brtsegs): da med par dab nga dzinan// 'di na na rgyan dang / 'don tan cing ma yin pa nas/ 'ag+sa hU~M/ sa thams sangs margyan N+DI myed / mamang ga/ ba
452a3(dkon brtsegs): bdenan tan zhes bya'o// nan tan la brtsod par gyis shig/ chos thams cad mi sgrib par snang bathob par gyis shig/ de nas da'i tsha bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs su ba/
452a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde sto la// shin tu nges par nan tan gnas byung ba// mkhas bden chos la 'chin ma byed// ma 'dzin pas na
452a5(dkon brtsegs): nan na 'ja'o// mas ni chos drang song bar ma byebyung // rjes mdzin sa par rlom sems dang // tshung chos marnam sems gang yang zed / rnam sems med byer na
452a6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'o// chos la len pa med cing 'dor ba med// chos ni chos la len par byed pa med// len pa med byer 'din chos kyi mtshan// de 'dra ba ninan tan zhes bya'o// gang
452a7(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams pa de mchags// de la len pa med zhes byangs ma 'gyur// meshes sa thus na rnamasems med// de 'du ba sa nan na shes pa'o// mkhas bslangs pa ma//
452a8(dkon brtsegs): tan gnas par gyis// chos 'di dag la shin tu brtson par gyis mchog tu stong bdag la gnas gyur na// de rje de'i sgon dag par 'gyur// sgo bdag ni chos 'di'ang ba shes/
452b1(dkon brtsegs): den sems la bsam pa'ang shes par 'gyur// mkhas pas de tshe bsam pa shes nas ni// 'di 'dra ba mi chos kyang 'chang bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos la don dam mkhas gyur nas/
452b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu don la rnam par gdon mi za// smod pa mtha' yas yon tan rnams kyis 'phags// mkhas pa mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'adra// de yi don dang tshig 'bru dag la yang // mtha' ma
452b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par rung ba ma yin zhing // don kyang mtha' yas tshig 'bru mtha' yas te// nan tan snying por byed pa mi 'khrugs 'gyur// sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
452b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin
452b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mnyan pa nas/ gnas la rgya cher bstan pa'i bar du byas nas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nas/ mun pa rab ba stug po bsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad sa snang bathob ste/
452b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi snang ba'o// de snang ba thob pas dge bdong mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu thos te/ de srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i chos la mi gnas te/ de mi dge ba'i chos nam
452b7(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i phyir/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rtogs pas na/ dge ba zub bzhi pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
452b8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so// ji ltar mun pas khyab slebs pas// khyim du zhugs par 'gyur na ni// yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang // mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//
453a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni 'di yang la// la la'i mingag skyes gyur kyang // dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos// ma thos par ni shes mi 'gyur// bris nas sdig pasbyin mi byed/
453a2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas gnod pa spong bar byed// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa thob// thos par 'dod pas thos pa 'phel// thos pa shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab kyis ni don rnams spod//
453a3(dkon brtsegs): don thob nas ni bde tho ba 'gyur// don thob de yi yid rno ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la mkhas// shin tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems
453a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod ni// thob nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten la ni snang gyur nas// byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
453a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa'i gang zag la/
453a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bzhes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo snod kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid du byung bar byed/ rnam par dag par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'
453a7(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i rdza sdong 'di'i don gyi phyir 'dun pa skyed / 'bang bar byed/ brtson 'grus par byed/ sems la rab tu dzin par byed/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed/ de yang dag
453a8(dkon brtsegs): pa song ba bzhi la rabatu grags zas/ chos thams cad la slob pa med pa za ga// danas dam tshacom ldan 'das kyis tshigs sa bcad pa 'di dag gsungs sa/
453b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni gang yin pa// de la dag pa'i bzhes su sems// rtag par nan tan gnas gyur nas// chos lanan tan zas te 'am// rtag par 'dun pa 'dzam byeng // nag par badzan
453b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus shin tu 'phags// rtag par shes rab rnam par spyod// ye shes la ni rtag tu gnas// de ni bdag nyid chos shes te// dad pa'i phyir ni 'gro mi byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni
453b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gang bshad pa// mi g.yo ba yi chos shes so// mkhas pa de dag tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// srab pa don la khong du chud par byed// de dag dkar po'i phyogs ni rtag par spyod//
453b4(dkon brtsegs): nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu spong par byed// de mi sems ni rnams kyang nyams pa med// de ni chos rnams gang la'ang zhum pa med// lus kyang de bzhin sems dang brtson 'grus dang /
453b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa yang ba'ang myur du thob par 'gyur// chos thos nas ni shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// ye shes rnam par rtogs nas dran mi nyams// dran dang ye shes la ni rtag gnas nas/
453b6(dkon brtsegs): dge dang dge'i chos ni rab tu shes// bla na med pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas ni// rtogs dang dran pa shes rab spobs mchog thob// ji ltar bdag nyid yun ring bslabs pa bzhin
453b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bshes// chos bslabs nas ni khyad par 'thob 'gyur te// khyad par thob cing ye shes dag 'gyur nas// de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam
453b8(dkon brtsegs): nga shes// de phyir bsam pa bzhin du chos ston to// sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// /
454a1(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu bdun pa/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ de ltar blo sbyangs pa
454a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / de ltar chos sdang ba'i sgra shin tu yongs su dgapas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ba ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ gnyis ga zhin
454a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan gyi sgra de dag/ bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid byed pa de gang zhe na/ de de ltar rul
454a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yod la byed pa na/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mthos/ 'phags pa'i chos
454a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba ma thos par/ ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba rnyed nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che ba'i nga rgyal du lhung ba de dag ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
454a6(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mthar/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po las yongs su mi mthar te/ de dag la de bzhin gno/
454a7(dkon brtsegs): bas dgongs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// pha rol la rjes su 'thun pa thos pa ni/ rga ba dang // 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/
454a8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams chos pas rnam par shes// chos nas sdig pa med byed do// thos nas gnod paspong bar 'gyur// thos nas mya ngan 'das bathob// zas 'ad thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur/
454b1(dkon brtsegs): thos pas shes rab 'brel bar 'gyur// zhes ras kyis nadan rnams myong // don rnyed nas dam mang nas// ma 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos gsang mkhas pa gang ba dang / mchog tu ngas
454b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul bzhin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ chub par
454b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs mi mnyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyong bar mi byeng ba de dag ni/
454b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ de la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du/ bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chib
454b5(dkon brtsegs): las grol ba'o// zhes gsungs so// de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ni gang / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin sbyor ba yin snyam nas/
454b6(dkon brtsegs): de 'di ltar slob ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang sbyor bar mi byed/ rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni/ mi sbyor ba'i
454b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni sgra 'byin par mi byed/ zlos pa 'byin par mi byed/ gang nas sgra 'byung ba de yang mi dmigs/ sgra de nyid
454b8(dkon brtsegs): gang nas byung / gang du 'gag ces sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog par byed de/ gang smras pa dang / gang smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi smra ba dang / gang gi sba bar 'gyur ba
455a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang spong ba'i phyir slab dang / gang song ba'i phyir sla bar 'gyur ba dang / gang khong du drung bar bya ba'i phying sras pa dang / gang khong du ru
455a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i byir snga ba dang / gang khong du chung par bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de thams cad yongs su gsal na/ 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang / dasur byung ba'i rnam par ming mig
455a3(dkon brtsegs): pade ni/ de'i tshul zhing sbyor ba'o zhes de de ltar slob bo// byang chub sems dpa' de sngar tshul bzhin du sbyor bas/ ji ltar na tshul bzhin du mthong zhe na/ de 'di ltar slo ba ce na/ gang gi tshi
455a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags par mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi cha thams cad rang bzhin gyis lte bar ni bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul
455a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi chos thams cad rnam par zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par mthong ba de'i tshe/
455a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad la skyes par mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gas
455a7(dkon brtsegs): gtso chos thams cad shin tu yang dag par ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gitsho chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshul bzhin mthong ngo // de gang gi
455a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de la yang rtog ste/ cinas kyang mi mthong ba dang / mchog pa desar mthong sa/ de bur mthongango na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// yang 'dis spong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
455b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang the chom dang rmongs pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang sgrib pa med do tshul bzhin du sbyor ba na chos gang la yang gang thar pa'i rnams
455b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med do// rgyal bzhin du sbyor ba na chos gang yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'bang ba med do// rul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang rtog par bya ba'i phyir 'bang ba med de/ gang chos ma/
455b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta'o// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mthong ba'o// ma mthong ba zhes bya ba de rje
455b4(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa'i tshig tha dgas so// ma sres pa zhes bya ba de ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i tshig tha dgas so// yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi sdang ba'i tshig thu dgas na/
455b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de la dgongs nas/ 'du byed thams cad mi skye bar mthong na/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag
455b6(dkon brtsegs): bar lta'o zhes de skad gsung ngo // de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de 'di ltar slo ba ste/ chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa/ sangs
455b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos de dang mnyam ste/ de bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa lo 'jug pa'o// de lta bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug 'dod pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
455b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ bzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di na/
456a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyong ngo // sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
456a2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas/ tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson na tshul bzhin gyi tshig
456a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // de la tshul bzhin du 'jug pa gang / tshul bzhin gyi tshig gang zhe na/ de sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang /
456a4(dkon brtsegs): wag mthong rnam par rtog pa la 'jug pa ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o// lus dben par 'jug pa dang / sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug pa dang / cha pal 'jug pa dang / rtag pa ma yin/
456a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa dang / rgya rkyen la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang /
456a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs ma phyin mi gnas pa la 'jug pa dang / mi 'pho ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chung mi za ba dang / rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dzes pa
456a7(dkon brtsegs): byabal 'a bad+ha/ ba zhes pal lag sang slong ba nyid dang / smin pa me pazhin pang 'jug pa ma yin pa dang / ting 'an / rnams par 'jug payin pa
456a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang / ngi de lan gyi dbang gis sme ba la mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i le shes len pa la 'jug kyang / zag pa zang bal mi 'jug pa dang / ma skye ba dag pa sa
456b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas par thar ba 'thob la mi 'jus pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med par rtog par lag spyang / na po gtong bas nga jug pa /
456b2(dkon brtsegs): par mamang ba la 'jug pa dang / srid pa bsam chis mi khyab pa len pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa la 'jug sang / chos mngon du thub la ma 'jug pa dang / 'dzin/
456b3(dkon brtsegs): yonotan gyi dga' ba btang snyoms pa la 'jug kyang / chos kyi dga' ba 'dod bral ma 'jug pa dang / rtog pasngos pa thams cad gtong ba la 'jug pang / thab sku mkhas pa gtong
456b4(dkon brtsegs): la mi 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bu tshul bzhin gyi tshig ces bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs pa'i tshig de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go// shA ri'i du
456b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang tshul bzhin gyi tshig go// de ni sgo'i tshig go/ de ni mkha'i tshig go/ de ni rgyu'i tshig go// de ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig go// de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go// de ni mi da
456b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig go// de ni btang snyoms kyi tshig go// mi len pa'i tshig dang / mi 'dor ba'i tshig dang / mi spobs pa'i tshig dang / mi gnang ba'i tshig dang / mi bri ba'i tshig dang / mi skye ba'i
456b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi med pa'i tshig dang / mi ldog pa'i tshig dang / gnyen po med pa'i tshig dang / de kho na'i tshig dang / de bzhin kho na'i tshig dang / ma log pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi
456b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin gyi tshig dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig dang / dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshig dang / yongs su chad pa'i tshig dang
457a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshig dang / tshor ba dang / shes dang / 'dra byed dang / rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de'i mig dang /
457a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam pa
457a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lce dang / rongang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lus dang / reg dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i
457a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig go// de ni yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go// de ni mi shes la rton pa'i tshig go// de ni nges pa'i don gyimano/
457a5(dkon brtsegs): sde la rton pa'i tshig go// shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ba ni// de gang gis mthong ba
457a6(dkon brtsegs): de nyid mi gtong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo // de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du/
457a7(dkon brtsegs): byor ba chis pa lal rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la tshas gang yang nga'i skor mi 'gyur ba medang/ tshul bzhin du myor ban rnam
457a8(dkon brtsegs): grang 'i byor bang bapamengango // rnam pa byung cos pa ma tugs pa rgya ma byang nga ma // gang tsas mas ca yang dag par myong ba dang sa pa ba
457b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ji sgru ba bzhin mthong ba deni yang dag pa'i smra ba'o// chos thams cad 'i lta ba bzhin mthong ba gang zhes/ 'di la ste/ mi mthong ba'o// mi mthong ba gang zhe na/ den ma skyes pa'i phyin
457b2(dkon brtsegs): bladags so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas te// rgyu cher ji ltar sngar bzlas pa de ltar de bzhin du bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems na
457b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad ni bdag bzhin du tshul bzhin
457b4(dkon brtsegs): teji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ngo // ji ltar sems can bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ste/ de ltar
457b5(dkon brtsegs): na tshul bzhin du mthong ngo // gang tshul bzhin du 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang ldan par mthong ba ste/ de ni tshu ldang sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de ni chos
457b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rang bzhin la nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin du bye brag med pa dang ldan par mthong ngo // rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma yin par yang mi snyems so// tshul bzhin du sbyor bas tshul
457b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mthong ste/ tshul bzhin gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang de skyed de/ sems can gyi gnas kyang mthong / chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa de
457b8(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ste/ sha ri'i bu de ltar na rnam pa 'di dang / thos pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin mthong ba 'di dang / dzi wa
458a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di dang / 'di dag ni shes rab ces bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
458a2(dkon brtsegs): // ga ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyong ba/ 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos thams cad la shes rab kyi gnas pa yin te/ 'dis ste
458a3(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa dang / lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas rgyas par byas te/ rga zhi'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas bdag tus pa dang lhan cig tu mgon
458a4(dkon brtsegs): banas/ bdag tu lta ba'i na ba las byung ba'i lba bar gyur pa drugacus gnyis dang lhan cig tum gnas/ mtho bar sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu mi gnas dma' bar sems dpa
458a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang ldan cig tu mi gnas/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'ing rgyal nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'i bu'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ rkyen
458a6(dkon brtsegs): bodang / 'bring po dang / monas son mongs pa thams cad kyi bar dang / lhan cig tu ma gnas/ gti mug gi mun par ba rib kyi ling tog gi slob pa dang / tshod par byed pa kun tu
458a7(dkon brtsegs): te 'dug ba nas dmang cos thams cad kyi bar dang ldan cig tu mi gnas/ rtsod pa'i gang pa dang / gon mongs pa dang / zung po dang / lha'i bung / 'chi bdag gi bdu thams cad kyims
458a8(dkon brtsegs): se nga chu ga sus gnas/ bdag sems can dang / gsobang/ gang thag dang / shing bu dang / gang pas skyes nas padag tus pathams cad kyi ba ma /
458b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mi gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi shes pa'i sgrib pa nas bag chags kyi
458b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang
458b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa dang / mdung pa'i sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ ser sna dang / gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa
458b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs
458b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mthun pa'i shes pa dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / lag par nges pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dges
458b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / khan ma tho ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa nas chos thams cad kyi gnyen pa'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ zhing sna tshogs
458b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / chos sna tshogs nas sna tshogs thams cad kyi bar dang ldan cig tu ma gnas/ rmo zhes pa dang / shes pa
458b8(dkon brtsegs): mam gas pa dang / gco ba dang / ngangangam pa nas/ sems canathams cad kyis canam yong sa byed bapa dag nga rgyun cig tu ma gnas/ shes rab sa chub nga /
459a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ mtshan ni med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 'das ma byas nas yid la byed pathams cad dang / sems dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gis
459a2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag dang gzhan yang 'dus la spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
459a3(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la spyod pa de ni 'dus byas kyi spyod pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhanas/
459a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byed mkhas pa yin te chos thams cad la mkhas pa rjes su thob bo// de sar
459a5(dkon brtsegs): sa rab rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ phung po la mkhas pa dang // khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mtshad la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag pa
459a6(dkon brtsegs): rig pa la mkhas pa dang / rton pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mkhas pa dang / me shes la mkhas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang / lam la mkhas padang
459a7(dkon brtsegs): ci 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang 'dum/ mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pade na gas rab 'byeng ba zhes bya'o// de lathung po lam khas
459a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhes/ ga nga rnaMms kyang ra byab baman pa 'angs sa/ dgra do las nga ba na dang / tshwag tus pa ldan padang/ rgyabras zung na nga rgyagasas
459a9(dkon brtsegs): zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smod pa/
459b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa dang /
459b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rje byu/ drugs sa/ sa sas sa smras sa / zlu
459b3(dkon brtsegs): / skyes smras kyang bamed da
459b4(dkon brtsegs): da de ga rnams kya nga bzhin/ ba des ma thos pa 'in la mkhas paskyes bya'o// rab du ng+ya sa na/ chab srung ba da
459b5(dkon brtsegs): sa rnam dpas skyes da/ rgyas pa da/ 'ong bzhin pa ma/ /
459b6(dkon brtsegs): palam sa pa zhes bya'o// 'du shes na thog rdzas paste/ sa ts+tsha'i yang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas skyes tha'i bar du med de/ thig d+hA rang bzhin dang ljin rnaM/
459b7(dkon brtsegs): shes kyang rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du byed rnams ni chu gang lta bu ste/ rgya du la yang bdag med/ sems can meng ba
459b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i bar du med pa sa/ chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed dag kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du byeng rnam
459b9(dkon brtsegs): ni chu gang lu du ste/ chu shing la yang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med pa ste/ chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed dag kyang de'i rang bzhim yin te/ ga
460a1(dkon brtsegs): mamakhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes b+ha'o// rnam par shes bskyams rbam+b+ha/ snum la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog me gang zag med/
460a2(dkon brtsegs): ming/ shed las skyes med/ skyes bu med/ byed pa po med/ tshor ba po med pa ste/ sgra ma'i rang bzhini gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung pol
460a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po rnams shes bya ba ni 'jig rten yin te/ 'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin paphung po rnams pa
460a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang de yin no// yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po yang de'i rang bzhin no// gang de la mkhas
460a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ chos kyi khams
460a6(dkon brtsegs): nisa'i khams yin mod kyis chos kyi khams nis pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni chu'i khams min mong kyis/ chos kyi khams ni nan pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi
460a7(dkon brtsegs): khams mo'i 'ams yin mod kyis/ chos kyi khams ca pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni rlung gi khams yin mod kyis/ chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/
460a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams min mod ces/ chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan cing ma yinan// chos kyi khams nin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams tshan mam
460b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'ams slar rtogs pa'i mtsha cid ma mnan// chos kyi khams na sa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin gyis/ chos kyi khams na rje sgom pa'i mngan nyid ma yin no// chos pa'ams rdzom
460b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams na kye'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyis/ chos kyi khams nir myong ba'i mtshan nying ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa
460b3(dkon brtsegs): khams yin mod kyis/ chos kyi khams sa ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyis/ chos kyi khams ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/
460b4(dkon brtsegs): / chos kyi khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyis/ chos kyi khams rnam par sgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams dang bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so/
460b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni mtshungs so// 'khor ba'i khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni mtshungs so// de ltar chos
460b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams de mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs/ mi 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs te/ 'dus byas kyi khams su 'jug par/
460b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi khams yin mod kyis 'jug pa'i phyir/ de la bshad pa dpag tu med de/ gang khams la 'jug pa des rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na tha'/
460b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la mig bdag dang bdag
461a1(dkon brtsegs): gis stong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig ni rang bzhin 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/ de ni drang chung sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas
461a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin du rda ba dang / spu dang sde dang / lus dang / yid bdag dang bdag gis song ste/ byang chung sems dpa'i yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta du'o zhes
461a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dge ba la stsogs pa'i phyir/ gang skye mched la kun stsogs pa dang / sna tshogs sngogs bur myi byed cing / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnam
461a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'jug ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni mig gi skye mched do// 'di ni gzugs kyi skye mched do zhes de ltar mig dang / gzug
461a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'dod chags med par mthong yang 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// rna ba dang s+thA/ sna nga / sde dang ro// lus dang reg pa
461a6(dkon brtsegs): yid dang chos/ gom bzhin du sbyar te/ de sngar byang chub sems dpa' ying dang chos kyi bar du 'dod chags med par mthong mod kyis/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang /
461a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde mched la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba yang 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched de/ des 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang lam thu
461a8(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'o// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang lam gtong bar byed pa 'dis ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni/ sems can lam la brtson pa por zhes
461b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa la/ slong can ma tho btsang lam gyi spyam ched ma gtong ngam/ don byang chub sems dnga' phye mched la mkhas dan// desar na byang chub sems dpa'i phyimatshangs smra sangan/
461b2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni rnam pa pa ni ste/ 'dis
461b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ gang phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes bden
461b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang sred pa 'jom pa de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mi 'byung mi 'ji
461b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de ni 'gog par shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgro 'dogs pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe
461b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bden pa 'di bzhi de ltar shes rab kyis shes kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon du mi byed pa de ni bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//
461b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa ni gsum ste 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni
461b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi bsad ji srid pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / rngar bstan paste/ de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o// de gdon ngas pa gang zhe na/ gang la sems kyi rgya ba yang medan
462a1(dkon brtsegs): migs na smras te/ don nongs pa'i bden pa zhes byug// de la mtshan nyid kyi badzin pa gang zhen/ 'dus skye/ mtshan cing thams cad mtshan cing ci
462a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid cig pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'chang pas mi bsgo// don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed par mi ltung / mtshan nyid bden
462a3(dkon brtsegs): bamatshan nyid med par rtogs par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa ni cig tu gnyis ma yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'gog/
462a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa'o// de la bden pa gcig pu la gang sgomi 'dogs pa dang / sems can sgro 'dogs par ltung ba rnams la bden pa sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa
462a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang drang po lnga rnams ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang phung po lnga po rnams ni mtshan nyid de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi gang spong pa
462a6(dkon brtsegs): cid nogs padon sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po snga rnams kyo ba gel zhal rgyu sred pa las byung ba'i lha bden kun 'byung ba'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phred pa'i/
462a7(dkon brtsegs): sbrulbu pa de yang sgom 'dogs mi rin mi sems pade ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang brang po snga rnams can tu zad pa'i phyir/ 'gag pa sngon gyi mthar ma byung ba/
462a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mamar sa 'job/ de sur byung bar mi gnas pa/ de ni 'gog pa 'bags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang mamal bden pa na sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba zhes pa dang /
462b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa shes pa la yang reg par byed la/ rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa yang thob par byed pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang /
462b2(dkon brtsegs): bshes pa de la rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can yongs su rtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad
462b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba ste/ de la tshor bar bya ba rnam par 'byed pa dang / blos rig pa nyid de/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// rgyu gang gis kun 'byung bar shes pa'i rgyu de jis
462b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang tshor ba gtong zhing mtshor ba'i tshor bar byed pa dang / 'gog pa la yang so sor rtogs tshor ba
462b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa yang mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba gang gis gzungs dran 'dra ba'i lam de sdud par byed/
462b6(dkon brtsegs): la tshor bar dgos pa yang ma yin/ lam gyi dgos pa yang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de ltar rtog/
462b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bden pa de bzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing / mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba ste/
462b8(dkon brtsegs): gang mi skye ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ gang srid pa 'jig par shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o//
463a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thams cad gang gis ma skye bar shes pa/ de la 'gog pa gang yang med cing / gang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni zang pa 'gog pa zhes bya'o// gang de ltar 'chol ba
463a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jal ba dang / yongs su 'chol ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya ste/ gang bden pa'i shes pa de la gzhog par byed kyang / bden pa'i shes pa
463a3(dkon brtsegs): de la mi gnas pa de mi byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong ngo // de la byung chus
463a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang
463a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa dang chos so so yang dag pa rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la don so so yang dag par rig
463a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhen/ gang chos rnams langon dam pa'i tshig tu shes pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / 'dus pa shes pa dang / mtha' med pa'i rjes su 'gros
463a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rten pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / de bzhin rgyad gorjes su 'jug pa zhes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi gnas
463a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / song ba nyid sa sa choms pashes pa dang / mtshanam mang btsags pazhes pa dang / blon pa meng pal sngon pa ma shes pa dang / mngon par 'dus bye pam
463b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra mi byed par shes pa dang / tshul cig tu shes pa dang / sems can med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med par byed pa 'jug pa shes pa dang / srog med par byed pa cig pa shes pa
463b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gang zag med pa don dam par shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mtha' med par shes pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i dus la thams
463b3(dkon brtsegs): cad du shes pa dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar shes pa dang / khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa dang mtshungs par shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la stong pa nyid du nges par rtogs pa shes
463b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nang zhi ba shes pa dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu ba shes pa dang / yul la yul med par shes pa dang / dran pa la gnas su shes pa dang / rtogs pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang /
463b5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros la mngon sum du shes pa dang / bden pa la rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la mi 'byung bar shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa dang /
463b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med par shes pa dang / lam la grol bar shes pa dang / chos la tshig tha dad par shes pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'jug par shes pa dang / stobs rnams
463b7(dkon brtsegs): lami brdzi bar shes pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas su shes pa dang / lhag mthong la snang bar shes pa dang / sgyu ma la sgrub par shes pa dang / smig rgyal 'khrul par shes pa dang
463b8(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam mi bden pa mthong bar shes pa dang / brag cha la rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan nyid gcig tu shes
464a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'du ba la bral bar shes pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa la phyir 'tshams sbyor ba med par shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar 'jug pa
464a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brten pa 'jug par shes pa dang / mchog tu shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sngags pa rnams cad shes pa ste/ de ni byang /
464a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang don la rton pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi don la rton pa nyid kyi
464a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma lus par spong ba ste/ stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/
464a5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par smon pa med pa ste/ smon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par rnam par
464a6(dkon brtsegs): byed ste/ rnam par bye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par sems can med/ srog med gang zag med pa ste/ gang med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/
464a7(dkon brtsegs): don no// gang de lta bu'i chos rnams rtogs pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ gang don la ston pa de ni gnas med pa son pa'o// de ni mi zad pa ston pa'o// soso
464a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa tshigs pa'i don sngon pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba/ rjes su la rang ba/ yang dag pa de khom gcanam yin pa/
464b1(dkon brtsegs): ra mas rdzogs pa/ rnams pa dadu 'a ma tha med pa na/ byang chub sems dadu 'angarnams mang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// ngas rgyas sa so sang ga par ga zug /
464b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dge pa dang / mdage ba dang / khamam tho ba dang bcas pa dang // khanam rdzo ba med padang / zag pa dang babs pa dang / dag med pa dang / 'dzi na
464b3(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chadang mthun pa dang / 'khor ba dang / sma ngan las 'das
464b4(dkon brtsegs): lte bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/
464b5(dkon brtsegs): ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pa rig pa ni gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams sems 'jug pa shes pa rnams dang / bcas
464b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'dod chags spyong pa rnams dang / 'dod chags brtan par spong pa rnams dang / 'dod chags chung ngu srod pa rnams dang / rnam par mi sdang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang /
464b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma brtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags spyod pa rnams 'jug pa ste/ sems can gang dag nang du 'dod chags la
464b8(dkon brtsegs): rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / phyi rol tu 'dod chags la nang du 'dod chags pa med pa dang / phyi dang nang du'ang 'dod chags la nang dang phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chags med pa dang
465a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'dod chags la sbal 'dod chags med pa dang / sbal 'dod chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs dang skal 'dod chags
465a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gzugs dang sbrul 'dod chags med pa dang / dril 'dod chags med pa dang / dril 'dod chags la/ reg la 'dod chags med pa dang / reg la 'dod chags la/ rol 'dod
465a3(dkon brtsegs): chags med pa dang / rol 'dod chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa de ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de'i sgos 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la
465a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig stong/ zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ni khri tshig stong / gti mug la spyod pa rnams la te khri tshig stong/ chamanyam par spod pa rnams la 'i khri tshig song ste/ gang de dag gi
465a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyad khri bzhi stong gi sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / ji ltar rigs par bstan pa shes pa dang / mi mang mi chung bar bstan pa shes pa dang / 'dod pa las yang dag par 'da'
465a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / snod kyi khyang par shes pa dang / 'bras bu mod par bstan pa shes pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de langes pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pags
465a7(dkon brtsegs): ma/ gang gang tsas rnams pa la su med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / 'i sang dang / l+r-i mang dang / gnod sbyin gyis dang / dri ba'i sang dang / mi 'an gyi'i ga dang /
465a8(dkon brtsegs): chen 'i gang dang / ming mim yin pa'i gang dang / 'gro balngar skyes pa'i sems canarnams kyi ska dang / ska pa/ dbyangs rnams las sang nges de dag la chos 'cha ba sgo
465b1(dkon brtsegs): nings pa'i tshigs so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos de dag rtag par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag bsdu bar bya'o// desar chos de dag rjes su sun chags par bya'o// des
465b2(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag yi ge rnams kyis spel bar bya'o// de tshig gcig gi bla dgas shes/ tshig gnyis pa'i bla dgas shes/ tshig mang ba'i bla dgas shes/ bud med kyi tshig shes/ skyes
465b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig shes/ ma ning gi tshig shes/ bsdus pa'i tshig shes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes/ smang pa'i tshig shes/ 'das pa'i tshig shes/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshig shes/ da ltar byung
465b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig shes/ yi ge gcig gis sgro 'dogs pa shes/ yi ge mang po'i sgro btag pa shes te/ de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// yang de'i nges pa'i tshig
465b5(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa 'khrul pa ma yin/ zlos pa yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ don gsal ba'i yi ge yongs su byang ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'khor yang dag par dga' ba sna tshog
465b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob dang don dam pas brgyan pa/ bdag gi sems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sems can thams
465b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dga' bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/
465b8(dkon brtsegs): gang tshig bzang ba mi gnas par lung bstan pa/ ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ spobs pa myur ba/ spobs pa mgyogs shing myur ba/ spobs pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/ spobs
466a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su ma nyams pa/ spobs pa mi 'gal ba/ spobs brtsod pa med pa/ spobs pa chos la rab tu gnas pa/ spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/
466a2(dkon brtsegs): srod bzab pa/ spobs pa sna tshogs/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa la spobs pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
466a3(dkon brtsegs): rab thams cad la gnas pa'i spobs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
466a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la sobs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
466a5(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'i spobs pa/ theg pa thams cad la spobs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang stong pa la spobs pa/ tshig mi sdug pa'i
466a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa/ sa m-i rgya pa pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mo 'dul ba'i spobs pa/ tshig rtsub ma yin pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mnyen pa'i spobs pa/ tshig dag pa/ tshig grol ba/
466a7(dkon brtsegs): mchags pa/ tshig btsun pa/ tshig brel ba/ tshig ma nyams pa/ tsigs na pa/ tshig 'am pa/ tshigam spang ba/ tshig 'phags pa/ thams cad kyis bstod pa
466a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing mtha' yas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rjes sum+b+ha/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ba'i rtogs par byed pa'i sgra gcig pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i spobs pa/
466a9(dkon brtsegs): tshig mi 'chal ba'i spobs pa/
466b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la chos ston to// de'i chos bstan pa de yang 'byung bar byed pa/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub
466b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa la ma
466b3(dkon brtsegs): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtog pa 'di bzhi ste/ gang zhe na/
466b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang / ye shes la rton gyis rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo ma sde rnams la rton gyis drang ba'i don rnams
466b5(dkon brtsegs): lam yin pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyis gang zag la ma yin pa'o// de la don gang / tshig 'bru gang zhe na/ tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la
466b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / nges pa bstan pa'o//
466b7(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya ba na dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang / sar pa ma yin pa dang / rnyings pa ma yin par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba yongs su ba'ang ba sngags pa'i/
466b8(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la rngon pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yongs su sgrogs pa'o// don ces bya ba ni chos rang bzhin gyis yongs su
467a1(dkon brtsegs): myang na las 'das pa rnams pa rnam par mirtog pa'o// rlig 'bru zhes bya ba ni theg pa ra rnam par gnag pa bzhin du 'cha ba'o// don ces b+ha
467a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul cig brtogs par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mi gtong bar bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o// tshig 'a
467a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa zhing bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len par bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni lus dang / dag
467a4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi dmigs shing mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / khrob dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang /
467a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jom zhing bzod pa dang nges pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa
467a6(dkon brtsegs): zang ston pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi len mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus so// rig 'bru zhes bya ni bas ma da / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
467a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa'i sgom par 'jug pa shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyirtsa pan//
467a8(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang byang chub brtso
467b1(dkon brtsegs): sum thun bdun gyi chos rnams can du byed pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam rab tu bstan pa'o// dzin
467b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la rdzogs pa/ rga shi'i bar du bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni ma rig pa 'gog pa nas rga shi'i bar du
467b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni ni gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba shes pa'o// d+h+r-ig 'bru zhes bya ba ni
467b4(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / cha mnyam par sbyod ba rnams la chos bstan to// don ces bya ba ni sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa'o//
467b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sgrib par byed pa'i chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// don ces bya ba ni sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog/
467b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' med par yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'dod chags med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi
467b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan sgrub pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bslab pa dang / yon tan rtsom pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni sems kyi skad cig
467b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o// mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bstan pa de ni 'bru zhes
468a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig 'bru thams cad brjod du med pa'i don ni don no// de la drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ gang tshig 'bru bshad pa/
468a2(dkon brtsegs): 'altar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud bar bya ste/ 'di dag ni drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde dag go/ nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ don gang bshad pa ji ltar bstan
468a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du rgyu cher khong du chung par bya ste/ de dag ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde dag go// de'i ser na chos la rton gyis gang zag la mu yin zhe na/ gang drang ba'i don de ni gang zag
468a4(dkon brtsegs): don yin pas de la mi rngon gyis/ gang nges pa'i don de ni chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin pas de la rton pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa bzhi'o// de ltar na byang
468a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rngon pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong ngo // dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bachung ba/
468a6(dkon brtsegs): des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig 'phrul mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'dil byang chub sems dngu' chos gnyis la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod//
468a7(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di la ste/ rnam par shes pa mkhas pa drung / ye shes la mkhas pa yin no// de la rnam par shes pa gang / ye shes gang zhe na/ rnam byar/
468a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di sa ste/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o// ba ni gang zhen/ gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas pa dang / tshor
468a9(dkon brtsegs): r+ras
468b1(dkon brtsegs): ba la zhugs pa dang / 'dra shes la zhugs pa dang / 'dra byed la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas paste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// dmam
468b2(dkon brtsegs): shes gang zhe na/ gang len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la gnas pa rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang sa'i khams rnam par shes pa
468b3(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang ye shes khams bzhi la mi gnas pa/ chos kyi
468b4(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la shes pa dang
468b5(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i ro rnams
468b6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i chos rnams shes pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang
468b7(dkon brtsegs): yang nang skye mched rnams la nye bar zhi zhing / phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams la rgyu ba med pa/ ye shes la non pas chos gang yang gzhog par mi byed pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gnan
468b8(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / yongs su rtog pa las rnam par skye ba ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang mi
469a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa/ mi sems pa/ mi dmigs pa/ rnam par mi rig pa/ mi 'khrugs pa de ni mi shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos
469a2(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par shes pa gnas kyi/ 'dus ma byas pa la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang yang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes so// gzhan yang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la
469a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// gang yang mi skye mi 'grag mi gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de la nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ mdo
469a4(dkon brtsegs): sde gang dag lam 'jug par byed pa de dag ni drang po'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag tu
469a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzob sgrub par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag don dam pa bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag las kyi bya ba
469a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo gang dag las dang nyon mongs pa zang par bstan pa de dag ni ngas pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo ste gang dag kunan/
469a7(dkon brtsegs): na mongs pa yongs su bshang ba'i phyir bstan pa de ga drung ba'i don no// mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni ngas pa'i na/
469a8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'khor bas sgo bar byed pa de gni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag 'khor bdang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su ma 'jug pa de dag nges pa'i don to// mdo sngags
469b1(dkon brtsegs): dag yi ge dang / tshig sna tshogs su bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag bab pa lta dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba de dganings pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag tshig
