469b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mang ba/ sems can rnams kyi sems rangs par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag tshig dang tshig 'bru chung la nges par rtogs par byed pa de dag ni nges pa
469b3(dkon brtsegs): don to// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po sgra sna chog
469b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po med pa/ bdag po yod pa bzhin du bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mi 'byung
469b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / yang dag par mi 'byung ba dang / sems can med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / dus gsum las rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o//
469b6(dkon brtsegs): de la chos dang / gang zag gang zhe na/ gang zag tu lta ba la gnas te/ chos kha cig la rtsom pa de ni gang zag ces bya'o// gang zag tu lta ba rtsom pa de'i gang chos gnas pa chos kyi
469b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings de ni chos shes bya'o// gzhan yang gang zag ni so so'i skye bo'i gang zag dang / so so'i skye bo'i dge ba'i gang zag dang / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang /
469b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang zag dang /
470a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa'i gang zag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gang dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag dang / skye bo mang po la ldan pa dang / skye bo mang
470a2(dkon brtsegs): ya bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi'i skye bo bal po che'i don dang / ngan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'jig rten du skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba/
470a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ gang zag gi sku de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob kyi gnas kyis so//
470a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'o// de la gang mngon par chags pa de dag ni non pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de dag rton pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos nyid la rton par bya'o//
470a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zag la ma yin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ de la chos nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'gyur ba/ sbom btags pa/ mi byed pa/ rnam par ma
470a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ mi gnas pa/ gnas med pa/ rtsa ba med pa/ thams cad du mnyam pa/ mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la
470a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyalam pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi rtsub pa/ nges par gyur pa/ thob pa/ chos thams cad la shin tu bo tshang med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos nyid ces bya ste/ gang dag chos nyid des
470a8(dkon brtsegs): dod pa byed pa dag ni 'ams gang la lang rjod pam byed de/ de bas dngos rgyal gyi skol 'jug pa 'das/ chos bams cad larton pa'i phyir chos mas cad den du'i rnam nyi sa so//
470b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshon pa bzhi skyes bya ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rngon pa la mkhas pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa 'don pa la mkhas pa zhes rabartsam
470b2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa la snod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs ni 'di gnyis te/ rje gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams
470b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs so// de la bsod nams kyi tshogs gang zhe na/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams
470b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i bsad nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa'i sems snyoms par 'jug pa dang / snying rje'i sbyor ba dang / dge
470b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa dang / bdag dang pha rol gyi sdig pa chags pa dang / dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang / slob pa thams cad dang / mi slob pa thams
470b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang/
470b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba thams
470b8(dkon brtsegs): cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sangs rgyas thams cad 'phags pa thams cad chos thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nan
471a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i dngos po dang / dge ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sems can byang chub tu sems ma srung ba rnams
471a2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ston pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod kyis sdung pa dang / nang pa rnams la sman sbyin
471a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang / ltung ba rnams mi 'chab pa dang / sdig pa chags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
471a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bzhugs pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang / ri mo thams cad byed pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la ston pa bzhin du rim
471a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos smra ba la dga' zhing dpag tshad brgyar yang song ste/ chos nyan pas chog mi shes pa/
471a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang zing med par chos 'chang ba dang / bdang mal rim gro byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / 'grong pa med pa dang / bsod nams bsags
471a7(dkon brtsegs): pas chog mi shes pa dang / lus bsdams shing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag bsdams pa'i ngag la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / yid bsdams pa'i yid la tshul chos pa med
471a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bcugs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bsags pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa
471b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'is pa'i tshogs snga tshogs bsags pas/ dpe pyod pazang ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dmyal med pas lus brgyan pa dang / ngag gnyis pa thams cad sangs sa
471b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag brgyan pa dang / blo thogs pa med pas sems brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes ba sprul pas sangs kyi zhing gi brgyan dang / ye shes yongs su dag pas chos nyid kyi rgyan dang /
471b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe gcod pa dang / dbye ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas/ 'khor mang po'i rgyan dang / chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rgyan dang / rab tu dga' nas legs
471b4(dkon brtsegs): so zhes bya ba byin nas/ chos kyi gtam mi 'jig par byed pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mchod pa rnam par spangs shing / gus par chos nyan pas 'bras bu yod par chos 'chang pa
471b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas rnams la dka' thub kyi nags tshal phul bas byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sngon du 'gro zhing byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas
471b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / las dang nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pas shi 'pho yongs su dag pa dang / rin po che 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bas lag
471b7(dkon brtsegs): na rin po che dang / mi zad pa'i smon lam thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa dang / khro gnyer med pas mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams dang cing / bzhin 'dzum pas gsong por smrab
471b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad la 'od gzer snyoms par mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang / ma log pa la mi sbas pas 'od mang po gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nam/
472a1(dkon brtsegs): nams bsags pas/ skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / ltung ba la martsod pas mngal yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag pa
472a2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mir skye ba dang / rjes su bstan pa thams cad la rab tu rtogs pas/ gdon mi za bar gnod pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas/ chos kyi dbang
472a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum pa dang / nyi che ba'i spyod pa mi 'dod pas rgya chen po'i chos la dad pa dang / thams
472a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'dor bas/ bsod nams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sngon dam par
472a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams su len par byed pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
472a6(dkon brtsegs): brtse/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ rmug
472a7(dkon brtsegs): gis mye shes sde bas/ de ltar chu gang dang rkyen gang gis legs rtogs pa'o// des rgyu gang chen gang she na/ chos 'dol pa la rab tu 'dun pa dang / ma shes kyi
472a8(dkon brtsegs): su song ba'i bzhes gnyen bsnyen pa dang / sangs rgyas kau se shes ma rton gyis can thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon pa dang / de dag lang rgyal mgyid ba nga
472b1(dkon brtsegs): blamal dga' ba dang / ston pa la dga' ba dang / de'i dge ba'i bzhes gnyen de dag gis 'di ni bsam pa dang ldan par skyes nasas/ ye shes kyi gtam gang yang masto/
472b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / snod du shes nas bar chad med par sems rtse gcig tu chos ston pa dang / des chos thos nas chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed do// gang chos kyi chog
472b3(dkon brtsegs): la brtson par byed pa de nyid de'i ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson pa yin no// de la chos kyi tshogs la brtson pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don nyung ba dang / bya ba nyung ba dang
472b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra nyung ba dang / srong dang mtho rangs la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / 'brel ba'i don la yongs su rtog pa dang / phyir zhing yongs su 'chol ba dang / sem
472b5(dkon brtsegs): la rnag pa med pa dang / sgrib pa gnon pa dang / ltung ba las 'byung bar shes pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / nan tan snying por byed pa dang /
472b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la rtul ba dang / rtag par mgo dang / gos la me 'bar ba lta bu dang / ye shes tshol ba de nyid la gnas pa dang
472b7(dkon brtsegs): mi lhod pa dang / brtson 'grus mnga' ba dang / khyad par 'gro ba dang / 'du 'dzi las dben pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / dgon pa yid la byed pa dang / 'phag
472b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang / sbyangs pa las mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig la ri mo
473a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba la dran pa mi nyams pa dang / rtogs pa la don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / blo gros la lam
473a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rjes su mthun par byed pa dang / mos pa la sdom pa dang / rkyen la ye shes kyi rjes su rig pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'gros
473a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa sel ba dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi ling tog sel ba dang / shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / rab tu rnam par dag pa dang /
473a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya che ba dang / blo zhum pa dang / blo rab tu tha dad pa dang / mngon sum du shes pa dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i yon tan dang / rang gi yon tan gyis mi snyems pa dang / pha rol
473a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan la rtog pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la myi 'gal bar byed pa dang / las yongs su dag par shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub
473a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes kyi tshogs shes bya'o// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni sbyin pa bzhi ste/ chos smrab la grog dang / smyu gu dang / sdug cha dang
473a7(dkon brtsegs): glegs pam sbyin pa dang / chos slab la chos kyi san sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la rnyed ba dang / bkur s+t+wa~M dang / tshogs su bcang ba thams cad sbyin pa dang / chos
473a8(dkon brtsegs): slab la chos kun bsdu ba'i phyir/ g.yo med par legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ sbyin pa pani po de dag ni mi shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ba'o// kun srang ni
473b1(dkon brtsegs): bani rnams ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ chos smra ba rnams kyi lus yongs su srung ba dang / dge bsrung ba dang / yul dang ljongs su 'jun/
473b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la yongs su srung ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su srung ba ste/ kun srung ba ni bzhi po de dag go/ nye bar brtan pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
473b3(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba rnams kyi chos nye bar rton pa dang / ye shes nye bar rton pa dang / zang zing nye bar rton pa dang / byang chub nye bar rton pa'o// sdoms lnga ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur
473b4(dkon brtsegs): telnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyir stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i stobs dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi
473b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / thos pa'i stobs kyi phyir shes rab kyi stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs pa
473b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la nges pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'chol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos la nges par rtog pa'i tshul khrims te/ tshul
473b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa bzhis ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
473b8(dkon brtsegs): 'chol ba la mngon par brtson pas ngan du smras pa dang / ngag tu brjod pa'i tshig rnams bzod pa dang / chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas rlung / tsha ba dang / grang ba
474a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / grob dang / som pa dang / bkres pa bzod pa dang / chos 'tshal ba mngon par brtson pas slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i rjes su 'jugapa
474a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos 'chol ba la mngon par brtson pas spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshig
474a3(dkon brtsegs): bsogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus bzhis ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ zos pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzungs
474a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi brtson 'grus dang / ston pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nan tan gyi brtson 'grus te/ brtson 'grus bzhi po de dag gis ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par 'gyur ro//
474a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhis ye shes kyi rtogs bsogs par 'gyur te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ dbyen pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / ye shes dang /
474a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs pa sogs par 'gyur ro//
474a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi snang ba'i chos 'di bzhis ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dri sa ste/ chad pal mi gnas pa dang / rtag pa lam
474a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / ma~M 'gal pa dang / bdag med pa la mos bste/ shes rab sdang ba'i chos ngan po de dag gis mishes
474b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs bsogs par 'gyur te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / mdo sde'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa
474b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag thabs kyi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro// chos 'di bzhis lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug
474b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam dang / yan lag brgyad pa'i lam dang / thams cad mkhyen
474b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes su 'gro ba'i lam ste/ chos bzhi po de dag lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ro// mi ngoms pa 'di bzhis ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par
474b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang / dpyod pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes kyis mi ngoms pa ste/
474b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ngoms pa bzhi po de dag gis ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / zhing /
474b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su lta'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
474b8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji tsam du byang chub sems
475a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i rtsom pa de thams cad ye shes kyi khar lus pa/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes la rton pa ste/ de ye shes la gnas pas/ ye shes can ma
475a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rton par 'gyur te/ bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la klags mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang gzhog par
475a3(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshogs de gnyis la ma'
475a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa
475a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pa sgom paste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta badran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sgom pa dang / tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag sa
475a6(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lnga brtan banye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su su ba can pa nye bar gzhag pa som pa'o// de la lus la lus
475a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su m+b+ha ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom pa grang zhen/ sha ri'i bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' la yang
475a8(dkon brtsegs): sosor rtog/ lus kyi phyi ma'i mtha' la yangs sor rtog/ lus kyi dbyar byung bas mang so sor rtog ste/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni byin mo log las byung bste/ rgyu rkyen las skyes
475b1(dkon brtsegs): ba gso pa med pa/ byed pa med pa/ bdag po med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ phyi rol gyi rwa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags nas ngag rgyu
475b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen las byung zhing bdag po med/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ de bzhin du lus 'di la yang rnga dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu'i phung po dang /
475b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched yongs su 'dzin pa/ bdag dang bdag gi 'am/ rtag pa'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zlog gam/ mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skyong ste/ lus de lang yir mi na
475b4(dkon brtsegs): lus snying po med pa des snying por blang bar bya'o// de la snying po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ni chos kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/
475b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bying pa'i sku/ sra ba'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum thams cad las khyad zhugs pa'i sku/ bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o// bdag gis lus 'di nyes pa du ma'i smon chags rmod/
475b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ 'on kyang nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par bya'o zhes te so sor rtog pa'i mthus legs pa mthong nas/ 'byung ba chen po'i gnas kyi ru
475b7(dkon brtsegs): srung bar byed de/ nga'i lus ni sems can thams cad kyi ci rang gos par zad par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams
475b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams sgo sna tshogs dang / dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs dang / yo byad sna tshogs dang / yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs
476a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba de bzhin du/ bdag gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'i lus 'di sgo sna tshogs dang / dmigs pa sna tshogs
476a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs dang / yongs su spyong pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar gyur cig snyam mo// de lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang
476a3(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog mod kyis/ skye bdang shi 'phos kyang mi skye'o// lus sdug bsngal nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyis/ lus kyi sdug bsngal bas kyang yongs su mi gdung ngo //
476a4(dkon brtsegs): lus bdag nyid du yang rtog mod kyis/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang mi skye'o// lus zhi ba nyid du so sor rtog mod kyis/ lus zhi bas gtang snyoms su yang ma sru
476a5(dkon brtsegs): po// lus stong pa nyid dang / lus dben pa nyid du so sor rtog mod kyis/ dben pa'i mur yang mi srung ngo // de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ lus la rdzas dang snying por rjes
476a6(dkon brtsegs): su mi mthong ngo // nang gi sras kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ nang gi rjes su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi go skabs mi byed do// phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pan
476a7(dkon brtsegs): phyiros gyi rjes su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi dmigs so// delus nyon mongs pa med pas lus kyi yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa yin no// delus yongs su dag panas
476a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis mang dag par brgyan pa'i su 'thob bo// delus rgyan par gyur nas lha dang mi rnams mngon du 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rnaMs sbas pa'i
476b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan nye bar gzhag bsgos pa'o// yang 'aseram/ byang chub sems dpa' tsho pa la tshor ba'i rjes sa sa brda pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa na zhes/ 'dis zang chu ba sems drun/
476b2(dkon brtsegs): gang ci tshor ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes de snyam du sems te/ de ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang / shes rab kyis rtogs pa dang / thabs kyis rtogs pa'i
476b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin tu rtogs par bde bar tshor ba/ tshor bar byed mod kyis/ 'dod chags kyi bgal nyal yang bag la nyal bar mi byed do// sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas reg nas kyang /
476b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan song du skye ba thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed cing / khong khro ba'i bag la zhal yang bag la nyal bar mi byed do// bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i
476b5(dkon brtsegs): tshor bas reg kyang / ma rig pa'i bag la nyal yang bag la nyal bar mi byed do// de tshor ba'i rjes su song ba'i dran pas bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma
476b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang tshor yang tshor ba de dag las 'byung bar lta ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba yongs su shes shing zhi ba'i phyir yang
476b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ sems can 'di dag ni nor ba las 'brang ba mi shes pas/ de dag bde ba'i tshor ba la dga' bar byed/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshar ba la yang zhe sdang bar byed/ bde
476b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la rmongs pa byed kyis/ bdag ni shes rab dang / ye shes kyi rjes su rtogs pa'i tshor ba thams cad so sor sbyangs pa dang
477a1(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba'i rtsom pas sems can de dag gi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir/ chos bstan pa/
477a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// ci'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya zhe na/ rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni bde bar 'gyur ro// ma rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// de la rtogs pa'i tshor ba gang zhe na/
477a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang tshor bar byed pa med de/ chags pa ni tshor ba'o// yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshor ba'o// len pa ni tsha
477a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// phyin ci log ni tshor ba'o// rnam par rtogs pa ni tshor ba'o// lta ba'i bag la nyal ba ni tshor ba'o// mig tu 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pa'i nas yid kyi bar du 'du shes pa/
477a5(dkon brtsegs): ni tshor ba'o// gzugs su 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas/ chos su 'du shes pa'i bar du ni tshor ba'o// gang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba
477a6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang mya yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// gong ma bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la sbyar te/ yid
477a7(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba ba ba 'am/ sdug bsngal pa 'am/ bde bsang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du den tshor ba zhes
477a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gzhan yang rnam grangs kyis tshor ba gcig ste/ de ni sems gcig pas rnam par rig pa'o// tshor ba gnyis te phyi dang nang gi'o// tshor ba gsum ste/
477b1(dkon brtsegs): yA / sa rgya / smra sa myu ga/ sa sa smra
477b2(dkon brtsegs): bya / sa ma sa / /
477b3(dkon brtsegs): gyu pa gyu/ ngasas sa'adu / sa ma
477b4(dkon brtsegs): nan nor ba'i/ dmigs pa'i steng pa dang / sri ma byed pa'i sring pa thams cad tshor bar bya'o// de bas na sems can cad med zhes bya'o// des byung ma
477b5(dkon brtsegs): dnga'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su la zhing gnas par sems can thams cad kyi tshor bskye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pA la ye shes bskyed par byaste/ gang sems ca
477b6(dkon brtsegs): nga kyi dge ba dang mi dge pa'i tshorabs tshor ba shes pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa'i tshor ba nas stsalta ba'i dran bal bar bzhag pa'o// des zung chub senas dzin
477b7(dkon brtsegs): sems pa sems kyi rjes su lta pa'i nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i mI brjed pa dang / swa ba dang / kun spang ba dang / srogasung ba'o// /
477b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar mo sor rtog ste/ sems ni skyes nas 'jig cing zhu ste/ mo gnas pas nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol tu yang mi 'baste/ gang bdag gis thog ma sems
478a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa de yang zad pa med/ rnam par gyur te/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pas/ de rnyed par mi nus te/ sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa
478a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa de dag kyang zad med/ rnam par 'gyur/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so// gang yang byang chub tu bsngos pa'i sems de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan
478a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ sems kyis sems rab tu mi shes/ sems kyis sems mi tshor na/ gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
478a4(dkon brtsegs): par mtshang rgyu ba'i sems de gang yin/ gang chub kyi sems de ni dge ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs/ gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems de yang bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grog
478a5(dkon brtsegs): gang bsngo ba'i sems de yang byang chub kyi sems dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs so zhes de de ltar so sor rtog pa na/ mi skrag mi ngang dang bar mi 'gyur gyis
478a6(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'di snyam du sems te rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rgyu dang 'bras bu chung mi za ba'o// gal te sems kyi chos nyid de lta bu sems kyi rang bzhin nyid yin yang /
478a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rgyu dang rten la ra g.yas pa g.yo ba med pa/ byed pabyed pa/ bdag po meng ba/ jisar 'dod ba de bzhin du 'grub kyis/ bdag gis bsgrub pa la 'an
478a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// sems kyi chos tshad de mi 'bri bar bya'o// de la sems kyi chos nyid gang / sgrub pa gang zhen/ sems ni skyem dang 'jab ste/ de la sbyin par byed pa sa
478b1(dkon brtsegs): ma/ thams can da// gang dang bdog pams cad dngasas bdang nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sgrub pa'i nan du batho bar byang bde sbyang byung na/
478b2(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam dang 'dra bar rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang tshul khrims sdom pa'i tshogs sgrogs pa mchog de thams cad myur ba'i mngon par shes nga'i/
478b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba de ni sgrub pa'o// sems smig rgyu lta bu shin tu dang par 'gyur ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang bzod pa'i stobs dang / nges pa byang chub kyi rgyun bsgru/
478b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir bsngo ba de ni de'i sgrub pa'o// sems chu zla lta bu shin tu dben pa de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang brtson 'grus com pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cing /
478b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bsngo ba de ni de'i sgrub pa'o// sems gzung du med pa ma myong ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba
478b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin du bsngo ba de ni de'i sgrub pa'o// sems gzugs med pa mi mthong ba/ mi thogs pa/ rnam par
478b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rig pa de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang dris pa'i tshig tha dad pa bstan pa thams cad shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bsngo ba de ni nga'i
478b8(dkon brtsegs): smra ba pa'o// dmigs pa sna tshogs la sems skye ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems nye bar sbyor ba de ni sgrub pa'o//
479a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu med pa las sems mi skye ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi rgyu'i sems skyed pa de ni de'i sgrub pa'o// gang yun
479a2(dkon brtsegs): med par sems mi skye bde ni sems kyi chos nyid do// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyu'i sems nye bar sbyor ba de ni de'i grub pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem
479a3(dkon brtsegs): la sems kyi rjes su lnga zhing dran pa nye bar gnag pasgom pa'o// de sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na mngon par shes pathob pa'i phyir/ sems shin tu 'brel bar
479a4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ de mngon par shes pa thob nas sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi chos 'chang ngo // gzhan la
479a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ snying rje chen po thob pa'i phyir sems nye bar 'brel bar byed de/ snying rje chen potho bas sems can thams cad yongs su
479a6(dkon brtsegs): ske par bya ba la yongs su mi bya'o// sems la sems kyi rjes su mtshang gnas pa na sems dang ba dang / sems su 'gog par bya ba'i phyir sems par mi byed kyis/
479a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas sbyor ba rnams kyis sems kyi sems mngon par sgrub ste/ sems kyi ngan pa shes pa des ma skyes pa dang / mgyi banges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'i chos na
479a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnas te/ nyas seM da sas rgyas kyi sa mang ma krung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams pad mangs su rdzogs par mgyur gyi bar du sems kyi rkyen chags par byed /
479b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis dacig gcig dang ldan ma chashes rab kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung na bu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang ste/ ra'i sa ra rung drug/
479b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gnag pa sgom mo// shari'i bu'i ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul chos kyi rjesas sung dran pa skye
479b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhag bsgom pa gang yin zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis chos gang mthong ba de dag byang chub kyi snying po'i
479b4(dkon brtsegs): rnas ma mos par ma 'tha/ sa mchis kyichisas gnas pan/ nga ba'i dum gtogs nga/ ma
479b5(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs pa dang / ma skyes par ma gtogs pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed par ma gtogs pa dang / dngos po med par ma gtogs pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi mthong ngo //
479b6(dkon brtsegs): gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ma gtogs pa'i chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong gis/ chos ma
479b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mi mthong ngo // de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa'i don dang / sems can med pa'i don dang / srog med pa'i don dang / gang zag med pa'i don
479b8(dkon brtsegs): de chos shes bya'o// de la chos ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chang
479b9(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpal chos la chos kyi rjes su
480a1(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / ngan chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o// yang sha ri'i bu chos rnam
480a2(dkon brtsegs): cad chos so// chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos so//
480a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gis ltab bag la nyal ba'i chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su lnga zhing gnas pa na/ chos dngag
480a4(dkon brtsegs): la gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa gang las byang chub tu mi 'gyur ba dang / gang las sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ba dang / gang las lam du mi 'gyur ba dang /
480a5(dkon brtsegs): gang las thar bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos rdul tsam yang ma mthong ste/ de chos thams cad 'byung bar shes nas sgrib pazhes
480a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i snying rje chen po thob ste/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la'ang / de dag nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ma yin gyis/ de dag chen mong/
480a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i zhes smos mar 'dra shes sbed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de kyar de dag na ngas pa'i don sa yang dag par 'jug paste/ na mongs pa rnams bsdu
480a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ phung po'i ngongos med de// bdag 'ad rjes su chags pa'i phying byang chub bo// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa byang chub kyi rang bzhin ma mamam/
480b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sa rang bzhin gang yin pa tshon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/ des nga na ba lte bar 'jog kyang kyang bang kyang nye bar 'jog pa med rab tu 'bog pazang /
480b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jog pa med do// chos nyid de gnas pa nyid du shes so// de bas na chos kyi dbyings de ni gnas pa nyid ces bya'o// chos kyi dbyings gnas gang la gnas pa
480b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams kyang gnas de la gnas so// sems can gyi khams gnas gang la gnas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gnas de la gnas te/ de
480b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'chungs shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la rlon pa yin/ sa
480b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su mos par byed de/ de zad par shes pa yang skyed mod kyis/ 'dus ma byas pa'i zad pa yang mngon du ma byed/ mi skye ba shes pa mngo
480b6(dkon brtsegs): bar sgrub mod kyis sems can la lta ba'i phyir yang skye la/ mi skye ba'i mtha' de yang mi gtong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dran pa de la gzho/
480b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed chos su gdags de dag thams cad ma lus par dran pa de la 'jog ste/ dran
480b8(dkon brtsegs): de yang brjed par mi byed/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du rmongs par mi byed do// chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// zhes bya ba de ni brtan pa dpag tu/
481a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ kun du spyod yul ma yin pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par 'du ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa/ bdu
481a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dul ba rang byung ba rtogs pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su lnga zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pasgom mo// de dag ni dran pa /
481a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'adran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub som
481a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag 'di bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di la ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chu
481a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yid dge byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan la
481a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / shin grangs pa yang dag kyabyang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btad snyoms yang dag kya rgyab kyis rgyal ga /
481a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no// de la dran pa yang dag byang chub yan lag gang zhe na/ dran pa gang gis chos tshogs par byed/ chos
481a8(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog par byed/ chos la dpyong bar byed/ chos yongs su tshol bar byed ming chos rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / chos la rnam par rtog par byed de/ dredren pa nges pa
481b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyang ma cad kyis can meng desang rjes su rtogs so// yang chos rnams kyi ba nyid gis rgyan med shes pa gang zhes chothams cad rang gis nas da sa tho na
481b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gang de sbyar dran zhing khong du chud pa de ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang
481b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa ste/ nges pa'i don kyang nges pa'i don gyi/ drang ba'i don kyang drang ba'i don du/ kun rdzob kyi don kyang ku
481b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzob kyi don du/ don dam par yang don dam par/ brda yang brdar/ rnam par gtan la bab pa/ yang dag par gtan la bab par/ chos de dag ji ltar rab tu dbye ba
481b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de bzhin du de dag rnam par 'byed de/ de ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang
481b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang chos rnam par 'byed pa de nyid kyi dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms dang / ye shes kyis rab tu 'dzin pa dang / spro ba
481b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / stobs dang / rtul ba dang / mi zlogs pa'i mos pa dang / mthu dang / rtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / lam mngon par rtogs par bya ba la brtson 'grus pa ste/
481b8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ dga' ba gang dang / chos la dga' ba gang dang
482a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la mchog tu dga' ba gang gis mi zhum zhing dang bste/ mthum pa'i dga' ba de'i lus sam/ sems kyang shin tu byang bar byed la/ kun nas kon
482a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa yang sel ba de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang
482a3(dkon brtsegs): sems shin du spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pazhin tu sbyangs pa dang / bslab pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du dmigs pa la sems le bar 'jog pa ste/ den shin du spangs pa
482a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang sems mnyam par gzhag pas chos nas brtogs par 'gyur
482a5(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam par ma gzhag pas ni ma yin pa dang / sems mnyam par gzhag pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ sems mnyam par mnagapas ma
482a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ chos mnyam pa nyid dang / chos la gnol pa ma gtogs par rjes su chags pa'i kun nas dkris pas rtogs par mi byung / dzin ting nge 'dzin yang dag bya
482a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya ldan la gces bya'o// de sa gtang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang mid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sems
482a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bing dang / 'jig rten gyi sa kyis mi 'thogs padang / mamo man du mi gnas pa'i tshu rab tu mig mo ma thug rabatum thug/ yang ga par ma khrug chams
482b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mabyed / zhe sdang bar mabyed kyi/ 'phags pa'i lam de nyid dang mthun par byed pa ste/ de ni gtang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// sha ri'i bu bur rabyang/
482b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi yan lag de bdun la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag brlang la mangs
482b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam ni 'di brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag
482b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtsho dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni byang chub sems
482b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ lta ba gang 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ bdag tu lta ba las langs pa na
482b6(dkon brtsegs): min/ sems can dulta ba las langs pa ma yin/ srog tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ gang zag tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / 'byung ba
482b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig par lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ dge ba dang mi dge bar lta ba las langs pa ma yin pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das par lta ba las langs pa ma yin te/ de ni/
482b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rtog pa gang gis 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug las sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa gnas/
483a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i rtog pa de ldang bar mi byed kyis/ rtog pa gang gis rgyal khrims dang / ting 'dzin du / sa nga nga / rnam par grol pa dang /
483a2(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la rtog pa ste/ de ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i ngag gis zhe na/ yang dag pa'i ngag gis dang /
483a3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhanas ma gdung zhing / de 'i dis su sbyor ba'i dag dang ldan pa min te/ ngag dang la su mnyam pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag pa'i gces bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i las
483a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' gang zhe na/ gang las gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa de lta bu mngon par 'dra mi byed pa dang / gang las dkar po la rnam par smin pa dkar ba de lta bu'i las mngon par/
483a5(dkon brtsegs): 'a byed padang / gang las dang nags rnam par srin pa dkar nag tu 'gyur ba des bu'i las mngon par 'du ma byed pa dang / 'dulas dkar nag yin la/ rnam par na du
483a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe brdzu pa/ las bang par 'gyur ba des pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa sa/ dA las bdag gar bya ba las rton pa/ yang dag pa'i las la brtson pas yang dag pa'i las
483a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' zhes bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i mcho ba gang zhe na/ gang 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan ma gtong ba dang / kha gsag med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa
483a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'thob kyis 'jal pa med pa dang / gsosra ba dang / chog mi stod padang / gzhan gyi ning pa la thag dog med pa dang / bdag gnid pas chog zhes pa dang // kharnam
483b1(dkon brtsegs): thabs sa dang / 'gasapas bamang ba'i 'amabs/ de na yang ngag pa'i 'aman na// de la nga dag du 'grol ba gang zhen/ rgol ba gang log pa spong bar bgang ba'ajom
483b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ke sbrang dang / gtimug gang nan mongs pa dang bag lagal ba'i rtsol ba de mi 'dod kyis/ rtsol ba gang 'phags pa'i lam dang / bden pal 'jug pa/ snang sas ni
483b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gro ba'i lam du 'jog par byed pa'i tshol ba de'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ ngan pa gang shes sa
483b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhog pa dang / tha mal ba ma yin pa dang / drang pa dang / ma gyu med pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa dang / smon la lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'dren pa'i dran pang
483b5(dkon brtsegs): dran par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam mi brjed pa ste/ de ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ yang dag pa nyid du mnyam pa//
483b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la mnyam pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na/ yang dag pa nyid du 'jug ste/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas na/ sems can
483b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa nyid du 'jug pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
483b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam mi zad pa 'di byang chub sems dpas mngon par rtogs nas/ 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge
484a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa 'o// de pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnamag zhes rgyaH/ den rgyang chub sems dpa' lams skakhas ga//
484a2(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'imado// bam po bcung gruba'i/ gzhan yang las la mkhas pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ldan lag gnyis pa /
484a3(dkon brtsegs): yan la ga gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dis ste// gnas dang / lcag mthong ba/ don lam yan lag gnyis pa zhes bya'o// des na gnas gang zhes/ gang sems gyon padang / bA
484a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mye gde ba dang / dbang po rnams snyams pa dang / ma rgod pa dang / mkhengs pa dang / mi 'thor ba dang / mu co masra pa dang / nges padang / sras padang / gasgom pa
484a5(dkon brtsegs): miding 'ong ba dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / 'du 'jisel ba dang / dben par dga' ba dang / lus dben pa dang / sems ma 'khrul pa dang / dgon pa'i sgo ying la byed/
484a6(dkon brtsegs): bdang / tshog shes pa dang / 'dod bzung ba dang / 'drob yongs su dag pa dang / chog bran sumatshogs pa dang / snong las sbas pa dang / 'dums pa dang / tshogs pa dang /
484a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dbangs pa dang / gas swa ba dang / ma sor rtog pa dang / ma mtho ma dma' ba dang / tshig ngan pa smras pa bzong pa rnal 'byor gyi sla sems bskyed pa dang /
484a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'a dog la mngon par dga' ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag med la byed pa dang / byams pa bskyed ba dang/ snying rje mngon par sgrub pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa dang /
484b1(dkon brtsegs): mangs sa pa dang / byasas gdun nas brgyad kyi ba dun gyim snyoms par 'jugapas/ ngadu nas gas pa'o// mdun pas rdzog na
484b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs
484b3(dkon brtsegs): de la gang rjes su rtogs pa 'in ni gnas shes bya'o// de la skrag mthong gang zhem/ gang shes rab kyi cha dang mthun pa'i sgom pa'i 'am sa/ chos rnams la g.yo bzang dadang / mang
484b4(dkon brtsegs): can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / zang po rnams la sgyu ma'i drang byor mabyung ba'i shes pa dang / khams rnams la chos kyi khams sa mthong ba'i zhes pa
484b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin ched rnams la thong stong bar mthong ba'i zhes pa dang / mig sa rab turnam par bye bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi 'gal bar mthong ba'igs pang/
484b6(dkon brtsegs): mgro la rab tu rnam par bye bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi 'gal bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / sems can du lta ba dang bral bar mthong ba'i shes dang
484b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mthong ba'i shes pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba'i shes pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du 'jug pa la 'jug par byed pa mthong ba'i shes/
484b8(dkon brtsegs): badz+ro/ yang lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la ste/ chos rnams ji bzhin du mthong ba dang / chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / chos rnams kyi gzhan ma yin pa nyid na
484b9(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes pa dang / chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa mthong ba dang / smon pa med pa mthong ba'o// yang lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni/ rgyas mthong ba med pa dang / bla me
485a1(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ba med pa dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa'i rgyus mthong ba med cing / sdug par mthong yang cung zad kyang lhag par mi mthong ba'o//
485a2(dkon brtsegs): yang lhag mthong bas kyang mthong la/ lta ba yang mi mthong ba ste/ gang gi tshe de ltar mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag par mthong ba'o// yang dag par mthong ma/ lhag mthong la mkhas pa yang
485a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su thob ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong daltar mthong la mngon par 'du byed par yang mi ltung zhing / dge ba'i zla ba mngon par 'du byed pa la yang mi gnas te/ na
485a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang lam la
485a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dis rtse/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed
485a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bad bar byed/ brtson 'grus com/ sems rab tu 'dzim yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams snang ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa bskyed/ 26
485a7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ brtson grus rnam rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos mazlas pa rnams ste nga'i phyir 'du ba skyed/ 'bye ba byed bcon 'bras bcom/ sems
485a8(dkon brtsegs): 'am yang dag pa ngos po da / dag por tsamam skyes parnams gnas pa dang / phyi mi byung nga / mas par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyang mi bar byang kyi
485b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a cas/ 'acos 'grus rgyas/ sems ba ma/ ya dag pa pa tu sa // gang dzug pa ma dge ba nasas skyes par sus su bad
485b2(dkon brtsegs): sa bya ba tshal / mang la byed de'icheg tha dgasas// 'byung byur byed/ btsun 'bras ma shes zab na/ rdum pazhin pa sa byed pa sa gtong ba'i// mas
485b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ba tu 'jog ces bya ba nA/ tshul zan rnam ma mar rtog pa'i tshig grangags so// de na phyi zhen/ rdul bzhin parab tu sbyor ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams mi 'byung ba
485b4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ nga la tshang ga ba'itshas rnams gang zhe na/ 'dis ze/ rdub khrims kyi ma mthun pa'i phyogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi ma mthun pa'i phyogs dang / shes rab gro ma mthun pa'i thogs so
485b5(dkon brtsegs): de la tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / gang gzhan la la tshul khrims khams par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams te/ de ni rgyal kham
485b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na/ gang chos nyams pa dang / gang gzhan la la sems g.yeng bar byed pa'i chos ting nge 'dzin gyi dung
485b7(dkon brtsegs): bo'i phyogs de ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes bya'o// de la shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i glang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba nyams pa dang / gang gzhan la la lta ba kun nas
485b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrib par byed pa'i chos gang shes rab kyi phung po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs de ni/ shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes bya ste/ de ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o// rdul ba nin
486a1(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa gang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de lta bu de dag stong pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus brtsom/ sems rab tu
486a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de bas na mi dge ba'i chos de dag sems la phung por gyur pa ma yin/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so// gang yang mi
486a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos de rnams sems la rgyu ba/ sdug pa'i rnam pas 'dod chags sam/ khong khro ba'i rnam pas zhe sdang ngam/ ma rig pa'i rnam pas gti mug gam/ chu dang sdeb pa gang
486a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag las byung ba shes shing / de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rnam pa mi gtsang bas 'dod chags zhi bar byed/ byams pas ni sdang zhi bar byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas
486a5(dkon brtsegs): gtimugazhi par byed/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag ni ba deni tha skad du btags pa'i phyir/ spong ba zhes bya'o// gang spong bde ni gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// mkham
486a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis chos thams cad mngon sum pas na/ de'i phyir gang yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ste/ de ni yang dag par spong ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang dge ba'i chos ma skyes pam
486a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya pa'i phyir 'dun byed/ 'ab ra byed/ brtson 'grus bcom/ sems rab tu 'dzin/ yang dag pa rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bden/ gnas cad me sa/ na kyir /
486a8(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i dge pa'i chos chang med pa'i phyir ro// de la 'dun pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyirtsa ba'o//
486b1(dkon brtsegs): skyon grus dag par sgrub ba ni dge ba'im thams cad kyis pa'o// sems ba' pa thams sa na par byeng du na ga pa na byamasas baH/ nga /
486b2(dkon brtsegs): spong ba gsum pa'o// gang yang dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / chung mi ba bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed/ 'bang par byed/ brtson 'grus
486b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom/ sems rab tu 'dzin/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog ces bya ba de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngos pa'i tshig bla dgas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub
486b4(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos pa ni mthar byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar khams gsum la ma gnas par sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro// gang khams pa
486b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni zang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems bskyed pa de ni khams gsum la gnas pa'i phyir ro// gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba khams gsum la/
486b6(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa de la zad pa gang yang med de/ de ni yang dag par song ba bzhi pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag bzhi la mkhas
486b7(dkon brtsegs): bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan lamal mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yan lag sdang ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson
486b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de la dang pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ dad pa gang gis chos bzhi la dang /
487a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta bal mngon par dad de/ de las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa yin
487a2(dkon brtsegs): de srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dad de/ skyod pa la zhugs pa de ni theg pa gzhan la 'dod par mi byed pa dang / don ngam
487a3(dkon brtsegs): banges pa'i don dang / don dam pa nges pa'i don dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo dang / sems can la rnam par spyod pa dang / sring po nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i
487a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi chos thams cad la dad de/ lta bar byas pa thams cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
487a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dad cing thos nas/ the nom med pa nem nur med par chos de rnams sdud par byed pa de ni/ dang ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po gang zhes
487a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang bde brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed par byed pa rtse/ de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o// chos gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bsdus pa de ga rgyu
487a7(dkon brtsegs): tshapa'i bang sa rgyangs pa par byed pa 'dzin pa ni bang po nas bya'o// chos bdud gtan pa'i dbang ngos chung ba par byed pa'i chos de dag dzin myed pa mas kyi
487a8(dkon brtsegs): bye bden stong nga ladzi gyi bang po zhes rgya'o// chos gang dag tshangang 'dzin gyi nga thos rgya gcig tu byed pa de dag gis rab kyi dbang tham sa sar rtog par byed de/
487b1(dkon brtsegs): rengs nas bden zhes rab gi dbang po zhes bya'o// de ltar na dbang pol ba de dag zhan cig tu 'brel ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mongs su rdzogs par byed
487b2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i sa yang thob par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper ma pha rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag mngal na 'dug pa bud med dang / skyes pa'i dbang po mthur ba du
487b3(dkon brtsegs): mamangal na 'dug pa la lung mi ston pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dbang po lnga po de dag dang ldan gyi bar du srung
487b4(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ de ni lam yan lag lnga pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gzhan yang shA ri'i bya
487b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ yan lag lnga ni 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /
487b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi stobs so// de la dang ba'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang mos bded pa mgo gcig pa/ mi badz+rI ba ste/ gal te de'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi bcwa
487b7(dkon brtsegs): su sbyar te/ 'ongs nas chos kyi ye shes la dad pa gang yang rung ba la la zhig gis/ chos 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes dpral bar byed 'dun pa
487b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod par byed kyang / yongs su rtag pa bzung na/ 'byung ba chen po bani rnams ni gzhan du 'gyur gyis/ dang pa'i stobs la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di lham/
488a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i stobs las 'bral bar mi nus pa des na dad pa'i stobs so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
488a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs gang zhe na/ gang brtson 'grus bcom zhing dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la mngon par sbyor ba'i dang de dag la brtan pa'i stobs kyi mthu thob kyang / gnas der ma la
488a3(dkon brtsegs): tshwa bar du stobs kyi mthu de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyis rnam par zlog pa'am/ rnam par bsrang par mi nus te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
488a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ chos gang dang gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pas sems nye bar gzhag pa ste/ de ni nyon
488a5(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yang rung ba dag gi gtong ba 'am/ g.yeng bar bya mi nus te/ dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa des nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jom zhing / dran pa de yang mchoms pa
488a6(dkon brtsegs): den byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang zhen/ gang 'dra 'a mas cad dung ben pa'i myong pa sa
488a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gi lam gyi sa rnams cad la yang rtog la de'i bsam gtan da pa sgra'i n+da ras sgrib par mi byed pa dang / dge bar rtogs pa la yang rnam par nig mang kyi/ thasas
488a8(dkon brtsegs): gtan gnyis pa la yang sgrisdib par mi 'gyur ba dang / de dga' ba dang / bde bskyes te/ gnas mod kyis/ de bsam gtan gsum pa la sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / de sems
488b1(dkon brtsegs): namangs smra na par bya ba dang / dmatsha' chos yongs su brdung bar bya ba'i phyir btang soms pa yang mayin/ bsam gtan bzhi ba la sla ba par yang ma 'gyur bste/ bcu
488b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan de bzhi la gnas na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pas gzhom par mi nus te/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi gtong la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi sgrib rtse
488b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs gang zhe na/ gang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam
488b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchos pa'i ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu bzo'i gnas 'jig rten na ji snyed spyod pa dam pa dang / dka' bar byed pa dang / rnyed dka' ba de dag
488b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad slob dpon med par mngon du 'gyur te/ gang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang gang gis 'jig rten dag sgrol bar byed de/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i shes
488b6(dkon brtsegs): rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis byung ba lha dang mi rnams kyis mi choms pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab kyi stobs so// 'di ni yan lag lnga pa'i la
488b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang mdor bsdun byang chub sems dpa'/
488b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lam ni mgo gcig pa ste/ de ni lam bgrod pa gcig pa'o// 'dis rtse/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par/
489a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu grogs med par shin tu brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas gon bgos pa ste/ gzhan
489a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis ma bstan pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ste/ bdag nyid byed pa/ bdag gi stobs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa ste/ de ltar go cha 'gros nas/ gang sems
489a3(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad kyis mthob bde bdag gis thob par bya'o// gang 'phags pa thams cad dang / gang theg pa lagasar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/
489a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mthob bde bdag gis thob par bya'o// sbyin pa ni nga'i grogs ma yin gyis/ nga ni sbyin pa'i grogs so// bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
489a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni nga'i grogs ma yin gyis/ nga ni de dag gi grogs so// nga ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bslang ba bya ba ma yin gyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ngas bslang du
489a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyas par shes par bya'o// nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis 'ang bar bya bo ma yin gyis/ dge ba'i
489a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cadangs bsrung bar bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i chos rnams la grogs med cingang gcig pu gnyis su med par rdo rje'i gang na la 'dug nas/ bdud stobs dang pa
489a8(dkon brtsegs): babatul te/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// del nges par rtog pa
489b1(dkon brtsegs): sa gyu ma nga na mams pa'i sam mthong bags byab/ des na mang chub sems dpa'adam pang bag sa sa sa sa shA
489b2(dkon brtsegs): mabya // da byang chu sems dpa rnams kyi 'am la ma ngas pas/ da byang chu ba mams dpa'alam lam ba shes pas tsha pa la
489b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems pa' rnams kyi nin cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtsug pung ben par slong sterang duyang dag na ni
489b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyar sems la rtog pa skye ste/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di dag las 'byung bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de 'di ltar sems te/ rdul bzhin ma yin pa byung ba'i phyir
489b5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa 'byung / ma rig pa byung ba'i phyir 'du byed byung / 'du byed byung ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'abyung / rnam par shes pa blang ba'i phyir ming dang gzugs 'byung / zad med
489b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i phyir sgra ri 'byung / skye mched drug byung ba'i phyir reg pa 'byung / reg pa byung ba'i phyir tshor ba 'byung / tshor ba byung ba'i phyir sreng ba 'byung / sreng pa byung ba'i phyir len pa 'du
489b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa byung ba'i phyir srid pa 'byung / srid pa byung ba'i phyir skye ba 'byung / skye ba byung ba'i phyir na shi 'byung / gshi byung ba'i phyir mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngam
489b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de yang 'di ltar sems te/ ji ltar mi g.yo ba dang / mi byed pa dang / bdag po med pa dang /
489b9(dkon brtsegs): ngang gzugs
490a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos
490a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad rkyen las byung ba ste/ gang yang las kyi rgyu gang dag gis sems can gang dag gi dbang po'i rgyu tshad ma dang / lhag pa'i cho ga'i rgyu tshad ma'i 'bras bu'i rgyu
490a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa dang / de ltar zin pa dang / ma zin pa la gang rgyu 'dul ba byung ba de thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la ma
490a4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// de yang gang 'gag ce na/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gag pa'i phyir ma rig pa 'gag go// ma rig pa 'gag pa'i phyir 'du byed 'gag pa nas
490a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig gi bar du 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes de snyam du sems te/ de ltar gang de la shes pa de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa zhes bya
490a6(dkon brtsegs): de yang chos thams cad ni rgyal rag las brgyan la rag las/ 'dus pa las rag las bste/ gangargya dang rkyen dang 'dus pa la rag las pa de ni bdag gi byin gyi rlabs
490a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ srog dang gang zag gi byin gyis rlabs ma yin te/ de la bgrang ba gang yang med do// zhes de ltar sems te/ gang de sngar sems dpa' de ni rten gying
490a8(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o// desngar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byang chub kyi rnam pa'i rkyen du spong bar byed la/ rkyen de dga' las
490b1(dkon brtsegs): bang pa dang / 'gag paras sor rtag la/ sems can lta ba'i phyir zang pa dang / 'gag pa ma yin pa yang thob par byed pa den/ byang chub sems da
490b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'dis ste/ 'ju
490b3(dkon brtsegs): byas dang 'dus ma byas so// de la byang chub sems dpas 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas la mkhas par bya ste/ de la 'dus byas la mkhas pagang
490b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed do// gang yang lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi dge ba'i 'du byed kyis 'dus ma byas pa'i byang
490b5(dkon brtsegs): chub la 'dus ma byas par rtog par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba de ni 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la mkhas pa ni/ 'di lta
490b6(dkon brtsegs): sde gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa dang / pha rol tu
490b7(dkon brtsegs): byin pa lnga rnams sdud pa'o// gang yang 'dus ma byas pa'i shes pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis spong bar mi byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa'i
490b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad la mkhas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i byang chub de la mos pas/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba de ni/ de'i 'dus ma byas la
491a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'o// gzhan yang 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa ni/ sems can thams cad la 'od byer rdzogs pa med pa dang / bdub banas sems can
491a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang sems pa med pa'i phyir/ sems can la bdag med par 'dzin pa dag bsdu ba la mkhas shing 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la mos nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bcwo
491a3(dkon brtsegs): bden/ de'i 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o// gzhan sang 'dus byas la mkhas pa ni/ gang 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi kun nas sbyor ba rnams yang dag par ma gcod pa/ 'khor ba'i
491a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun gyi nyon mongs pa rnams yang dag par gcod pa dang / byang chub tu dmigs pa'i sbyor ba rnams rgyun chags par byed pa dang / sbyor ba phyogs gcig pa rnams mi sdud par spyong
491a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ni 'dus byas la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gang yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la 'dres par byas pa shes shing mngon gsum du mkhas
491a6(dkon brtsegs): padang / byang chub tu gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / 'dus ma byas kyang mngon sum du ma byed pa de ni 'das mthas la mkhas pa'o// gnas yang khams gsum na myong ma /
491a7(dkon brtsegs): khams gsuman stong pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mgos pa ni ngo'i dus byas la mkhas pa'o// yang khams gsum las byung ba'i ye shes rab tu shes kyang 'byung ba'i
491a8(dkon brtsegs): su mi srung ba ni 'dus ma byas pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gang chos thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya ba na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// ga mas
491b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma shes rtogs pa mongs su rdzogs pa da ni shes rab dang / mkhas pa med na 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/ ngar gyur chos thams cad la mkhas pa zhes
491b2(dkon brtsegs): desar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myong ngo // ma ri'i bu'i ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems bzhi
491b3(dkon brtsegs): sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas shing / mkhas pa bcu po de dag la yang mkhas pas shes rab kyi
491b4(dkon brtsegs): ral tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la shes rab ni gang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi don ni gang zhe na shes rab ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa'o//
491b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab de ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams kyi mngon sum mo// 'phags pa'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir tshad mar gyur pa ni shes rab bo//
491b6(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'o// shes rab ni lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / sgrib par byed/ sgrib par byed pa'i chos
491b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu rtogs pa'o// shes rab ni 'dod pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / smon lam dang bral ba'o// shes rab ni shin du sbyangs pa'i phyir tshim par byed pa'o// zhes rab ni
491b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas sogs pa rnam par mi gcod pa'i phyir rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o// zhes rab ni me shes thams cad mngon sum du mar nga'i phyir rten pa'o// shes rab
492a1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams cad kyi gnas so// shes rab ni thig pa'is pa bzhin 'grus partogs pa'i phy-i thob 'im nadang // nas ngan dang na/
492a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis me shes snang b.rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// shes rab ni chu bo thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir rab tu sgrol ba'o// shes rab ni yang dag par gyur pa la 'dzin pa'o// shes rab
492a3(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'o// shes rab ni nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal thams cad dang bar byed pa'o// shes rab ni chos thams cad kyi spyi bo thob pa'i mchog go//
492a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni rang byung ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la dam pa'o// shes rab ni khams gsum dang ma 'dres pas rgyu ba dang bral ba'o// shes rab ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis
492a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bzung pa'o// shes rab ni mtshan mar yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs pas smon las rnam par cha pa'o// shes rab ni mun na ga dang bral bas pag med pa'i gnyen chem
492a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni rnal 'byor stong pa'i sa la gnas pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba'o// shes rab ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam la gnas pa rnams kyi rab tu 'dzin pa'o// zhes rab
492a7(dkon brtsegs): ni ma rig pa'i klung ni mun pa rang rib kyi smin 'dom par byed pas snang bar byed pa'o// shes rab ni mig la ji ltar mos pa rnams kyi mi gathams cad kyi sbyin par byed pa'o// zhes rab/
492a8(dkon brtsegs): nacig dang gzugs kyi lam las 'das pa'i phyir bag pa med pa'o// shes rab ni bden pa las byung bas don dmapa'o// shes rab ni shin du 'dul ba'i phyir 'khrugs pa'o//
492b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni ma shes rgya sgra'i snang ba'o// shes rab ni thams cad du grub ma zad pa'o// shes rab na rten cing 'brel ba la 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir 'gal bamed pa'o// shes ran
492b2(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed pas thar pa'i lam mo// shes rab ni sgrib par byed pa'i chos thams cad dang lan cig tu mi gnas pas ma 'dres pa'o// shA ri'i bu des
492b3(dkon brtsegs): bas na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ji snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi las dang ye shes kyi spyod pa yang de snyed do// sems can thams
492b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bsam pa ji srid pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa dang / ye shes kyang de snyed do// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji srid pa byang chub sems
492b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes rab la 'jug pa'i sgo yang de snyed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa/ shes rab kyi
492b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang de sred do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bslab par bya ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ces bya'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ shes
492b7(dkon brtsegs): rab gang yin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i don kyang de yin te/ dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ces bya'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ pha rol tu phyin pa
492b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas kyang de bzhin du spyad par bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// gan/
493a1(dkon brtsegs): yang rnams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni nga rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'dus byas dang 'dus mabyas pa'i chos la mngon param
493a2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba'i nyes pa khong du drung ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// zang mi shes pas chos kyi mdzod ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
493a3(dkon brtsegs): to// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
493a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sems can thams cad kyi khams la 'jug pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mi skye ba'i chos
493a5(dkon brtsegs): la brjod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// phyir mi ldog par yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs
493a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// byang chub kyi snying po yang dag par thob pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//
493a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// gzhan yang byang chub sems
493a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gnog par byed pa'i don ni rol tu phyin pa'i don to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bslabs na/ pha rol tu phyin
493b1(dkon brtsegs): mas cad kyi 'os tu song bar 'gyuraro// gna'i than pas rnams pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi sku'am gas thams/ byung chub sems dnga'i samangs
493b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bya/ bzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan la yang bshad par bya/ rgyache rarab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i byor nen/ ro'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i snga stong kyi rgyas kyim
493b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mnyan/ blangs/ bzung / bklags/ kun chub par byas/ gzhan yang bshad/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ yon tan bcu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// bcu ga
493b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du 'phos nas gzo gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad la rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/ rigs mtho zhing btsun par 'gyur/ dbang
493b5(dkon brtsegs): che bar grags par 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams las 'phags par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur/
493b6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa thob par 'gyur/ thams cad du byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'thal bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bcu bathob par 'gyuraro// de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan mon
493b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gcer bu pa'i rtsod pa dang 'dres pa ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / bdag tu mi lta ba dang / sems can du mi lta ba dang / srog tu mi lta ba dang / gang
493b8(dkon brtsegs): zag tu mi lta ba dang / chad par mi lta ba dang / rtag par mi lta ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba dang rab tu 'byung ba la dga' bar sems bskyed pa thob pa dang / thos pa'i tshe//
494a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru myur du khong du rgya par 'gyur ba na/ yon tan gyi ban skyon bcu ba de dag thob par 'gyur ro// de gzhan yang yon tan gyingan son 'atsutho ba par 'gyur te/ @
494a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par
494a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ste/ 'dod chags 'dod pa ma yin la/ de shin tu 'dod
494a4(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang / rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang chung ste/ zhe sdang 'dod pa ma yin la/ de shin tu zhe sdang gi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang / rang bzhin gyi
494a5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug chung ste/ gti mug 'dod pa ma yin la/ de shin tu gti mug gi gdung bas yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//
494a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab ngo mtshar du 'gyur/ shes rab rno bar 'gyur/ shes rab 'grogs par 'gyur/
494a7(dkon brtsegs): rab rtsa che bar 'gyur/ shes rab zab par 'gyur/ shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gyur/ shes rab ma chags par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du mthong zhing gnas nas
494a8(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul bzhin gyi zhu ba yongs su zhu zhing / tshul bzhin gyi 'u bzhus nas/ lan lon par 'gyur bas/
494b1(dkon brtsegs): don tanam lan yon 'chu ba dag thob par 'gyur ro// des gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan mon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams ca
494b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi bcings thams cad lhod pa byas par 'gyur ba dang / des bdud tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar
494b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed thams cad du gtogs pa las yid bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba ngan par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba dran par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad la rgyab kyi
494b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam mngon du 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thams cad las sgrol ba'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems
494b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad kyi bka'i rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu pong dag
494b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan/ blangs/ bzung / bklags/ kun chub par byas/ gzhan la yang bshad cing
494b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs sa
494b8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin ga/ mkhas pa de dag shes rab mtha' yas 'gyur// chos dang don rnams la yang mkhas par 'gyur// tshig
495a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang khyad par 'phags shing yi ge rdzogs// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// de ni bdaga' shin tu dgu sres shing // dge slong de ni 'dir yang
495a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chad de// rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa byed par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni mang du chos thos nas// kye ma'o yon tan chen po 'chang byed pa// nam zhig bdag cag 'di 'dri 'chos spyan
495a3(dkon brtsegs): cing // mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes// gang dag de 'dra shes rab ldan mchog rnams// chos rnams gang lang zhum par mi 'gyur te// dran dang ye shes kyis ni 'phags
495a4(dkon brtsegs): padang // bla na med pa'i ye shes tshig ston 'gyur// gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// de ni 'phags pas rtag bsngags rgyal bas gnang // chos tshig legs par bshadas
495a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chol bar byed// de ni thos pas rtag tu 'phags par 'gyur// thos nas don ni nye bar 'dzin par byed// shes rab ldan pa 'phrul bsnyems pate// don la lta bas rtogs pa
495a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel par 'gyur// de mi mi shes drug tu chang med do// ye shes mtha' mas don kyang mtha' yas te// sems pa mtha' yas dam pa'i don la mkhas// de yi yon tan phyogs
495a7(dkon brtsegs): daphyogs su 'gro// de mthos thos pa'i yon dan 'di dgAg/ de 'i 'dod chags tshu la zhe sdang rlung // de gti mug shin tu chung ban// sems kyang shin tu dag pa na
495a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de mi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go// longs spyod rnyed nas chags par mi 'gyur te// 'di la snying po ci zhes don la rtog/ longs spyod snying po med par shes nas ni//
495b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni longs spyod mi smra bab tu 'byung // mngon par byung ste dgon par gnas// rtag tu g.yel ba med pa dang // chos rnams thos pas mngoms ste// ros sbyin pa las seras
495b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po'i drung nyid du// song ste zhu ba zhes byed pas// de phyir de yi ye shes 'phel// de la dkar po 'bri ba med// shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
495b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad bskyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// de ma
495b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na/ 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/ bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems
495b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / dor byed pa dang / don mtshungs pa
495b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ de dag ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o// de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa ste/ de
495b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sbyin pa'o// de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na/ spong ba dang / chos mnyan pa la snyan par smra ba'o// de la don byed pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
495b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o// don 'thun pa ni theg pa gang la yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg pa dang / chos de dag la 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can rnams gzho ba'o// gzhan yang sbyin
496a1(dkon brtsegs): ni gang slong ba la yid dang bar byed pa ste/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang spong ba rnams la rim 'gro byed pa'o// don byed pa ni gang gis spong ba rnams kyi
496a2(dkon brtsegs): don du 'gyur ba'i don de yongs su thob par byed pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni gang spong ba ladon mtshungs pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni bsam pas gtang ba'o// snyan par smra ba ni sbyor ba yongs su rgya
