496a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// dor byed pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa 'gyod pa med pa'o// don mthun pa ni theg pa chen po la bsngo ba'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sems kyi gtong ba'o//
496a4(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra ba ni dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba la zhugs pa'i sems gtong ba'o// don byed pa ni snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa'i sems kyis/ sems can gyi bya ba la brtson pa'o//
496a5(dkon brtsegs): don mtshungs pa ni btang snyoms la mtho dman med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsngo ba'i sems so// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang chos kyis btsal ba'i longs spyod yongs
496a6(dkon brtsegs): sra gtong ba'o// san par sna ba ni gang la sbyin par byed pade nos la 'dzud pa'o// don byed pa ni gang bdag gidon dang gzhan gyi yang dag par bskyed pa'o// don mtshungs pani
496a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can masas kyi na ma mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems daskyed bya'o// gnan yang rgyun pa n-i ga nang dang nas rnam su la ba dag pa rnams cad yongs su
496a8(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba'o// san par sla ba ni gang chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi ye zhes la slob dpon gyi dpe'am khyod med pa'o// don byed pa ni gang gis bdag gdon btang ste/ gzhan
496b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu / ma ca nga rgyabal ma smras/ rlu nga / la
496b2(dkon brtsegs): bris pa'i chos rnams son pa'o// des san par smra ba gang zhe na/ gang zang thaMng med par chos son 'o// don byed pa ni gang pa ro lal lung 'bog pa dang / rkyen byeng na dang /
496b3(dkon brtsegs): padang ston pa la ma skyo ba'o// de la don mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral par chos la 'dzud pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni chos ldan par 'ongs parma/
496b4(dkon brtsegs): lam g.yeng bar bstod pa de la snyan par sla ba ni gang brgyad ring por yang song ste/ dam pa'i chos ston pa'o// de la ngon byed pa ni gang chos 'dod pas chos smra ba rnams gos dang
496b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur ngam/ bsod soms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bral bar gyur tam/ ci dgos par gyur pa de thams cad ston par byed pa'o// don mtshu
496b6(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid ni lhag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa'o// gzhan yang chos sbyin pa ni gang sbyin pa thams cad kyis nang nas chog tu shes nas chos sbyin par byed pa'o// de la
496b7(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra ba ni gang phan pa'i dngos po bston pa'o// don byed pa ni gang don la rton gyis tshig 'phrul ma rton pa'o// de la don mtshungs pa ni gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang
496b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos ston pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / don byed
497a1(dkon brtsegs): 'anagang/ rtson 'grus kyi rgyu tshan pa'o// de rgyas paningasam gdun bar tshun dadang/ sa rab na // smra
497a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyang chub se sa dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi'o// ma sgrub rgyang chub sems dadu 'aslong pa lazugs parnams kyi'o// nga drung ba ba rgyu ba sems
497a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzos rnams rgya'o// don margyang pa rgya chubase mas dpa' skye bug gis thogs mas pa'o// gzhan ma rgyur pani rlung chub kyin pa gnas so// ngan su pa
497a4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi myu gu yongs su rdzogs pa'o// don byed pa ni byang chub kyi me tog yongs su grub pa'o// don mtshungs par byed pa ni byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon par grub paste/ de dag ni byang chub
497a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sdud
497a6(dkon brtsegs): nga / byang chub tu stong de/ de ni bsdu pa'i dngos po rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o// de skabs na chad med pa de dag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pa de dag ni byang chub
497a7(dkon brtsegs): la ma zhes bya'o// de ltar ga ri'i bri bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang po chen mo ngas/ brtson 'grus smong la byang
497a8(dkon brtsegs): kyilamade yang bshad/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang brjod do// shA ri'i bu de nas gzhon nu brtson 'grus
497b1(dkon brtsegs): snod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs padrang po chen po las byang chub kyi lam de thos/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / dasgyur byung ba'i sa su rgyas bcom ldan 'das rna
497b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan yang thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba rgya chen po rnyid par 'gyur ro// de dga' ba dang / mgu ba rgya chen po rnyeng nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gra
497b3(dkon brtsegs): bayang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag dgu bcus drug tu 'dis ste/ ni bza' dang / bsod soms dang /
497b4(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / na ba'i gsos sran dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan
497b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyong na
497b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod the tshom dang yid gnyis zan de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur te/ de'i tshe
497b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs paphung po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos spyan dang / yo byad rnams
497b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byas nas/ byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / ngal bcom ldan 'das kyis
498a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// zhes lung ma ngastan na/
498a2(dkon brtsegs): kar-i'i bu de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das 'od 'gro'i phung po chen por nan chad bsal pa grangs med pa nang bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon
498a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog yan lag ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag gi nyan thos bye ba phrag sa
498a4(dkon brtsegs): nathos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ theg pa zang bu/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi
498a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ca kyi byam pa'i pha rol tu son pa gastug go// ga ri'i bu yang de'i chen/ rgyal po mdzes par snang zhes bla mtha' bzhir rnam par rdul pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyus dang ldan pa
498a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po tshul gyi mthun pa dang / btsun pa thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba ni 'di dag go/ 'dis ste/ 'khyi mo na mam
498a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon pon po che'i bar du bdun te/ mngon par btul nas gnas pa'i bar du'o// sha ri'i buM rgyal po mdzes par snang ba de'i 'i zang ni grong khyer 'dzam burgya po'i gser shes bya ste/
498a8(dkon brtsegs): ga tsugs nas nung phyogs su rma nad ngag cad bcu gnyis/ gyo phyogs nas byang phyogs su nang dun pag chad bdun yod de/ 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa
498b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po dang / mis gang bar gyur to// yang de'i chen tshong dban+da zhes rab bzang zhes bya ba drug pa/ nor mang ba/ yongs spyod mye ba nas mdzod dang dang bas mangs
498b2(dkon brtsegs): gang ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs te
498b3(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog yan lag des/ tshong dpon shes rab bzang gi bsam pA la brtags nas/ kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bdang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rung
498b4(dkon brtsegs): kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur to snyam du dgongs te/ snod du gyur par mkhyen nas/ tshong dpon shes rab bzang ga la ba der gshegs te
498b5(dkon brtsegs): byin nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas/ byang chub kyi lam yang bshad/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
498b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang brjod do// shA ri'i bu de bas na nong dpon shes rab bzung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di la yang zos/ 'das pa dang //
498b7(dkon brtsegs): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen pothob par gyur to// dga' bag
498b8(dkon brtsegs): mthu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par su bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan la gtan thos kyang ni
499a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang nas padel ma stod du 'dus ste/ na bka' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na pa'i gsos stan dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen paku rdzas/
499a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas/ bsti stang byas/ mchod par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan la gdes r+dz+dza
499a3(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du the tshom dang ying gnyis pan
499a4(dkon brtsegs): de khyer milci'o// de'i tshe de'i dus nang tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya bar gyur to// ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag zhan thos kyi dge 'dun
499a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas bde la lo stong du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ bsti stang du byas te/ mcho
499a6(dkon brtsegs): par byas te/ byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des/ ngal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par/
499a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa yang dag pa rdzogs pakyi sang+yas rgyas su sa rna med pa yang dgA rdzogs pa'i rgyang chub tu byu ma stan to// shA shA / ponan nams nam na
499a8(dkon brtsegs): cad bskal 'grangs med pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du blang ngo // mang de'i chan rgyal pong ma thul ces bya ba zhig byung rtse/ gari'i bu rgyal po ma
499b1(dkon brtsegs): rdul gyi mong khyer bad+ma can zhes bya ba 'byor ba/ rgyas pa byed pa/ ma legs pa/ dga' ba/ skye bo mang pyo dang / mas snang ba zhig myo nga / du rgyal bong ma rdul gyi rnam tham
499b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba zhings la chen po lta bu'i bu// phyag panor bya/ yongs spyod rje ba nas mdzod dang bang po'i bar du yongs su gang bzhig blang ba de/ rgyal po maphrul la dben nong 'bangs sdugacing men
499b3(dkon brtsegs): du'ong ste/ mthon mi mthun pa med de/ shAri'i bu zlum ze ma ma'i bdag nying sa la chen po lta bu lo rgyal sring byed sbyin no// ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ rgyal po mar me'i bdag ba rgyam pa'i phyi
499b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod pa chos kyis byed de/ chos ma yin pas ma yin no// yang sha ri'i bu dus gzhan zhig ni/ rgyal po mar bdag pol du gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa bstan sdug pa/ sbyin du bzang ba
499b5(dkon brtsegs): dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i lus thams cad las 'od byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
499b6(dkon brtsegs): blang ba bzhin te/ de'i ming mar me mdzad du btags so// shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag gis bram ze mtshan mkhan lhas shes pa rnams bsdogs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mas
499b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang / de dag gis de byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ltar na rgyal po mar me'i bdag blos rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad ma ma dag la gtad do// sha ri'i bu de nas ring po malon/
499b8(dkon brtsegs): bar rgyal bu mar me mdzad gzhon nu mkhas par gyur to// shA ri'i bu de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'og min gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems
500a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mar ma mdza dgal bder songs byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mar se mdzadal bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na
500a2(dkon brtsegs): me mdzang la chags su gcang pa 'di dag smras so// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir ni// yon tan 'byung gnas gyur ba med// drang srong rgyal mtshan gnas ni// byang chub dam partog/
500a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// lang momyur du 'gro ba ni// rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs// rgas na de ni gzugs 'jig ste// 'jig rten ming du mi 'ong ba/ grogs po rgas pa mthunyams
500a4(dkon brtsegs): ni// rab tu byung bar dga' bste// khyod ni shin tu daral ba ba// khyod ni btsal ba'i dus yin no// sogs so legs so zhes rab che// legs so legs so blo gros che// myur du
500a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung na legs// thub brtan byang chub rtogs par gyis// dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// bam po nyi shu ste tha ma'o// sho ror
500a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas gcang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me mdza la bskul ba dang / dang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas
500a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi nung mo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de nyid kyi nub ma de ltar bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dam
500a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur bar/ che ba dang / dge bar grags pa'i snga dang
500b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sa sa dpa man par byung nas/ rgyal po dmathal kyis/ rgya' po mar ma bdag gi bras skya bslabs par thun ma pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chung ma
500b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo'i rgyanir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur bas par du che ba dang / dge byar chags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad bathos so// gar byung nas rgyam rje
500b3(dkon brtsegs): dmathul gyis/ rgyal po mar me bdag la khyod kyisas rab tu byung nas/ blan mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// zhes bdag gis thos te bdug
500b4(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod kyisas mar me mdzad mthong bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad thugs brtse ba'i srad du/ bdag gi drung du gshegs su gsol/ de rje n-i /
500b5(dkon brtsegs): na bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te mchi'o zhes/ pho nya btang ba dang / de nas shA ri'i bu rgyal po mar me bdag gis rtsis pa dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor
500b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams bsogs te/ de ltar gyur pa dag bzlas dang / de dag gis lha de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gsol na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thugs rje che bas thugs rjer dgongs te/
500b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dag thus kyi drung du gshegs par gyur te/ rgyal po mthul kyang 'dir ma mchis par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me'i bdag thon ba dag /
500b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de ltar gyur pa de dag gsol to// de skad gsol na/
501a1(dkon brtsegs): bcos ldan de bzhin pagags pa mar me mdud byas rgyal bam 'i bdag zas/ dbus nam na drugs brgyub gyu/ rgyal ba 'dus ma drung du
501a2(dkon brtsegs): so nas bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad/ rtswa rdzas mchog gi rgyal ba'i bo rmang du ni srong dgyes par bzhugs nus/ dgra bcom
501a3(dkon brtsegs): pabye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs so// rgyal po mer me'i bdag po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag/
501a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang bcas te/ zham phreng thog thag tu 'brang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i so
501a5(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / mar me'i bar dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byed cing / bdag gi yul gyi bar du zham 'bring byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad
501a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor te/ mchim thags nas slar mog pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par
501a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i sa sa rgyas ma sem+b+ha nga ma bcom pa gyi ba thag tung chung babs gcig tu rgyal ba'o ba zang brnyanan du gzugs par rgyal po ga rdul gyis tham so// des
501a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dgra bral gyis rgyal po'i bo phreng pad+ma can brgyan te/ sa bani dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag la gseg ma dang / gyo mdog sel du bcug/ de bas pa/
501b1(dkon brtsegs): / ga stsa sa sa smra/
501b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams par ba byams// ma ma tshams kyims/ sem mang tshogs pa da kyil sa rgya// sa rgyal gyus kyis
501b3(dkon brtsegs): nas pang rgyal po'i'o pho brang ba dra can kun nas me tog dang / dri dang byug pa yon pa rnams sus kyang ma spyad cig/ ma btsong shig/ de thams cad bcom ldan 'das mar me mdadas dngus
501b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i las su gyis shig/ la la zhig spyod dam 'tshod na/ de ni chad pa chen pos gcad do// zhes sgra bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
501b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mar me mdzad la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te/ me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / mtha dang / gdugs dang
501b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol ba dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po'i pho brang pad+ma can nas phyir byung ngo // badracan gyi tham
501b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de gal ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mjed de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
501b8(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas/ blon po dang / 'gro
502a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ zham 'bring
502a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'brang ba dang / rgyal po dgra thul sems dga' sems mgu sems la sgrib pa med sems rangs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brangs so// yang de'i tshen
502a3(dkon brtsegs): gangs ri ngos la tham ze rin po che zhes bya ba g.yog bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya yod pa/ srog tu 'dzud pa'i mkhan to// sngags 'drang ba/ rig byed gsum po snangs par sbyor ba dang sa
502a4(dkon brtsegs): bdang / shes rab gsal ba dang bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshig de zhing lung bstan pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang pa dang /
502a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin gyi rgyud dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa/ rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig gnas te/ sha ri'i bu la
502a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam be rin po ma ma bam po gzhon nu srin ces bya ba che gnas byed pa/ srog tu 'jug pa/ sngags 'chang ba/ rig byed gsum po sba nges par spyod pa dang bcas pa dang / shes pasas
502a7(dkon brtsegs): dngasas paphywa/ yo gar btung rtsib dang bcas pad+ma / snron byung bsgru rnams kyi ros tu phyin pa/ dag shing lung sngon pa dang / 'go na rgya na dang / chatshad rkyen chu
502a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa/ kha na mtho ba med pa/ rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon tu gyur bar yongs su shes pazhig yod do// ga ri'i bu nas ni
502b1(dkon brtsegs): ze gzhon nu sman ces bya ba rig byed lo bas nas/ mkhan po la/ kye mkhan po bdag gis rig byed longs te/ bdag ni yul du mchin/ bdag gis bgyi ba cimargyas zhes de na smras pa
502b2(dkon brtsegs): kye bu srin slob dpon la nor 'gron bu lnga brgya byin cig ces de skad smras so// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor nus/ mkhan po'i dru
502b3(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rgyu zhing slob dpon la 'brel ba'i slob dpon gyi nor btsal te/ des slob dpon la 'bul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor bsdus
502b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ mthar gyi rgyal po'i bo brang pad+ma can du phyin te/ bram ze gzhon nu smin gyis rgyal ba'i pho brang pad+ma can kun brgyan par mthong ngo // mthong nas ma zhig bos te/ kye skyes bu rgyal ba'i bo thang ba
502b5(dkon brtsegs): can 'dir ci'i dga' ston cig g.yos par gyur ces smras pa dang / des gzhon nu khyod kyis mi shes sam/ de ring bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
502b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad/ dgra bcom bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du gshegs te/ de'i phyir/
502b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can 'di kun brgyan to// de la mi dag sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed/ bsod nam dag kyang byed do zhes de skang smras pa dang / de nas bram ze sbyin gzhonas/ sang+yas kyi sgra thonas/
502b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mgu ba cher skyes nas sang+yas bcom ldan 'das rnas byung ba dkon te/ shin tu dkon pa/ u dum wa ra'i me tog dang 'dra/ mchod sbyin gyi shing gcig pu'i tshul lta bu
503a1(dkon brtsegs): / yin pas/ gang bdag gis kan pa Na lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos te/ bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog gtor la/ slob dpon gyi nor gud nas bcal lom
503a2(dkon brtsegs): mo// yang de'i chen/ bu mo zhig mo tog sut+pal bdun khyer te lam gyi srang nas song ba dang / de nas bram ze gzhon nu smin gyis bu mo da la/ kye bu mor+thanas byung ba'i me tog gang nas rnyed par 'gyur zhes
503a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad smras pa dang / des phyogs cheg mo zhig na/ 'phreng ba byed pa'i khang pa nas bdag gis kaR+sha ba Na lnga brgyas nyos zhes smras so// de nas bram ze gzhon nu smin gyis bu mo de la me tog chu las skyes pa
503a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ci tsam gyi nyos pa bzhin du nga la chongs shig ces de skad ces smras pa dang / des de ltar mi rung ngo zhes smras nas/ des 'o na gnyis khyod la zhog la lnga nga la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyas nyor byin cig ces snga
503a5(dkon brtsegs): nas des 'di dag gis ci bya zhes smras pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la gtor bar bya'o zhes smras so// des gal te khyod srid pa'i 'gro ba 'chi 'pho ba thams cad du bdag gi khyim thab
503a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'gyur bar dam bca' na sbyin no// des bu mo khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod pa'o// bu mo bla na med pa yi sangs kyi chos grangs med pa ni/ bsrel ba grangs med/
503a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub dgos te/ do'i phyir 'd-i d+ha ste/ 'gron bu dang / nang bu dang / mu tig dang / bre rgyu dang / drung dang / mnazhes dang / gsar dang / dngul dang ldan pa dang / na dang / grang ba che dang / bong du dang / @
503a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / gtsug dang / rgyal srid kyang yongasu btang ba dang / shing rna yongasu btang ba dang / sras yongasu btang ba dang / bu po dang bu mo yongasu btang ba dang / lag pa yongasu btang ba dang / rus pa dang /
503a9(dkon brtsegs): gang dang / gtsu ga phud yongasu btang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mnal ga mchog yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa byin par bya ste/ mngon bu mo nang dang byi'i dngos po gang bdag gis 'ongasum
503b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya med de/ bu zo gang bdag gis myong kyang mangs btang sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i brgyan pa yang bas sdom nas chom med par rab tu 'byung ba'i ngas dang myong du 'byu sa/ thong nagadun
503b2(dkon brtsegs): rgod kyis/ khyod pa'i sbyin pa'i bar chud ma byed cig/ ces de skad smras pa dang / des gas te khyod lus las sha yungs kar gi 'brum bu bcang deng la byin du zin kyang / ngas khyod kyi sbyin pa'i bar chang mi bya'o//
503b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras nas/ des de la de ltar gyur cig/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog dgang la byin cig ces smras pa dang / des kyang byin no// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis me tog ut+pa la de dag blangs nas/ brtson
503b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzangs ga chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskod
503b5(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun du bdar ba mthong ste/ spyod lam mdzes pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bar gyur to// de sems dang bar gyur nas/ shin tu dga' ba dang / dang pa dang / bkur sti bsgre
503b6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mi mang po dag gis gos bzang po bzang ba dag/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi drung du bkram pa mthong nas/ des
503b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la gos med kyis/ gang bdag gis ri dgas kyi pags pa 'di gding ngo snyam nas/ des ri dgas kyi pags pa de gding ba dang / de na mi de dag 'di 'dra ba'i sems can dkon mchog gi drung du
503b8(dkon brtsegs): ridags kyi bags pa gding ngam zhes 'phya zhing bting ba yang rtul bar byed do// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin phyogs kyi mtha' ga la ba der yang ste byin nas/ rigs kyi bags pa bting ste/ dgongs
503b9(dkon brtsegs): shig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kun nas spyan ri dgas kyi pags pa 'di la zhabs bzhag par mdzod cig ces sos bskyed pa dang / bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis
504a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ dgongs nas/ bram ze gzhon na sbyin gyi rigs kyi bags pa la zhabs banag go// de nas bram ze gnon pa srin dga' mgung dngas rab tu dag ni
504a2(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog ut+pa la lnga gtor ba dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag du mas/ lha'i me tog men+dA ra ba dang / lha me tog ut+pal dang /
504a3(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma dang lnga'i can+dan gyi phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mngon par gtor/ lha'i sil snyan rnams dkrol/ lnga'i glu dbyangs
504a4(dkon brtsegs): blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir/ me tog ut+pa la de dag ut+pa la stong phrag du mar byas te/ me tog gi bla bre 'dab ma
504a5(dkon brtsegs): badz+rar dulta ba/ sdong brjen dum par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang me mdzad la mngon par gtor to//
504a6(dkon brtsegs): gakye bram the gzonan na sems dang nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar lo bcu gnyis su ral pa gser gyi kha dogs bu bti nas/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
504a7(dkon brtsegs): mde bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag dadugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ bdag la phyag gis /
504a8(dkon brtsegs): ba gsol// zhes 'di dam brtan por cas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad pa dag gi ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i steng du zhabs ma 'jog cing bdag la
504b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyugs byin par mi mdzad/ bdag la byang chub tu lung yang mi ston na/ de'i phyir bdag 'di nyid du/ lus skams par bgyi'o// zhes yi ma yang bcas so// shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan
504b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kun nas spyan/ kun nas mkhyed pa dus gsum gang yang mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mims
504b3(dkon brtsegs): bdes/ bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi sba ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu la zhabs bzhag ste/ gas phyogs nas glang po che'i gzigs pas gzigs te/
504b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dge 'dun de la/ dge slong dag ral pa rnams la rkang pa ma bzhag cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag bram ze khye'u 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dan/
504b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
504b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mar me mdzad las lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu nas/ steng gi bar snang gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brjod du med pa/
504b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon gsum du byed do// de nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gyi bye ma las 'das bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod
504b8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bston pa dang /
505a1(dkon brtsegs): / bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar dang / lho ba'i tshams nas/ 'og dang / steng gi bar dang / phyogs bcu'i kun nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
505a2(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma pas lhag pa dag gis zla'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i ngas bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
505a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAH thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// zhes lung ston pa mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u smin lung bstan badzub nas dbugs byin par 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i kyil na
505a4(dkon brtsegs): nas babs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de'i drug du dad pas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ 'tshungs par spyad pa spyod do// sha ri'i du khyod de'i dus na/
505a5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u smin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa sum du de ltar dogs shing the tsham zan/ de ra mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da da bo che de 'i dris na bram ze'i khye sbyin ces byabs
505a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba de yin te/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mang ma mdzad de la me tog su la lnga gtor de/ ral pa yang gting ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lung stan
505a7(dkon brtsegs): bamyung du thob par 'dod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan par ga// rlung bar bya/ bzung bar bya/ gzhan dag la yang brjod par bya/ rgya
505a8(dkon brtsegs): 'a dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// gang 'di mtshan ma med pa'i spyod pas nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// tsi'i phyir zhen// sha ri'i brangs mngor par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus
505b1(dkon brtsegs): nam mamadzad kyi 'khon ngas dkar ba chos kyi spyod pa gang lam smad pa de gang yang med du/ bon kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'asam pasan// c-i
505b2(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ 'di ltar nga mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod par 'gyur to// gang gi tsheng gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyad pa/ dmigs pa med par
505b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa/ de ltar thos pa bzhin sgrub pas gnas pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin shegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsa
505b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nga lung bstan to// shA ri'i bu de ltar ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
505b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu spyod pa thams cad las
505b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba khong du chud do// mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par shes so// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das pa/
505b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad des bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
505b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung snyan to// lung bstan ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i la bu zhe na/
506a1(dkon brtsegs): / gang 'di gzugs rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rab tu mi skyed par bzod par ba tu thob pa dang /
506a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa'o// yang bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bzod pa med pa'i chos rwa
506a3(dkon brtsegs): tu thob pa'i tshig bla dgas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i chos de la ni 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kun tu mi 'byung ngo // so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ma yin/
506a4(dkon brtsegs): slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin// mi slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // chos chad
506a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad thob pa med cing mi dmigs pas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de yang mtshanam
506a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis skad kyi cig pa gan te/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni mig med do// mig la smras pa med do// gong ma bani/
506a7(dkon brtsegs): dras+yA te pa med/ sna med/ khre med/ yid med/ yid la smras pa med de/ mi zad pa'i yul de ni bzod pa/ 'gro ba med pa'i yul de mi bzod pa ste/ de byor bzod parab tu thub pan/
506a8(dkon brtsegs): byal sha ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa myur du thob par 'dod pa dag gis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med pa/
506b1(dkon brtsegs): snodag rgyu sa gru par myod gang tshigs pamed par snang ba/ shin tum ldan par dbya/ drang ba gA/ 'drang bar bya/ kun chub ba ga/ gzhan dag la brda ba dag/ rgya cher yang dag pa
506b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan par gnan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// yang de'i che 'bor de nyid du tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems
506b3(dkon brtsegs): sde snod kyi chos kyi rnams grangs dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas stan las langs te/ blagos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas// khrus mo
506b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan ma 'ag
506b5(dkon brtsegs): bas bdag la khyim bdag dgra bcom pa thob ste/ 'di ni ne shi'i tha ma'o zhes de ltar 'jug par bgyis/ de skad rjesu brtan mod kyis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sas
506b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas 'di snyam du gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par
506b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs byang chub theg pa chen po 'di ni mchog gtso bo/ dam pa mchog rab/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa'i snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das las kyang bdag gis rnam par
506b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de skyed par bya'o// zhes mngon gsum du thos/ mngon sum du bzud nas/ bdag 'di snyam du rab tu rnam par bye ba'i chos bzung ba ma/
507a1(dkon brtsegs): / mchis pa/ da'i ma mchis pa yongs su bzung ba mchis pa/ rnams kyis bcom ldan chos gang mchog gtso'o/ mchog rag gya nom pa/ bla na med pa'i cho
507a2(dkon brtsegs): deyang dag par bsgrubs te 'jug go// snyam bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du theg pa thams cad kyi nang na ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med par gnas pa lags te de bzhin gshe/
507a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i theg pa ni theg pa de dag gi mchog tu brjod pa nas/ bla na med pa'i bar du brjod pa te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'dzi
507a4(dkon brtsegs): rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde' ba'i rkang de slad dud slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem/
507a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bcas pa la yang bslab par bgyi'o// sum bgyid/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi du ma
507a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin sa 'di sa ces paka' stsal to// yis byin bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yid ces par bka' ba/ bsgrub par dka' bab// gsal ba bcom ldan 'das blan/
507a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid ches par dka' zhing bsgrub par dka' lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das de dang 'thun par brtson 'grus brtsams te/ bla na med pa/
507a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dag par rdzogs pa'i bying chub bsgrub brgya'o// mil brgyan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyig// bcom ldan 'das gas nyem
507b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa gang gA'i klung gi byem snyed kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgyabar nus par gyur la/ sems bsgred ba ra yang bsam
507b2(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lan re zhing yang mgo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed chad par gyur kyang / de ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag pa
507b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam grangs 'dis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sngon/ gang bde ba'i yod byad kyis
507b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni ji ltar bska
507b5(dkon brtsegs): babye ba brgya stong du tshig gis kyang khyod du chud par sla ba ma lags te/ de ltar rgya che ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag kyang de ltar rgya che'o// de ltar bsam gyis min/
507b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de ltar mtshungs pa ma mchis so// de ltar dpag tu ma mchis so// de ltar grangs ma mchis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa yang / de
507b7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa ma mchis so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ bdag ni byang chub sa/
507b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cing / sdug bsngal kun gyis gtses gyur kyang / sems can rnams ni mi btang ngo // sems bskyed pa ni lan re zhing // mgo yi phung po ri rab kyi/ 'phang tsam mthon
508a1(dkon brtsegs): / bor gyur pa dag/ thams cad gcod par spro bar bgyi/ srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub 'di la bdag 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod
508a2(dkon brtsegs): 'drab de 'dra lonar gyur par shog/ theg pa chu du theg pa dman/ nyan thos theg pa spangs nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod ci 'drang/ de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/ theg pa
508a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni theg pa che/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchog ces bsngags/ gzung bar 'os pa gzhan mthang / de bas bdag ni byang chub mos/ gnod par gyur pa rnams pa/
508a4(dkon brtsegs): skyos ngan 'gro gsum las thar bar bgyid/ de yi phyir na sangs rgyas dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin 'di snyam du
508a5(dkon brtsegs): sems ste/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu dag shes la gang bu dang chung ma dag chos 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin du ma cug na/ 'di ni bdag gi/
508a6(dkon brtsegs): mi na'o snyam nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskur ba byas nas rangs shing mur ba'i gzugs
508a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi khyim gal ba der song ste/ chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / lhun cig tu ras btsas bu bzung stong thogs te/ rol mom
508a8(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar 'gyur bas rangs shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ba dang /
508b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gsog dang ldan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar 'gyur bas rings shing myur ba'i rgyu
508b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ba yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces mis byin khyod g.yog dang chas te/ rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis gang
508b3(dkon brtsegs): 'cha zhes 'dzer ba dang / smras pa/ skyes bu khyed cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril lakhon
508b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag du mas bskor te// mngon du bdar nas/ rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yang dag par rab tu ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya
508b5(dkon brtsegs): po dag gi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs
508b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ga la ba der song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed pa
508b7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa la lta/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yongs su bsgrub par 'dod na tshur sheg deng ngo // bcom ldan 'das de'i gan du dong ste/ sangs
508b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyi rgya che ba dag gdon gyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams mas byin gyi tshig de thos nas/ srog chags
509a1(dkon brtsegs): // phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bumis bya ni chung ma bdan dang / khre'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang / lhan ci
509a2(dkon brtsegs): tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs nas/ srog chags stong phrag bcu po de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / ldan cig tu me tog dang / sbas dang / 'greng ba dang /
509a3(dkon brtsegs): drug pa dang / brim dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / rnga dang / ram mol las na grol te/ bcom ldan 'dasa' mtsha pa byas nas ras bcos banas
509a4(dkon brtsegs): snying po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can dam pa mi mchog gang lags pa/ byang chub mchog tu rnam par dag pa/
509a5(dkon brtsegs): sa mtha' las gzigs pa rlung gnyis rnams kyimachog/ de la de nga bdug ni mnod par bgyi// gang nig sngon gyi bskul pa mang bar spyad/ srog chas rnams la ngan phyir byang nangs/
509a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyis dbang mchog brnyes/ de la de ring bdag gis mchod pa bgyi// bu dang bran bces te dang tshogs dang bcas/ srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub rnas
509a7(dkon brtsegs): grog chags stong po 'di dang lhan cig tu// rangs rgyas dang ni chos la snrubs sra ba ni/ de nas tshang dpon gyi bu mas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis man/
509a8(dkon brtsegs): stod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ji snyed bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du mchis pa de dag thams cad ni//
509b1(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha sngags las ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis cinas kyang sems can thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
509b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i drang chub las phyingar mi ldogs par 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa gang lags pa/ dge ba rtse ba 'dis bdan
509b3(dkon brtsegs): thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur pa de ltar de dag la chos bstan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du
509b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cathams cad kyang ces 'di dag zos par gyur cig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo dun pa de dag dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu ma bdu dang
509b5(dkon brtsegs): po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang / srog chags khri po de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
509b6(dkon brtsegs): cag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsal/ deng nas ji sred 'tsho'i bar dusmon
509b7(dkon brtsegs): gcod paspong ngo // skyabs su mcho'o// mngon par dod do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//
509b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod bzhin du bdag cag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/
510a1(dkon brtsegs): // sems rnams la chos bstan par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das tshogs la gdam dag mdzad pa de bzhin du tshogs la gdams dag 'gyi'o//
510a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'dilta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can sdug bsngal rten pa rnams thar bar mdzad pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang sems can sdug bsngal
510a3(dkon brtsegs): na pa rnams thar bar bgyi'o// de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis/ sel snyan gyi sgra chen pos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do// srog nags
510a4(dkon brtsegs): khri po de dag dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin nu ma pa bdun dang / khyi'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang / g.yog thams cad dang / rol ma
510a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhan lnga rgya po de dag dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed de// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag 'thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ skyeng
510a6(dkon brtsegs): bang byung la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs// de nas del mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das seng gri bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa zang // mdzas
510a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang da bsres nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo'i cha byad de dag thams ca dbang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag ma bzung bar srid gyi bar snang la gnas shing smra byin/
510a8(dkon brtsegs): sgra byin pa'i dra bzhin gshegs pa par snang la ldan gsum bskong ba byed do// nas cang dban kyi chu mas byin ga gdang bcas pa dang / rim mam khan lnga 'i rgya mapan
510b1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / srog chags khro ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul 'di mdzang nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas thams cad tha ma
510b2(dkon brtsegs): srung ste bum ma ldan 'das la phyag 'chal/ steng gi bar snang la dpag chad gcig par yug du yang / sim snyan stong phrag du ma yong sum bzang ba dag gis thob par gyur te/ dbe na
510b3(dkon brtsegs): spong rtsi'i tshong bzhin du steng gi bar snang la rnga dang / rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ngo // de nas tshong dpon gi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam pa de
510b4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / srog chags khro bo de dag dang / sreg chags khri po de dag dang / chos nyan du sar lhags pa las srog chags drug stong tsam zhig dang / dge slong steng gnyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag
510b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa lnga lnga 'byung ngo // rol mo mkhan gyi 'ang
510b6(dkon brtsegs): pa brtsegs pa bzhin bdun gyis bltas pa'i rol mo mkhan gyi khang partsegs pa thams cad na chos ston to// bar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dag gis kyang / lha mi
510b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog mnar dag gtor to// me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gyi bar sdang lA brtsegs pa brgyud cung gyur to// de nas skye ba'i tshigs rten pa sted gyi bar snang ba
510b8(dkon brtsegs): pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang / rjes cher byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen pode/
511a1(dkon brtsegs): / de dang ba mkhyen chod dben gyi bu mis byin dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad te/ dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyu
511a2(dkon brtsegs): ches bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas/ chos las phrag pa gcig tugacar te/ bcom /
511a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rgyu ma mtshas/ rkyenam
511a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun das
511a5(dkon brtsegs): bol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' ba tshong dpon gyi brams byin 'dis chung ma bdun dang // khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang/ bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun
511a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis nga la mtshad pa byas te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du log par ltung ba ma 'gro ste/ marnams kyinang du skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal ba bye bsnong phrag brgya
511a7(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhi gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang ben zhes bya ba me na m+b+hi gyu mo mdzes par byas nas swA du
511a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// mnyes par byas nas bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mi byed par 'gyur mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de 'og tu bskal pa ci shur log par ltung bar mi 'gyur
511b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de la tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyi rlung ma bdun dang / bu bo bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / blan ma bdun gang yin pa dag ni 'di ga nas shi thos nas bud med kyi lus las
511b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mis byin dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de dag bskal gcig la blan med pa yang da/
511b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mis byin ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
511b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems snyoms shes bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mis byin gyi zhabs 'bring ba gang yin pa thams cad
511b5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa ming tha dad par 'gyur ro// rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po gang yin po de dag ni bskal pa grangs med par log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
511b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bye ba phrag spong byed par bgrang ste/ bar skabs der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu mnyes par byas nas/ bsti sang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mo
511b7(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la ba med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
511b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'gyur ro// srog chags khro bo de de/
512a1(dkon brtsegs): // las srog chags bzhi brgya ni bzhin gshegs pa byams pa mnyes par byas nas/ de'i tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// lha mi rnams ni bskal pa
512a2(dkon brtsegs): bad+hA'i klung gyi bye ma snyed na/ log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ tshul 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas nas/ bsti bstang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur
512a3(dkon brtsegs): rimir byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
512a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo mtshar ces bya bar thams cad kyang ming 'thun par 'gyur// srog chags drug stong po de dag las sa
512a5(dkon brtsegs): chags stong ning yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ dam pa'i chos nub nas mtshan gyi bskal pa par ma ni 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa nem byung ba'i dris de sa
512a6(dkon brtsegs): ca rnams kyi che ngel bar 'gyur ba'i dus de na/ rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ srog chags stong po de dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad
512a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas nas/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// gang zag gi mchog byams
512a8(dkon brtsegs): ba de yang mnyes par byas nas/ bsti skang tu byeng par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri ming bying bar 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyung // de bog tungs/
512b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyang chug rdzag grag sa kyang 'og par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas lus kyi rnam bdag rgyas kyi mdza nas/ dge kya rnams ces bsgra sa/ dpa
512b2(dkon brtsegs): nas byam med par rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon par sum byed par 'gyur ro// srog chags khri bo las srog chags mthong ba skyes pa stong gis blan mong ba yang dag par
512b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lho'i du khrag khrig phrag drug cin ches rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing drim mod pa skyes so// kun dga' bo byim pa
512b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma gtogs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang / rjes sra bskyed par mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
512b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus 'di lta bu sa'i che ba nyid thob cing mya ngan las 'angs pa la yang reg go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chagasu bcad pa 'i
512b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas la ni gus byas na/ 'di 'dra ba'i dpal thob ste/ de phyir gang la byin na ni/ 'bras bu che ba'i ston la mchod// gang yang bzhun
512b7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod/ gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i/ ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar mthong // gang yang bzhug
512b8(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa dang / gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i/ ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa/ sems kyang mnyam la 'bras bu mnyam/ mnyam pa'i sems
513a1(dkon brtsegs): / su byas nas ni// gang zag mchog la mchod byed pa// de yi rnams par smin pa mnyam mtshungasas par byang chub 'chang yang rgya// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam bzung ste/
513a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcad // mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam// de yang de la mi dkon no// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang // sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin mchog gis// de
513a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod la dang byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu 'gyur// mchod pa dam pa byas nas ni// myur du mchag tu 'byur ba yin// chos kyi dam pa son mdzad pa// rdzogs pagyis
513a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas na chob tu 'gyur// myi gang sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur// mi gang mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi// chos la stesbyin par 'dod pa te/ 'dun badrag po bskyed par bya// mang du
513a5(dkon brtsegs): nas nus bzhin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa dbang byed gyur nas ni/ yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang / mya ngan 'das par nges par 'gyur/
513a6(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan das kyis cing ldan gA la pa 'astsal pa/ shAri du pa zla'am rigs kyi dri mthig nganan po la dag par zhugs pa/ blan med pa dang
513a7(dkon brtsegs): dag nga rdzogs pa'i byung chu du mngon par rdzogs par chang rgyas par 'dzid pa dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sde kyi ma grangs dadi la bdun pa drag pa bsku
513a8(dkon brtsegs): ma gyi/ nga ga dung ba dag/ bag sa sa ku chub par bya/ senan gal brjod par bya/ gzhan dgas rgyakyang yang dag par
513b1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ ci'i byang zhen/ byang nu pa sems dpa'i sa snang kyi rnam grangs nin dus ma ma/ blangs sam/ bzung sa/ kun nub par byas sam/ gzhan dag la sad+ma ma/
513b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la na chen yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ dkon mchog sum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// chud med pa bzhi dang mi bral ba yin no// pha rol tu
513b3(dkon brtsegs): byin pa drug la brtson pa bzhi no// bsde pa'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud par brtson pa yin no// shari'i bra gung 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs de na
513b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnamyu grangs kyi nang du bcug go/ sha ri'i bri nges byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrabs nas yid dag par chad pa
513b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su thongab po// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol
513b6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa thams cad la nges pa byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyis tshad med pa'i sku rjesu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas dpag
513b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa rjesu thob pa// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes la shin tu gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// las
513b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis lus dang rnam smin gyis/ rnam par smin pa shes par bya/ las min rnam smin ma ya ni gang / de ba de de ni mya ngan 'das/ gang la shes pa med pa 'i/ 'dus/
513b9(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi lam yin ma// de ci'i phyir zhem su ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa kyi bya rdzas mi byang chub sem pa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam mangs dpa'abrel te/ kA ri'i bu byang chub me rdza ma'i rnams kyi rna
513b10(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyis pa thams cad rjes su thos pa/
514a1(dkon brtsegs): / byas thams cad sdug bsngal te// dephyir shes pa bskyed nas ni/ 'dus byas kun las rnam par grol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pag
514a2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
514a3(dkon brtsegs): bad na mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i le'u ste// bcug kyi/
514a4(dkon brtsegs): brdzogs s+ho// / a tsar+ya su re n+na dang / shi len+d+ra dang / a tsarar+ya d+harmata shrI las sbyar cing zhus te/ skad ser cid kyis kyang bcos nas gtan rtsub pa/
514a5(dkon brtsegs): ma btsats+tsha/ sh+log drug ste/ phags pa dpon mtshag brdegs pa chen pa'i chos kyi mgrangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/
514a6(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug pa rten pa'i med// 'am pa tshig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la drug 'jug// du bdag pa
514a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dus ga na// bam su ldan 'das macan yodan/ sbrul ba rtul byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gi kun dga' ban bzhugs te// de nas de dzi/ dang ldan
514a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag par 'dzegs pa las langs te/ dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste/ thal
514b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar nas/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'kha // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rmyi dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge sa
514b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma bka' stsal pa/ nga la chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ den pazang po/ gcig bres 'dres pa/ yongs su rtogs
514b3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'o// chos 'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yod kyis/ legs par nyon la phyid la bzungs shig da
514b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyod la rnam par phye ste bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos gsol ba dang / de nas btsa
514b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ dga' bo sems can rnams ni mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa'i tshe/ rgyu dang rkyen phun sum
514b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par gyur na ni/ lus len par 'gyur gis/ gal te phun sum tshogs par mA gyur nA ni/ lus len par mi 'gyur ro// de la rkyen dang mi ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di
514b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ ba dang ma gnyis g.yang chags pa'i sems byung bar 'gyur/ bar mdo'i phung po yang mngon du gyur cing / skye ba'i gnas yongs su tshol bar byed
514b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ma de dag gi 'du 'phrod snga phyir gyur cing / dus cig tu byung bar ma gyur tam/ so so'i lus la nad rnams ljon par gyur na yang / mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur
515a1(dkon brtsegs): // ro gal te ma'i mngal du rlung dang / 'khris pa dang / bad kan dang / khrag gis nye bar gnon par gyur tam mtshams shas gang ba'am/ sman gyis gang ba 'am/
515a2(dkon brtsegs): dpung nas 'dra ba'am/ grog mo'i rked pa 'dra ba 'am/ rnga mo'i kha 'dra ba 'am/ shing rta'i tshogs pa bzhin sogs khar 'dug pa 'am/ shing rta'i srog shing lta bur 'dug pa 'am/
515a3(dkon brtsegs): shing rnga'i lte ba'i kha lta bur 'dug pa 'am/ shing lo lta bur gyur pa 'am/ swalta bur gyi gyur khel bar gyur tam/ mngal gyi nang / nas kyi gram skyes pa lta bur gyur tam/ khu chud
515a4(dkon brtsegs): khrug mang du 'dzag cing / skad cig tsam du yang 'dug tu mi bdab par gyur btam/ zu tu 'jugs par gyur tam/ mngal gyi lam rtsub par gyur tam/ steng du 'angs pa'am/
515a5(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu yangs pa'am/ yo ba 'am/ zab pa ma yin pa'am/ rdol pas grags pa 'am/ mthob 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ thung zhing dag pa'am/ nad sna tshogs dang bcas par gyur
515a6(dkon brtsegs): nadang / mang la du 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// gal rje pa mtsho rigs btsun nang bsad nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la// bar mde'i drang po bsod nams chung ba'am/ bar ma rin
515a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po bsod nams chung ba'am/ bar mdo'i srid pa 'tsho rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la/ pham bsod nams chung bar gyur tam/ gcig bas
515a8(dkon brtsegs): nams dang ldan yang / ya tsun zad par gyung pa'i las pasags par ma gyur na yang / mngam du 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// di ltar ba ma rung ba'i mang du jus pa
515b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ban thog sa khan dbyin ci lag gyi sems rnam pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ bam gnyis phrad par gyud pa'iH/ gal te bar gyu
515b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhig yinan ni/ mal nani chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ pha la ni ni sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ phra'i khu ba byung ba na/ 'di ni bdag gi yin na snyam du sems gal te mor gyur pa na/
515b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ bal ni tshigs pasmra bar 'gyur la/ malan ni sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ ma'i khu ba byung ba na/ 'di ni bdag gi yin snyam du sems pas/ gal te 'di
515b4(dkon brtsegs): bra'i zhe sdang dang / chags pa'i sems spyod par mgyur na/ mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' bo ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur nem
515b5(dkon brtsegs): m+b+ha ste/ pham yang chags pa'i sems skyes par 'gyur/ dus kyi zla mtshan yang rjes su mthun par 'gyur/ bar ma de'i phung po yang mngon du gyur la/ gang ma la
515b6(dkon brtsegs): skyon mang po yang med cing las kyi rkyen dong ldan par gyur na/ mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bar mdo'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa na/ de yang
515b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o// bsod nams dang mi ldan pa gang
515b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i sems byung nas yul mthong bar gyur pa ni/ 'di snyam du sems/ deng bdag gi rlung dang / grang ba dang / gnam rmugs pa dang /
516a1(dkon brtsegs): / char bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i ci co dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod pa dang / phrad par 'gyur ro// zhes yi 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas/ deng ba
516a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa'i khyim dang / lo ma'i khyim dang / rtsig drung bden par 'jug par bya'o// yang ni ri dang nags stug po dang / brag phrag dag tu 'jug par bya'o snyam de sems te/ gzhan yang
516a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas/ ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par bya'o// gang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa de yang 'di snyam du/ deng bdag gi rgyu
516a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / grang ba dang / gnam nus pa dang / mar 'bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i ci tsom dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis/ gnod par byed pa dang / drang bar 'gyur ro zhes na
516a5(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag pa bskyes nas/ cigang khang pa rtseg ma'i steng du 'jog pa 'am/ yang thog mthon pa'i snying du 'dzeg pa 'am/ gzha' med khang gi nang du 'jug pa 'am/ khril du/
516a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyab sum dusems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas/ ji ltar mdzang ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
516a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ dga' bo 'di ltar bar mdo'i phung po de thog mkhor na mngal dri bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni med mer po zhes bya ste/ ma'i mi gtsang ba dang / 'dres pa'i las la rten
516a8(dkon brtsegs): mdus len par byed kyang / 'di ltar las de dang / ba ma byin rnams kyis pas nas rang srung bar ma gyid kyis/ 'dus pa'i thu skabs kyis lus len par byed pas/
516b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ snod kyi nang du no bkang nas/ skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / bathag pa las sogs pa la rten te mar 'byung ba yang / rten rnams las dmigs pa ma
516b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur mod kyis/ 'on kyang 'dus pa'i mthu las mar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin de/ 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthus mngal du lus can
516b3(dkon brtsegs): par grub par 'gyur ro// dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ rtswa sngon po dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / rgya shug dang / zhol tren nas/ so so nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba re re'i nang dusan du
516b4(dkon brtsegs): mi migs kyang / rgyu dang rkyen gyis stobs kyis srin du skye bar 'gyur te/ srin bu de dag skyes pa na/ so so nas rten cing lta ba bzhin du kha dog spen pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dka rtswa
516b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du pa ma'i mi gtsang ba las lus 'di skye ba yang / rkyen rnams kyi nang du btsal na dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyis/ 'on kyang rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu dang ma bral bar 'ang
516b6(dkon brtsegs): thos la yang dag par len par 'gyur ro// lus 'di skyes pa ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / ngo bo nyid tha mi dad par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams kyis ni sra ba'i bye ba byed do//
516b7(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams kyis ni gsher ba'i bya ba byed do// me'i khams kyis ni dri ba'i bya ba byed do// rlung gi khams kyis ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bru ba byed do// mer mer po'i lus de dag/ gal
516b8(dkon brtsegs): sa khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la/ chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phye dang thal ba skam po bcangs pa bzhin 'dur mi btub par 'gyur ro// gal te chu'i
517a1(dkon brtsegs): / khams 'apa' zhig dang ldan la/ sa'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbe na/ 'bu ma ram/ chu'i ring bzhin snum zhing gsher pa 'ams pa med pa pani/
517a2(dkon brtsegs): bo zh-ing gyes par 'gyur ro// gral te chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la/ me'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar tshab 'dris su shing gong bu grib ma la zhig pa
517a3(dkon brtsegs): na nyid kyis mabog pa bzhin du rul zhing myags par gyur to// gel tes dang chu dang me'i khams dang ldan la/ rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni/ 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di
517a4(dkon brtsegs): sde dpe na// khung pa mnyan nam// de'i slob ma mkhas pas bubam bcos nas/ dbugs kyis byas te/ tsi dang ni b+ha ba rnams mngon par 'dus byas nas/ de dag nang khong stang
517a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ gal te rlung gi stobs med par gyur na mngon par grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po dag kyang phan gcig la gcig rten cing yong su bzungs nas/ rnam
517a6(dkon brtsegs): par gzhag pa'i yin pas/ de'i bri'i mer mar pa'i lus pa ma'i 'byung ba chen po bani dang / las kyi rlung gi rgyus skye bar 'gyur ba yang / de bzhin du rkyen mang po rnams kyi nang na
517a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par mi gyu yang / 'dus pa'i snabs kyis lus yadi dag par len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan sa dga' bo 'di ltas+ho// dmas 'anas dpa/
517a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas su gcang palegs par smras pa/ srin bus ma thas ga/ mthum cig/ mtshig pa dang / chags pa dang / dug med pa zhig/ gang la la zhig gis zhing babang bani
517b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bcal tes ban btab na/ ci nyin zhag gcig gis myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lam grib ma dang / bcas pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rgyas shing phung sum
517b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin du rgyu dang // rkyen las rin
517b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis skye bar 'gyur gyis/ dus gcig tu dbang po rnams phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pha ma las byung bar gyur ba'i lus 'di rkyen rnams kyi nang na btsal na yang dmigs
517b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur gyis/ 'on kyang tshogs pa'i stobs kyis skye ba len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mig gang ldan pas me shes
517b5(dkon brtsegs): nor bu drangs nas/ nyi ma la bzhag ste/ lci ba skam po nor bu dang mi ring bar bston pa las me 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lci ba dang / ma'i 'od so so nas mi byin par mi nus kyang / ngan tshun me
517b6(dkon brtsegs): bral bas/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis me 'byung bar byed do// ba ma las byung ba'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ltar med mer po'i lus gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs shes byag/ rgyar
517b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pade ni ming zhes bya ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi phung po lnga bas skad cig la lus drangs nas/ sdug bsngal myong
517b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la yang ngas bsngags pa brjod par mi byed na/ yun ring por srid pa rnams su 'khor bgyur pa lta mos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gtsang ba ni nyung nam ngan
518a1(dkon brtsegs): / mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na mer mer po'i lus nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la su zhig sred par chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo'i
518a2(dkon brtsegs): ljar lus de ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgya sde lon nas gdong 'byung bar 'gyur te/ zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin de med
518a3(dkon brtsegs): tshang zhes bya ste/ lus kyi tshan ma dang por snang ba yin pas/ 'di lnga ste pe na/ zho mchags pa dang 'dra' bas/ zhig bdun gyi bar dung du bcos/ rab tu bcos nas
518a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bachen po bzhi mthar kyis mngon par grub par byed do// zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i che/ las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin paden
518a5(dkon brtsegs): kun sdud ces bya ste/ rlung shin tu phra mo/ des/ ma'i rtsibs logs g.yon pa dang / g.yas pa bus te/ mer mer po'i lus kyi mtshan ma rims kyis snang bar byed pas/
518a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i dbyi bas ni sgru ba'am/ mar 'khrugs pa 'dra ste/ mngal gyi nang du bcos rab tu btsas pas/ nung nung po'i lus su gyu nas/ 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag pas
518a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed// nag bdun phrag sum pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rang mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod ga nas
518a8(dkon brtsegs): ze/ rlung 'i skabs kyis nur chung pa gang yin pa de mthar gyis 'khrugs shing yang ltar por byed pas// ded byings ni smi ba'i bdun du drug dru chung
518b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du bcos rab tu bcas pas/ 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po 'di dag mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag bani pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i ma yang las kyi drung
518b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni nang rab tu 'byod pa zhes bya ste/ rlung gi stobs kyis ltar ltung ba gang yin pa de ni mdzang bar byed pa ste/ de'i dbyibs ni mchi gu 'dra ba ste/
518b3(dkon brtsegs): nad du bcos rab tu bcos pas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar kyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par
518b4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag por snang ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mkhrang 'gyur gang yin pa de rkang lag brgyus pa sgyur bar byed pas/ gong gong po gang yin pa
518b5(dkon brtsegs): deni rnam par phyen/ brla gnyis dang dpung po gnyis dang / mgo bo'i mtshan mngon tu byung bar byed do// 'di lta ste dper na/ dbyer gyi dus su char pa 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing rnams
518b6(dkon brtsegs): gdang / 'dab ma med par byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams snang bar byed do// nag 'dun phrag drug pa la ma'i mngal dra banas pa'i/
518b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa ga gang yin pa den zas zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma bzhi 'byung bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pus mo gnyis dang / dpung
518b8(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis gang sani bde ni mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mnga' du gnas pa'i tshi/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'khyil pa/
519a1(dkon brtsegs): / byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bani 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lag mthil gnyis dang / nang mthil gnyis ste/ de'i tsan ma ni shin du man
519a2(dkon brtsegs): bas/ dbu pa 'das pa 'dra'o// zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i che/ las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bzlog cing spyar par byed pa zhes bya/
519a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang / nang pa'i sor mo'i mtshan ma'i shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o// de ni 'di lta ste/ dper/ dbyar cha pa
519a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bab pa'i che/ ljon shing rnams kyi yal ga dang / mdab ma mthar gyis skye zhing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gyi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar bye
519a5(dkon brtsegs): sonas 'du gi dgupa la ma'i mngalan gnas pa 'i/ yang las kyi dang mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par 'byed pa zhes byas/ rlu de'i stobs kyis mtshanam
519a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dgu 'byung bar byed// dgug chen/ 'dis ste/ mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis dang / kha dang / bshang ba'i dang / gtso ba'i gnas gang yin pa des/
519a7(dkon brtsegs): rnamam man mAn zhes byag// zhag dun blag bca pa 'am ma lan gnas pa na/ yang las kyi nA mngan par grub pa gang pan nas par byung ba zhes byas/
519a8(dkon brtsegs): de skabs payi sa cing brtan par byed do// gzhan yang de'i chi kun nas \u0f89\u0fa4zhes bya ba brjing 'byung ste// de na sa mangs na gnas pa'i lus bus pas lus kun rgyas shing ba ba
519b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dap+ta/ rgyal ba gang ba ji ltur ba bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu cig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i che/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa
519b2(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa'i tshe// de steng dang 'og gi phyogs su 'am nang lus kyi brag rnams 'byin par byed do// zhan yang rlung de'i da
519b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma de res 'ga' dga' ba dang / ma dga' ba yang byed/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / thal ba na yang de'i rang bzhin 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag
519b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyong yang byed pas/ mngal na gnas pa'i drug rnams mthar gyis skye zhing 'bel bar yang byed pa/ de'i kha nas khrag nag po yang 'byung bar 'gyu sanas kyang rnam
519b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rlung de'i dbang po rnams bzlog nas de nas zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pal ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon pa
519b6(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsibs logs g.yas g.yon gyi nang khrol gyi nang rgyu mche chung rnams bskyed par byed de/ de ni 'di lta ste dper na/
519b7(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i rtsi shang shang po'am/ skud du brims pa sa la bzhag pa lta bur lan bco brgyad 'khor bar lus la brten te/ gnas so// de'i tshe gzhan yang spu brgyus pa'o// zhes
519b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rlung ste/ rlung de'i dbang gis tshigs kyi yan lag gsum bsum brgya nyi shu dang gnang brgya rtsa gcig lus la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum sa
520a1(dkon brtsegs): / la ma'i mngalan gnas pa'i chi/ gang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bkres shing skam par byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal
520a2(dkon brtsegs): byilus de ma chung shing bkres pa dang / sdom pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas/ de'i mas thos shing mjung ba'i ro snyed bdag lus kyi nang dang / ste nga'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzi
520a3(dkon brtsegs): cing na 'dogs par byed do// de nas de tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal ba/ bran ma mngal na gnas pan// mngal banas de la pan 'dags pa
520a4(dkon brtsegs): des na lus srog rab gnas shing / rims kyis skyed skyed nga 'phel bar byed/ mas ni zos shing 'thungs pa dag/ mngal na gnas na ngan 'dogs pas/ rims kyis smra
520a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ zhag bdun drug bcu bani pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa ni/ ngang las kyis rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pade snyan pa'i sgonas b+hA ste/ rA
520a6(dkon brtsegs): cu rgyas dag rgya spyad nas/ lus kyi mngan dang / rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon sgrol mar g.yog par byed do// ga bdum phrag bco lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'o tshe/ yang las
520a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rlung mngon par bsgrub pa gang pon bden pad+ma nas byaste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis cung chub chethu bskyed nas/ bza' pa dang / gung ba'i'i gang yin pa 'dir thugs nas/
520b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzas la ngan 'dags par byed do// nin ga pa zhe na/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas g.yan re re la yang rtsa lnga lnga yod de/ cha 'di dag re re la yang su phra mo'i lan lag pa na
520b2(dkon brtsegs): bcushA rtsa yad do// de dag ri la yan lag brgya brgya yod de/ lus kyi bdun na yod pa nyi dri nas ka zhes bya'o// lus kyi rtsub na yod pa nyi drin stobs shes byag/ lus kyigam rgya
520b3(dkon brtsegs): na yod pa kyi mi ni brtan pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi galas phyogs na yod pa ni khri ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ste// de ltar na rtsa'i yan lag che ba brgyad khri lus de la skye ba dru
520b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa brgyad khro ba de dag kyang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan te/ 'di lta ste/ mngan pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / mar dang / zhwa dang / 'brumar gyi kho dag go/
520b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khra bo de dag re re la yang rtsa ba re re yid de/ rtsa ba re re la yang bug sna tshogs yod de bu gcig dang / bu ga gnyis nas bu ga bdun gyi bar dang ldan te/ re re yang spu'i bug
520b6(dkon brtsegs): dang phan nun 'brel te/ de ni dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba la bug mang po yod pa ji lta bu bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ma'i mngalan gnas pa'i cha/ yang las kyi rlung ma
520b7(dkon brtsegs): pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni bdud rtsi zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis/ de'i mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / kha sgo dang / med pa dang / snying gi snying po 'khar ra khar gyus
520b8(dkon brtsegs): brag dgu po dag rnam par phye nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba steng dang 'og tu rgyu zhing / thags pa med pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba zos shing 'thungs pa gang yin pa dang
521a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lus la phan 'dogs shing bsags pa'i gnas yod pa dang / legs par bshugs nas 'og gi phyogs su 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnga mngan
521a2(dkon brtsegs): nam/ de'i gro ba ma mkhas pas 'jim pa legs par snang te/ 'khor lo'i snying du banag nas/ 'og dang steng du spyang ning snod kyi rnam pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/ man par
521a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin du/ 'di bang rlung gi stobs dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis mig dang / rna ba las sogs pa rims kyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ga bdun phrag sa
521a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'dri gdong zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig gnyis kun tu dang ba dang /
521a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sna'i dbang po las stsogs pa yang rims kyis yongs su byin par byed de// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa sa'i phye ma dang / 'bru mar dang /
521a6(dkon brtsegs): thal ba blangs te/ byang byas na/ sangs su gas la bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis mag la sugs pa byas nas/ mig la sngags pa kun tu dang bar byed sa
521a7(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i ni/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par sgrub pa gang yin par de ni brtan par 'gyur ba zhe/
521a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i dbang pa mthar kyis yongs su sman cing gsal ba dang / yongs su dag par byed de/ 'di lta sgo dper na/ 'i ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil babar rjen
521b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lug rlang rnams kyis skabs gang khebs par gyur pa/ glo brang du rlung drag pa lang sa te byas nas/ phyogs bzhing gtor bar gyur na/ nyim dang / rdza ba'i dkyil
521b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor shin tu gsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'di ltar las kyi rlung gi dbang po rnams bus pas/ chos shin tu gsal zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yang de bzhin du rig pa
521b3(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i che/ snga ma'i rlung gi stobs kyis mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag yongasu smin par byed do// dang pa
521b4(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe ni dbang po gsum dang ldan te/ lus kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po ste/ de ltar na dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// /
521b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sra ba zhes bya'o// rlung de'i stobs kyi re lus las rus pa sna tshogs skyed par
521b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// nang pa g.yon pa la brten te/ rus pa nyi shu bskyed do// nang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do// gzhan yang rkang pa'i snying pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / rje dar gyi rus pa/
521b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang / lha rkang gyi rus pa gnyis dang / rlu'i rus pa gnyis dang / byed pa dang / dpyi'i rus pa gsum gsum dang / sbal tshigs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyenan
