521b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / drang gis pa gsum cu dang // lag pa g.yas g.yon re re la rus pashu dang / lag dar gyi rus pa bzhi dang / dpung ba'i b.rus pa gnyis dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis
522a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa mgo rus pa bzhi dang / so'i rtsa ba'i rus pa sum pa rtsa gnyis kyang bskyed par byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs ma kha rnam pazugs mkhan gyi /
522a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mkhas pas/ sngur shing sra ba blangs te/ phyis srang bus bcings nas gzugs rnams byas pa/ 'jam pa ma bsku mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i tshe dus pa'i mtshan nyid ces brna pa
522a3(dkon brtsegs): duHlas kyi rlung gi stobs kyis rus pa rnams bskyed pa'i dus kyi che/ yang de bzhin te/ de lta bas na zhag bdun po de dag du rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa chen po bskyed pa
522a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs ni gnyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par bskye/
522a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhes byaste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mang can gnas pad lus kyi ga 'i skyed par byed de/ 'di lta ste par na/ zhalazhal mayin nam/ zhal zham mkhan gyi slo mas pam
522a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par sbyangs nas/ cig pa rnams la nal zhal byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lus kyi sha bskyed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phyug
522a7(dkon brtsegs): shu gcis pa'i ma mang lan gnas pa'i ci/ yangams kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun du rgyal ba zhes bya ste/ rlung 'i skabs kyis de'i khrag bsrung bar byed /
522a8(dkon brtsegs): su khrag nyi shu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'angs su dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ rlung da'i sangs
522b1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi bags pa skyed par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin 'dzin ces rgyu
522b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyi lag pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pag/
522b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni grong khyer 'dzin ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de lus la sha dang khrag 'phel zhing rims kyis rab tu dad par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyin
522b4(dkon brtsegs): drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i che/ ping las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba mngon par grub pa ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i sgra dang / spu
522b5(dkon brtsegs): sen mo rnams bskyed nas/ thams cad rtsa rgyus rnams dang 'brel ba byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i che/ yang las kyi rlung mngon pa
522b6(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni sman yon chen po zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi mtshan rnams mthar gyis mngon par grub pa zhes bya ste/ gang tshe rabs snga ma/
522b7(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing / yo byad rnams la ser sna 'phangs shing sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang /
522b8(dkon brtsegs): tha na'i gnas rnams kyi rjes su bstan pa nyan par mi byed pa zhig yin na ni/ las de'i dbang gas yid du mi 'ongs pa'i lus rnam pa snga chags thob bar gyu gas
523a1(dkon brtsegs): / lus dang zhing snyam pa dang / tshe zhing dkar ba dang / mkhyen pa gang yin 'das mdzes par gyur na ni/ lus rdung zhing phra ba dang / ring zhing gnag pa dang / chub bdag mthong ba
523a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te lus drung zhing phra ba dang / ring zhing gnag pa dang / rtsub glang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni/ lus ring zhing sdom pa dang / tshe zhing dkar ba dang / shin du mnyen padag thob par /
523a3(dkon brtsegs): detagal te lus kyi yan lag mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / mang ba dang / nyung ba dang / thags bzang ba dang / thags ngan pa dang mdzes par gyur na ni/ mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / thags
523a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / thags ngan pa dang // mi ldan pa'i lus yang dag par len par byed do// gzhan yang 'on pa dang / long ba dang / lkugs pa dang / rkang lag bye zhing 'gro ba dang / dbang po rnams mtsha
523a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshig smras pa gzhan gyis mnyan par mi 'dod pa dang / lus mi sdug po cing yi dgas dang 'dra ba yang dag par len par 'gyur te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis yin
523a6(dkon brtsegs): duma'ong ba'i las rnams pa sna tshogs len par 'gyur bas/ ba ma dang / gnyen pashes rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lnga smos kyang ci dgas/ gal te tshe rab sngams
523a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing / sbyin pa legs par btang ba dang / ser sna dang / gas spyi'i bsam pa med pa dang / nga ma dang / mkhan po dang bla ma'i gnas rnams
523a8(dkon brtsegs): sa su gas padag na par ya gyis shing yi dag par blangs pa nig yin no// sgyidang rten desags temadzes sab par gyur na yang / bang du na ga su ma
523b1(dkon brtsegs): dge bsngos pas mngan par grub pa 'grus len par ma 'gyur cing / rgyanam parnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur bas/ drang ba ni ni mdzes pa dang / mtshan sa
523b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing tshig smras pa rnam pa mang po kun gyis mnyan par 'dod pa'i 'os su 'gyur te/ de lta bas na dge ba'i las kyi dbang phyug gis khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa
523b3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo de lta bu'i lus de yang / len te pho yin na ni ma'i mngal nA g.yas phyogs su cog pur 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis kyis
523b4(dkon brtsegs): gdong g.yogs nas/ ma'i skal tshigs logs su bltas te 'dug go// gal te mo yin na ni rtsib logs g.yon phyogs su cog pur 'dug ste/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogan
523b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ mtha ba la bltas nas/ mthu ba'i gnas kyi ni 'og/ zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng na nang du bcos/ rab tu bcos shing / gnas lnga kun tu bcings pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rwa'i
523b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa 'dra'o// gal te de'i sems shin tu mang du zos sam/ shin tu nyung ngu zos sam/ gal te zas shin tu mngar ba 'am/ shin tu rtsub pa 'am/ shin tu skam pa/
523b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ shin tu snum pa 'am/ shin tu lan cha bro ba 'am/ shin tu kha ba'am/ shin tu sgyur ba'am/ shin tu grang ba 'am/ shin tu cha ba dag zos par gyur tam/ gzhan yang 'dod chags
523b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ drag tu song ba 'am/ mchongs pa byas sam/ yun ring du nyal ba 'am yun rings 'dug par gyur na yang / mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar/
524a1(dkon brtsegs): man nas pa'i sdug snga la chang ba la du dag gis btu ga bar ga zug// ngas ma rgyu ba rdzug bsngal 'das du na pang ma/ mas
524a2(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal dpe'i byadaka' ba rnams lha smos kyang ci dgos te/ mkhas pasra zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'di 'i bung rab tu mos par byed/ zhag bdun phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la
524a3(dkon brtsegs): mangs na gnas pa'i tshe/ byin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gnon pa'i 'du shes dang / khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang / wa~M sman gyi 'dun
524a4(dkon brtsegs): dang chu mig gi 'du shes dang / rdzing gyi 'du shes dang / chu bo'i 'du shes dang / kun dga'ar ba'i 'du shes dang / skyed mas tshal gyi 'du shes dang / 'dini 'dugs rnam pa brgyad ces byas/
524a5(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun drag ni shu dgru pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'ini/ yang las kyi rnying mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mi tog 'phreng ba zhes bya ste/ rlung 'i skabs kyis mang la na gnas pa de
524a6(dkon brtsegs): grus kyi legs pa'i mngag kun tu gzang ning mtshan ma rnam parabatu gas la bar byed de/ thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus sulas rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bye drug mam mas pa
524a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa'i lta ba bzhin du 'dig rnam pa snga tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur bas// kha cig mi dag pa/ por 'gyur// ba ci ming dag nag par 'gyur/ kha cig mi bdog dkang bam
524a8(dkon brtsegs): la ma nag pa yang ma yin par 'gyur/ kha cig mi bdag sngon par 'gyur/ kha cig mi ba dog rtsub cing bskam par 'gyur/ kha cig ni bdog snum par 'gyur te/ 'dil bu'is
524b1(dkon brtsegs): dog gi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// zhag bdun phrag sum cu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe// yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni lpags kyi sgo zhes bya ste/
524b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i sgra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams rab tu 'phel ba dang / kha dog dkar nag rnams rab tu gsal bar byed de// las kyi rkyen gyis mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
524b3(dkon brtsegs): nag 'a thugasam thugacig pa nas/ zhag bdun mag su bulnga pa'i bar duma'i mang mdu gnas pa tshon/ khrus kyi mam mnams cher skye bar 'gyur bas/ ma kyis sa
524b4(dkon brtsegs): chagasun su mchogs shing yangs par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ dbyung ba'i bsam paskye bas mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur/
524b5(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas/ pa'i tshe ni/ phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa'i 'du shes rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lnga gang zhe na/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i rgyu
524b6(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / brtson ra'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi 'du shes dang / yongs skyonas phyir 'byung ba'i 'du shes skye ba gang yin pa ste/ mngal na gnas pa de yongasu skyo ba'i bsam pa de lta bu dag skye ba cum
524b7(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun drag brgyad pa lama'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni thogs pa'i rkyen ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de rab tu bsgyur ba byed do// gzhan yang na
524b8(dkon brtsegs): byung ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ de'i mgo thur tu lta zhing lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ thar kyis 'byung 'dod par 'gyur ro// mngal na gnas pa de/ gal te tshe rabs snga ma la mngal dri 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i las
525a1(dkon brtsegs): / bcugs pa zhig yinan ni/ de'i lag pa dang / rkang pa snol mar gyur nas/ bskur mi nus pas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis/ ma'i mngal nyid du chi ba'i dus byed par
525a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de'i ma yang de'i ni sdug bsngal chen pa myong ba'am/ yang na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// gal tsher bas sngam la dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing/ tshe ring por 'gyur ba rgyu
525a3(dkon brtsegs): thugs pazhig yinan ni/ seMs ba chi/ ma dang bu gnyis garab tu bde zhing/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gong ma lta bu med do// nag bdun phrag gsum bu rtsa brgya ma
525a4(dkon brtsegs): nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas/ 'dod 'brang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir lus 'di lta bu len pa 'di ni yang dag par sdug bsngal chen po yin par ni
525a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byamo dang pomong sa nas 'byung ba'i chi// khyi bu mdu mi yang rung ste/ sa la ltung bdag tu lag pas bzung ngas/ gos kyis blangs sam// khril bzhag pa ma khang pa'in du banag pas/
525a6(dkon brtsegs): 2gas zag cang bang banag gas/ ma la banagasas/ dganan mo byur gyings su grang ba dang / cha ba zhing gis bcas mthag pa'i mas del reg par gyur na yang /
525a7(dkon brtsegs): ba chen pa myong par 'gyu / 'de la ste dper na/ dalang bson po bgras pa rtsig pa la rig gam/ blagam med pa'i thung la ltung bar gyur // sreg nag sa dag gis zab
525a8(dkon brtsegs): ma ga ya 'dig ste/ ba na/ minig pasnang du ma na ngas rnams kyis za pa la/ yang lugs kyis bzlas pa de bzhin du/ rangi ba mang nas 'byung ba na tshu na ma dgasas/
525b1(dkon brtsegs): brkus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal myo ba yang de dang 'dra'o// bcas nas mthar gyis cher 'gyur ba dang / ma'i lus las khrag dang 'dres pa'i nu'o byung nas bso par byed de/ ngas sngar mang sdig nas
525b2(dkon brtsegs): las rgya cher bstan pa yin no// de lta bas na lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang / sdug bsngal mang po las mngon par grub pa yin pas/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba na 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes
525b3(dkon brtsegs): su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo mngal nas byung nas nag bdun len pa dang // srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgya na lus las skyes nas de la za bar byed do// skal ba
525b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhes bya ba'i srin du'i rigs gnyis yod de/ sbrul gnas nas skal za bar byed do// khrin du'i rigs gnyis ni mig la gnas myig la ba bar byed do// sprin pa'i rigs par mang ba// thas
525b5(dkon brtsegs): nang srong dang / yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ blang ba la gnas nas klang bza bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lnga nag po'i lo ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rna ba la gnas nas
525b6(dkon brtsegs): rnab za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang / kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/
525b7(dkon brtsegs): mnul gnas nas mchul za bar byed do// sprin bu'i rigis na zhes bya ba gcig yad de/ snrel gnas nas ldel za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs khacwo zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ blo'i rgyu
525b8(dkon brtsegs): na gnas nas lce'i drung la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba cig yod de/ dkan la gnas nas dkan la za bar byed do// srin bu'i lag pa dra can dang / rkyed
526a1(dkon brtsegs): / sgyur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas lag mthil la za bar byed do// srani bu'i rigs dpung pa dang / nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung
526a2(dkon brtsegs): pal gnas nas dpung pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lugs can dang / nye ba'i lcags can gnyis yod de/ ming pa la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs rdo rje dang /
526a3(dkon brtsegs): rdorje chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ snang la gnas nas skyeng la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dman pa dang / dman pa'i kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod na/ shal gnas nas sha la thabar
526a4(dkon brtsegs): byed do// srin du'i rigs pa dog dang ldan pa dang grags ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la 'thung bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dri gtod zhes bya ba
526a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yod de/ chung la gnas nas chub za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mi mthong ba dang / khas sgrub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rtsub kyi sgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi sngal chen
526a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tha bar byed do// srin dung rigs tshol gyi khadog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshig la za bar byed de/ srin bu'i rigs 'khris pa'i kha drog ces bya ba cig yod de/
526a7(dkon brtsegs): 'as pa la ga cas nas 'khris pa lab bar byed do// srin du'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mtshan pal banas nas mtshan pa za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs 'ang mabums
526a8(dkon brtsegs): bya gcig yod de/ mcher pa la gnas nas mcher ba bar byed de/ srin bu'i rigs lngabargya 'ad de/ rigs rgya ni sde ba zhes bya'o// gis brgyan pa'i la zhes bya'o// gas
526a9(dkon brtsegs): rigs brgya ni 'phel byed ces
526b1(dkon brtsegs): ni bsal byed gtong shes bya'o// rigs brgya ni yangs pa zhes bya ste/ rtsibs legs g.yon pa la gnas nas/ cibs legs g.yon pa la za bar byed do// gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs
526b2(dkon brtsegs): dargya yod ni dbong ma dang mthun te/ rtsibs logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsibs logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs chung zad 'bigs pa dang / cher 'bigs pa dang / rus pa yin
526b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rus pa'i gdeng zhes bya ba ba ni yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs cher dkar ba dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / snom pa'i stobs dang / sdug
526b4(dkon brtsegs): pam shes bya ba ba 'i yod de/ rna rgyas la gnas nas rba rgyas la za bar byed do// ni du 'i rigasams pa'i 'di dang / seng ge'i stobs dang / ribong lce dang / 'did pa mngon par rten pa
526b5(dkon brtsegs): byab ba ni yod de/ mthu pa'i gnas la gnas nas ma zhu bo'i gnas la za bar byed do// sman bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dpa' ba bdag po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas
526b6(dkon brtsegs): nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mug dang / drang kha dang / phung po'i kha dang / b+hi'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ gtso ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la
526b7(dkon brtsegs): za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang byed pa chen po dang / bye ma dang / bo tang ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang pa'i lam la gnas nas/ bshang ba'i lam la za bar byed do//
526b8(dkon brtsegs): srin du'i rigs padeng gnag dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ bcwal gnas nas brlal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdzeban dang / mdza
527a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ bdun zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la tha
527a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mgo gnag ces bya ba gcig yod de/ nang pa la gnas nas rga pa la za bar byed do// dga' bo ngas de khyod la srin du'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus 'dil ba na
527a3(dkon brtsegs): nas nyin mtshan du za bar byed pas/ thams stobs chung zhing mdog ngan par byed pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lus 'di la 'dus nas gzhan yang de'i sems gdung ba dang / ma
527a4(dkon brtsegs): dang yongasu gdung bar byed pas/ sman pa mkhas pa yod kyang / de la rmongs sman gang gis nad 'di dag giso bar nus pa shes par mi 'gyur ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ mkhas pa su zhig
527a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgyamache 'di 'du lus pa rjes su chags par byed// gzhan yang dga' bo dang pa bcas nas cher skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du/ gas dang zas kyis gsas nas/ lus 'di mngon pa
527a6(dkon brtsegs): b+hA blu pa sgyu kyang / de'i che'i ched lce nasgrub pa yang yodade/ de bas zung ba yang yod do// lo ba d+ha po de dag dus sum bsgyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dpying dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi nus sa
527a7(dkon brtsegs): ga nga rjes ga na nan pa rdzasas/ shAng ba dzin pa nga du // gang 'a pa du 'dus shA 'a
527a8(dkon brtsegs): rmi ban ga/ yo ga ni rje ba bcug cis yang par 'gyur la/ pa rgyal ni zlab stong kyis rgyam par 'byung bas thabs dzad pa ba dge/ zlang mer gyi nagapas byin sa s+ho/
527b1(dkon brtsegs): bani brgyar 'gyur te/ de la nyin mtshan ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do// nyin cig la lan gnyis zabs ni/ lan snang phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zabar 'gyur // res 'ga' mi
527b2(dkon brtsegs): b.rang grangs dang 'dus te// deni 'di lta ste/ na pa dang / re ba dag ched du bas bcad pa dang / gnyid lag pa dang / cid mchis pa dang / las gzhan gyis dral ba dang / ma dzin nga
527b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyus m+b+ha na mdzes pa gang yini pa de ni ma zas pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta bu'i lus 'dil brgya khyab par gyur kyang / mthang 'jig par 'gyur bas/ mkhas pa su cig sa
527b4(dkon brtsegs): rnamache bding de la rjes su chags par byed// gzhan yang dga' bo lus 'di yang dag par blangs pa la sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyis yod de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nang mang ba rnams
527b5(dkon brtsegs): sa la 'dus pa gang yin pa de ni ning gyi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya'o// mi dang mi yin pas rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// de la na dmang pa
527b6(dkon brtsegs): lus la 'dus pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig da rna ba dang / sna dag / lce dang / lkog ma dang / sa dang / brang dang / lto ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa rnams na par gyung ba dang / gzhan sa
527b7(dkon brtsegs): rlungan pa dang / snabs dang / smras pa dang / khong rje dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / glon pa dang / gci ba'i lam rtsab mo dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang 'bras dang / thor bu dang / zhu ba dang / 'brum dud
527b8(dkon brtsegs): rkang bam dang / gzhan yang ning rnam pa sna tshogs lus la 'du ba gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang 'khris pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / rlung nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan gyi nang brgya rtsa gcig dang /
528a1(dkon brtsegs): / rlung dang / 'khris pa dang / pad kan 'das pa las byung ba'i nad brgya rtsa gcig ste/ de ltar nas bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dag gis lus nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sdug bsnga
528a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phyi rol kyi lus 'di la gnod par byed pa 'di lta ste/ brtson ra dam por bcug pa dang / lcags kyis bzlas pa dang / btson rang bcug pa dang / bcings pa'i sdug bsnga
528a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang rnaM pa gtsad pa dang / sna bcad pa dang / lag pa dang nang pa gtub pa dang / mgo bcad pa dang / lha rnam kyis ma bsrungs pas/ mim na pa'i gdon marungs pa rnams dang /
528a4(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / phrin po rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang sbrang bu mchu rirings dang // gasbrang la sogs pa srin bu gdug pa rnams kyis zos pa dang / grang ba dang /
528a5(dkon brtsegs): tshab da / bkres pa dang / snyom pa dang / rlung dang / pa khang gnas par gyung pa'i sdug bsngal rnams pa sna rtogs kyis lus nyon mongs par byedade/ mir gyur pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal la
528a6(dkon brtsegs): de dran/ dan gro rnams kyi sdug bsngal k+ta spos kyang ci dges// de ni shin tu brjod pad/ 'o// de lta bas ni 'di dag thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon pa
528a7(dkon brtsegs): du dang bang des 'di la bu ma par smin pa skyeng bar rig par bya'o// gang gis mtshan na dag gis gnod pa byas pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyob zang khyer bcigs te 'bas kyi ldan na/
528a8(dkon brtsegs): rus des su sus la rlung ba / snang bu d+ha ris dag / gasdang 'azugs pa thang kyis dag tu ngas nas/ gnod pa byed par 'gyur ma nang zhi rgya bzhis kya na dbya na
528a9(dkon brtsegs): pa da
528b1(dkon brtsegs): mongs par byed do// bza' ba dang btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / zhid dang / kun dga'ar ba dang / khang khyim dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa rin pa che sna bdun dang / dran na
528b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dran mo dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad rnams yong su tshol ba na/ gal te yid dang mthun par gyur na yang / sdug bsngal bskyed par bye/ gal te long srung thob par gyun
528b3(dkon brtsegs): thabs smras 'apangs shing nag tu spang ba dang / gal te stor zhing chud zos par gyur na yang sdug bsngal chen pa bskyed par byed do// dge' bomador na nyi ben pa'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni/ gro bdas
528b4(dkon brtsegs): spang ba dang 'dug pa dang / nyal 'i skyed 'am thams cad sdug bsngal ma son pa gang yong med pas/ gal te yun ring du 'gro zhing skad cig sam yang dal pa gsong med par gya na 'ang sdug 'as
528b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur la/ sdod pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba de dag so so nas yun ring du gyur na yang // thams cad sdug bsngal bar gyur pas/ gal te yun ring du song song ba las/ skad cig tsam du 'dug du 'ad
528b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na/ bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed par byed kyang / de yang dag par bde ba ma yin pas/ de'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni thams cad kyang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o//
528b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zhig gis bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams yongs skyo bar byed nas/ khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ yang
528b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par slob par byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par grol ba'i chos las yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur la/ gang la las zhig gos dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsas sman dang //
528b9(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bang bar byed pa ma yin no// gal te yum ring du 'thong ba las skang cig tsam du 'dug pa dang / la te yum ring du 'dug pa sa sa skang cig tsam du lta gyur pa 'ang yangs mams na nas
529a1(dkon brtsegs): / sa byang rnams kyis de la rim grodag par dag kyang / rnam pa sprin pa rnon po'i mthu dang / grags thob par 'gyur po khyim ldan 'das kyis pa 'phrul pa/ dga' ba na
529a2(dkon brtsegs): rdza sum du sems/ gzugs gang yin pa de ci'i rtag pa zhig nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa cig yin// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga'i bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs de na
529a3(dkon brtsegs): martag pa 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba' bstsal pa/ gaul te ma rtags pa yinam/ de sdug bsngal bdi ni rnam par 'jug pa'i chos can yin na 'phags pa'i than thos pa dang ldan pa de
529a4(dkon brtsegs): lta du'i bstan pa thob par gyur na yang lus 'di ni 'di lta bu'i gzugs canan nas 'dzin cing// de la bedag dang bdag gis 'dzin par byed dam/ bcom ldan das de ni ma lags te/ gzugs pa
529a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ces bgyi ba yang ma mchos la/ bdag gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis paso// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin
529a6(dkon brtsegs): bde dag cinagang zhig yin nan/ khon te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad ni mi rtag par lags
529a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi rtag pa yin na/ ci sdug bsngal ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba med pa zhig yin pa ni// dpa' bos gsol pa/
529a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar drung po ban pa de dag ni sdug bsngal ba zhes brgya ba lags so// batsham ldan das rgyas pa 'phrul pa/ yang mirtag cing drug bsngal pa med pa deni rnam par 'dzus
529b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes can yinan/ 'phags papa zhin thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de lta bas bstan pa thos par gyur na yang / lus 'di phung po bzhi po dag la/ bdag dang bdag ging 'dzin par byed dag bam
529b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ phung po bzhi po dag la 'ang dag par bdag cas bgyi ba yang ma mchis pa/ bdag gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar bdag
529b3(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba de ni/ 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nang dang phyi rol na'ang yod pa ma yin la/ rags pa dang phra ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / nye ba dang / ring ba la ma
529b4(dkon brtsegs): banings chos de dag thams cad ni bdag dang bdag gi nga ma yinano// de lta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar yang dag par shes pas/ chos rnams la bdag med par sa par brtag pa 'i
529b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i can thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang / de ltar so sor brtags nas yongs su skyo ba med par byed na/ rnam par grol zhing mthar yongasu mya ngan las na
529b6(dkon brtsegs): bathob par 'gyur te/ de ltar yang dag par bslabs nas/ chos 'di mngon tu gyur pa'i ni/ skye ba'i chen med cing tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad pas bya ba byas nas nga
529b7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ni rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral bas// chos
529b8(dkon brtsegs): mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga rgya po de dag ni chos rnams la lezlas pa med par zag pa zad nas/ sems rnam par grol lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
530a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor mang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grang
530a2(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mngal du 'jug par bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste// 'dus pa bcu gsum pa/ rdzogs so// 'phags pa dkon mchog brjes
530a3(dkon brtsegs): bachen pa'i mdo stong brag brgya ba las// gcung ma tu dga' bo zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen pa'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'jams cad la drug
530a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser spyan shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chad med pa rnams dang thabs ba
530a5(dkon brtsegs): dazugs te 'a dzin pa ma ldan das gargya dga' ba zhes bye ba de'i dus pa sa ga 'dog can/ mtshan sumacu dang ldan ni'i tshad pamaldan 'das las sa bzhis drung bzhizhis
530a6(dkon brtsegs): mede ngam su da zhes bya ba babang mo stan sdug ga/ byang pa zhi mdzes shing 'jig rtenan nag kha ga rgyang ba tu dag tu gag/ mang po ku kyis pad+ma da pa zhigasangs
530a7(dkon brtsegs): di 'chags kyang zhen par gyur pas/ da cig tsam du yang ma bral zhi / 'ad pa'i sems kyis nin du rtags par gyus/ srog gi 'jab bar byed pas// bajam ldan nas
530a8(dkon brtsegs): byar rdzu pa ma / yin pa ba mal ga zung ba ma nam mam mdzang che ldan kri gang ba dang / zab rgya drung mang gangs pa sa
530b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis dga' bo'i khyim gangan par derang gshegs nas/ de'i sgor gshegs te bzhugs so// de nas thugs rje chen po'i mthus 'od gser gyi kha dogal du btang bas/ dga'
530b2(dkon brtsegs): khyin rnying du kun du gser bcom lta bu'i kha dog tu gyur pa dang / de tshe dga' bo 'di sum du 'od gzer kun tu snang bar gyur pas/ gdon mi che bar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin nasum du
530b3(dkon brtsegs): byams nas/ dag 'ang ma zhig mngags te// kye song la su la ni bltos shig ces bsgo ba dang / des kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ myur zhing rings par slar log nas/ dga' rtse
530b4(dkon brtsegs): mamacam ldan 'das sman de zhugs sa zhes smras so// des de skad ces smras pa/ thos nas myung du phyir byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gsus te/ phyag byas pa las// de'i tshesan+ta ka 'i
530b5(dkon brtsegs): sum du/ bdag gis gal te 'di btang bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar rab tu byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems nas/ gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung stem btang
530b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dga' bos smras pa/ ded re shig thong shing+ga dang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas bdag slar 'ong ngo // sun de ri kas smras pa/ bdag cag dam bcas nas gdod de bzhin btang
530b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes de'i dpral ba la thagi le gsher ba'i mtshan ma btags nas/ 'di skad du/ thig le 'di ma skams par slar gshegs su sol// gal te thogs par gyur na/ gser gyi smra ba na
530b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgyas chad pas bcad do// zhes smras pa dang / dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes sgor byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de bzhin gshegs
531a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa'i lhung bzed blangs nas/ srar khyim du zhugs te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / sod pa dag lhung bzed bkang nas slar sgor byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
531a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed ma len cig par mtshan ma bstan to// de bzhin gzigs bston pa chen po na
531a3(dkon brtsegs): ba gyi chengs bshes gas la zhes gsal pa thugs kyang mdzub nas/ yang kun dga' bo la phyin pa dang / kun dga' bas smras pa// khyod kyis snru zed 'di srung 'angs
531a4(dkon brtsegs): gabacom ldan 'das las thangasaso// kun dga' bas smras pa/ 'on bcom ldan 'das la phul cig des smras pa/ bdag snyan pa mos chen po lags pa ba'i thugs mdzub thams
531a5(dkon brtsegs): mam+b+ha bar zhabs brang du sang ngo // bcom ldan 'das snyir gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas phyag pasams thabs bsil te/ gdan la bzhugs pa dang / dga' bas lhung bzed
531a6(dkon brtsegs): thas pade bcom ldan nas la dral 'i/ com ldan 'das kyisems kyi kying mtshanas/ dga' ba la dka' stsal pa/ khyong da ltang rjod kyi lcam mapa'am/ rang
531a7(dkon brtsegs): lagasal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i byin mo/ dga' bas thos zin pa dang / tham ldam das kyis pa/ 'phrul pa/ gi byang bdu byung nga/ des kyang
531a8(dkon brtsegs): srung ba la gas mes de 'angasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon bya chub sems dpa'i spang baspyad pam/ yab zhum dang / mang pa dag sa ba dngan dang / tham banas /
531b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang nam yang 'gal bar ma mdzad par phyir/ da ltar na byang gang bka' las 'gal bar ma byed pa bskyen par spang ba yin ma ngangs bam 'ams
531b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kun dga' bal ba 'astsal ba/ khyod kyis dga' ba'i sgo dang khaspu brags shig dang bka' stsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mtshal lo zhes 'brug mkhan btsal nas//
531b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i sgra 'breg par brtsams pa dang / dga' bos 'amag mkhan de la stog/ ka'i khyod mi shes sam/ nganA ring por ma thogs par stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyung bas
531b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gal te nga'i sgra breg par gyur na/ khyod kyi lag pa gnyis la khrig mam cad bcad de zhes bsdigs pa dang / de shin tu skrag par gyur nas spu gri bsdus te/ khyid 'gro bar brtsams
531b5(dkon brtsegs): bdang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te/ dga' bo la ci khyod rab tu 'byung ngamadzes
531b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ril ba bsnams te/ de'i mgo bol chu blugs nas/ 'breg mkhan gyis sna dang kha spu brog pa dang /
531b7(dkon brtsegs): de 'di sam du dang bdag res shig bcom ldan 'das la srid zhu byas te/ rab tu byung ngo mod kyis/ 'on kyang dgongs kharang sngar khyim du 'gro'o snyam mo// nges dgongs kar lam du zhugs
531b8(dkon brtsegs): sang ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'gro ba'i lam du g.yas chen pa zhig sprul pa des mthong nas// 'di snyam du sum da ri ka dang dus byas pa ni thag ring du gyur pas/ 'gro
532a1(dkon brtsegs): / kha sbyin nga ldan par ma gyur te/ rang bdag gis de bsams pa nyid kyis gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur yang srid na/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na/ nam langs te 'tshang na/
532a2(dkon brtsegs): sun+na ri ki dran pa'i mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyis mtshan mo 'das par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun na
532a3(dkon brtsegs): po khyed song la dga' ba de la khang skyong byos shig par sme shig/ des kyang de bzhin du tha dad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khang skyong byos shig par bka' stsal to// zhes sa
532a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / des kyang khang skyong zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ des bya ba ni tsi nig byed ces dris so// des smras pa/ gtsug lagi khang du dge mdun gyi bya ba dag zhal ta bya dgos so// smras pa/
532a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul dza lta bur bya bar rigs// smras pa khang skyong zhes bya ba ni/ gal de dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dang na/ gtsug lag khong nang gis rnams phyags nas rgyas chagags
532a6(dkon brtsegs): da h+ya/ nga gi rje ya sgre nas 'i mas bzhin du 'jam par bsgru bar byag// 'das par yid la byas te ba 'i steng drug med par byag/ mas byabs/
532a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la gas la bar bya'o// dang ma tog yod na dge 'dun la khrim par drug mtshan ma skacad cing nam langs na dbye bar bya'o// ma gyis dang / chag khungs rtag tu bkrun
532a8(dkon brtsegs): dod bya dgos so// gal te gtsug lag khang zhig tsang ral ba yid na bcos legs bya'o zhes de skad bstan pa thos pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dza skad pa 'astsal pa
532b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so// de nas dge slong rnams snga dro'i dris kyi che/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs te/ grang khyer sang sgra'i gas
532b2(dkon brtsegs): srubs de snyom la bzhud pa dang / dga' ba gtsug lag khang na su yang med par mthong nas/ bdag gis phyag dang byas zin pa dang / sreng khyim du 'gro'o zhes phyag dang byed po la nag
532b3(dkon brtsegs): tibacom ldan 'das kyis gzigs shing mkhyen pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phyags zin pa'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / des kyang 'di ste
532b4(dkon brtsegs): drang dag gis brag dang bdag srang khyim du 'gra snyam du bsams nas/ phyags ma spar bsdus nas/ phyag dang zad pa ma gyur bas// gnas khang gi sla pa ba dade/ 'gros mdangs mas
532b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gcig bcad zin pa na sgo gzhan gcad tsam na sgo gzhan yang bye bar byin gyis brlabs pas de nyon mongs pa skyes nas// gzhan yang 'di snyam du/
532b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te rkun po gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang / 'di la gnod pa ci yod de/ bdag rgyal por gyur pa na/ 'di bas lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong rtsigs par
532b7(dkon brtsegs): zad pas/ bdag ni slar khyim du 'gro bar rigs so zhes gal te lam po cher zhugs te 'gro na ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang brad du dogs pas/ gseb lam du zhugs te 'grog
532b8(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bsam so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam bathugs kyis mkhyen nas/ gseb lam de nyid du bzhugs te gshegs so// de nas rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/
533a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ mi drad par bya ba'i phyir lam gyi 'gram na ljon shing sal ga dang / grib mar ldan pa/ thur du 'jal ba zhig gi drung du gab ste 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ljon shing
533a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'ilag gyen du brjes nas/ de'i lus mngon par snang bar byid kyis rlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod gang nas 'angs// nga'i phyir bzhin du shog cig bka' stsa
533a3(dkon brtsegs): bdang / de yang skyengs te che ba'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di sa 'di rlung ma la shin tu chags gang nen par gyu
533a4(dkon brtsegs): bas de dang bral zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir// grong khyer ser skya nas byung ste/ grong khyer mnyan yong du gshegs so sum du dag gas nas/ der byon pa dang / ri rigs dgrakhrims pa
533a5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'ar ngan bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du/ dga' ba blun po 'di ni chung ma la nags shing zhen nas/ gting bar ma byed pas/ 'di la drangs
533a6(dkon brtsegs): ga sna te/ sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o sum du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan dga' ba la bka 'astsal pa// khyod kyis snga mang dri ldan ces bya 'i mtheng dam/ gsolapa/
533a7(dkon brtsegs): mamadzong dag s+ho/ la te de ltar ma chos kyi gi nas bzangs shig des kyang na pa grus nas badrang ba dang / seMm sa ma na ngas dang rtul pa bzhi dum
533a8(dkon brtsegs): la ldes te/ dri na du gzhigs nas/ tsha dang ldan pa dag ba dang thangs cig tu gal pagasan du gcig pa lag shing drung zhigin su mo mig pa cis yang bcig da
533b1(dkon brtsegs): teg nas/ mig yo bar brtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la bltas pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis sde mo gar ma 'di mthong ngam/ gsal/
533b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ji snyam du sems/ skye mo zhar ma 'di sun da rika dang bskrun na/ gang zeng zhing khyad par du 'phags gsolapa
533b3(dkon brtsegs): sran+da ri ka de ni shAkya'i rigs lags te/ lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar byed bzhin mchog tu gyur/ 'jig rten na bla ma mtshas pa lags pas/ spre mo 'di dang bsnun par gyur ma brgya cher yang
533b4(dkon brtsegs): nye ba mi mchi snyed kyi cha dang / khra'i cha dang / 'bram gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / 'grang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
533b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis lha'i gzhal med khang mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ ma mthong lag so// 'o na yang chos gos kyi grwa nas bzungs shig/ des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang / dang pa
533b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bzhin na mkha' la mngon par 'grus nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas su gshegs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo khyod song la/ lha'i gzhal med khang khyad pa
533b7(dkon brtsegs): dra 'phags pa'i gnas rnams la bltos shig ces bka' stsal pa/ dang // tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal dang / rtsub 'gyu
533b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / kun tu 'dus pa'i tshil dang / chos bzangs khang la sogs pa lha rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rdzing
533b9(dkon brtsegs): rdzing nga
534a1(dkon brtsegs): dag bye ma kyi zhing dga' mabu' ba'i gnas nas su song ste/ kun du khyag par bltas nas/ mdzab kyis grod khyer rab snang du zhugs pa las/ gzhan yang dang / bawangs
534a2(dkon brtsegs): d+hu rnam pa sna tshogs las smasnyan pa las stsogs pa byin pa dang / gnas de dang de dag tu lha'i bu mo dang / bu shin tu 'dzes pa dag lhan cig kyi zhing 'khong pa dag mdzang ba/
534a3(dkon brtsegs): deseM kun du brtags pa las/ banas gzhan zhig gi gzhal med lang na/ lha'i bu ma 'ba' zhig yod kyi lnga'i du myed par mdzad/ lnga'i drim de dag 'a rgyas pa nas gzhan ni lja du
534a4(dkon brtsegs): mtho dang lce'i bu ba 'dres par gnas nas/ bded rnams myong bar byed la/ khyed ni gang gi phyir lha'i bu mo ba' zhig lhan cig gnas shing / lha'i bu mi snang bar gyur zhes dris pa dang / lha'i bu mad
534a5(dkon brtsegs): khas ma ldan das kyi bcu dpa' bzhes byas sam ldan das sarab blugs/ tsugacig dungs par byung pa yang dag par snang bzhig yo / dus de las ma
534a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skyes gyung pas/ bdag cag ni 'di de la bstad pa yinano// zhes smras so/ ga'i ba de skad thos nas/ dga' mgu rangs pas myu ning rings par bcom ldan 'das ga' ba de ngas
534a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ma ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ khyod kyis bya rnams kyi bang du dgas pa dngas padas mamang ngan/ gas lag macing lagaso// mam ldan ngas gal brgyad kyis dman
534a8(dkon brtsegs): nga shes pa 'dul pa dang kyang rje lta zang brnams pargyas par bcom ldan das la gsal to// tsham ldan das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba khyod kyis lha'i dri ma dzad
534b1(dkon brtsegs): dam/ gsol pa// mthong lags so// lha'i bu mo de dag sun da ri ka dang / bskrun na/ gang zhugs bzang zhing / khyad par du 'phags gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su nang ri ka lA ma de dag na
534b2(dkon brtsegs): bskrun na/ ji ltar ri dri ldan gyi sna mo zhar ba sun da ri ka dang bsnun pa bzhin du/ brgya cher yang nye bar mi lta ste/ stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / rgyu'i bar du yang bzod la/
534b3(dkon brtsegs): so bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshangs par spyod pas yang dag par spyad na/ de lta bu'i phan yod khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ldan par gyur pas/ deng khyod kyis
534b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa brtan par spyod cig dang / lhar skyes nas de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// des kyang de skad du thos nas dga' mgur rangs te/ cang mi zing bar 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan
534b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ad ng+ge dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / thabs cig tu lha'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs so//
534b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yang lha'i gzhal med khang la bsam bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pathugs kyis
534b7(dkon brtsegs): khyen nas/ tshe deng ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyod su yang dga' bo dang lhan gcig tu stan gcig la ma 'dug shig/
534b8(dkon brtsegs): chag cig tu ma 'chag shig/ rdang bu gcig la chos gos lhan cig ma gzhag shig/ gnas gcig tu lhung bzed dang / ril ba lhan cig ma zhag cig/ gnas cig tu mdo sde bklags
535a1(dkon brtsegs): / bang ma byad cig/ 'angon 'don par ma byed cig ces snrogag// ched ba ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin dge srung rnams la bslabs
535a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'phags pa'i dka' bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de'i tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yang mang po rnams kyis spangs par mthong bas/ shin du ngo ma zhing gnod par gyur to/
535a3(dkon brtsegs): nas dus gzhan zhibi na// tshe dang ldan bkun dga' bo dge slong mang ba rnams la ldan gcig tu bka' stsal nas chos pas drub pa'i las byed pa de'i ma ched ldan pa dga' ngas mthong nas/
535a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di sam du dge slong mang po 'di dag ni bdag yongs su spangs pas lhan gcig tu mi gnas na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba 'di ni bdag ga nu bo yin pas/ tsas kyang smad par mibying / gam dus/
535a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam ci sa ltan 'i lus pa dang / 'i ched pa bdun dga' ba ba gul sa yang / sa gzu ga da lta ga ma napa gagrang ba mims
535a6(dkon brtsegs): byung dag slong bar rnyed/ tshe dang ldan kun ngos smras pa/ yang dag pang de lta du'i don dang ldan mod kyis/ 'on kyang khyod ni lam gzhan du 'grol/ bdag kyang lam gzhan du 'gro bas/ desde byed ban na bya
535a7(dkon brtsegs): ba pa nil ma pa tsha kyi lam pas sprus gargyan d+ha byu mamanasams par snang ba ste / na mas mas pa sa sa gyi sa mo/
535a8(dkon brtsegs): thams sems par tu sa la ba dzi ma/ nas nang smram khris pa pa/ sa ga na rgya bya na pa byung gi sa ma ldan nas kyis mas kyi ngam rdzum
535b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mthun nas/ nodang ldan pa dga' bal paka 'astsal pa khyod sngon chad sems can myal ba mthong ngam/ gsal pa ma thang lags so// bam ldan 'das kyis paka' sprul pa/ khyod kyis
535b2(dkon brtsegs): chos gos kyi grwanas bzungs shig/ des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de khrid nas/ sems can myal ba'i gnasu gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
535b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs cig tu gzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod song la sems can dmyal ba rnams bltos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de bzhin du song ba las/
535b4(dkon brtsegs): sngar ni chu bo be hang ni mthong ngo // de nas mthong ngo // de nas mthar kyis ral gri'i lo ma'i gnas dang / bshad gci'i 'dam dang / me mung gi gnas su phyin te/ de dag tu zhugs te rnam par bsgrub
535b5(dkon brtsegs): las/ sems can mang po sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba dag mthong ste/ kha cig ni skam pas lce dang / so dang / mig phyung ba dang / kha cig na sog les lus 'dra ba dang / kha cig ni /
535b6(dkon brtsegs): res rkang lag gdub pa dang / kha cig ni mtshon cha shag ti dang / dgra sta so gnyis pa dang / ber khas bsnun pa dang / kha cig ni lcags kyi thob 'tshig par byas pa dang / kha cig ni lugs
535b7(dkon brtsegs): kyithu lum khang bcug pa dang / kha cig ni ral gri lo ma can dang / ljon shing ral gri lom can la mdzeg pa dang / gdun gyis brdung ba dang / rang drag gis thag pa dang / zangs kyi
535b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jug pa dang / lugs kyi khril 'dug nas/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams myong bar mthong ngo // kha cig ni lugs zangs me lu rab tu 'bar zhing khol/ rab tutsha ba'i 'od byung ba/
536a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems ca chad pas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyi dngas ba srung ba dag mthong ngo // gzhan yang thugs zangs ma gyi rab tu 'bar ning chag sems ca med pa'i mang
536a2(dkon brtsegs): dang shin du stug nas dmyal ba'i srung sa ma la/ rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir lugs zangs gzhan rnams ni sems can 'tshod par byed pa la/ lug zangs 'di 'ab 'ashig na stong pa
536a3(dkon brtsegs): khol zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba ltar skye bar smon nas/ sems rtse gcig du tshangs par spyad pa la yang dag par spyod pas
536a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'jig rten tu skyes nas re shig bde ba myong bar 'gyur yang / de shi ba'i 'og tu lugs zangs 'dir 'jug par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir deng bdag cag lcags zangs me sbar nas bsdad
536a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// zhes smras pa dpa' bos thos nas/ bani tu 'jigs skrag bskyes nas/ bsgralangs te/ lus las rdul b+h+ya nas/ 'di sam du 'dis gal te bdag blo yin par shes gyu
536a6(dkon brtsegs): rnamang pa na mas kyin du 'ang bar 'gyur ro snyam du bangamasanas sbyang shing nges par bcom ldan 'das gal bar lags su byas sa ba dang / 'am ldan
536a7(dkon brtsegs): ga 'phrul pa/ khyung pag sems can dmyal ba rnams mthong ma// des kyang snying rje ba'i tshul du mchi ma rdegs dus nas/ lce nags pa bzhin du skad bla ma byung nas ma
536a8(dkon brtsegs): lags zhes gsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis dngas pa ci zhig mthang / des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das 'tshal pa/
536b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba ma skye bar smon pa dang / rtswab 'jig rten yongs su tshol bas tshangs par rab tu spyod pa yang dag par spyad pa la nyes
536b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bu yod pas de lta bas na deng khyod kyis mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu gnyer ba'i bsas pas tshangs par sbyang bar bya ba'i lhar skye bar mngon par dga' bas rab tu brgya
536b3(dkon brtsegs): bar ma bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis cang mi zer bar spyad pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa
536b4(dkon brtsegs): thubs kyis mkhyen nas/ sems can myal ba'i khams nas mi snang bar gyur te/ slar rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams/
536b5(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ nang gi dri ma sum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang gti mug gang yin pa ste/ de dag ni spang bar bya ba yin pas/ yongs su spang ba la rab
536b6(dkon brtsegs): tu byung zhing bslab par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bzhugs nas/ ring por ma lon par rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sems can bdul ba'i phyir/
536b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul tsam par gshegs nas/ gang+ga'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dge slong lnga brgya dang / lhan gcig
536b8(dkon brtsegs): tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams phyogs gan/
537a1(dkon brtsegs): tu'a'od par mkhyen nas chedang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dul zas kyi rnams grangs thag mar dgeg/ bang du dge gsum dge gang nga gi cig khru babang ba ma
537a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ ngas su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yod kyis// shin tu legs pa
537a3(dkon brtsegs): la yid la brdungs shig dang / ngas deng khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par mtshal lo zhes gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das
537a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo ma'i mngal dang ldan par gyur kyang / mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba yang yod do// 'jug par mi 'gyur ba yang yod do// ji ltar skye ba len cing ma'i mngal du 'gyu/
537a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhen/ gal de pha ma gnyis 'dod pa'i sems kyis lhan cig 'a khrig pa yang spyod par 'gyur/ ma'i mngal yang yangs su gtsang bar 'gyur/ dus kyi rgyu mtshan dang yang
537a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par ldan par 'gyur la/ bar mda'i phung po yang mngon sum du snang bar gyur na/ de'i tshe ma'i mngal du 'jug par rig par bya'o// de la bar mdo'i bring pa'i dbyings de las
537a7(dkon brtsegs): mngag su gyu / kha nga smra cing mangs pa dang / khadag sa byug zang pa mdzes byag/ mam sa dpal rnams kyi dngas nga zod pa'i ban rnam
537a8(dkon brtsegs): zhen sa/ gang shing dang / nga mas pa ma sring pami do ni sa te/ yang rdu pa nga jug/ 'a dgas kyi ba mam men pa cin
537b1(dkon brtsegs): lce ste dper natu dang 'drag lha dang ma rnams kyi par mda'i srid pa'i ba dog ni 'di ltas/ dper na/ gsang gi kha dog dang 'dra'o// gzugs kyang bar mdo'i srid pa'i bdas ming
537b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dug go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams ni bar ma do'i srid pa med de// 'di ltar de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir ro// bar ma do'i sems can kha cig ni lag pa gnyis dang rang
537b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis dang ldan no// kha cig ni rkang pa bzhi dang / rkang pa mang po dang ldan no// kha cig ni ring ba med de/ sngon gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i bar mdo
537b4(dkon brtsegs): srid nga mngon par grub par 'gyur// lha'i bar de'i srid pa gang yin pa gde ni mgo gyen tu lta'o// mi dang dung 'gro dang / yi gas rnams kyi thaMd dkar lta zhing 'gro'o// sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi
537b5(dkon brtsegs): mdo'i srid pa ni mgo thur tu lta'o// bar ma do'i srid pa thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas/ na mkha' la 'gro zhing lha'i mig bzhin du skye ba'i gnas thag ring po yang mthong bar nus so/
537b6(dkon brtsegs): rjem na na pas b+ha ni / rnams kyi dus ma ga pa gang na pag/ da' bzung ma la mig ma nga/ lja na thu
537b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig lon nas/ zla mtshan dang ldan pa yang yod do// kha cig na rkyen las bltos pas yun ring zhig lon nas/ gdong rgyu mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang yod do// bud med gang lus kyi
537b8(dkon brtsegs): mthu stobs med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po med pa dang / byang bzhin mi sdug pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba mi bzod ba dag zos shing 'thung ba de dag ni zla mtshan 'ongs su zin kyang
538a1(dkon brtsegs): / myur du chang bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper ma/ sa skam po'i phyogs su chus chag chag btab pa'i tshe/ myur du skam par 'gyur ba yin no// bud med gang las kyi mthu
538a2(dkon brtsegs): bas dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu bde ba myong ba dang / byad bzhin sdug pa dang / brda' ba dang / btung ba bsosad pa dag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag gi rna mtshan ni byung bu chad par ma gyur
538a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la sted per ma sa gsheg pa'i phyag su chus chag chag 'dab pa'i ni/ myur du skam par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// de ltar ma'i mngal du 'dug par mi 'gyur zhen/ gal te 'i lum
538a4(dkon brtsegs): byung la ma'i khub ma byung ba dang / ma'i khu ba byung la pha'i khu ba byung ba 'am/ gal te gnyi ga byung gyur na/ thams cad mngal len par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ma yongasu dag par na/
538a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung sa pa yongs byud ma 'gyung ba'am/ ga'i ris yong su dag par ma 'gyung ba la/ ma yang suM dag par 'gyur ba'am/ gal te gti mug yong su dag par mgyu na yang mangs
538a6(dkon brtsegs): bangam 'gyur// gal kyisa'i mings kyi gnas rgyung nad kyis yangasu na par gyur tam/ gadzes pa dang / ba kan gyis yong su zhi bar gyur tam// khrag gis garten dA mang sa sa
538a7(dkon brtsegs): bas du byung / shas gangs gyur ma/ sngam khrungs dam/ dbyangs wa ba'ang/ sngag ma ni dpa'ang// mangs kyis rnamal las drung krung tA/ dbung tsha gyi rtsa ba ma
538a8(dkon brtsegs): tsha ma bur gyur na/ gzhal mag la bur gyur dan/ shing na'i tshigs bzhi sags las drug pa'am/ sras bur 'jug pa'am/ nas kyi bram skyes palta bar gyur mam/
538b1(dkon brtsegs): 'og zab pa'am/ steng duzab pa'am/ mngal gyi snod du rung ba ma yin pa 'am/ chag tu khrag zag pa 'ang/ chubag pa'am/ bya rog gi mchu lja nag tu kyi zhing 'dzum du mi thub pa ma steng
538b2(dkon brtsegs): 'og dag/ rnga ma zhes che chung gi ma mnyam pa 'am/ mtho dman mi gzhoms shing 'bar 'brar du gyur pa 'am/ nang srin bus gces pa 'am/ rul zhing mi gtsang bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste// gal te ma
538b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i skyon dang ldan par gyur na/ thams cad mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha mtsho rigs btsun zhing bar mdo'i srid pa dman par gyur tam/ bar ma do'i srid pa tshe rigs btsun ning
538b4(dkon brtsegs): bam dman por gyur du yang mngal 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha ma dang / bar ma do'i srid pa gnyi ga tshe rigs btsun par gyur kyang / gal te las mthun par ma gyur na yang / mngal 'grub par
538b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// gal de bar ma do'i srid pa mdun na snang ba'i yul la/ pho dang mo'i sred pa gnyis med par gyur na yang / skye ba len par mi 'gyur// dga' bo bar ma do'i srid pa ji ltar ma'i mngal
538b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te mngal yang yongasu gtsang bar 'gyur la/ bar do'i srid pa 'dod pa'i bya ba spyod pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur bas na/ gong du bstan pa lta dus
538b7(dkon brtsegs): skyon mang po'i bar yang med 'gyur te/ pha ma dang bu yang phan tshun mngon par phrad pa'i las dang ldan par gyur na/ gdod ma'i mngal tu 'jug par 'gyur// gzhan yang bang mdo'i srid pa
538b8(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe/ sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur te/ gal te pho yin na ni ma la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ pa la ni zhe sdang bar 'gyur ro// gal te mo yin na ni pha la chags pa skye bar
539a1(dkon brtsegs): byung gsun nas pa drisems par 'dus byas pa'i las kya nga dgas yang dag pa ma 'a pa gas kyi tshan pa gas pa bangs par skyed pa byed / rang ba da /
539a2(dkon brtsegs): dru chen po 'das pa dang / char chen po 'bab pa dang / gnas rmugs pa'i 'du shes dang / skye ba mang ba'i sgra mdzes pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas/ las kyi mthong man ji lta bzhin du yang dag pa ma yin na
539a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du rnam pa bcu 'byung bar 'gyu'o// bcug zhe na/ deng bdag ni khang pa'i nang du 'dug gosum pa dang / bdag ni khra ba brtseg ma pa steng du 'dzeg go snyam pa dang / bdag nin la med khang
539a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus gsum pa dang / bdag ma khris 'jig go snyam pa dang / bdag ni nA'i snrel bung 'jug go sum pa dang / bdag ni la ma'i khyim du 'jugs sem pa dang / yadag ni gas kyi nang du jug
539a5(dkon brtsegs): gosum pa dang / bdag ni rtsig pa'i bu gar 'dzul lo snyam pa dang / bdag ni sag ma'i gseb tu 'jug go// sum du sems pa gang yinI pa ste/ dga' bo de'i che bar mda'i sred pa de de snyam du
539a6(dkon brtsegs): bsamasanas ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// sgra bayin pa na meng merd pa zhes bya bar rig par byaste// de'i ba'i bu ba dang ma'i drag yin te/ ngas pa gzhanas pa ni dang / ba sa
539a7(dkon brtsegs): khru dang khrag ng+yas pa myed dang / rnam pa shes pa'i dzin pa rten de rgya cig gnas par byed pas 'di 'i snyed pa na/ dang / rnam dpa sgrub cing dang / skyes bu tshul pa la
539a8(dkon brtsegs): nas mam byung gi gnas mi byung ba bzhi bra ma ma mgacad pa'i phreng dang / khrag las mngan par gru pa'i lus mang med ze pang de ban du gi bar gyi'o// gzhan sa ga
539a9(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtswa stug por 'jug go skam pa dang /
539b1(dkon brtsegs): bod de rnam pa pa ni yod kyis khyod legs par can cig/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsa ldan po la brten te srin bu smra bar 'gyur ba/ cu ston pa yang srin du ma yin/ rtsalas grang na yang ma
539b2(dkon brtsegs): med mod kyis/ 'on kyang rtsal rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis sran du skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang sngon por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' be pa'i khru ba dang / mami khrag gis dram
539b3(dkon brtsegs): mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper ma ba lang gi gcib la brten nas/ srid bu skye bar 'gyur ba/ b.lang
539b4(dkon brtsegs): gi lci ba yang srin bu ma yin/ ba lang gi lci ba las gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi lci ba la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bskos nas/ lus kyi kha dog
539b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ser por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo pha'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gi lus mer mer por yang 'di ltar rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/
539b6(dkon brtsegs): mar+g+ha thug la rten nas srin bu skye bar 'grug rgya shug kyang srin bla ma yin/ rgya shug las gud na yang srin du med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgya thug la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa 'di'i dbang gci
539b7(dkon brtsegs): srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang dmar por gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' ba pha'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gis lus mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po
539b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ zho la brten nas srin bu skye bar gyur pa/ lus kyi kha dog kyang dkar por 'gyur ba zhes bya ba nas / rgyu dang / rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen
539b9(dkon brtsegs): ngo'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar tu sbyar ro// gzhan yang dga' bo pha ma'i mo gtsang ba las brten pa'i mer mer po'i dbang gis sa'i khams mngon du snang bas ni sra bi'i bya ba byes
540a1(dkon brtsegs): / dz+ha'i khams mngon du snang bas ni bstan pa'i bya ba byed do// me'i khams mngon du snang ba ni dro ba'i bya ba byed do// rlung gi khams mngon du snang bas ni yang ning g.yo nga'i bya ba bye/
540a2(dkon brtsegs): dbanga' bogal te ba ma'i mi gtsang ba'i lus med meng po de sa'i khams 'apa' zhig dgra ldan la/ chu'i khams med par gyur mo// rnams te gyes par 'gyur bas/ 'di 'i ge ba ma la
540a3(dkon brtsegs): byed thal ba bsas pa las rtogs pa bzhin du 'gyur// gal te nu'i khams 'apa' zhigi dang ldan la/ sa'i 'ams med par byur na ni po bar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste dper ma 'dus ramathun
540a4(dkon brtsegs): bur gyur pa zhig ma chu'i khams dang ldan par 'gyur la/ me'i khams med par gyur pa/ me'i khams med par gyur na ni rul ning myags par gyur te/ 'di lta sted par ma dbar gyis
540a5(dkon brtsegs): sug gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te med meng po'i lus dang / chu dang mo'i khams 'apa' zhig dang ldan la/ rlung gi khams med par gyur na no//
540a6(dkon brtsegs): bal zhing rgyas pang mi 'gyur te/ 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi las gyis rgyu byas rnas pan rgyun gcig gi rkyen gcig ga rgyas byas pa'i bang dgas rnam par shes po
540a7(dkon brtsegs): spyang ngag/ sa'i khams kyini chen byed do// rgyul khams kyi ni sbed bar byed do/ yi khams kyi ni yongs su smin par byed do// rlung gi khams kyis ni 'brel par byed do/
540a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzidzin bye ba ma/ khrang ma 'tshas de ras drang ma migs pa gcig nas/ dadrugs kyis bum la// rgya pa'i nang na 'ang snang dbyung bar lda na/
540a9(dkon brtsegs): 'i khams kyi bang se me sa'i khams gyes par mi 'gyur la/ sa'i nyam gyi dbang gis mi nu'i khams so bar mi 'gyur ro// dga' lal te med me pa'i lusas pa
540b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ste dpe ma/ pad+ma ma'i dra ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ nang gi lus kyi 'byung ba chen pos dang / rgyu dang me dang/ rlung gi khams las kyi stobs kyis 'phel bar byed pa yang da ni
540b2(dkon brtsegs): du rig par bya'o// dga' bo pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po'i lus 'byung ba yang ma yin/ ma'i mngal nas kyang ma yin/ las las kyang ma yin/ rgyu las kyang ma yin ni
540b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ 'od kyang rkyen mang po 'di dag tshogs pa'i dbang gis mngon par grub par byed de/ 'di lnga ste dper na/ sa bon sar pa rlung dang nyi mas nyams par mi byas pa sra zhing snying
540b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang bcas pa bu ga ma byung ba/ shin tu legs par sbas pa/ zhing gshin pa la btab nas/ rlan gyi rgyu dang rkyen 'dus par gyur na/ gdod myu gu dang / stong du dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang /
540b5(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / 'bras bu rimos las mngal du skye ba thob pa ma yin gyis/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis mngal mngon par grub par rig par bya'o// dga'
540b6(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus me yongs su tshol ba'i phyir/ nor bu me yaM shel khyer nas nyi ma la bzhag ste/ ba lang gi lci ba bskam po de'i steng du bzhag na gdod me 'drang
540b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa la brten pa'i phyir/ gdong mngal mngon par 'grub pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// ba ma'i mi gtsang ba la/
540b8(dkon brtsegs): las mer mer po mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs shes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa gang ni ming zhes bya ste/ de ni ming dang / gzug
540b9(dkon brtsegs): kyis skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dga' po sa bon re yang rkyen 'dus pa zal ba las/ myu gu la phyogs paskyed par byed la ma yin pa de bzhin du/ ya ma 'ba' zhig dang / las 'bal zhig dang / rkyen gzhan 'da' zhes
541a1(dkon brtsegs): / zhes bya'o/ mang dang bajugs shes byam/ ma dang gzugs kyi bung bzhin tu spyad par bya'i srid pa rnams skye ba len par byed pa 'di la na ngas phyogs cung ba ma/
541a2(dkon brtsegs): skad cis cam du yang bsngags pa brjod par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal chen po yin pas so// 'di lta ste dpa
541a3(dkon brtsegs): skyugs pa ni rjel chung yang mnam par byed pa de bzhin du/ srid pa rnam su skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chung yang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga /
541a4(dkon brtsegs): gajigs dang / tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni skye bi dang / gnas pa dang / 'phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jig pa dang
541a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang bani pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no// gnas pa gang yin pa de nin pa yin no// phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jig pa gang yin pa te ni dag 'a she sa ni ga lta san/
541a6(dkon brtsegs): da' ba mkhas pa gang zhig snad pa pad+ma mtsho 'di sred par bskyed nas/ mang mang man thal zhing dadi 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag par thams su chung
541a7(dkon brtsegs): // gzhan yang dgu' bo 'di ltar ma'i mang la du zhugs pa de'i grangs kyang mdong bstan/ zhag 'dun phrag su byin brgyad yang par rig par byaste// sa du ga
541a8(dkon brtsegs): ga man du sems 'a me pa mam gas me pa'i sa par byaste/ sa na
541b1(dkon brtsegs): dmadang migacang bzag ma'i gnasathal bas/ 'di lnga ste dper na/ sangs rab tu tsha ba'i nang du bcos shing brdos pa bzhin du/ lus kyi dbang ba dang / rnam par shes pa ltan cig tu
541b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myeng ba gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyings ni 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bras kyi khu ba 'am/ zho'i spris ma dang 'dra bas// zhag bdun gyi nga
541b3(dkon brtsegs): du dang du btsos ba tu bcos pas na/ sa'i khams sra ba nyid dang / chu'i khams sher ba nyid dang / me'i khams dro ba nyid dang / rlung gi khams yang zhing g.yo ba nyid gdeng mngon du
541b4(dkon brtsegs): snang bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la/ ma'i mngal na mi gtsang ba'i gnas su 'di lta ste/ dper na zangs kyi nang du bcos shing brdos pa bzhin du lus kyi dang
541b5(dkon brtsegs): bidang / rnam par shes pa lhan gcig tu sdug bsngal mi bzang ba myong ba ni/ ma'i mngal nas kun tu reg pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis rang byung nas/ mngal de la na/
541b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni nur nur po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni ni ska ba dang / mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar tu bcos pas na/ khams bzhi po dag mngon du snang ba
541b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te dga' ba zhag bdun phrag gsum pa las yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas mdzod ka zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis byung nas/ mngal
541b8(dkon brtsegs): de la reg pa gang yin pa de ni ltar ltar po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni 'di lta ste/ lcags kyi thur ma'am srin bu grog mo 'dra ste// nag bdun gyi bar tu nang du btses pas na/
542a1(dkon brtsegs): // khams bzhi po dag mngon tu snang bar 'gyuraro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas rab tu 'byed pa
542a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rjing sngon gyi las las byung nas mngal na gnas pa'i zug rngu rab tu 'bang ba 'bud par byed pa gang yin pa'i ni mkhang 'gyur ces bya'o// byings ni ring pa'
542a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste/ zheg bdun gyi bar tu zhes bya ba nas/ khams bzhi po dag mngon tu snang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// ga' bo nag bdun phrag lnga pa la yang b+ha/
542a4(dkon brtsegs): sngam bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas yang dag par spyad pa zhes d+ha ba'i rlung byung ste/ d+h+r-i des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshanam lnga po 'di lta steng dung po gnyis dang /
542a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyi dang / go pa'i mnan ma mngon du 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta s+t+waM dper no/ dbyar gyi dus su na 'bab pa chi/ sbyi shing dang / nags tshal rnams pa' ga dang / lamargyas
542a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du mtshan ma lA bi dag rab tu snang bar byed do// dga' ba zhig bdun phrag drug pa la mi/ mang ming la nas rgya chen po zhes b+ha bawId byung ste/ rlung sa ma
542a7(dkon brtsegs): re par byung ba ma mtshanam bezhi pa 'di lta ste/ dpung pa gnyis dang / bras ma gnyis 'byung bang drud de/ 'di lta steng dper na dbyung tshor pa 'bab pa'i ni/ tsu gong lal ga sdebapa rgyu
542a8(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi du mamam ngani ba dgang btu snang bar byed do// dga' bonapa bdun papa ridan pa'i ni ma'i mang nas lakhyil bar byed pa zhes byang 'i chung khrung ste/ nga sa/
542b1(dkon brtsegs): de la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste// lag pa gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste dper ma dbu ba 'dus pa 'am/ nya lcibs bzhin du mtshan ma
542b2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dga' ba zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas bzlog cing skyur ba pa zhes bya ba d+hA byung ste/ rlung des mnga' la reg par gyur pa ni mtshan
542b3(dkon brtsegs): ma nyi shu po 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i sor mo bcu bcu thog ma kho nar snang bar byed do// 'di lta ste dper na/ dbyar char 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing gi rtsa ba dang por skyes pa de
542b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhig bdun phrag dgu pa la nI/ ma'i mngal nas rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa ma mtshan pa dgu po 'dim
542b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis dang / kha dang / bshang pa dang / gcin pa'i bu ge gnyis snang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ni/ ma'i mangs
542b6(dkon brtsegs): nas sra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ dper na/ rgyal ba bus des mngal na gnas pa sra zhing brtan par byed do// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe/ ma'i mngal nas gzhan yang
542b7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas skye zhes bya'i rlung byung nas/ rlung des mngal gyis gnas byas nas rgyas par byed de/ 'di lnga ste/ dper na/ rgyal ba bus pa rgyas 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhan
542b8(dkon brtsegs): bdun phrag bcu cig pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas bug snang ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mngal khong stong du byed pas/ bu ga dgu po dag
543a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu snang bar gyur te/ gal tem 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ba'am/ 'dug pa 'am// rnal ba'am/ las dag byas par 'gyur na/ de ni tshe rlung de 'khyil ba nyid kyis khong song
543a2(dkon brtsegs): gyung nas/ bu ga rnams mthad kyis che bar byed do// gal te rlung steng gyi phyogasu song na ni steng gi brag 'byin par byed la/ gal te 'og gi phrog su sa na ni lag gi zug 'byir par byed de/
543a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dis lta dper na/ mag ba'am/ de'i stobams snad pa dras pa ma/ steng dang 'og tu rlung rgya zhing / rlung gi dra ba byas nas/ 'gag par 'gyur ba ji ltar ba bzhin no// dga' ban
543a4(dkon brtsegs): dadun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas yod pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal bus/ g.yas yin gyi nang khrel gyi rgyu ma rnams 'byin par byed de/
543a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la snyed pa na/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzhin du lus la brten te/ snrel lar gnas so// ga badzin med nyid kyin/ bzhan yang smra badrus pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ ma
543a6(dkon brtsegs): du ltag chad med par chags brgya sam cu bskyed par byed do/ bzhan yang rung de'i skabs kyis nang brgya cig 'byung bar byed do// dga' bo zhig padan phrag drugs
543a7(dkon brtsegs): ba laM ni mi'i mang la nas sna ma'i rnyed do maud kyi spangs kyis bkris pa dang / skom pa shes par byed pas/ mas chis shing khrungs pa'i ji rje snyed pa bdag lta bar gas
543a8(dkon brtsegs): nag ni lus la pan 'dags par byed do// dge' bzhig bdun phrag cu gsum pa la ni ma'i mangs nas snga ma drung da kyi skabs kyis// bathil pa dang / rnam par /
543b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pas/ mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa dag lte bar zhugs nas/ de'i lus la phan 'dogs par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ni
543b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'adi ma'i mngal nas skud pa'i kha zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i ma rgyas stong bskyed par byed do// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi mdun
543b3(dkon brtsegs): na gnas so// nyis rgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi brgya ba na gnas sa// nyis lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na gnas so// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yor phyogs na gnas
543b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal nas/ pad+ma zhes bya'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i rtsar rgyu ba rnam pa nyi ga bskyed nas/ ro rnams bzhib par
543b5(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de yang lus kyi mdun na lnga dang / lus kyi rgyab na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yas na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yon na lnga yod do// rtsar rgya ba de yang ming sna tshogs dang / kha dog
543b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang ldan pas/ ming ni se ka zhes kyang bya// stobs zhes kyi bya/ brtan pa zhes kyang bya/ mthu dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o// kha dog ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / da
543b7(dkon brtsegs): baM dang dkar po dang / sran ma dang / mar dang / 'bru mar dang / zhol sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dgang yin pa dang / gzhan yang kha dog mang po phan tshun 'dres pa gang
543b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'o// gla' bo car rgyu ba nyi shu po de dag ror la yang yan lag gzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod pas/ gcig tu bsdus nas dbugs bzhib pa'i byang chub brgyad pargya
544a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'o par gyur / rdzas kyi mdu nga/ rgyu dag / garas du / gsod sa phyog sar ral yang skyes brgyas rgya yadang/ ma sa cang rtsub brgyad rgya ba de ga mas
544a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag ban nun 'brel pa brgyad rgya yod pas/ gcig tu bsdus na/ stong phrag rgyad cu yod par 'gyur te/ stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi mdun na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi rgyag
544a3(dkon brtsegs): na 'dang// stong prab b+h+re ni lus kyi gsas phyogs na 'ad do// ga' bo byeng rgyas pa stong phrag brgyad chu ba de dag la yang br-ig mang pa yod pas/ brag gcig dang gnyis dang
544a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa na phrag bdun gyi bar dang ldan pa yin no// de dag re re la yang spu'i khrang bu re re dang / so sor pan nan 'brel te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bad+ma tshul phrag mang ban/
544a5(dkon brtsegs): / brag gcig dang gnyis dang ldan pa na brag 'dun gyi bar dang ldan pa yinan// de dag ral yang spu'i khung bu re dang / sa mau ngan nan 'phrul ste/ 'din ga
544a6(dkon brtsegs): ba tsi la brug mang po yong pa dza lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo nag bdud drug pa drug pa la bdud zhes bya ba 'byung na// rlung 'i skyong bas mngapa nas
544a7(dkon brtsegs): pam rimig sa sgri mched gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis kyi skye mched dang / kha'i sna dang / ming ba'i bug dang / sring gi'i khang ra 'khor yug dang / na bad/
544a8(dkon brtsegs): lung ba sa myung ma 'jug par 'byung ba yinas rnam par 'jig cing/ dugs kyi du du brdzags pa meng par byed do/ 'di ga snyed pa ma jam pa ma sa
544a9(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba dang //
544b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa'i gong bu blangs te/ 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas/ ji ltar mos pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam pa'i dbyibs tha dad pa spel zhing rnam par 'jog pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi dang
544b2(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i skye mched ji ltar mos pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog cing / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdur phrag bcu bdun pam
544b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rims nas 'breg tong zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / kha'i sgo dang / ming ba dang / snying gi phyogs dang / zas 'jug par 'gyur
544b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas rnams kun tu dad par byed cing / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i gnas thogs pa med par byed de/ 'di lta ste dper mkhye ma bu mo mkhas pa zhig d+hA dz+hats+tsha lakhang rdul sa
544b5(dkon brtsegs): gamams pa blangs nas/ 'bru mar dang / thal ba dang / sang byi ma zhib mo dag gis bye dngadabyas nas gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi dbang gis skye mtshang rna
544b6(dkon brtsegs): bas gtsas gas parnyed par / dga' thag padu mug ban rgyang pa la ma mtsham sacas dzam meng pa zhes bya ba'i nga chung ste mangs nags pa
544b7(dkon brtsegs): drug pa dag yoyangs su dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyim dang zla ba'i dkyil khor sprin thug pos khebs pa// rlung drag po langs nas bus te/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na/
544b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od dang ldan zhing yongasu par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo las kyi rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po drug yong su dag par byed pa yang de bzhin du rig pa
545a1(dkon brtsegs): bya kyi dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po bzhi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag mngon par grub par
545a2(dkon brtsegs): dang pa ma mings du 'dug pa 'i/ thog mkhan dbang po gsum thob par 'gyur to/ 'di lta ste lus dang / srog dang / yid kyi dbang po gang yin ga/ dga' bo nag bdun phrag ni/
545a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni mi'i ming la nas shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te/ sor ma'i dris pa ni shu bskyed par byed do/ dang pa g.yas pa
545a4(dkon brtsegs): na grus pa buM dang / rkang pa'i snyibyung pa'i dris pa pan dang / rje dang bya dras pa panyis dang / bras ma nus pa gnyis dang / rwa dres pa gnyis dang / rmed pa'i rnas pa gsum dang /
545a5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i dris pa gsum dang / sgal tshigs kyi rus pa bco rgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bskyed do// dus gzhan yang lag pa yin pa la brten te/ sor mo'i tshig kyi rus pa
545a6(dkon brtsegs): btso gu dpa lag pa g.yas pal san ge sor ma rigs kyings pa nyishu bskyed pa byed de// gzhin yang la ga nus pa gnyis dang / pung ba drus pa bani pas
545a7(dkon brtsegs): sa ban da / zug pa dus pa bdun dang / ga' da dus pa ni dag / khyim pa'i dzes pa gnyis dang / pa dus pazlam nan ga sa dang / ma dus pa ma
545a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ dpa' bo di la snye pa na/ gzugs mkhamam/ zugs ma na gyi slob ma mkhas pas/ sngaldan cing sra ba las da'i byangs rgyas nag de rig tu spa
545b1(dkon brtsegs): bcings te/ phyis 'jim pa rnams bskus nas/ gzugs brnyan mngon par grub par byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs des rus pa rnam par 'jog pa yang de bzhin du
545b2(dkon brtsegs): lta bar bya'o// de dag rus pa phra mo mo gtogs par rus pa chen po skye ba'i grangs na gnyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ni
545b3(dkon brtsegs): ma nga nas yang dag bskyed pa zhes b+ha ba'i rlud ste// mnga' na gnas pa de'i lus 'ag bskyed par byed pas 'od lnga ste dper na/ zhal nal mkhar ma/ zhamanal
545b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan gyi slob mas 'jim po legs par sbyar nas/ rtsig ngos la zhal zhal byed pa bzhin du/ las kyi rlung des sha bskyed par byed pa yang de bzhin du lta bar bya'o// dga'
545b5(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag nyi sha gnyis pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ des mngal na gnas pa de'i khrag bskyed par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu
545b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa la ni/ mi'i mngal nas yongasu dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung to// rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i bags pa spyod par byed do// dga' bo zham bdun phrag nyi
545b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhipa la mi ma mingal nas kun tu 'phya ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung ngos mngal na gnas pa de'i pags pa stong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed de// dga' ba zhag bdun dran
545b8(dkon brtsegs): nyishu lnga pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas grong khyer 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de ga dang khrag rab tu dang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag
546a1(dkon brtsegs): / thig drug pa la ni/ ma'i mnga' nas skye ba mngon par grub pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung nges ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi sgra dang spu dang / sen mo rnams bskyed pa
546a2(dkon brtsegs): byed po de dag thams cad cang na rgyu rnams dang pan tshun 'jal par lta bar bya'o// ganga' bzhig bdun drug shrI bdun pal ni/ ma ma lan sman ben pa zhes pa brjid rgyu
546a3(dkon brtsegs): ste rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i sgra dang / spu dang / sen po rnams mngon par grub par byed do// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de/ gal tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa me dge la
546a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus byas pas/ ser snas longs spyod bdog pa rnams 'phangs shing / shin tu brtan par mngon par zhen nas/ sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan pos
546a5(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag mnyam par ma byed pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing // ni mtshan
546a6(dkon brtsegs): rung ngel bar byeng ba zhig yin na ni/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par sbyin pa myong bar 'gyur / gal med skye bar gyur na yang 'dus bu rnams par sbyin pa 'ad du ma 'ong bathob pa
546a7(dkon brtsegs): bsagal te 'a ga/ nab rnams 'dilta ring pos mdzes par 'gyur na ni thung bar gyur ro// gal rlung dus mdzes par gyur nani par 'gyur ro/ snrus pas ma
546a8(dkon brtsegs): byur ni dra ba 'gyur ro// gal te thams mdzes par gyud nani sgom pa pa gyur ro// gas te yan lag da lag pa na gtems mdzes pa 'argya na ni
546b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te thag ring pos mdzes par gyur na ni// de thag nye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mang pos mdzes par gyur na mi/ de nyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyung mdzes par gyur na ni/ de mang por 'gyur ro//
546b2(dkon brtsegs): gal cho dod na ni bar 'gyur/ nga bar 'dod na ni che bor 'gyur ro// gzhan zhig gnyen par 'dzid na ni bzhir bar 'gyer ro// babor bar 'dzin ni 'an cig mngon pa pa zang ro/
546b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod na ni gnag par 'gyur ro// gnag par 'dod na ni dkar bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis// sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pas na
546b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang leng ba dang / skyugs pa dang / glen pa dang / khyad bzhin mi sdug pa dang / chog smras pa rnams gzhan gyis mnyan pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang / lus mi sdug
546b5(dkon brtsegs): cing yi dgas dang 'dra bas/ gnyen bshes rnams kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ji snyed pa tsal ba dag gzhan la smras ma
546b6(dkon brtsegs): yang / gzhan gyis yid mches shing yid la mi 'dzin pa dang mngon par 'gyur bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshong bas snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mya ngan bar 'du byas pa'i
546b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par sman pa thob pa 'gyur bar byas so// dga' bo mngal na gnas bde tshe rabs snga ma la bsod nams kyi las sgrub pa dang / ser sna med par legs par
546b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa gtong zhing / 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang / longs spyod rnams la 'phangs shing mngon par zhen pa'i sems med pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pa rnams ni/
547a1(dkon brtsegs): / mtshan 'angal bar byed pa zhag gartanan/ 'din sa pang sbyin pa ltung bar du bas babyung bang rgyu ma pa sbyis par byung pa rdzam
547a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yidi bzab par 'gyur bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams ring bas mdzes par gyur na yang de bzhin du ring por 'gyur ro// la de thung sa mdzes par gyur na yang ngo na/
