547a3(dkon brtsegs): drubyu bang 'gyur ba dang / tha sram ngan zhing yan lag dang byed lag 'tsham pa dang / mang nyung dang tsho nga dang / bshod mi gsheng yang de bzhin du mdzes shing ying dum 'ang ba med pa dag
547a4(dkon brtsegs): po drug chang zhing byad bzhi sdug pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / tshig gsal zhing dbyangs snyan pa dang / skyes du'i mtshan bun sum tshogs shing gang gis mthong ba rnams pa/
547a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dag gnan la smad na yang / gzhan gyis yid rjes shing gus pas ying la 'dzin par 'gyur/ ci'i phyir zhe na
547a6(dkon brtsegs): des tshorangs snyam la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus drug pa'i dbang gis ring lta bu'i rnam par sbyin pathab par 'gyur bste// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de gal te
547a7(dkon brtsegs): ya ni/ rtswa'i rtsibs logs g.yas phyogs tsog bung 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdod gsags nas/ ma'i sbrul tshigs log su bltas te 'dug go// gal te mo /
547a8(dkon brtsegs): ni ma rtsibs logs g.yan phyog su cog thang 'drag la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i phyogs su la bdas mthu badzog nas byin no/
547b1(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i gnas kyini stong na/ mthu ba'i dngos pos srur tus cam nu ba'i dngos pos ni 'ang 'artsegs par byed pas 'di lnga steng per na/ gnas sna bcings nas gas shing rnon pa'i bang bcug pa bzhin du
547b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// ga nyams mang du zos sam/ nyung du thos na yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de bzhin du gal te shin du snum pa 'ag/ shin tu nub pa 'am/ shin du mang ba 'am/ shin tu ma pa'am na
547b3(dkon brtsegs): tsha bro ba 'am/ mi bro ba 'am/ kha ba 'am/ skur ba'am/ mngar ba la stsogs pa'i zas 'di lta bu dag zos na yang / thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro// gal te mas 'dod pa spyod pa gyur na/
547b4(dkon brtsegs): drag tu song ngam/ brgyags sam/ mang de'i phyogs 'dug gam/ yun ring du rtsal bar gyur tam/ mchongs par gyur na yang thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo ma'i mang
547b5(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas pa na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brjod kyis mi lus la nyon mongs par rig par bya ste/ mi'i 'gro ba na yang sdug bsngal de lta bu myong bar 'gyur na/ ngan 'gro sems can
547b6(dkon brtsegs): myal ba'i sdug bsngal dbar bya dka' ba lta smos kyang cing dgos te/ de lta bas na dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pag tu med pa na gnas par mos shing / sdug bsngal blo
547b7(dkon brtsegs): su myong bar byed/ dga' bo zhag bdun phrag ni brkyang ba la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de/ byin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad skye bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhen 'di la khyi
547b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'dushes dang / bzhon pa'i 'du shos dang / kun dga' ra ba'i 'dra shes dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang / skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shos dang / khril 'dug pa'i 'dra shes dang /
548a1(dkon brtsegs): kha/ @#// chu ba'i 'du shes dang / rdzing gi 'du shes te/ yang dag par 'di dag yod pa ma yin yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtogs paskyed par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phran
548a2(dkon brtsegs): nyishu dgu pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas me tog 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i pags pa'i mdog kun tu gsal zhing yongasu dkar ba dang / chu
548a3(dkon brtsegs): dag nga dang bar byed de/ las kyi stobs kyis kha cig mi bdog nag por 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha dog bsngon por 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
548a4(dkon brtsegs): na nub la snum pa med pa dang / kha dog dkar ba dang / kha dog gnag pa dag kyang ci rigs par 'byung bar 'gyur// dga' bo nag bdun phrag sum cu pa li ni ma'i mangs nas/ grags
548a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de bus pas skra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams skye zhing 'phel bar byed de/ sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis kha dog dkar gnas pa
548a6(dkon brtsegs): stsogs pa ci rigs pa snang bar 'gyur ba yang gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu gcig pa la ni/ mdze mkha' na gnas pa de thar gyis cher skye bar byed/
548a7(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin du zhag bdun phra ga sum cu gnyis pa la/ gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar du yang rgya cher ste ning 'phral bar byed do// dga' bo nag bdun drug sum chu lnga pa la ni mang pa nAs
548a8(dkon brtsegs): banas pa 'i ma ladun pan lag dang tshad la gnas cad yang su rdzogs par gyur ro// dga' bzhag bdun phrag sum du drug pa la mi ma'i mang lan gnas pa na ma tsha
548b1(dkon brtsegs): na'adug mi dod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la ni/ mngal nu gnas pa na de phyin+ti ci log ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum po 'di lta
548b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni phyogs gcig gi dbang du byas ste bstan to// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum
548b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas me tog sdud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de lus bsgyur nas/ thur du phyogs shing lag pa gnyis brgyad nas/ skye
548b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sgo logs phyogs par byed do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'thur tu blta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste las kyi stobs kyi rlung des mngal na gnas pa de bus pas/
548b5(dkon brtsegs): ni thur tu blta zhing rkang pa gnyis ni gyen tu phyogs par byas nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de'i tshe rabs snga ma
548b6(dkon brtsegs): la sdug pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas shing / gzhan gyi mngal ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa zhig yin na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen des mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur
548b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ lag log cing stsol mar gyur nas bsgyur mi nus pas// ma'i mngal nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ ngo che shes pa dang ldan pa'i bud med ngam/ sman pa mkhas pas
548b8(dkon brtsegs): mang dang 'bru mar 'jam po 'am/ shing shal ma lo'i shun pa'i khu ba 'am/ gzhan yang dngos po 'jam po dag gis lag pa bskus nas lag pa'i sor mos gri rnon po blangs te/ snam
549a1(dkon brtsegs): bris sa dang 'dra zhing mchog tu dri mi zhom/ sgyug bro ba'i 'dam khrang / srin du'i tshigs brgya stong tshad med pa rtag tu gnas pa mi gtsang ba'i rabartag tu 'dzag pa/ 3
549a2(dkon brtsegs): dang khrag rlung rnams dral zhing rmugs pa mthong nas spro bar 'gyur ba/ lpags pa srab mas g.yogs ga sdig pa'i las las byung ba'i lus rma dang bcas pa/ mi gcad pa
549a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas der sang mo bcug ste/ der bcug nas kyi rnon pos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus dum bur gtubs nas/ ma'i mngal nas 'byin par byed pas// des na yid du mtshad
549a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad cing / tshab rngub pa dag myong ba'i rgyus ma de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na yang zhi ba dang bye brag med do//
549a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de dge ba'i las mngon par grub pa zhig yin na ni/ gal te log par gyur na yang / ma la gnang ba med par bad par bcas par 'gyur
549a6(dkon brtsegs): bas/ sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang ba gegs 'di lta bu dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/ nag bdun phrag sam cu rtsa brgyad 'das nas bcas par
549a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'im sdig bsngal can pa srog la bab pa myos nas/ gnod ma'i mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur bas na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu legs par brtags nas/
549a8(dkon brtsegs): rma bar 'drung ba yongasu btsal bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni che/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa'i sdug sa
549b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa mas par sdug bsngal shes par d+has/ pa san sna ba mngal nas skye ba len pa gang yin pa dngag shin tu sdug bsngal ba yin par rig par bya'o// dang pa bcas pas
549b2(dkon brtsegs): che nyamra / bu mi yang rung ste/ lag pa'i steng ngam/ gis las sngags pa'i steng du snang nas/ nyim 'am/ sgrib ma'am/ bsgrub pa'i zhing meb pam/ bstananam/ dang pa'i
549b3(dkon brtsegs): du bzhag pa na/ rgyu dang rkyen des thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha bathub pa/ ying du mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di ste ste/ dper na ba lang san par lpags pa bzhus
549b4(dkon brtsegs): gtsug pa dang nye bar gyur pa na/ cig pa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba'am/ gil te shing dang rtsa'i phung po dang nye bar gyur ma shing dang rtsal gnas pa'i
549b5(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te thug pa med par 'dug par gyur na/ bla gabapa med pa na gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur zhing / thams ca
549b6(dkon brtsegs): du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dang po btsas pa yang de bzhin du lta bar bya'o// dang po bcas pa de la n+ya dran ran pas bkrus na yang sdug bsngal chen mi
549b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mdze can lpags pa rul zhing myags pa/ rnag khrag zags pa la yang lcags kyis bzhug na/ sdug bsngal mi 'azad pa/
549b8(dkon brtsegs): tsha ba dang / chub pa myong bar 'gyur bzhin du// dang po bcas pa'i lus rgya dron gyis bkrus pa yang de bzhin du lta bar bya'o// dang po bcas pa'i lus de yang / phyis ma'i khrag pa/
550a1(dkon brtsegs): / dzam 'tshungs nas cher skye bar 'gyur te/ de khrag gi dri ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba las nu zho nyid la bya bar bstan pas/ de lta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar shin du mi badzad pa
550a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / bde ba chung zad kyang med na/ mkhas pa su zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshe 'di la rje sa chags pa bskyed nas/ rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgyun phyog su 'jug ni
550a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun 'chad pa med par byed/ dang po bcas pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lus de nyid las srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgya byung nas lus la za bar byed de/ dga' bo srin bu'i rig
550a4(dkon brtsegs): skal za ba zhes bya ba cig yod do// skra'i rtsi ba la gnas nas rtag tu skal yod byang byed do// srin bu'i rigs khar ba'i mdzod dang / mgo sbom zhes bya ba gnyis yod do// mgol brten te gnas
550a5(dkon brtsegs): rdeg tu mgol za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mig 'khor zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mig la gnas nas rtag tu mig la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs ded pa dang / 'dres pa dang / khangan
550a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa yong su rdzogs pa zhes pa bzhi yod de/ kAng pa la gnas nas rtag tu bla pal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lnga'i lo zhes bya ba gcig med de/ rna ba la gnas nas rnabal ba bar byed/
550a7(dkon brtsegs): gA'i rigis mdzod spro zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ sbrul gnas nas sprul tha bang da du/ srin bu'i rigs sas// zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mnul gnas sa rgyal ba bar bya /
550a8(dkon brtsegs): dri'i gis snang ci'i la mags bya ba gcig yod pas pa gnas nas po lam bar byed do// srin du'i rigs shing gdong gis bri ba gcig yad de/ sa'i rtsib la gnas nas rab rgyab la /
550b1(dkon brtsegs): byeng po srin bu'i rigs khab ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ le la gnas nas lcel za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs la rnon zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i rtsa ba la gnas nas lce'i rba ba lab ba na
550b2(dkon brtsegs): sri pa'i rigs lag rdzogs shes bya ba gcig sad de/ nal gnas nas dganal ba bar byed/ sprin bu'i rigs lag brda ba can dang / khyed bsdu shes bya ba gnyis sadag lag
550b3(dkon brtsegs): ma gnas nas lag mthal la za bar byed do// srin pa'i rigs 'phyang ba dang / rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag dang la gnas nas lag ngar la ba bar byed do// srin du'in
550b4(dkon brtsegs): dpung pa dang / nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas dpung ba zla bar byed do// sbyin bu'i rigs med pa dang / nye ba'i ming pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ med pa la
550b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas me bral la bar byed do// srid bu'i rigs dpa' ba dang / dpa' bachen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yang de/ brang la gnas nas drang la za par byed do// na bu'i rigs drang dang / drab ni
550b6(dkon brtsegs): b+ha ba gnyis yod de/ sha la gnas nas shal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang / stobs ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la za bar byed do// sprin du
550b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs dpa' bo dang / dri gtong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do// srid bu'i rigs mtho ba dang / kha sbub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi skal tshigs
550b8(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs gnyis g.yang tshal gi kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshal la za bar byed do// srin bu
551a1(dkon brtsegs): // gis rdzas sde la don ces bya ba gcig yong / 'arji ba la gnas nas rdze bal ba bar byed do// sprin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkha' ma la gnas nas ma
551a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas ma 'amam la sa par byed do// na pa'i rigs mu cig can pa zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rked pa la gnas nas na pa la nga bar byed de/ sbyin du'i rig ma ngas pa zhes bya pa gcis pa dang/
551a3(dkon brtsegs): bal gnas nas mched pa la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs chu srog dang / chu srog chen po dang / khab kyi mchu dang / mtshan chamachu zhes bya ba bani yod de/ rgyum la gnas nas rgyum la za bar byed do// man
551a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs bla rdzogs dang / zla ba gtong dang / bsil byed gtong dang / so sor gnas pa zhes bya ba lnga yod de/ rtsibs logs g.yas pa la gnas nas/ rtsibs legs g.yas pa la za bar byed do/ na
551a5(dkon brtsegs): yang srin pa'i rigs gong ma dang / ming mthun pa lnga yod de/ rtsibs logs g.yon pa la gnas nas rtsibs logs g.yon pa la g+han+d+has nus do// gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs mdun du 'bigs
551a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag rgyab tu 'jigs pa dang / nan par 'bigs pa dang / 'bigs te gnas nas bya ba ba ni yod de/ dus pa la gnas nus pa la za bar byed do// sran bu'i rigs cer da ba dang / chung zadang
551a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sbyin bcigs dang / dmi'is shes bya ba pani sangs rgya rgyas pa gnas nas rbargyas ma za bar byed // sri du rigs seng ga dang / skabs ldan dang / mgyogs pa'i mang dang / bad+mags byas
551a8(dkon brtsegs): mas meng gis thapa bdas pa gsangs marba gnas pa bar byang po khrin bu'i ba sa gan pa dang / 'dzi na pa nas bya ba gnyis mdad klu gnas sa gnas rba/
551b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu kha dang / phung po kha dang / drA ba kha dang / khye'u kha zhes b+hA ba bzhi yod de/ gci ba'i lam la gnas nas gcu pa'i lam la
551b2(dkon brtsegs): byed ga zan pa'i rigs byed pa dang / byung ba che ba dang / dbyebs rlung dang btad pazhes bya ba ba'i yod de/ babyung bu'i lum la ba par byed pa/ yin pa'i rigs la rag dang /
551b3(dkon brtsegs): 'anas chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod / brnal gnas nas brgal ba bar byed do// sprin bu'i rigs mngon nan/ mdzen can na du zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ bus mo la gnas nas
551b4(dkon brtsegs): bus mal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rig sa myos pa'i dra ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mgon zhes bya ba gcig yang/
551b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la gnas nas rkang pa la za bar byed do// dga' bo yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i lus 'di 'dra ba 'di la ni/ srin bu'i rigs 'di lta bu stong phrag brgya bcu rtag par nyin mtshan du rma/
551b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa des ni/ lus la gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / nyam chung zhing rma ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom par byed cing / gzhan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ldan zhing
551b7(dkon brtsegs): bdud pa dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongasu gdang ba dang / na mang po rnams mngon tu snang bar byed pas/ sman pa mkhas pa gang gis kyang gas zhing bsal bar mi nus te/ dga' ba srid
551b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po 'khor ba 'dir sdug bsngal de lta bu dang ldan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di la rjes chags pa bskyed par byed/ gzhan yang gnod pa mang pos yongs bzung ba 'di lta ste/
552a1(dkon brtsegs): 2/ ma/ khwa gon dang klu'i gdon dang / ka ta pra na bar gyi gdon rnams kyis yongs zin pa dang / gzhan yang gcan dan gyi gad rnams kyis yongs su zin pa dang / gzhan yang /
552a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / zla ba dang / rgyun tso gangan la sngags pas 'ongs zin nas/ nang sna chags kyis lus dang sems rten mangs par byed pa yod de/ 'dzad kyis mi lang ba/ bcom ldan
552a3(dkon brtsegs): e ga 'phrul gA dga' ba mkhas pa sa nag 'khong ba'ang ma'i mngal du 'jug par mas shing / sdug bsngal ma pa bad brgyang bur byed // de ltar bcas yang de lta
552a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ ma'i na no khrag dang 'dres pa 'thung zhing / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams zos shing 'thungs pa na yid/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa
552a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do// mthar gyis cher skyes nas/ lus pa de zhing nad med pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan zhing / tshe lo brgya thub par gyur na yang / tshe 'di nyid la gnyid kyis phyed bri bar
552a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya song rgyad ba dang / ga tug nananas/ mthar gyis cher skyes pa'i ba du dang / rgya na dang sgra sngags dzin pa dang na ma snams kyis rab tug da/
552a7(dkon brtsegs): ris pa 'du mang chud med pa pa sa chos mi 'ang ba rnams kyis/ la tshan mangs par byed pas lus kyi sdug ban ma dang du len par mi nus pa'im/ gsan pa ma ldan cing gi ba sa
552a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas na lus 'di ni sdug bsngal ma la bde bachung ba yin te/ re sheg tsam du gnas par byed kyang mthar 'jig par 'gyur bas/ dpa' ba skyes pa rnams thams cad kyang mchebar/
552b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas/ rtag par gnas pa dgang yang med do// gal te sman dang / zas kyis gsos nas tshe ring por 'gyur na yang / mthar 'chi bdag gi rgyal pos gsod cing yul stong du skye bar 'gyur bas na/
552b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi skye ba la dga' ba ci yang med par rig par byas nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs bsags pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la brtson zhing le la mi bya ba
552b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa na ca spyang ba dang / chos kyi stong pa dang // yon tan gyi spyod pa dang / dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pa la nag par mos pas bsgom par bya'o// ga par bdag nyid dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las
552b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa gnyis la so sor brtags nas/ sems la gtad de/ ma 'ongs pa na 'gyod pa chen po med par bya'o// rjes su chags par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni mthar bral bar 'gyur ni
552b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du tshe phyi ma len par 'gyuraro// dga' bo che lo bcu thub pa de yang gnas bskabs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dang po ni bris pa'i gnas skabs te/
552b6(dkon brtsegs): thams rlung zhings gan rgyal du la bar byed do// gnyis pa ni gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i dring mo la dga' bar byed do// gsum pa la ni lang tshol bab pa ste/ 'dod pa'i bad ba rnams
552b7(dkon brtsegs): myong bar byed do// ni la ni mthu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dpa' nid skabs dang ldan pa yin no// pa la ni dang la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no// drug pa lan
552b8(dkon brtsegs): yangs rdzogs pa ste/ legs par spyad pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin na// bdun pa la ni mthar gyis rgas pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu shes pa yin no// brgyad pa ni rgas par
553a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ bya ba mang po rnams pa mthu chung bar 'gyur ba bzhin no// dgra pa la ni shin tu rnas pa ste/ ci yang ma nus pa yin no// bcu pa la ni lo brgya ba ste/ 'tsha ba'i gnas bskabs gang yin pa'o//
553a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gnas skabs can pa de dag kyang mdor bsdus te bstanan/ 'di ltar zla ba bani bani dus gcig tu byas nas/ la brgyal dus sum brgya yod par 'gyur te/ dpyid dang / dbyung dang / dgun gyi dus na
553a3(dkon brtsegs): la'ang ngas brgya 'ang bas pa/ cig la cwa bcu gnyis yong pas zla ba yang brgya drag bcu gnyis yi bar 'gyur la/ de 'ang rtsub byed bzungs na rdzab byed pa brgyadrug na pa ni sa par ts+tsha
553a4(dkon brtsegs): pas dus gsum por re yang zla ba phyed pa brgyad rgya brgyad yod pas/ mdor bsdus na nyin mtshan stong phrag sumo cu cu drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur// ni gcig la lan gnyis su ma bas/ mdor sngas nams n-i
553a5(dkon brtsegs): yan stong drag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/ rkyen gyis bar byas nas/ me zos pa'i grangs der gtogs so// zas ma zos pa'i byin ni 'di lta ste/ khrus nas ma thos pa dang / sdug bsnga la myong ma/
553a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa dang / bcal tam rnyed nas ma zos pa dag / gting log semazas pa dang / sdom pablangs pa dang / rde bas myos te zlos pa dang / khrel mthos pa ste/ zas pa dang ma dzes pagacig tu bsdus nas grangs
553a7(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa / sa na 'angs pa yang grangs da gtoms pa/ de lta bas nangs ma rnams kyi tshe ba che lo brgya pa'i la dang / thA dang / nyinamathun dang / bza' ba dang / dung bas pa dang las
553a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdzangs ma su khris par bstan pa yin tshus// khyod kyis da sangs su srub bskyed par bya/ dga' ba ltang bcas gang ra skyes pa'i lus pa yang mang pa 'di lta ste/ nga pan pa /
553b1(dkon brtsegs): mgan pa dang rna phan pa dang / sman pa dang / gyen pa dang / son pa dang / lkog man pa dang / skyid na pa dang / ltoban pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / dang ban pa gnang pa dang / gzhan pa dang / mdze dang / mus pad/
553b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa dang / chung ba dang / 'khros pa dang / ba kan la sngags pa nang mang po rnams kyis/ yan lag dang / byin lag na ning sdug bsngal myong bar byed de/ dga' ba ma'i lus la 'di 'dra ba'i das/
553b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdug bsngal rnam pasna tshogs yad do// gzhan yang drung nang brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'khris pa'i nang brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan gyi na brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nang brgya rtsa gcig 'angs//
553b4(dkon brtsegs): mdo bsdus na nad pa ni brgya rtsa bzhi nang gi lus las skye bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo lus 'di ni 'bras dang 'dra zhing / zug rngu dang 'dra bas nang mang po las mngon par grub pa// skad cig tsam
553b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi gnas zhing / skad cig mar 'gyur ga/ rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par gyur pa/ 'chi ba dang / nye zhing 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i chos can/
553b6(dkon brtsegs): yid brtan tu marud ba yin no// dga' bo 'di ltar sems can rnams ni/ gnan yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa bcang ba dang //
553b7(dkon brtsegs): mig dbyung ba dang / rna ba gcad pa dang / sna gcing pa dang / lce gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcang po'i sdug bsngal dang / gzhan yang gose ra 'jug pa dgag/
553b8(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / lcag kyi bcu ba dang / rdeg pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ngal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / char ba dang / spang
554a1(dkon brtsegs): / mtshu ngas dang / sha stAng dang / gcan can dang / sdig bsngal la sogs pa'i rigs pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa/ brjod kyis
554a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rdzogs pa dag rjes su myong bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams ni rtag tu 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzang rngub pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba la gnas shing rjes su chags pa dang /
554a3(dkon brtsegs): bying bar gyur pa yin pos/ 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin yang / de snang bar bya ba yin par d+ha ba yin par shes shing / yang yang su gang bar byed pas
554a4(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshan du lus dang sems yongs su gdung ba dang / nang sreg cing chog par byed pa la yang rgyun 'chang par med de/ de bzhin du skye ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// rga ba yang /
554a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yin no// tshab yang sdug bsngal yin no// sdug pa dang bral ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// mi sdig pa dang phrad pa yang sdug bsngal yin no// gang 'dod pa btsal te rnyed pa 'a/
554a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba ni mo// nye bar yin pa'i phung po lnga yang sdug bsngal yin no// 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam bzhi po dag kyang sdug bsngal yin pas/
554a7(dkon brtsegs): gal de nag tu 'gro zhing 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar ma gyur na yang sdug bsngal myong zhing bde ba med par 'gyur ro// gal te rtag tu 'greng zhing 'gro ba dang / 'dus
554a8(dkon brtsegs): bdang thal par gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu 'dug la 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / thal bar ma gyur tapa/ gal tertag tul 'gro ba dang / 'drer ba dang / 'dug par ma gyu /
554b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong zhing bde ba thob par mi 'gyur bas/ dga' bo 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal spangs nas/ sdug bsngal yongasu gtse bar byed pa yin pas/
554b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kho na skye zhing / sdug bsngal kho na 'gags par 'gyur bas/ 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rgyun chad med par 'byung bar 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig
554b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi 'khor ba'i chos 'dra byed pa rnams mi rtag cing / yang dag pa'i mthar byin pa mo yin pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/ yid pan
554b4(dkon brtsegs): du ma rung ba yin pas/ chos shes pa yongasu btsal nas shin tu skyo bar byed de/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rnam par grol yongs su gnyer bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa yin no// dga'
554b5(dkon brtsegs): bo bde 'gror skyes pa'i sems can skye gnas mi gtsang ba dag sdug bsngal ma zad pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba yang brjod kyis mi rdzogs na/ ngan song gsum pa
554b6(dkon brtsegs): yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyis myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa bzod par dka' ba yongasu brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
554b7(dkon brtsegs): so// gzhan yang dga' ba ma'i mngal du 'jug pa rnams pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gang zhig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas
554b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas la/ yang dag par ma shes bzhin du 'byung ba
555a1(dkon brtsegs): // yod kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing / yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/ kha cig ni mi shes bzhin du 'jug
555a2(dkon brtsegs): nga dag par migs pa ga nas/ yang dag par migs bzhin du byung ba yod do// mu nig yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / byung bar 'gyur zhen/ ji lta ba nas /
555a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i sems can bcig rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' ning / yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / dngos po mchog la mes shing bas rnams rnams
555a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa dang / shin tu yang dag par sdom pa dang / rtag tu drang por sems shing bag med par mi byed pa dang / shes rab chen po dang ldan pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi ni// 'gyod pa med pa/
555a5(dkon brtsegs): skyeb par dag par len par byed pa/ rgyun tu thugs pa sgrub 'an bdun pa'ang/ rigs nas rigs su skye ba 'am/ phan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ par chad gcig pa dag yin me/ gang rdza
555a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang dge ba snang pa hU~M tshi 'dus kyini sdug bsngal ba 'angs ga na pa dang / jib sa su myong bar gyur bya/ sems la gad pa med pa dang smra
555a7(dkon brtsegs): s+'ud+d+ha kaM pa hU~M sa sa mas kyas h+l-I sa nga na sa ma/
555a8(dkon brtsegs): sa byas par byung gis rab tu shes so// ba' ba tshus 'di nimi gtsang thams cad kyi rgyam yin pas/ rang bzhin rtag par gnas pa ma yin pa dang / blon pa'i'adengs pa yin pas rnas pas
555b1(dkon brtsegs): la smra bar byed pa yin no// snyam du rig par bya'o// lus 'di ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor rtsa rgyas rnams phan tshun 'brel ba/ bu ga dang / gnad rnams 'dod par gyur pa/ sha dang tshil dang / rus pa ldang
555b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar myong bar gyur kyang / dbang po mchog turno ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur mi 'gyur te/ dga' bo de ltar na mngal na gnas pa de'i mas
555b3(dkon brtsegs): naganas pan ma/ de lta bub sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcasu rtse ba'i tshin sdug bsngal dang bcas pa bzhin du 'gyur te/ las kyi rlung gi bang gis de'i lag pa bsnol nas
555b4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang nying lag du bcum ste/ sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa myong nas/ ma'i mngal nas byung bar gyur pas/ lus kyi yan lag thams cad sngon por 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper ma gas
555b5(dkon brtsegs): du spangs pa la reg par mi bzod pa bzhin du/ bkres bsgom gyis gdungs pa dang / snying 'phyang zhing gdung ba dang / bcas pa bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gis rgyu dang rkyen gyis bus nam mngal nas 'byung
555b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyuraro// mngal nas byung nas kyang phyi rol gi rlung gis reg par gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste dper// mtshon kyis bcing nas thal bas bkrus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyuraro// lag pa dang gos kyis rog tu
555b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chen yang / thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang / dbang po rab tu rno pa'i phyir yang dag pa dran pa dang ldan pas rnam pan/
555b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ ma'i mang la dri shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na/ dga' bo mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug
556a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba la mos par byed / dga' bo su zhig ma'i mngal du yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe mangs
556a2(dkon brtsegs): po ji ltar 'di na so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing / yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / rtag
556a3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po mchog la mes shing / bsod nams mngon par du byed pa dang / de'i sems drang zhing bag med par mi byed pa dang / shes rang chung ngu dang ldan pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa
556a4(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur ba rgyun tu zhugs pa smrab lamadun pa'am/ rigs nas rig sa smra ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ bar chad gcig bdag yin te/ gang dab de dag gis snar na
556a5(dkon brtsegs): bstud pa'i 'chiga'i dus kyi me// sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang / tsha ba'am su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du/ ma'i mangs
556a6(dkon brtsegs): dra zhugs nas chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar rab tu shes so bya ba nas/ ma'i mngal nas/ ma'i mngal nas byung nas shes byan
556a7(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang sngam bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma bzang ba cha ning chub pa rnams myang bar gyur kyang / dbang po 'bring dang ldan pa'i phyir/ yang dag par /
556a8(dkon brtsegs): shin du drug cing gnas la/ yang rig par migs ba zhin du 'byung bar 'gyur na/ mkhas pa sun gi 'di 'dra ba mngal du 'jug pa lams par byed pa zhes byab
556b1(dkon brtsegs): du yang snga ma bzhin du nus par sbyar ro// dga' bo su zhig yang dag par bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing 'byung bar byed cen/ dga' bo 'dra/
556b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'di na so so'i sbyi sems can kha cig ni/ rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims srung ba la dga' zhing / yang nas yang du dge ba goms par byed pa dang / rtag tu dngos po mchog la mes
556b3(dkon brtsegs): shing bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi che 'gyod pa med par gyur pa/ rgyun tu zhugs bskye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya ba la stsogs pa'i bar du yang snga ma ngan
556b4(dkon brtsegs): du rgyas par snang te/ 'tshag 'dis kyi tshe/ sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing / na ba dang chab nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mang
556b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug par byed de/ dbang po rno ba ma yin pa'i phya'i/ shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed kyang / mi shes bzhin du gnas shing 'byung bar byed de mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngan
556b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa la mos par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo su zhig yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar byed
556b7(dkon brtsegs): cen/ ji ltar 'din so so'i skye bo sems can kha cig/ tshul khrims yongasu dag pa la mi dga' zhing dge ba'i phyogs sgrub par mi byed pa/ rtag tu dngos po ngan pa dang / rkang phan chun
556b8(dkon brtsegs): dkris shing pags pas g.yog yin yang spyan tu ma mthong bas/ rab tu gdungs pa'i phug du mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/ sgra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / sa'i gnas skabs tha dad /
557a1(dkon brtsegs): zhag dang /
557a2(dkon brtsegs): la bdag nga bdag gir gzung ba'i phyir/ rtag tu rang dbang med par khrid brtag tu mchis ma dang / skabs dang / mi gtsang ba dang / kha chu dang / rdul dang / 'bris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'drung zhing / tshi /
557a3(dkon brtsegs): mid myags pa dang / ma'al ma dang mcher pa dang / man pa dang / khro ba dang / zlum ne dra mi gtsang ba'i gang ning skyug brog/ srin bu'i rigs mang pas kun tu khyab par gang gasteng dang ga gi drug pa rnam su ma mam
557a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'adzag pa/ zhu ba dang / mnu ba'i gnas gnyis lpags pa srab mos g.yog pas/ 'di ni snam phyis dang 'dra ba yin no// snyam du khyed kyis so sor brtag par bya'o// ji tsam du bza' ba dang / bca' ba zos pa chos shing /
557a5(dkon brtsegs): ldang nga ma mchil snabs su gyur nas/ meng par 'jug cing / rkang pa dang / klad pa phan tshun 'dres nas lto bar 'bab par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na khyi rus pa skam po bldad pa lta bur gyur pa yin yang /
557a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis nim pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byed pas/ zas rked par phyin nas gyen du smon par byed kyang / slar med par byed do// dga' bo lus 'dini dang po med mer po dang /
557a7(dkon brtsegs): chu rgya pa nga / yang ltar pa dang / mju gyur dang / rkang la bzlas pa mi gcang pa das pacir skyes nas/ byis pa'i chil bar bar gyur ba nas/ rgas pa'i bang du lacha nga tsas par ma
557a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mun pa'i gsangs dang 'dra'o// khrin pa gnas pa dang 'dra ba/ rag tu lan cha dang / bska pa dang / tsha ba dang / sbyar ba la stsogs pa'i zas kyi ris yongs su pa
557a9(dkon brtsegs): ga gan ya ma ngal gyi mis lus kyi dbang ba rib tu btsas pam gtsang ba'i slang du brtag pa rab tu badrang pa'i sdug bsngal bar 'gyur gi/ gal te 'phreng ngam/ jugs sa
557b1(dkon brtsegs): nyal bar gyur pa na bcings pa 'am/ mes gdugs pa bzhin du bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur bas/ dper byar yang mi nus so// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de/
557b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du gnas shing sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs par 'gyur mod kyis/ 'on kyang dbang ba rno ba'i phyir sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sems can bsod nas
557b3(dkon brtsegs): chung ba bcig ni ma'i mngalan phred du nyal ba'am/ log par 'dug par yang 'gyur te/ de yang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyi phyir ram/ yang rnams kha zas ma snyoms pa/ shin tu drang na
557b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ shin tu tsha ba 'am/ shin tu sgyur ba 'am/ shin tu mngar ba 'am/ shin tu khab zos pa'i phyir ram/ yang na tshad las 'das par skom 'thungs sam/ 'dod chags mang du spyang ngam/ nang bu can du gruban/
557b5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan mang po non tam/ rdeg 'tshos sam/ brdegs par gyur na yang rkyen 'di dag gi dbang gis/ ma'i lus kyang yongasu gdungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su gdungs par gyur pa'i phyir/ mngal nasan
557b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su gdung bar gyur pa'i phyir ni sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur pa'i// phyir ni g.yo bar 'gyur ro// g.yos pa
557b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i phyir ni lus log par phyed du nyal zhing 'byung bar mo nus pa la/ bud med mkhas pas/ mar ram 'bru mar gyis lag pa bskus nas ma'i mngal du 'jug ste// bags kyis mngal
557b8(dkon brtsegs): la myangs nas/ sngar ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'jog par byed pas/ lag pas reg par gyur pa na/ mngal na gnas pa de sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa dag myong bar 'gyur te/ dag
558a1(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di lta steng dbar na/ khye'u'am bu mo shin tu gzhon pa'i lus la/ la la zhig gis mtshan rnon pos lpags pa dang sha bcad nas/ de'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ de'i na
558a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzang ba rtsub pa yang de 'dra ste/ de la mos shing sdig pa rnams stod pa/ sems kyi/
558a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin ma 'dra zhing bag med pa mang ba/ shes rab dang mi ldan pa dag longs spyod la mngon par zhen cing ser sna byas pa dang / rtag tu lag bskums nas gzhan dag la rgor zhi
558a4(dkon brtsegs): gdod bar byed pa dag / nag tu re ba dang bcas shing sems rab tu dul bar ma gyur pa dang / lta ba dang sprod pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ 'chig 'dus kyi tshe 'byud pa dang bcas shing/ sdig/
558a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dge pa'i las rnams mngon tu gyur pas/ 'chi gA'i dus kyi tshe// sdug bsngal mi bzang ba dang / tshang dang / chub pa dang / yid du ma 'ong ba dag gis rab tu gzir cing / de'i sems na/
558a6(dkon brtsegs): par g.yang bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal dbang gis/ bdag ni su tshig gang nas 'dir 'ongs de gang tu 'gro bar 'gyur nas rab tu mi shes pas/ dpa' bo 'di ni dus gsum du
558a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par shes bzhin du med pa zhis bya ste/ rgyas par gang ma bzhin du sbyang ro// dga' bo sems can de dag mir skyes nas/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal tshang pa dang ldan par 'gyur/
558a8(dkon brtsegs): namad kyis latha de ga ni ga nas sachog tu gyur pa gan pas/ bskal pa byed brgyas cang med pa sbed du 'ang ma lus me rnyed pa dag bsanin// gal tha sas kyis/
558b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na/ rtag tu lhungs 'jigs pas sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha gzhan rnams kyis 'di skad du// khyod bde 'gro'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur
558b2(dkon brtsegs): cig pade 'gro'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de ni mi'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer bas/ mi'i 'gro ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin la/ kham pa dang ldan pa ni de bas kyang chos
558b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// ngan 'gro gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ngan song gsum po dag gang yin pa'o// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ni rtag tu sdug bsngal mi zad pa shin tu yid du mi 'ongs
558b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu cha zhing rngub pa dag myong bar 'gyur bas/ dpe byar yang mi nus so// yi dgas kyi 'gro ba ni rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang mang ba/ rab tu mnyen zhing dul ba'i sems med ba/ g.yo sgyu
558b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ gsod cing gnod par byed pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa/ byams pa dang snying rje med pa/ byang bzhin mi sdug pa// mthong na 'jigs su rung ba/ gal te ming dang/
558b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gyur na yang / bkres pa dang sgom pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas/ rtag par slebs pa dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi
558b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni tshad med dpag tu med de don gyi spyod pa dang mo ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ chos kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ drang po'i spyod pad/
558b8(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan pa/ phan tshun gcig la cig za ba dang / mthu dang ldan pa rnams mthu chung bdag la za bar byed pa dag yin no// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kha cig ni mun par skyes/ mun par rgas/
559a1(dkon brtsegs): / mun pa'i 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / migacang pa'i gnas gcig cag gi nang du gnas pas/ res 'ga' snang ba dang bcas pa yang yod de/ 'di la na bye ma leb dang / snang ma dang / sra shig dang /
559a2(dkon brtsegs): trail ta lta du rnams so// gzhan yang rtag par mun pa'i nang du skyes/ mun pa'i nang du rgas par gyur pa tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ de ni tshe rab snga ma la mir gyur pa na/ glen zhing gtim/
559a3(dkon brtsegs): drug pas rjes pang dag par ma mnapa/ lus dang ngag dang / yidi thal rangs su gtong zhing 'dod pa la la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ sdig pa me dge ba'i las mang ba mngan par 'dus
559a4(dkon brtsegs): bas de'i bisu smras nas/ spen cing rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dag yin no// dga' ba gzhan yang dung 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems ma nu nang du sus nas/ chu ming du
559a5(dkon brtsegs): rnas chu nang du dus byed par 'gyur ba chad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 1dang / rus la dang / skal pa dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / ba lu ka lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang /
559a6(dkon brtsegs): mas snam la lus dang ngag da / yid kyi las ma dag pa di bang gis zhes pa la sogs pa gang ma bzhin du rnam par snar // dga' ba gzhan yang da bgra stu gnas pa
559a7(dkon brtsegs): ma bag pa dang / gcib dzi ra na/ myu du nga sang nas brda' ba dang / bdung bar byung ba na mad dpag tu med pa rnyad yid de/ 'de lta ste/ bag dang / srog dgi khyim kyang ga/ na
559a8(dkon brtsegs): tha nga/ byag dang / tha ga dang / sdang za da/ srung bdag can can rnams te/ thams cad kyang che bas snga ma'i sdig pa ma dag parda las kyi dbang gis dag bu byung brgyang gru
559b1(dkon brtsegs): khog gan sa drang 'gro stsa gnas pa nag tu tu dang / shing dang / mi gtsang ba'i dngos pa rnams pa' 'altung bar byed pa char med dpag tu med pa sred yang de/ 'drig ste/ grang ba da /
559b2(dkon brtsegs): rta dang / rnga ma dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / dre'u la stsogs pa lta bu rnams te// thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i las mi dge ba'i dbang gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de lta bu rnam par
559b3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' bo kye ma kye hu srid par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di ni 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ mchog tu 'bar ba/ shin tu mchog tu 'bar ba yin pas/ sem
559b4(dkon brtsegs): can 'ga' tsam yang des ma bsregs shing ma bcos pa med de/ de yang mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi me rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pas mngon du snang bani/
559b5(dkon brtsegs): yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dr-i dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur pa yin no// dga' bo 'bar rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i mi gang zhe na/
559b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i me dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bdu
559b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa'i mi dag gis rtag tu bsregs shing 'bar bar byed pas/ 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do// dga' bo le lo la rab tu gnas pa dag ni sdug bsngal mang po'i myong shing /
559b8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mos pas kun tu dkris nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mngon par 'dra byas pas/ 'khor bar 'khor ba yang nye bar zhi zhing rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtsams/
560a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba mang du myong zhing / brtul ba'i sems bskyed par byed pas/ nyon mongs pa yongs su bsal nas/ dge ba'i chos bsku
560a2(dkon brtsegs): 'a'i bar du brtson pa mi gtong ba la rgyun 'chad pa maud gyur ro// de b+ha bas na deng khyod kyi lus 'di pags pa dang / sha dang / chub dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang /
560a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / nang rnams ni ring por mi thogs par gyis shing 'jig par 'gyur ro// snyam du so ser brtags nas// rtag par sems rtse gcig tu le lo mi b+ha bar mngon sum na
560a4(dkon brtsegs): mabyas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phy-ir/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de ltar bslab par bye'o// dga' bod ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod par mi byed na/ 'on kyang 'dzag nag
560a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rten gyis ngal med par byed de// de ci'i byor na ni/ gang chos shes pa rnams ni gzhan dang rtsod par mi byed de/ bdag dang bdag gong badzin pa dang bral ba yi
560a6(dkon brtsegs): byadang rgyun cig cod par byed do// kyang mthong ba dang shes pa med pa dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa bskyed par byed pa'i phyir/ ngas yang dag pa mnas
560a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangasargyas nas/ 'di skad du na chos rnams gang yang mi shes pa med do// zhes smras pa yin no// dga'i bongs de skad smras pa de la tha dad du gyur pa yododas
560a8(dkon brtsegs): ma / ris ldan rjes ma ma/ ra ba gzhags papa dag gsungs pal pan ma mams la sa
560b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ lag so legs so// dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsungs pa/ bden
560b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gsung ba/ tha ma dang bar gsungs pa/ sgru ba med par gsungs pa/ 'jig rten pa rnams pa phun ring bar phan pa dang / bde ba dang / phan lan chen po thob par mdzad
560b3(dkon brtsegs): mam mkhyen pa/ lam ga pa/ lam sbyin pa/ lam 'byed pa/ lam 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dngag
560b4(dkon brtsegs): suMldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur
560b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// 'jig rten pa rnams ni shes pa med pa/ mngon par yid ches pa med pa/ rtag par dbang po rnams kyis dran pa med pa/ lag mthil na yod pa kho na mthong zhing /
560b6(dkon brtsegs): don chen po la mi lta ba/ sba ba'i dngos po mi sgrub par gang bya dka' ba rgyun tu byed pa yin no// dga' bo shes rab dang ldan pa'i spyod yul 'di ltar re shig zhog la/ dang rtse
560b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis sha'i mig gis blta bas shes pa dang / mthong ba ji snyed pa dag yang dag pa ma phyin pas sa sor rtogs na/ de cing rnam par thar pa zhes bya bas/ dga' dzin
560b8(dkon brtsegs): nga la dad pa'i phyir ma 'gro shig/ nga la 'dun pa'i phyir 'brang bar ma byed cig/ nga'i tshig la rton par ma byed cig/ nga'i mtshan ma la rtog par ma byed cig/ dge
561a1(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi lta ba dang / shes pa'i rjes sum 'brang shig/ dge sbyong la gus ma skyed cig/ 'di skad du dge sbyong go'u tam ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no zhes mazer bar
561a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i cis gang yin pade gcig pu dben par song lnga bzlas te/ 'dal bar gyis shig/ sa ser rtogs shig/ rtag pa mang du sams ni/
561a3(dkon brtsegs): sems ce gcig tu chos rnams so sar rtags te/ chos de dag las bsgom pa'i 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ yang dag pa dran pa la gnas nas bdag nyid kyis gling byas
561a4(dkon brtsegs): shig// bdag nyid kyis gnas dang skyabs byes shig/ chos kyi gling byos shig/ chos kyi gnas dang skyabs byos shig/ de las gnan pa'i gling dang gnas dang skabs med de/ das
561a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar na dge slong bdag gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skabs su gyur pa dang / chos gling du gyur pa dang / ches gnas dang skabs su gyur cig/ de las gzhan ni
561a6(dkon brtsegs): gling dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnos dang / skyabs med par gyur pa yin ne na/ dga' bo 'di ltar dge slong gang ba la nig bdag nyid kyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes sul ba la/
561a7(dkon brtsegs): gas sa/ ban rgyas dran pa cig cig tu gas pas/ yang dag pa shes pa na/ jig nA pag 'ang za ba sbyi bdag N+DA 'di masas ra
561a8(dkon brtsegs): gyung pa gang na / gangs ma drug pa snga ma la pa sa sum panas byan/ gang gis kyim gyi rdzas dang / da kyi dus 'grus kyis
561b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// dga' bo de'i 'og tu 'byung ba'i chos la lus su bltas pa rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i rjes su lus nas rab tu gnas pa yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'brang ba dang /
561b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la lus su lta zhing rjes su gnas par byed pa nyid kyi lus 'di la yang dag par dran par byed pas res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong na
561b3(dkon brtsegs): khon dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rten pa med par gnas par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/
561b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na dge' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid kyis lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rang gi lus dang phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyi ga'i lus la lta ba
561b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// de'i 'og tu nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / nang dang phyi rolo gnyi ga'i tshor bar lta ba la rab tu gnas pa dang / nang gi sems dang phyi rol gyi sems dang / nang dang rtsi
561b6(dkon brtsegs): rol gnyiga'i sem su lta ba la gnas pa dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang / nad phyi rol gnyi ga'i chis su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas/ brtson 'grus gyis dran pa rtse gcig tu/
561b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ yang dag pa'igis pa thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la mi sems shing rab tu dul bar gyur nas/ kun 'byung ba'i chos su lus nas rab tu
561b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos su ltas nas rab tu gnas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la chos su ltas nas/ rab tu gnas par byed pa nyid kyis
562a1(dkon brtsegs): / lus 'di 'di la yang dag par dran par byed pas/ res 'gang ni shes pa khon dang ldan par 'gyur na/ re 'ga' ni mthong ba khon dang ldan par 'gyur// des 'ga' zhin
562a2(dkon brtsegs): pa khon dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid gling du myur pa dang / bdan
562a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos kyi gling du gyur pa dang / chos da / skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i gling med pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang sgyu
562a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya'o// dga' bo skyes bu rang bzhin drang zhing g.yo sgra spangs po gang la la zhig snga dro dris kyi tshe/ nga'i thang du 'ongs pa la ngas dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du /
562a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos de la rdzas su bstan nas/ de phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smras par 'gyur la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes bstan pa/ yang bdag ni
562a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dang ldan par smra bar byed pas na/ dga' bongs legs par bstan pa'i chos ni mthong ba'i chos la mngon sum du rdzogs pa/ rab tu gdung bsrel bar byed pa/
562a7(dkon brtsegs): dus dang dbang po dang rab tu 'tsham par 'gyur ba/ thabs dang ldan pa dang / gis rig pa'i chos legs par skyob par byed pa yin pas/ gong gis nga'i mngon
562a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes panan patsas par 'gyur na/ nalas 'das pa'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur ra/ byang chuba'i gnas par byed pa gang ngan pa ni sa gyi /
562b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta ngas na dang khyed kyis bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyig 'don de lta bu mthong nas/ chos 'di la rtag par yang dag par bslabs te/ rab tu byung ba'i chos
562b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag yod par bsgrubs nas/ rlud ma thon cing 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par byas nas/ gzhan gyis byin pa'i chos dang / bsod na
562b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mal na dang / na ba'i gsos sman la stsogs pa blangs par bya zhing / sbyin bdag rnams bsod nams kyi phan yon chen po thob pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa
562b4(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa yangs shing rgya che ba dag thob par 'gyur bar de ltar dga' bo khyod kyi brlab par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo gzugs 'ga' tsam yang rjes su
562b5(dkon brtsegs): chags par bya 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par 'gyur zhing 'dzag par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de'i gnas med do// gang yang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
562b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyon mongs pa skyed pa gang yang med de/ de'i gnas med de/ dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ gzugs de rtag pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa de ni rang
562b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis mi rtag pa legs so// dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci ste bde ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba zhig yin nam/ btsun pa de ni
562b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba lags so// gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing / 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldanapa
563a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba zhig yin na
563a2(dkon brtsegs): // dag gzugs 'di ni bdag yin nom/ btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag yin no// bdag ni gzugs las
563a3(dkon brtsegs): so zhes mkhas len par byed dam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so// 'di ji sam du sems/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa/
563a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag rtag pa zhig yin nom/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi rdeg pa lags so// dga' bo gal te rong bzhin gyis mi rtag pa na
563a5(dkon brtsegs): ngon te sdug bsngal ba zhig yin/ btsun pa sdug bsngal ba lags so// gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal bden rnam par 'gyur zhing 'dzag pa'i chos can yin/
563a6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'phags pa nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag/ ci tshor ba la stsogs pa 'di dag ni bdag yin no// bdag ni tshor ba la stsogs pa dang ldan pa/ tshor pa
563a7(dkon brtsegs): la stsogs pa ni bdag yin no// bdag tshor ba la stsogs pa la gnas so zhes mkhas len par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so// de bas na ci tsam du/
563a8(dkon brtsegs): gas su byur ba'adas pa 'am/ mngangs pa mAM/ da ltar 'byung ba'am/ nang gi ma/ phyi rol gyi ma/ rigs pa'am/ pra ba'am/ bzang po la/
563a9(dkon brtsegs): ga sa ba 'am/ dag sa ya rung ste// detsam du gzugs su gyur ba thams cad kyang bdag phan la/ bdag kyang bzugs ldan pa ma na /
563b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs la gnas pa ma yin par rig bya'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis/ ji tsam du tshor ba
563b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'du shes dang / 'dra byed dang / rnam par shes par gyur pa 'das pA/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ zab 'am/
563b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'am/ nA pa 'am/ bag ring ba 'am/ zag nye ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang
563b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang bdag gi ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag la gnas pa ma yin par legs par so sor brtag par bya'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag
563b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis nga'i nyan thog 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang / ldan pa dag ni/ 'di ltar gzugs la so sor brtags nas yongs su skyo ba skye ba dang / gzhan
563b6(dkon brtsegs): nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la so sor brtags nas yongs su skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te skyo bar 'gyur na mngon par zhen par ma
563b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do// mngon par zhen pa med pas rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro// rnam par grol nas bdog rnam par grol lo snyam du shes pas/ 'di skad du bdag gi skye ba ni
563b8(dkon brtsegs): zad de/ tshangs par sdud pa yang dag par spyod do// bya ba byas pas yang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtag par bya'o//
564a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chi bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas/ chos kyi mig
564a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya po rnam ni zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to// de nas de tshe/ bcom ldan 'das
564a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal ba/ gang la mnyam gzhag sems med pas/ rnam dag ye shes byed pas na/ zag pa rnams ni spong mi 'gyur/
564a4(dkon brtsegs): de bas khyod kyis nan tan bsgrubs// khyod kyis rnal 'byor rtag bsgoms/ phung po skye 'gag shes par gyis/ rnam dag gal te rdzogs 'gyur na/ lha rnams
564a5(dkon brtsegs): kun ni dga' bar 'gyur/ brda' shes lhan cig 'brel dga' zhing / phan tshun 'dul zhing chags pa dang / thob dang grags pa mngon zhen pa/ dga' bo khyod kyi
564a6(dkon brtsegs): kun spongs shing / khyim pa dang ni rab byung li/ bsten cing shes ni ma byed par/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dis sems la/ sdug bsngal mthar ni phyin par byes/ dang po/
564a7(dkon brtsegs): med med po las ni/ sha yi chu bur skye bar 'gyur/ chu bur las ltar wAr ste/ ltar ltar po las mkhrang bar 'gyur/ mkhrang ba rnam par gyur nas ni/ mgrin dang
564a8(dkon brtsegs): lag pa'i skyes pas/ rus pa 'dus nas 'grub pa/ thams cad las kyi rgyalas byung / mgo tha~Md rus pa dgu 'dus shing // 'jam pa'i rus pa gnyis 'dres
564b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ san sum cu cu gnyis ldan/ de la chu'ang de bzhin no// rna rtsa gnya' ba'i rus pa dang / dkan dang sna yi rus pa dang / brang dang med pa'i rus pa ni/ bsdus na rus pa gnyi shu 'ad/
564b2(dkon brtsegs): mig la rus pa bzhi yod de/ phrag pa byin bzung gnyis yod/ lag pa gnyis dang sor mo rnams/ bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod/ lhag rgyab rus pa brgyad yod de/ sprul
564b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs la ni sum cu gnyis 'di dag kun la rtsa yod pas/ de'i grangs ni che bzhir 'gyur/ rtsib logs g.yas pa'i rus pa ni/ ban nAn 'brel ba bcu gsum yod/
564b4(dkon brtsegs): 'i logs galan+do 'brel skye ba yi// ras pa dag ni bcu gsum yod/ rus pa'i lu gu rgyud 'di dag/ gsum gsum dag ni ngan tshun 'brel gnyis gnyis dag ni tshigs ldan
564b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag na gzhan ni 'brel ba med// g.yas gzhan brnyan gnyis pa la// bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod // lus nang 'brel ba'i rus pa ni// bsdoms sum cu cu drug yod
564b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs phan tshun 'brel na ni// sems can lus ni grub yin no// yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yin// bden tshig tu ni gsungs pa yin// rkang mthil nas ni mgo bo'i bar/
564b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang 'dres shing ma brtan pa/ de dag lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// nyams chung 'dam bu'i khyim dang 'dra// rus pa 'bra' zhig gzer bu med// sha khrag kun tu bskus
564b8(dkon brtsegs): bsan/ shing mi 'khrul 'khor rab 'dra zhing / sgyu mas sprul pa'i gzugs bsnyen 'dra// lus 'di rtsa rgyus dkris nas ni/ lpags pa gsher bas g.yogs pas na/
565a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dgu rma'i sgo yod par// de lta bur ni lte bar bya// kun nas gcin rgyag mi gtsang ba// rtag tu gang zhing 'dzag pas na/ dper na bang pa rdol rnams sa//
565a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams sna tshogs bkang ba ltar// lus 'di yang ni de bzhin de/ ma gtsang sna tshogs rab tu gang // rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor g.yo bas na// rnams nang snying po ci yang med/
565a3(dkon brtsegs): paskye bo rtag tu chags// mkhas pa dag ni zhen mi byed// mtshal snying dang skyibs rdul ni rtag tu 'ba'/ rnag khrag gi dag ni rgyun tu gang // zhag ser 'i ma ldan cig 'dres// rlung
565a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni glad pa gang / snying kang bad kan rgyun tu 'byung // nang gi zhu dang ma nu'i gnas/ klad rgyas dang ni pags pa dang // snying dang nang khrol glo mtshachin dang // 'di ltas stsogs
565a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rul lcags dang // mi gtsang rnams dang lhan gcig gnas// srog pa'i lus ni 'jig rung bas/ 'di nyid bdag gi dgra yin na// shes med 'dod la zhen pa
565a6(dkon brtsegs): blun pa rtag tu 'bangs par byed// 'di 'dra'i mi gtsang lus 'di na// grong khyer rnyed pa 'dra bas na// in mnan n+dan mongs rab gzir cing // skad cig ma gnas kun tu ma
565a7(dkon brtsegs): nus pas thaMng khyer tshig par byed// dang zug gis na lanal bsdus// dzad sdang gti mug mtshon brgyanas/ tsaM rigs par ni brgyan par byed// rus pa 'grod khyed stug tho ga
565a8(dkon brtsegs): 'brel zhing 'dus pa lam rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs pa yis// khyo nang sdug bsngal gdung par byed/ dga' ba khyod kyis shes par byas/ ngas ni rje sa bstan pa pa nas mi mam/
565b1(dkon brtsegs): tu dran byos la/ 'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed/ gal te 'dod pa spong 'dod na/ rtag tu de bzhin rab bsgoms la/ rnam grol yongs tshol bar gyis/ myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dang/
565b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'a/
565b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te/ bathar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i
565b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas su phyin nas/ dgra btsam pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas/ bdag nyid shin tu dga' bar gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bus das
565b5(dkon brtsegs): khrus ni bsgrub pa dang / chu gtsang byug spos bral ba dang / bsod nams rnams ni bsgrubs pa nas/ rnam smin mchog nyid thob pa yin/ de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad cesad/
565b6(dkon brtsegs): stsol ba thos pas thams cad the tshom tu gyur nas/ the tshom gcod pa'i phyir ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di sngon sug las tsa bgyis na/
565b7(dkon brtsegs): de rnam par smin pa lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la/ mtshan sum bcu dang ldan pas bdag nyid brgyan cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrubs sor bzhis
565b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur/ ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ mthus 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ thabs kyi
566a1(dkon brtsegs): ni tam tha jug pa'i myangan las 'das pa la rnam par bzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag dge slong dba' sngon las mdzan
566a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byas pa'i rnam par smin pa yongs su smin pas na/ thams cad mngon du gyur pa yin ne zhes/ gzhan na bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher bka' stsal nas/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
566a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gal te bskal brgya lon kyang / las byas nud zar mi 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen ni tshigs pa na/ lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin/ dge slong dag khyed nyon cig/ sngon byung ba'
566a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na/ skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
566a5(dkon brtsegs): bad babs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ blan med pa'i skyes bu// khab sbyar ba/ sna dang ma'i stan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
566a6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu bang / grong khyer mnyen ldan rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dupa
566a7(dkon brtsegs): nasas mtsho ldan gyi tshil na bzhug so// de'i chi bcom ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi gzung zhig yang bde 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las de bzhin gshes
566a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongasu 'da' ba'i phyir/ rab tu byung bar bskul nas/ thabs
566b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mthang thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su rnam pa bzhag go// de'i tshen yus de'i bdag poganyen ldan zhes bya brgyal po byed de/ di ltar cho gyis mi rnan 'dul la/ mi dang skye bom
566b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ga/ lo log shing bde ga/ g.yo sgra dang chom rkun med cing / nad dang bral ba/ ba lang dang / ra lug dang / sA lu dang / bu ram shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te/ rgyal po de'i g.yas khyim
566b3(dkon brtsegs): byin po zhig yod pa yang shin tu 'dod pa la mngon pazhen cing // chag pa gyur to// rgyal po de bcoM ldan 'ad 'khor dang ban te/ mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhag pa thos na/ btsun mo dang / gzhon dang /
566b4(dkon brtsegs): be dang skye bo mang po'i tshig dang lhan cig du/ bcoM ldan 'das ga la der song ste/ bcoM ldan 'dra kyi zhapA la mag po phyag byas nas/ phyog gcig tu 'khod pa dang / de ni bcoM ldan 'ang des rgyal po 'khor dang ban
566b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lashin tu tu nom pa'i ches kyi gtam kun tu bsten cing gzeng ba spyod pa// khyud bye du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob pa grung to/ deri na 'dod pa la zhen cing khyim nu 'byung dri ma btub pa dang / be tsi/
566b6(dkon brtsegs): blon po'i bu dang / gzhan yang sngan ldan cig cetse rtse bI grig po dag gis/ kye grag pa shwe pA gi shog/ 'di ltar rgyal po'i gzhonu dang / btsun po'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po dang badz+ra te/ de bzhin gan
566b7(dkon brtsegs): brnam pa gzig ga la bder dong ste/ gus pas dam pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phag pI shes pa thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar khyod kyang mi lus shin tu thob pa dka' ba las deng thob pa gyung na/
566b8(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir 'dod pa la mngon pa la mngon par zhen cing chag nas/ sgor yang 'byung du mi btub ces smras pa dang / des kyang de skad du skye ba thos pa shin tu tsha bar gyur nas/ de dag ga rje su 'bras ste lnga
567a1(dkon brtsegs): / cig tu dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i gcung dge slong des mang ba de dag lhan cig 'grogs te ngong bA mdzang nas/ kye khyod ci'i phyir mi 'di cig pu khri nas ldan cig 'grog te 'gro zhes 'dris pa dang / de dag ni
567a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ji ltar byung bzhib tu smraso// dge slong des smras pa/ bdag ni bco ldan 'das kyis rlung yin te/ sdom khyim na gnas pa'i ni/ 'dod pa'i yul rnams la nin du mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ ston chen
567a3(dkon brtsegs): rje sa ma byus ba ba sa dge ma thang dru myed na las ngas pal banag pa na// na nga skyes pa kren pa pa gdang drag de sa bu do ga/ khyed kyi 'ang ba zhes ldan ceg khrid ngas pan
567a4(dkon brtsegs): de tha med pa'i dzin pachen po/ maldan lta de tha~Md me dang / gad ma bzhi du da pa skyebapa gyu/ zhes nas pa/ de ga dang rnyan ci grags/ pa ma ldam dragal de sa pa dag pa ma na da rgya
567a5(dkon brtsegs): sa ma sa pa nga mas pad paban du ga shAd+ha b+hU mA/ rgyud pa shes pa / 'dud du brdzun papa 'a grus bas pagapa se / 'am snu
567a6(dkon brtsegs): la na mi lags ldan 'a na pa can po 'dag pa dge 'dun dang ng+ge tsog tu seng gi gdug pa bdag gsum po sregang du blas la gsheg pa cig tu shes gsol pa dang / pacoM rnams
567a7(dkon brtsegs): dzu na ga dzin tshu ba gnas sgyu dag ga rgyas ma ma/ sa rgya dgur ba sa / pa brdza pa
567a8(dkon brtsegs): byas byas sa di shi sa ga/ rgyal bachen pa bdag pa tsa ma jug la bder mchis nas/ chos kyis dan du dang bstas nas/ 'ad pa'i dul rnams parnams pa 'dusu sto pa'i jims skye /
567b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bam par sang gi gdugs la/ bdag gi sdum par sro gang du khrus la gshegs par gsol ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen pas kyang thugs
567b2(dkon brtsegs): brtse bar dgongs nas/ gshegs par zhal gyis zhes te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i ni lha dang ma rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur pa lags na/ lus kyang grong khyer
567b3(dkon brtsegs): sprul dang srang rnams kyag dur byug nas chag nas pa ste/ mdzes par bgyi bar rigs sa zhes smras pa dang / rgyal ngas di sam du ma ldan padagrang ltung gnagasas/
567b4(dkon brtsegs): slong khyer mdzes par byams kyis/ 'on kyang bdag pa nub 'dod pa la mngon par zhen nas/ bsreg par dka' ba las/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa ni
567b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du sems nas/ nu bo shin tu legs kyis khyod song la khrus kyi yo byad ci dgos par sbyor zhig dang / ngas kyang ci nus kyis
567b6(dkon brtsegs): grang khyer brtan par bya'o zhes smras pas/ rgyal po'i bu po yang shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ rgyal po la phyag byas te langs te sang /
567b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu ba shin tu de nas rgyal pas blon pa rnams pa skyo ba/ kye khyed cag deng la grong khyer du dril chen po bsgrags te/ phyogs sna
567b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces/ sang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs gyis/ grong khyer na gnas pa dang / yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye ba rnams so/
568a1(dkon brtsegs): so nas nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis sa las dang srang rnams drug dang byas te/ chag chag btab nas me tog dang / spos da /
568a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thogs te/ ston pa chen po gshegs pa bsus shig ces sgo zhig/ blon po rnams kyis kyang gyad de bzhin 'tshal lo nas rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas/ phyogs go ba sa
568a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / dril chen gyisgra bsgrags pas/ skye bo rnams grong khyer rdo rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / bong ba rnams bsal te/ spos kyi nus klan tu khyad par chag chag btab nas/ bdug pa
568a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnams kyang sregs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bad na mang po yang btsugs te/ me tog rnams mngon par gtor bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyed mos chal
568a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba bzhin du byas so// de'i phyir rgyal ba'i nu bos kyang spos chu dang / spos mar la srogs pasgyur te/ sro gang mnges par byas nas/ khri bshams nas gang na yang gting ngo //
568a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mthar gyis grong khyer du gshegs su nye ba dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo dang / sgras dang / skye bo mang po rnams
568a7(dkon brtsegs): gro nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsdus nas/ rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ zhabs 'thing byas nas/ grong khyer du gshegs pa dga'a'amarnam
568a8(dkon brtsegs): nu 'o ngas kyang dacom ldan 'das so gang du gshegs paspyan drangs te/ sras chus stsogs babus nas/ sru bsil par gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi su gser gyi

568b1(dkon brtsegs): dog cas mtshan sum curtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byang bzang po brgyad cus yongs brgyan pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba nas shin du dang pa'i dad ba skyes par gyur to// srabasol na
568b2(dkon brtsegs): na bza' mnabs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du/ deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa la mchod pa
568b3(dkon brtsegs): cung zad bgyis pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang / tha dad pa med pa'i gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur cig/ ci ltar bcom
568b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di'i gzung 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ mthus yong su 'das te/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar gyur pa de
568b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur te/ 'di skar bdag 'dod ba'i 'phral la na
568b6(dkon brtsegs): par zhed cing chags par gyur pa na yang / mthus sred pa'i chu bo lus yongasu 'das te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gzhol bar gyur cing ces smon lam btab po// dge sa
568b7(dkon brtsegs): dag khyed kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gnyer ldan gyi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de gzhan yin du sems na/ de ltar mi lta ste/ de ni dge slong dga' bo 'di yin//
568b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs bsro gang du gshegs pas gsol nas/ spos tshul sogs pas sku bsil te/ shin tu dang pan
569a1(dkon brtsegs): / dad pas smon lam btab ba'i de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud du gyur nas/ lus gser gyi kha dog sa bur gyur pa dang / 'dod na
569a2(dkon brtsegs): yul mngon par zhen cing chags pa las ngas mthus phyung ste/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa yin
569a3(dkon brtsegs): no// de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na/ skyes bu chen po'i ma
569a4(dkon brtsegs): sum cu mngon par grub pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dis las mngon par 'dus byas pas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher snga ma bani/
569a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon 'das pa'i dus su ri thag gi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ yo byad kyis brel ba med pa zhig gnas pa de la/ skyed mos tshal me tog dang 'ja
569a6(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyas shing / chu mig dang / 'bab rgya dang / sngon zhing dang ldan pa/ rab tu 'byung ba'i dben gnas su 'os zhig yod de/ de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying rtse ba'i phyir
569a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung nas/ dben pa la gnas pa long bas/ nam 'jig can du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ de nas rang sangs rgyas zhag gcig ljongs rgyu zhing / ri brag /
569a8(dkon brtsegs): thang byed nga byin nas/ ban rgyan kun du brtags te/ gnas bsas pams/ de'i byed mas chad dbyin pa dang / byed mos tshal de srung ba'i mas 'phags pa
569a9(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'ba' zhig bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te/
569b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ bde bar gshegs sam/ mnyel bsho ba'i slad du 'phags pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol zhes smras so// des nam gyi gung thun la me'i khams la som/
569b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhugs pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis mthong nas/ 'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di lta bu'i spyod pa mchog tu grub po bskam du bsams nas/ de nas nus
569b3(dkon brtsegs): mo langs te khyim bdag ga la ba der song nas/ 'di skad du khyim bdag chen po deng dga' ba chen po bskyed cig/ bskyed mos tshal na 'phags pa zhig bdag gi thang du gshegs
569b4(dkon brtsegs): nas mtshan mo gnas pa la/ de'i spyod pa gya nom pa dang ldan zhing / rdzu 'phrul chen po phun sum tshogs pazhi ga pas/ 'od zer chen po bkye nas/ skyed mo tshal gyi nang kun du
569b5(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar byas so// zhes smras pa/ dang khyim bdag gis thos nas myur zhing rings par skyed mos tshal du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du 'phags pa bas
569b6(dkon brtsegs): nams bzhed pa lags la/ bdag ni bsod nams btsal ba lags na/ thugs rtse bar dgongs te/ skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs su gsol/ bdag gis rtag par
569b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang / des kyang gus pas gsol ba btab par mthong nas khas blangs te/ skyed mos tshal de'i nang du gnas/ bsam gtan dang /
569b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par tha rad pa mchog la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na 'di snyam du bdag gi lus rul ba 'di ni 'khor ba las
569b9(dkon brtsegs): rar/ po
570a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis gang bya ba de ni thob par gyur pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs nas/ gtan du mi skye ba'i mngon sum du bya bar rig so//
570a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdzu 'phrul rnams mngon par bstan te/ 'od zer chen po bkye nas/ steng du 'a
570a3(dkon brtsegs): bdang / cha ba dang / 'og tu chu 'bab pa la stsogs pa bstan te/ lus 'di spangs nas/ rnam par shes paskye bar mi 'gyur ba lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
570a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas khyim bdag des de'i rus bu blangs nas/ dri'i shing thams cad kyis bsregs te/ 'oms me bsad nas/ rus pa lhag ma ma lus par brdzun
570a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bum pa sar pa'i nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten brtsigs te/ bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams btsugs nas/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas dri'i chugya nom pa sum cu
570a6(dkon brtsegs): gtor te/ mtshan bzang po rnams grub par shog shig ces smon lam chen po btab bo// dge slong dag legs par nyon la/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur ba de
570a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na/ de ltar mis ste/ de ni dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis mchod pa mchog byas pa dang / gus pa dang / shin tu dang ba bskyed pa'i las kyi
570a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis deng 'dir mtshan mchog khyad par du 'phags pasum cu mngon par grub pa'i rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur pa yin no// de nas 'khor mang po rnams yang the tshom skyes
570b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// brgyan pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las c-ibagyis na/ gal te 'di rab tum byung zhing khyim na gnas par da /
570b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ gdon mi za bar stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dis bgyis par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dadaga' bos/
570b3(dkon brtsegs): rabs snga ma la las mngon par 'dus bya ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su sbyin par gyur pa'i tshe/ gdon mi za bar bdag nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs
570b4(dkon brtsegs): palang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ dge slong sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgunams che lo song drug nyi shu thub pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa
570b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba mtshan sum nA dang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul bA ra na se drang srong lhung ba'i gnas/ ri dgas byin
570b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i chen grong khyer de na rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba rgyal po byed/ 'di ltar chos kyi 'jig rten 'dul bar byed pas/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/
570b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rgyas par grong bzhin du sbyar ro// rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rab dang / 'brang dang / tha chungs so// de bzhin gzhag
570b8(dkon brtsegs): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung spangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar byin nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
571a1(dkon brtsegs): khapa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po nges gus pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung blangs te/ dri'i shing tsan+daH/
571a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'go shir sha dang / lha'i spos kyi shing la stsogs pas bsregs te 'o mas me bsad nas ring bsrel bsdus te/ rin po che'i bum pa'i nang du bcug nas
571a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten chen po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ 'khor ra 'khor yug tu ni dpag tshad gcig 'bang du drab gi tshad phyed yong pa bsdigs nas/ 'khor lo 'dzugs
571a4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu 'bring po des bdag nyid steng du 'dzegs nas/ 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so// dge slong dag de'i tshe/ de'i dus na rgyal po'i 'bring po 'bring
571a5(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi lta ste/ dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su gus pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas
571a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'khor lo bar ma btsugs pa'i dge ba'i las des tshe rabs gnyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du/ rtag par gling gcig la dbang ba'i stobs kyis 'khor los
571a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas so// tshe 'di nyid la gal te rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin du stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la dbang sgyur ba/
571a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor mang po rnams po tshom du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa dga' bo na rjen/
571b1(dkon brtsegs): las ci bgyis na/ nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po sgro rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bka' stsal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 'di ni smon lam gyi stobs las
571b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba yin te/ dge slong dag dga' bo 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ khyim nas khyim med par
571b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba las/ de'i mkhan po bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las/ dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// des ji srid 'tsho ba'i ba
571b4(dkon brtsegs): du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe de nyid las mngon par rtogs pa ci yang thob par ma gyur pas/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'di skad du/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pas
571b5(dkon brtsegs): ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci yang med pas/ bdag gis tshangs par sbyang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan
571b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'od srung gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mtshan
571b7(dkon brtsegs): yang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ nyon mong
571b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bstan pa las/ dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom
572a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las/ dbang po sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces/
572a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon lam btab pas na/ smon lam de'i stobs kyis deng 'dir nga'i bstan pa las/ nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no// 'di ltar
572a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag gang gcig gnag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag go// gang gcig tu dkar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar// gang las/
572a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ma gang yin pade ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dzin ma myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed kyis gcig tu gnag pa dang / 'dren ma las spongs la/ gcig tu dkar
572a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo/ song brag brgya pa las/ mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa'i le'u ste 'du
572a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu bzhi rdzogs s+ho// dge'o/ mang+gal/ oM ma Ni bid+den+d+he/ oM ma Ni bad+men+d+he/ oM ma Ni bad+me/ oM a m+b+ha/
572a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig zhus
